Matta 1.1: Ndaa inɗe kaakiraaɓe nder asŋgol Yeesu Almasiihu, ɓii Daawuda, ɓii Ibrahiima
Matta 1.3: Ibrahiima danyi Isiyaaku, Isiyaaku danyi Yaakubu, Yaakubu danyi Yahuuda e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum.
Matta 1.4: Yahuuda danyi Peres e Zara, Tamar woni daada maɓɓe. Peres danyi Hesruunu, Hesruunu danyi Siriya.
Matta 1.5: Siriya danyi Amminadabu, Amminadabu danyi Nahasunu, Nahasunu danyi Salmuuna,
Matta 1.6: Salmuuna danyi Bo'es, Rahab woni daada maako. Bo'es danyi Obet, Ruut woni daada maako. Obet danyi Yessa,
Matta 1.7: Yessa danyi laamiiɗo Daawuda. Daawuda danyi Suleymaanu, daada maako wonno debbo Uriya.
Matta 1.8: Suleymaanu danyi Robo'am, Robo'am danyi Abiya, Abiya danyi Asa,
Matta 1.9: Asa danyi Yosafat, Yosafat danyi Yoram. Yoram danyi Uzziya,
Matta 1.10: Uzziya danyi Yotam, Yotam danyi Akas, Akas danyi Hezekiya,
Matta 1.11: Hezekiya danyi Manassa, Manassa danyi Amon, Amon danyi Yusiya,
Matta 1.12: Yusiya danyi Yekoniya e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum saa'i daheeki
Matta 1.14: Ɓaawo daheeki Isra'iila'en haa lesdi Baabila, Yekoniya danyi Salatiyel, Salatiyel danyi Zorobaabila,
Matta 1.15: Zorobaabila danyi Abihuda, Abihuda danyi Eliyakim, Eliyakim danyi Ajora,
Matta 1.16: Ajora danyi Cadok, Cadok danyi Ahim, Ahim danyi Eliyuda,
Matta 1.17: Eliyuda danyi Eli'azaaru, Eli'azaaru danyi Mattan, Mattan danyi Yaakubu,
Matta 1.18: Yaakubu danyi Yusufu, gorko Mariyama mo danyi Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu.
Matta 1.19: Diga Ibrahiima haa Daawuda waɗi gide sappo e nayi; diga Daawuda haa daheeki Isra'iila'en haa Baabila boo waɗi gide sappo e nayi; diga daheeki Isra'iila'en haa Baabila haa Almasiihu danya boo waɗi gide sappo e nayi.
Matta 1.21: Ndaa nii danyeeki Yeesu Almasiihu laatori. Daada
Matta 1.22: maako Mariyama o kaɓɓanaaɗo Yusufu, ammaa diga ɓe ngondaay tawon, Mariyama reedi bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Matta 1.24: Yusufu kaɓɓanɗo mo o adiliijo, o yiɗaa feftugo mo yeeso yimɓe, o annini accugo mo bee sirri.
Matta 1.25: Nde o ɗonno numta haala ka'a, malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani mo nder koyɗol, wi'i mo: “Yusufu, ɓii Daawuda, taa hul ɓaŋgo Mariyama mo kaɓɓanɗa, ngam ko reeda nder maako iwi haa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Matta 1.26: O tammi danyugo ɓiɗɗo gorko, a inndan mo Yeesu, ngam kaŋko hisnata ummaatoore maako diga hakkeeji maare
Matta 1.29: Ɗum fuu ɗum laati ngam hiɓɓingo ko Jawmiraawo wi'no bee hunnduko annabiijo:
Matta 1.31: “Paanyo debbo mo annda gorko reedan, danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko,
Matta 1.33: bana wi'go: Allah ɗon wondi bee meeɗen
Matta 1.36: Nde Yusufu fini, o waɗi bana no malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo umri mo, o hoo'i debbo maako,
Matta 1.37: ammaa o hawtaay bee maako haa o danyi ɓiyiiko gorko. Yusufu inndi mo Yeesu

Matta 2.1: Yeesu danyaama haa Baytilaama, nder lesdi Yahudiya, nder zamanu laamiiɗo Hirudus. Nden annduɓe alaamaaji koode ngari diga fuunaaŋge haa Urusaliima.
Matta 2.2: Ɓe ƴami: “Toy ɓiŋngel danyaaŋgel laatiiŋgel laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en woni? Ngam min ngi'i horre maagel haa fuunaaŋge e min ngari sujidango ngel.”
Matta 2.4: Nde laamiiɗo Hirudus nani ɗum, o sakli, yimɓe Urusaliima fuu cakli.
Matta 2.5: O mooɓti mawɓe liman'en ummaatoore e moodiɓɓe tawreeta fuu, o ƴami ɓe: “Haa toy Almasiihu danyete?”
Matta 2.6: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Haa Baytilaama, nder lesdi Yahudiya. Ngam ndaa ko annabiijo winndino:
Matta 2.9: fakat a ɓuraay gure Yahudiya fuu leesugo,
Matta 2.14: Nden Hirudus ewni annduɓe alaamaaji koode go bee sirri, ɓe paamtini mo saa'i horre waŋgi.
Matta 2.15: O neli ɓe haa Baytilaama, o wi'i ɓe: “Keɓe habaru maagel bee laaɓɗum. To on tawi ngel, anndineeɗam, haa min boo mi yaha, mi sujidana ngel.”
Matta 2.17: Nde ɓe nani ko laamiiɗo wi'i ɓe, ɓe ndilli. Horre nde ɓe ngi'no haa fuunaaŋge go ardi ɓe, nde yotti dow nokkuure ɓiŋngel woni, nde dari.
Matta 2.18: Nde ɓe ngi'i horre, ɓe ceyi bee seyo maŋngo masin.
Matta 2.19: Ɓe nasti suudu, ɓe tawi ɓiŋngel e Mariyama, daada maagel. Ɓe tuggi koppi, ɓe cujidani ngel. Nden ɓe piisti doŋgle maɓɓe, ɓe ndokki ngel dokke: kaŋŋeeri e uurle daneeje guleteeɗe e uurdi baɗaadi.
Matta 2.20: Ɓaawoɗon Allah reentini ɓe nder koyɗol taa ɓe loro haa Hirudus. Ɓe kooti lesdi maɓɓe bee laawol feere.
Matta 2.22: Nde linyooɓe alaamaaji go ndilli, malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani Yusufu nder koyɗol, o wi'i: “Umma, law hoo'u ɓiŋngel e daada maagel, dillu haa Misra, jooɗa ton haa to mi yecci ma: Wartu, ngam Hirudus tammi tefugo ɓiŋngel haa o halka ngel.”
Matta 2.24: Nden Yusufu ummi, hoo'i ɓiŋngel e daada maagel, dilli Misra bee jemma.
Matta 2.25: O jooɗi ton haa yotti maayde Hirudus, ngam haa ko Jawmiraawo wi'no bee hunnduko annabiijo hiɓɓa: “Mi ewni ɓiɗɗo am, mi wurtini mo lesdi Misra
Matta 2.28: Nde Hirudus faami annduɓe alaamaaji koode go cargi mo, o tikki masin, o neli, ɓe mbari ɓikkoy ngorkoy haa Baytilaama e gure taariiɗe ngo fuu, diga markoy duuɓi ɗiɗi bee koy cikaay duuɓi ɗiɗi, fodde saa'iire nde annduɓe alaamaaji anndini mo baŋguki horre go bee laaɓɗum.
Matta 2.34: o yiɗaa de'itineego, ngam koy maayi
Matta 2.37: Nde Hirudus maayi, malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani Yusufu nder koyɗol haa Misra,
Matta 2.38: o wi'i mo: “Umma, hoo'u ɓiŋngel bee daada maagel, hootu lesdi Isra'iila, ngam tefnooɓe mbarugo ɓiŋngel go maayi.”
Matta 2.40: Yusufu ummi, hoosi ɓiŋngel e daada maagel, hooti lesdi Isra'iila.
Matta 2.41: Ammaa nde o nani Arkilawus roni laamu baaba muuɗum Hirudus dow lesdi Yahudiya, o huli yahugo ton. Ammaa Allah reentini mo nder koyɗol, o yehi haa lesdi Galiili,
Matta 2.42: o jooɗi nder berniwol bi'eteeŋgol Nasaratu. Ɗum waɗi non ngam hiɓɓingo bolle annabi'en, anndinɓe: “O bi'eteeɗo Nasaratuujo

Matta 3.1: Wakkati man Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma waŋgi, o fuɗɗi waazaago nder ladde hamaadaare Yahudiya.
Matta 3.5: Yuhanna woni mo Esaaya wolwino dow muuɗum, wi'i:
Matta 3.11: Yuhanna ɗon ɓorni limce kuuwraaɗe bee gaasa ngeelooba, o ɗon taadi taadorgol laral, baɓɓatti e njumri ladde ngoni nyaamdu maako
Matta 3.13: Yimɓe Urusaliima e lesdi Yahudiya e lesdi kommbi maayo Urdun fuu, ngari haa maako.
Matta 3.14: Ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe, Yuhanna boo waɗani ɓe baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
Matta 3.16: Nde Yuhanna yi'i Farisa'en e Saduki'en ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ngara haa maako ngam o waɗana ɓe baptisma, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɓiɓɓe poosokje, moy wi'i on on kisan tikkere Allah warannde
Matta 3.18: Nden kam kuuwe kuuɗe ɗe mbaŋginta on tuubi.
Matta 3.19: Taa nume nder ɓerɗe mooɗon: Ibrahiima woni kaaka amin. Ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, Allah woodi baawɗe waɗango Ibrahiima ɓiɓɓe bee kaa'e ɗe'e
Matta 3.21: Fe'irde ɗon taaski ngam fe'ugo lekki diga ɗaɗi mum, lekki ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe fuu ki fe'e, ki wudine nder yiite
Matta 3.23: Min mi ɗon waɗana on baptisma bee ndiyam ngam tuubu mooɗon. Ammaa garanɗo ɓaawo am waɗanan on baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e bee yiite. Kaŋko o ɓuri yam baawɗe piw. Mi he'aay koo fiistugo ɓoggi paɗe maako.
Matta 3.24: O woodi jaartirɗum haa juŋngo maako ngam senndirgo alkamaari bee nyaande. O mooɓtan alkamaari haa beembal maako, ammaa o wulan nyaande bee yiite nge nyifataa sam.”
Matta 3.26: Nden Yeesu ummi lesdi Galiili, wari maayo Urdun ngam haa Yuhanna waɗana mo baptisma.
Matta 3.27: Yuhanna jaɓaay, wi'i mo: “Min maa, mi woodi haaje a waɗanammi baptisma, nden nii ngara haa am!”
Matta 3.28: Ammaa Yeesu jaabi mo: “Yerda ɗum jonta, ngam ɗum pottuɗum kebbitinen adilaaku fuu.”
Matta 3.30: waɗani mo baptisma. Nde Yeesu wurti ndiyam, asamanji maɓɓiti, o yi'i Ruuhu Allah ɗon jippo bana poola, ɗon wara dow maako.
Matta 3.31: Sawtu boo iwi haa asama, wi'i: “Oo woni
Matta 3.33: am giɗaaɗo, mi ɗon seyoro ɗum masin

Matta 4.1: Nden Ruuhu Allah yahri Yeesu haa ladde hamaadaare ngam haa Iblisa jarribo mo
Matta 4.3: Yeesu waɗi suumaye nyalawmaaje e jemmaaje cappanɗe nayi, nden o maati dolo.
Matta 4.6: Allah kam, umru kaa'e ɗe'e laato nyaamdu.”
Matta 4.7: Yeesu jaabi: “Deftere wi'i: Neɗɗo yeeɗirtaa nyaamdu tan, ammaa bee wolde nde Allah wolwi fuu
Matta 4.10: Nden Iblisa yahri mo haa berniwol ceniiŋgol, jo'ini mo dow yeereere
Matta 4.15: Allah kam, diw diga ɗo haa lesdi, ngam Deftere wi'i:
Matta 4.16: Allah umran malaa'ika'en muuɗum ngam maaɗa,
Matta 4.17: ɓe taɓɓo ma bee juuɗe maɓɓe,
Matta 4.18: ngam taa kosɗe ma pergo dow hayre
Matta 4.21: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Deftere wi'i boo: Taa jarriba Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa
Matta 4.24: Fahin Iblisa yahri mo dow hooseere townde masin, o sappini mo laamuuji duniyaaru e tedduŋgal maaji fuu,
Matta 4.25: o wi'i mo: “Ɗum fuu mi hokkete to a tuggi koppi, a sujidani yam.”
Matta 4.27: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Dillu, accam, an Sayɗaanu, ngam Deftere wi'i: Sujidan Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa tan, kaŋko feere maako a rewata
Matta 4.30: Nden Iblisa acci Yeesu, malaa'ika'en ngari, njaggani mo.
Matta 4.32: Nde Yeesu nani ɓe nastini Yuhanna suudu daŋngay
Matta 4.35: O wurti Nasaratu, o yehi, o jooɗoyi haa Kafarnahum kommbi fomoonde weendu Galiili, nder lesɗe Zabulon e Neftali
Matta 4.37: ngam haa bolle ɗe annabi Esaaya wolwino kiɓɓa:
Matta 4.40: haa laawol yahugo mbeela e gaɗa maayo Urdun
Matta 4.41: e Galiili haa ummaatooje goɗɗe ngoni,
Matta 4.43: ummaatoore jooɗiinde nder nyiɓre yi'i annoora makka.
Matta 4.44: Jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi e nyiɓre maayde boo,
Matta 4.48: Diga saa'i man Yeesu fuɗɗi waazugo. O wi'i: “Tuube, ngam laamu asamanji ɓaditake
Matta 4.51: Nde Yeesu ɗon saalo kommbi weendu Galiili, o yi'i deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo: Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyer e Andire deerɗum. Ɓe ɗonno ngubo zubaawol nder weendu ngam ɓe waawooɓe liɗɗi.
Matta 4.52: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Tokkeeɗam, mi waɗan on waawooɓe yimɓe.”
Matta 4.53: Law ɓe acci zubaaji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
Matta 4.55: O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o yi'i deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo: Yaakuba ɓii Zebede e Yuhanna deerɗiiko. Ɓe ɗonno nder koommbowal
Matta 4.56: bee baaba maɓɓe Zebede, ɓe ɗon mbo'itina zubaaji maɓɓe, o ewni ɓe.
Matta 4.57: Law ɓe acci koommbowal e baaba maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
Matta 4.59: Yeesu yilli lesdi Galiili fuu, o ekkitini Yahuudu'en nder cuuɗi dewal maɓɓe, o waazini kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu asamanji, o nyawndi yimɓe diga nyawuji feere feere fuu caka ummaatoore
Matta 4.61: Habaru maako saŋkiti nder lesdi Siriya fuu. Ɓe ngaddani mo torraaɓe nyawuji feere feere e yinnaaɓe e marɓe paɗɗe e jiijiiɓe, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Matta 4.62: Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde tokki mo. Ɓe ngari diga lesdi Galiili e Gure-sappo e Urusaliima e lesdi Yahudiya e lesdi gaɗa maayo Urdun.

Matta 5.1: Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde nde'e, o wa'i hooseere, o jooɗi. Pukara'en
Matta 5.3: O fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓe, o wi'i:
Matta 5.5: “Barka laatanto annduɓe ko'e muuɗum'en ɓe talaka'en fodde Ruuhu, ngam kamɓe njeyi laamu asamanji.
Matta 5.7: Barka laatanto woyanɓe, ngam Allah de'itinan ɓe
Matta 5.10: Barka laatanto yaŋkiniiɓe, ngam ɓe ndonan lesdi
Matta 5.13: Barka laatanto ɗaɓɓanɓe waɗugo muuyo Allah bee ɓernde fuu, ngam Allah hokkan ɓe ko ɓe ɗaɓɓi
Matta 5.16: Barka laatanto enɗooɓe, ngam Allah enɗan ɓe.
Matta 5.18: Barka laatanto laaɓa-ɓerɗe'en, ngam ɓe ngi'an Allah
Matta 5.21: Barka laatanto sulhindiranɓe yimɓe, ngam ɓe wi'eteeɓe ɓiɓɓe Allah.
Matta 5.23: Barka laatanto toonyaaɓe ngam ɓe ɗon ngaɗa ko Allah yiɗi, ngam kamɓe njeyi laamu asamanji
Matta 5.26: Barka laatanto on, to yimɓe kuɗi on malla toonyi on malla mbaɗi tufle feere feere dow mooɗon daliila am
Matta 5.29: Ceye, mbelmbelte masin ngam Allah warjoto on mbarjaari ɗuuɗndi haa asamanji. Bana non ɓe toonyino annabi'en aartuɓe on
Matta 5.32: “Onon ngoni mannda ngam duniyaaru: Ammaa to lammeeŋga mannda ittake, noy ɗam heɓtirta lammeeŋga maajam fahin? Mannda man nafataa sam, sey wudingo ɗam yaasi tan, yimɓe njaaɓan ɗam
Matta 5.35: Onon ngoni annoora ngam duniyaaru, berniwol nyiɓaaŋgol dow hooseere wiirnataako sam
Matta 5.37: Ɓe njamnataa boo pittirla ngam suuɗugo nga les bokoti. Ammaa ɓe njo'ina nga dow jo'inirɗum pittirla, haa nga yaynana wonɓe nder suudu man fuu
Matta 5.39: Sey annoora mooɗon yayna bana non yeeso yimɓe, ngam haa ɓe ndaara kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe, ɓe teddina Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama
Matta 5.42: “Taa nume mi wari fiistugo tawreeta Muusa malla bolle annabi'en. Mi waraay ngam fiistugo ɗum, ammaa ngam hiɓɓingo ɗum.
Matta 5.43: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: No asama e lesdi nduurdi fuu, walaa koo harfeere ɓurdunde famɗugo malla toɓɓere woore haa tawreeta Muusa wudinte, haa to kuuje fuu laatake
Matta 5.45: Ngam man koo moy luuti umroore ɓurdunde famɗugo nder tawreeta malla ekkitini woɗɓe waɗugo bana non, laatoto ɓurduɗo leesugo nder laamu asamanji. Ammaa koo moy jogi ɗe, ekkitini woɗɓe boo jogaago ɗe, kaŋko o laatoto mawɗo nder laamu asamanji.
Matta 5.46: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: On keɓataa nastugo laamu asamanji sam, sonaa to adilaaku mooɗon ɓuri ngu moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en.”
Matta 5.48: “On nani ko wi'a haa kaakiraaɓe meeɗen: Taa mbar-hoore. Koo moy mbari goɗɗo, he'i hiiteego
Matta 5.50: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo moy tikkani deerɗum, he'i yahreego yeeso alkaali. Koo moy wi'i deerɗum: A meereejo, he'i yahreego yeeso hiitooɓe nder dawriinde. Koo moy wi'i deerɗum: A ginnaaɗo, ɗum he'i nastingo mo nder yiite jahannama.
Matta 5.51: Ngam maajum to a wari haa hirsirde bee dokkal ma, ton a siftori woodi deerɗiraawo ma ɗon tikkani ma,
Matta 5.52: nden kam accu dokkal maaɗa haa hirsirde ton, yah law, sulhotir bee deerɗa tawon. Nden a loro, a lii'ano Allah dokkal maaɗa.
Matta 5.54: To goɗɗo wullake ma, nden on ɗon njahda haa alkaali, yaaw narrugo bee maako law diga on ɗon dow laawol tawon, ngam taa o yahre haa juŋngo alkaali, alkaali boo hokke haa juuɗe sooje'en, ɓe nastine fursina
Matta 5.56: Gooŋga mbi'anmaami: A wurtataako ton sam, sonaa to a yoɓi ko o tokki ma fuu.”
Matta 5.58: “On nani ɗum wi'aama: Taa waɗ njeenu
Matta 5.60: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo moy to laari debbo bee suuno, waɗi njeenu bee muuɗum nder ɓernde muuɗum.
Matta 5.61: To yiitere ma nyaamre laatanake ma fergere, ɗoof nde, wudin nde daayiiɗum. Ngam ndikka a majjina tergal ɓanndu ma gootal dow ɓanndu ma fuu wube nder yiite jahannama
Matta 5.63: To juŋngo ma nyaamo laatanake ma fergere, ta'u ngo, wudin ngo daayiiɗum. Ngam ndikka a majjina tergal ɓanndu ma gootal dow ɓanndu ma fuu nasta yiite jahannama
Matta 5.66: “Ɗum wi'aama boo: Mo yiɗi seerugo debbo mum, sey hokka mo ɗereewol ceergal
Matta 5.68: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo moy seeri debbo muuɗum, naa ngam debbo oo njeeni, nden kam o laatini mo jeenoowo. Koo moy te'i debbo ceeraaɗo boo, waɗi njeenu
Matta 5.71: “On nani boo ko wi'a kaakiraaɓe meeɗen: Taa huna dow fewre, ammaa hebbin hunayeere ma yeeso Jawmiraawo
Matta 5.73: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Taa kunore sam, koo bee asama, ngam ɗum leeso laamu Allah
Matta 5.75: koo bee lesdi, ngam ɗum jaaɓruɗum kosɗe Allah, koo bee Urusaliima boo, ngam ɗum berniwol Laamiiɗo Mawɗo
Matta 5.77: Taa kunore koo bee ko'e mon boo, ngam on mbaawataa wartirgo gaasa mooɗon ndaneeha malla ɓaleeha.
Matta 5.78: Sey ooho mooɗon laato ooho, aa'a mooɗon boo laato aa'a tan, ngam wolwugo ko ɓuri non, iwi haa Kalluɗo.”
Matta 5.80: “On nani ɗum wi'aama: Yiitere bee yiitere, nyiindere bee nyiindere
Matta 5.82: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Taa mbaate baɗɗo on halleende. To goɗɗo maari ma haa galaŋgal nyaamal, waylitan mo nanal boo.
Matta 5.83: To goɗɗo yiɗi wullaago ma ngam o jaɓta toggoyel maaɗa, accu mo o hoosa ngapaleewol maaɗa boo.
Matta 5.84: To goɗɗo dooli ma yahugo kilomeetir gootel, yah kilomeetir ɗiɗi.
Matta 5.85: To goɗɗo ƴami ma huunde, hokku mo nde. To goɗɗo ƴami ma nyamaande, taa salana mo.”
Matta 5.87: “On nani ɗum wi'aama: Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo ma, a wanya konneejo ma
Matta 5.89: Ammaa min mi ɗon wi'a on: Ngiɗe konne'en mooɗon, tore Allah ngam toonyiiɓe on,
Matta 5.90: ngam haa on laato ɓiɓɓe Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama. O ɗon fuɗna naaŋge maako dow halluɓe e wooɗɓe fuu, o ɗon toɓna iyeende dow adili'en e dow sooya-adilaaku'en.
Matta 5.91: Mbarjaari ndiye Allah tammi hokkugo on to on ngiɗi yiɗɓe on tan? Koo jomnooɓe boo ɗon mbaɗa bana non!
Matta 5.92: To on ɗon koofna banndiraaɓe mooɗon tan, on mbaɗi huunde kaayeefiire na? Koo heefeerɓe boo ɗon mbaɗa bana non!
Matta 5.93: Laate on timmuɓe, bana Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama o timmuɗo

Matta 6.1: “Kakkile: Taa kuuwe kuuɗe adilaaku ngam yimɓe ngi'a on. To on mbaɗi non, on keɓataa mbarjaari haa Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama
Matta 6.4: To a ɗon hokka talakaajo huunde, taa wooynu ɗum, bana naafiki'en mbaɗata nder cuuɗi dewal e dow laabi. Ɓe ɗon mbaɗa non ngam yimɓe teddina ɓe. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɓe keɓi mbarjaari maɓɓe, jinni.
Matta 6.5: Ammaa an, to a ɗon hokka talakaajo huunde, taa juŋngo ma nano anndita ko nyaamo waɗata,
Matta 6.6: ngam haa dokkal ma wona nder cuuɗiiɗum, Baabiraawo ma gi'anɗo ko mbaɗata nder cuuɗiiɗum, warjoto ma.”
Matta 6.8: “Nde on ɗon mbaɗa do'a fuu, taa laate bana naafiki'en. Kamɓe ɓe ngiɗi daraago nder cuuɗi dewal e haa kawtirɗe laabi, ɓe mbaɗa do'a ngam yimɓe ngi'a ɓe. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɓe keɓi mbarjaari maɓɓe, jinni
Matta 6.10: Ammaa an, nde a yiɗi waɗugo do'a fuu, nastu suudu ma, maɓɓu dammugal, nden tora Baabiraawo ma gonɗo nder cuuɗiiɗum, Baabiraawo ma gi'anɗo ko mbaɗata nder cuuɗiiɗum, warjoto ma.
Matta 6.12: To on ɗon mbaɗa do'a, taa ɗuɗɗine bolle meereeje bana heefeerɓe mbaɗata. Ɓe ɗon tammo Allah nanan do'a maɓɓe to ɓe ɗuɗɗini bolle.
Matta 6.13: Taa mbaɗe bana maɓɓe, ngam Baabiraawo mooɗon anndi haaje mooɗon diga on ciwaa toraago mo.”
Matta 6.15: Ngam man, onon, to on ɗon mbaɗa do'a, ndaa nii mbi'oton:
Matta 6.17: a Ceniiɗo, waɗ koo moy teddina innde ma.
Matta 6.23: Hokku min nyaamdu deydey haaje amin hannde.
Matta 6.25: Yaafana min aybeeji amin, bana no minin boo
Matta 6.29: Aynu min ngam taa min nasta jarribeeki,
Matta 6.31: [Ngam an mari laamu e baawɗe e tedduŋgal,
Matta 6.34: To on njaafanake woɗɓe aybeeji muuɗum'en, Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama yaafanto on boo.
Matta 6.35: Ammaa to on njaafanaaki woɗɓe, nden kam Baabiraawo mooɗon boo yaafantaako on hakkeeji mooɗon
Matta 6.38: “Nde on ɗon cuumo fuu, taa mbaɗe bana naafiki'en: Ɓe ɗon nyiɓɓina geese maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon nyobba ɗe ngam haa yimɓe ngi'a ɓe ɗon cuumi. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɓe keɓi mbarjaari maɓɓe, jinni.
Matta 6.39: Ammaa an, to a ɗon suumo, sulmu e wuja yeeso ma,
Matta 6.40: ngam taa yimɓe anndita a ɗon suumi. Sey Baabiraawo ma gonɗo nder cuuɗiiɗum kaŋko tan anndi. O ɗon yi'a ko mbaɗata nder cuuɗiiɗum, o warjoto ma.”
Matta 6.42: “Taa paggane ko'e mooɗon jawdi haa duniyaaru, haa gilɗi e peewol mbonnata ɗum, haa wuyɓe boo ngasata cuuɗi, ngujja ɗum
Matta 6.44: Ammaa paggane ko'e mooɗon jawdi haa asama, haa ton gilɗi e peewol mbaawataa wonnugo ndi, wuyɓe boo mbaawataa sumpititgo cuuɗi, ngujja ndi.
Matta 6.45: Ngam haa jawdi maaɗa woni, ton ɓernde maaɗa boo wonata.”
Matta 6.47: “Gite laati pittirla ɓanndu. To gite maaɗa njame, ɓanndu maaɗa fuu ɗon nder annoora.
Matta 6.48: Ammaa to gite maaɗa njamɗaay, ɓanndu ma fuu ɗon nder nyiɓre. Ngam maajum to annoora ngonka nder ma nyiɓɓi, nden kam nyiɓre man nyiɓɓan jamum.”
Matta 6.50: “Walaa mo waawata jagganaago jaagorɓe ɗiɗo, ngam o wanyan oo e o yiɗan oya malla o ɗakkotira bee oo e o meeriɗina oya. On mbaawataa jagganaago Allah e jawdi.”
Matta 6.52: “Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Taa caklane nguure mooɗon, waato ko on nyaamata malla ko on njarata malla ko on ɓornoto. Yoŋki ɓuri nyaamdu saman, ɓanndu boo ɓuri limce saman, naa non na?
Matta 6.53: Ndaare colli: Ɗi aawataa, ɗi codataa, ɗi mooɓtataa koo ɗume nder beembe, ammaa Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama ɗon nyaamna ɗi. On ɓurataa ɗi saman piw na?
Matta 6.54: Moy caka mooɗon waawi ɓesdugo balɗe muuɗum koo seɗɗa bee saklere muuɗum?
Matta 6.56: Ngam ɗume on caklanto haala limce? Ndaare pinndi ladde no ndi mawnirta. Ndi huuwataa, ndi sannyataa,
Matta 6.57: ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: koo Suleymaanu bee daraja muuɗum fuu meeɗaay ɓornaago limce booɗɗe bana ngoori man
Matta 6.59: Allah ɓorni huɗooji ɗi tawe hannde nder ladde, jaŋngo boo ɗi cakkine nder yiite. To non kam, o ɓornataa on ko ɓuri non na, onon famɗa-nuɗɗinki'en?
Matta 6.60: Ngam maajum taa cakle ko'e mooɗon bee wi'go: Ɗume min nyaamata? Malla: Ɗume min njarata? Malla: Ɗume min ɓornoto?
Matta 6.61: Heefeerɓe cuklanto kuuje ɗe'e nde weeti fuu. Ammaa Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama anndi on ngoodi haaje kuuje ɗe'e fuu.
Matta 6.62: Aarte suklanaago laamu Allah e adilaaku muuɗum, nden kam o hokkan on kuuje ɗe'e fuu bana ɓesdaari
Matta 6.64: Taa caklane haala jaŋngo, ngam jaŋngo saklanto hoore muuɗum. Nyalaade fuu, torra maare he'i nde.”

Matta 7.1: “Taa laate hiitooɓe woɗɓe ngam taa Allah hiito on.
Matta 7.2: Ngam Allah hiitoto on bana on kiitori woɗɓe, o etanan on bee etirgal ngal on etirani woɗɓe
Matta 7.4: Koni a ɗon yi'a kuɗel haa yiitere deerɗa, ammaa a hakkilantaa leggal gonŋgal nder yiitere ma?
Matta 7.5: Noy mbi'rata deerɗa: Accu mi ittane kuɗel haa yiitere ma, an maa, leggal ɗon nder yiitere maaɗa!
Matta 7.6: An naafikiijo, aartu ittugo leggal gonŋgal haa yiitere maaɗa, nden kam a yi'an laaɓɗum, haa a itta kuɗel nder yiitere deerɗa.
Matta 7.7: Taa ndokke dawaaɗi huunde seniinde, ngam taa ɗi loro dow mooɗon, ɗi ceeka on. Taa cakkinane gaduuji luuluuje mon, ngam taa ɗi ndamma ɗe bee kosɗe maaji.”
Matta 7.9: “Tore, on keɓan. Ɗaɓɓite, on tawan. Cilmine, ɓe maɓɓitanan on.
Matta 7.10: Ngam koo moy tori, heɓan. Koo moy ɗaɓɓiti, tawan. Koo moy silmini boo, ɓe maɓɓitanan mo.
Matta 7.11: Moyjo caka mooɗon, to ɓiŋngel muuɗum ƴami ɗum nyiiri, o hokkan ngel hayre?
Matta 7.12: Malla to ngel ƴami ɗum liiŋgu, o hokkan ngel mboodi?
Matta 7.13: Onon halluɓe maa, on anndi hokkugo ɓiɓɓe mooɗon kuuje booɗɗe. Sakkomaa Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama, o ɓurataa hokkugo kuuje booɗɗe haa torotooɓe mo na?
Matta 7.15: Ngam maajum mbaɗane yimɓe ko ngiɗɗon ɓe mbaɗana on fuu. Kanjum Tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en caawi
Matta 7.18: “Nastire dammugal paaɗŋgal. Ngam dammugal jaasŋgal e laawol jaasŋgol ɗon njahra haa halkere, ɗuuɗɓe ɗon tokko ton.
Matta 7.19: Ammaa dammugal paaɗŋgal e laawol paaɗŋgol ɗon njahra haa ngeendam, tawɓe ngol ɗuuɗaay.”
Matta 7.21: “Ndeente e fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en, waranɓe haa mooɗon nder laral baali, ammaa nder maɓɓe ɓe caafaali kaaŋaaɗi.
Matta 7.22: On annditan ɓe nder kuuɗe maɓɓe. Gi'e ndimataa inabooje, giŋngille boo ndimataa ibbe.
Matta 7.23: Non boo, lekki booɗki ɗon rima ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe, lekki kalluki boo ɗon rima ɓiɓɓe kalluɗe.
Matta 7.24: Lekki booɗki rimataa ɓiɓɓe kalluɗe, lekki kalluki boo rimataa ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe.
Matta 7.25: Lekki ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe fuu, ɓe pe'an ki, ɓe ngudina ki nder yiite
Matta 7.27: Bana non boo on annditiran fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en bee kuuɗe maɓɓe
Matta 7.30: “Annde, naa wi'anɓe yam: Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo fuu nastata laamu asamanji, sey waɗanɓe muuyo Baabiraawo am mo asama.
Matta 7.31: Nyalaade man, ɗuuɗɓe mbi'atam: Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo! Naa bee innde ma min mbaɗi annabaaku, min ndiiwi ginnaaji e min mbaɗi kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi!
Matta 7.32: Nden mi wi'an ɓe bee baŋguɗum: Mi meeɗaay anndugo on sam, onon waɗooɓe halleende, ndille
Matta 7.35: “Ngam maajum koo moy nani bolle ɗe'e, ɗowtani ɗe, nanndi bee goɗɗo marɗo hakkiilo, mahɗo suudu mum dow tapaare.
Matta 7.36: Iyeende toɓi, maaje ngaddi ndiyam, keni ummi dow suudu man, ammaa ndu yibbaay, ngam ndu mahaandu dow tapaare.
Matta 7.37: Ammaa koo moy nani bolle ɗe'e, ɗowtanaaki ɗe, nanndi bee goɗɗo mo walaa hakkiilo, mahɗo suudu muuɗum dow njaareendi.
Matta 7.38: Iyeende toɓi, maaje ngaddi ndiyam, keni mbaɗi dow suudu man, ndu yibbi yibbere hallunde.”
Matta 7.40: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo bolle ɗe'e, ekkitinol maako hayɗini mooɓe fuu,
Matta 7.41: ngam o ekkitinaay ɓe bana moodiɓɓe tawreeta ekkitinirta, ammaa bana marɗo baawɗe

Matta 8.1: Nden Yeesu jippi hooseere go, mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe tokki mo.
Matta 8.2: Kuturuujo ɓaditi mo, tuggi koppi yeeso maako, wi'i: “Moodibbo, to a muuyi, a waawan yamɗitingo yam.”
Matta 8.3: Yeesu forti juŋngo muuɗum, meemi mo, nden wi'i: “Mi muuyi, a yamɗita!” Law kuturuujo go yamɗiti diga saɗawre muuɗum.
Matta 8.4: Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Hakkil: Taa yeccu koo moy haala ka sam, ammaa yah haa limanjo, hollu mo hoore ma. Nden lii'a dokkal bana Muusa umri, ngam seedaago yeeso yimɓe fuu a laaɓi
Matta 8.7: Yeesu nasti Kafarnahum. Goɗɗo Romaajo, mawɗo dow sooje'en teemerre, ɓaditi, tori mo ballal,
Matta 8.8: wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, suka am ɗon waali haa saare, o nyawɗo, o waawataa dimmbaago, o torraaɗo masin.”
Matta 8.9: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Mi yahan yamɗitingo mo.”
Matta 8.10: Ammaa mawɗo sooje'en go wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, mi he'aay a nasta saare am. Wi' wolde woore tan, nden suka am yamɗitan.
Matta 8.11: Min boo mi woodi mawɓe dow am, mi woodi sooje'en boo les baawɗe am. To mi wi'i oo: Yah, o yahan. To mi wi'i oya boo: War, o waran. To mi wi'i suka am: Waɗ nii, o waɗan.”
Matta 8.13: Nde Yeesu nani bolle maako ɗe'e, o hayɗini, o wi'i tokkiiɓe mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Mi meeɗaay tawugo nuɗɗinki makki bana ki'i koo haa moy nder Isra'iila fuu.
Matta 8.14: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Ɗuuɗɓe ngaran diga fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge, ɓe nyaamdan bee Ibrahiima e Isiyaaku e Yaakubu nder laamu asamanji
Matta 8.16: Ammaa yimɓe ɓe Allah suɓino ngam laamu muuɗum, ɓe wudinteeɓe yaasi nder nyiɓre nyiɓɓunde, ɓe mboyan, ɓe kirƴindiran nyii'e ton
Matta 8.18: Yeesu wi'i mawɗo sooje'en go: “Hootu saare ma, ɗum laatante bana a nuɗɗini.” Suka maako yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Matta 8.20: Yeesu yehi saare Piyer, tawi esiraawo Piyer debbo, ɗon waali nyawɗo yontere.
Matta 8.21: Yeesu meemi juŋngo maako, yontere acci mo, o ummi, o weerni Yeesu.
Matta 8.23: Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, ɓe ngaddi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, marɓe ginnaaji. Yeesu riiwi ginnaaji bee wolde mum, yamɗitini nyawɓe fuu.
Matta 8.24: O waɗi non ngam hiɓɓingo ko annabi Esaaya wi'i: “O hooci tampe meeɗen e o roondi nyawuji meeɗen
Matta 8.27: Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde ɗon taari mo, o umri pukara'en maako, ɓe eera gaɗa weendu.
Matta 8.28: Goɗɗo nder moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɓaditi mo, wi'i: “Moodibbo, mi tokkete koo toy njahata fuu.”
Matta 8.29: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Doldolɗe ngoodi gasɗe, colli boo ngoodi caɓɓe, ammaa
Matta 8.32: Goɗɗo feere nder pukara'en maako wi'i: “Moodibbo, duŋanam mi yaha, mi uwoya baaba am tawon.”
Matta 8.33: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Tokkam, accu maayɓe uwa maayɓe muuɗum'en.”
Matta 8.37: Law henndu saatundu ummi dow weendu haa ƴuuge ndiyam cuddi koommbowal. Ammaa Yeesu ɗon ɗaani.
Matta 8.38: Pukara'en ngari haa maako, pindini mo, mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, hisnu min, min kalki!”
Matta 8.39: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ngam ɗume kultorɗon, onon famɗa-nuɗɗinki'en?” Nden o ummi, o telɓani keni e weendu, de'ere mawnde waɗi.
Matta 8.40: Yimɓe kayɗini, mbi'i: “Goɗɗo moy oo, haa keni bee weendu fuu ɗon ɗowtano mo?”
Matta 8.42: Nde Yeesu yotti gaɗa weendu nder lesdi Gadarena'en, marɓe ginnaaji ɗiɗo ngurti genaale, potti bee maako. Ɓe hulniiɓe masin, walaa mo saalotono laawol man.
Matta 8.45: ɗume ngiɗɗa haa amin? A wari torrugo min diga wakkati siwaa na?”
Matta 8.46: Woodino tokkere gaduuji ɗuuɗɗi haa nokkuure man, daayiiɗum seɗɗa, ɗi ɗon ndura.
Matta 8.47: Ginnaaji go tori Yeesu, mbi'i: “To a yiɗi riiwugo min, nel min nder tokkere gaduuji nde.”
Matta 8.48: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɗi: “Njehe.” Ɗi ngurti, ɗi nasti gaduuji. Gaduuji man caamni, ndo'i diga dow fomoonde townde nder weendu, ɗi mbaati ton.
Matta 8.50: Durooɓe gaduuji go ndoggi, ndilli haa wuro, ngecci yimɓe ko waɗi fuu e ko laatani marnooɓe ginnaaji ɗiɗo boo.
Matta 8.51: Yimɓe wuro fuu ngurti ngam fottugo bee Yeesu. Nde ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe tori mo o acca lesdi maɓɓe.

Matta 9.3: Ɓe ngaddani mo waata-terɗeejo, ɓe ɗon ndoondi mo dow be'itte. Nde Yeesu yi'i nuɗɗinki maɓɓe, o wi'i waata-terɗeejo: “Ɓiŋngel am, tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama.”
Matta 9.4: Moodiɓɓe tawreeta woɗɓe numi: “Gorko oo ɗon wolwa kalluka dow Allah.”
Matta 9.5: Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe, o wi'i: “Koni numoton numooji kalluɗi?
Matta 9.6: Ko ɓuri hoygo? Wi'go mo: Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama naa malla wi'go mo: Umma, yah?
Matta 9.7: Ammaa ngam haa mi faamtina on
Matta 9.9: woodi baawɗe yaafaago hakkeeji nder duniyaaru…” Nden o wi'i waata-terɗeejo go: “Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, hootu saare ma.”
Matta 9.11: O ummi, o hooti saare maako.
Matta 9.12: Nde yimɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kultori, ɓe teddini Allah ngam o hokki ɓiɓɓe Adaama baawɗe bana ɗe'e.
Matta 9.14: Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, dilli. Nden o yi'i bi'eteeɗo Matta ɗon jooɗi haa baariki jomorgol. Yeesu wi'i mo: “Tokkam.” Matta ummi, tokki mo.
Matta 9.16: Nde Yeesu ɗon nyaamda bee pukara'en muuɗum haa saare Matta, jomnooɓe woɗɓe e hakke'en ngari nyaamdi bee maɓɓe.
Matta 9.17: Farisa'en ngi'i ɗum, ƴami pukara'en Yeesu: “Koni moodibbo mooɗon ɗon nyaamda bee jomnooɓe e hakke'en
Matta 9.19: Yeesu nani ko ɓe mbi'i, nden o wi'i ɓe: “Yamɓe ngalaa haaje kurgoowo, sey nyawɓe.
Matta 9.20: Ndille, ekkite ko saawi nder bolle ɗe'e: Enɗam ngiɗmi, naa dabbaaji kirsaaɗi. Mi waraay ewnaago adili'en, ammaa hakke'en
Matta 9.23: Nden pukara'en Yuhanna ngari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume minin bee Farisa'en min ɗon cuumo, ammaa pukara'en maaɗa cuumataako?”
Matta 9.24: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Kadi on tammi ewnaaɓe haa ɓaŋgal cunoto saa'i ɓe ɗon ngondi bee ɓaŋɗo na? Naa non sam! Wakkati waran ɓaŋɗo tawataake bee maɓɓe, saa'i maajum ɓe cuumoto.
Matta 9.26: Walaa mo takkata leppel kesel dow limce kiiɗɗe, ngam leppel kesel fooɗan limce kiiɗɗe, nden ceekgol man tullitan.
Matta 9.27: Walaa mo loowata inaboojam kesam nder kanyakanyaaji
Matta 9.28: kiiɗɗi boo. Ngam inaboojam kesam seekan ɗi, ɗam rufa, kanyakanyaaji boo mbonnoto. Ammaa ɓe loowan inaboojam kesam nder kanyakanyaaji kesi, nden kam walaa ko wonnoto.”
Matta 9.30: Saa'i Yeesu ɗon wolwana ɓe bolle ɗe'e, mawɗo feere wari haa maako, tuggi koppi, wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am deyel maayi jonta nii. Ammaa useni, war, wallin juŋngo maaɗa dow maagel, nden ngel yeeɗitan.”
Matta 9.31: Yeesu ummi, kaŋko bee pukara'en maako, ɓe tokki mo.
Matta 9.33: Woodi debbo torraaɗo nyawu ilugo ƴiiƴam waɗi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi. O ɓaditi gal ɓaawo Yeesu, o meemi gawargal limce Yeesu,
Matta 9.34: ngam o numno: “To mi meemi koo limce maako tan, mi yamɗitan.”
Matta 9.35: Yeesu yeesiti, laari mo, wi'i mo: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, ɓiŋngel am, nuɗɗinki maaɗa hisni ma.” Debbo man yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Matta 9.37: Nde Yeesu yotti saare mawɗo go, o yi'i fuufooɓe ciide e mooɓre ɗon waɗa hoolo,
Matta 9.38: o wi'i: “Ngurte ɗo, ngam ɓiŋngel maayaay, ammaa ngel ɗon ɗaani.” Ammaa ɓe njanci mo.
Matta 9.39: Nde ɓe ngurtini mooɓre nde'e fuu yaasi, Yeesu nasti suudu, naŋngi juŋngo ɓiŋngel, nden ngel ummi.
Matta 9.40: Habaru man saŋkiti nder lesdi man fuu.
Matta 9.42: Nde Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, ɗonno dilla, wumɓe ɗiɗo tokki mo, ɓe ɗon mbi'a bee sawtu: “An Ɓii Daawuda, enɗu min!”
Matta 9.43: Nde Yeesu nasti saare, wumɓe go ɓaditi mo. O ƴami ɓe: “On nuɗɗini mi woodi baawɗe waɗugo ɗum na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ooho, Jawmiraawo, a woodi baawɗe man.”
Matta 9.44: Nden Yeesu meemi gite maɓɓe, wi'i: “Ɗum laatano on bana on nuɗɗini.”
Matta 9.45: Law gite maɓɓe mbumti. Nden Yeesu barri
Matta 9.46: ɓe, wi'i: “Taa goɗɗo koo gooto nana haala ka.”
Matta 9.47: Ammaa kamɓe ɓe njehi, ɓe caŋkiti habaru Yeesu nder lesdi man fuu.
Matta 9.49: Saa'i ɓe ɗon ndilla, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu goɗɗo mo waawataa wolwugo sam, ngam o marɗo ginnawol.
Matta 9.50: Yeesu riiwi ginnawol man, muukaajo fuɗɗi wolwugo. Mooɓre hayɗini, wi'i: “Huunde bana nii meeɗaay yi'eego nder Isra'iila sam.”
Matta 9.51: Ammaa Farisa'en mbi'i: “Bee baawɗe laamiiɗo ginnaaji o riiwrata ginnaaji
Matta 9.54: Yeesu yiiloyi berniiji e gure fuu. O ekkitini yimɓe nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, o waazi ɓe kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu asamanji, o nyawndi yimɓe diga nyawuji feere feere fuu
Matta 9.56: Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓe, o yurmini ɓe, ngam ɓe tampuɓe, ɓe sakliiɓe bana baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako
Matta 9.58: Nden o wi'i pukara'en maako: “Ƴaamle ɗuuɗi, ammaa sodooɓe ɗuuɗaay.
Matta 9.59: Tore Jawmu ƴaamnde o ɓesda nelugo sodooɓe haa ƴaamnde maako

Matta 10.1: Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo. O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwugo ginnaaji e nyawndugo yimɓe diga nyawuji feere feere fuu.
Matta 10.2: Ndaa inɗe nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo man: Aran, Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyer e deerɗum Andire, Yaakuba e deerɗum Yuhanna, ɓiɓɓe Zebede,
Matta 10.3: Filip e Bartolome, Tomas e Matta jomnoowo, Yaakuba ɓii Alfa e Tadde,
Matta 10.4: Simon Kanaaniijo e Yahuuda Iskariyot zammbotooɗo Yeesu.
Matta 10.6: Yeesu neli pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo ɓe'e, o umri ɓe: “Taa njehe haa ummaatooje goɗɗe ngoni, taa naste gure Samariya'en boo.
Matta 10.7: Ammaa njehe haa Isra'iila'en laatiiɓe bana baali majjuɗi.
Matta 10.8: Njehe, ngaazine bee wi'ugo: Laamu asamanji ɓaditake.
Matta 10.9: Njamɗitine nyawɓe, ummitine maayɓe, laɓɓine kuturu'en, ndiiwe ginnaaji. On keɓi ɗum caahu, onon boo caahe ɗum.
Matta 10.10: Taa njoge kaŋŋeeri malla cardi malla ceede.
Matta 10.11: Taa njoge booro ngam jahaaŋgal malla limce ɗiɗi. Taa koo'e paɗe malla sawru boo, ngam kuuwoowo he'i heɓugo nguure muuɗum
Matta 10.14: To on nasti berniwol malla wuro fuu, ɗaɓɓite goɗɗo mo he'i jaɓɓaago on, njooɗe haa maako haa to on ndilli.
Matta 10.15: To on ɗon nasta saare goɗɗo, koofne wonɓe ton.
Matta 10.16: To yimɓe saare man njaɓɓake on, jam mooɗon laatanto ɓe. Ammaa to ɓe njaɓɓaaki on, jam mooɗon loroto haa mooɗon.
Matta 10.17: To on nasti saare malla wuro, ɓe cali jaɓɓaago on malla nanango on, ngurte saare man malla wuro man, piɗɗe collaaje kosɗe mooɗon
Matta 10.19: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita maɓɓe tullan dow kiita yimɓe Sodoma e Gomorra
Matta 10.22: “Ndaa, mi ɗon nela on bana baali caka caafaali. Ngam man laate on ƴoyɓe bana boɗɗe, laaɓɓe bana pooli
Matta 10.24: Ammaa ndeene ko'e mooɗon, ngam ɓe njahran on yeeso hiitooɓe, ɓe ɓoccan on nder cuuɗi dewal maɓɓe.
Matta 10.25: Ɓe njahran on yeeso ngomna'en e laamiiɓe ngam daliila am, ngam haa on ceedo seedamku mooɗon yeeso maɓɓe e yeeso yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe.
Matta 10.26: To ɓe njahri on yeeso hiitooɓe, taa cakle dow ko mbi'oton malla no mbolwirton, bolle ɗe on mbolwata ngaranan on saa'i man nden.
Matta 10.27: Ngam naa onon tammi wolwugo, ammaa Ruuhu Baabiraawo mooɗon wolwan nder mooɗon
Matta 10.30: Yimɓe ndokkan deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en ngam mbareego, baabiraaɓe boo ɓikkoy muuɗum'en, ɓikkoy ummanto saaro'en muuɗum'en, mbara ɓe
Matta 10.32: Yimɓe fuu nganyan on ngam daliila am. Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, hisan
Matta 10.34: To ɓe puɗɗi toonyaago on haa berniwol ngol, ndille haa berniwol ngola. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: On mbaawataa fiiltugo berniiji Isra'iila hiddeko
Matta 10.38: Jaŋngoowo ɓurataa jaŋnginoowo muuɗum maŋngu, maccuɗo boo ɓurataa jaagorɗo muuɗum maŋngu
Matta 10.40: To jaŋngoowo yottake darnde jaŋnginoowo muuɗum, maccuɗo boo yottake darnde jaagorɗo muuɗum, ɗum he'i. To ɓe ewnake jawmu saare Be'elzebul
Matta 10.41: , ɓe ɓurataa hallingo yimɓe saare maako na
Matta 10.44: “Kadi, taa kule ɓe. Cuuɗiiɗum fuu waŋgan, sirriijum fuu faamoto
Matta 10.46: Ko mi wi'ata on nder nyiɓre, mbaŋgine ɗum caka nyalawma. Ko on nanata nder sofndaago, ngooyne ɗum bee baŋguɗum.
Matta 10.47: Taa kule yimɓe ngam koo ɓe mbaawan mbarugo ɓalli mooɗon, ɓe mbaawataa mbarugo yoŋki. Ammaa kule Allah baawɗo halkugo ɓanndu e yoŋki fuu nder yiite jahannama.
Matta 10.48: Ɓe coorrataa colloy ɗiɗoy baakin suleyje ɗiɗi na? Ammaa walaa koo gootel maakoy do'oto haa lesdi sonaa to Baabiraawo mooɗon yerdake ɗum.
Matta 10.49: Onon boo, koo gaasaaji ko'e mooɗon ɗi limaaɗi gootol gootol fuu.
Matta 10.50: Ngam maajum taa kultore, on ɓuri colloy ɗuuɗkoy saman.”
Matta 10.52: “Koo moy seedi yeeso yimɓe o anndi yam, min boo mi seedoto yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama mi anndi mo.
Matta 10.53: Ammaa mo yeddi yam yeeso yimɓe, min boo mi yeddan mo yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama
Matta 10.56: “Taa nume mi waddi salaaman haa duniyaaru. Naa salaaman ngaddumi, ammaa kaafahi.
Matta 10.57: Mi wari ngam waadugo ɓiɗɗo gorko bee baaba mum, ɓiɗɗo debbo bee daada mum, debbo boo bee esum debbo.
Matta 10.58: Yimɓe saare goɗɗo laatoto wanywanyɓe mum
Matta 10.61: Koo moy ɓuri yiɗugo baaba muuɗum malla daada muuɗum dow am, he'aay laataago mo am. Koo moy ɓuri yiɗugo ɓiŋngel muuɗum gorgel malla deyel dow am he'aay laataago mo am.
Matta 10.62: Koo moy to hoo'aay gaafaaŋgal muuɗum, tokki yam, he'aay laataago mo am
Matta 10.64: Koo moy yiɗi aynugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki muuɗum ngam am, heɓtan ki
Matta 10.67: “Koo moy jaɓɓi on, jaɓɓi yam. Mo jaɓɓi yam, jaɓɓi nelɗo yam boo
Matta 10.69: Koo moy jaɓɓi annabiijo ngam o annabiijo, heɓan mbarjaari bana ndi annabiijo. Koo moy jaɓɓi adiliijo ngam o adiliijo, heɓan mbarjaari bana ndi adiliijo.
Matta 10.70: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Koo moy hokki koo ndiyam peewɗam nder jardugel haa ɓurɗo leesugo caka pukara'en am ɓe'e ngam o pukaraajo am, heɓan mbarjaari muuɗum fakat.”

Matta 11.1: Nde Yeesu timmini umrugo pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, o ummi nokkuure man, o dilli ngam haa o ekkitina e o waazina nder berniiji fuu.
Matta 11.3: Saa'i man Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma ɗon nder fursina
Matta 11.4: , o nani habaru kuuɗe Almasiihu, o neli pukara'en maako woɗɓe haa Yeesu,
Matta 11.5: ɓe ƴami mo: “An woni mo min nani waran na? Malla min ndeena goɗɗo feere?”
Matta 11.6: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Njehe, mbi'e Yuhanna ko on nani, ko on ngi'i boo:
Matta 11.7: Wumɓe ɗon ngi'a, woosɓe ɗon njaha, kuturu'en laaɓi, fahɓe boo ɗon nana, maayɓe ummitaama, talaka'en boo ngaazinaama kubaruwol ceynoowol
Matta 11.9: Barka laatanto koo moy mo accaay nuɗɗingo yam sam.”
Matta 11.11: Saa'i pukara'en Yuhanna ɗon ndilla, Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango mooɓre haala Yuhanna, o wi'i: “Ɗume on njehi laaroygo nder ladde hamaadaare? Ƴommbal ngal henndu dimmbinta na? Aa'a, naa non.
Matta 11.12: Ɗume on njehi laaroygo kadi? Goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce booɗɗe na? Ammaa ɓorniiɓe limce booɗɗe, nder cuuɗi laamiiɓe ɓe ngoni.
Matta 11.13: Kadi ɗume on njehi laaroygo? Annabiijo na? Ooho! Mi ɗon wi'a on: Fakat, o ɓuri annabiijo.
Matta 11.14: Ngam Allah seedi dow Yuhanna nder Deftere, o wi'i: Ndaa, mi ɗon nela nelaaɗo am yeeso maaɗa, haa o mo'ina laawol ma yeeso maaɗa
Matta 11.16: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama fuu walaa mo ɓuri Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma maŋngu, ammaa mo ɓuri leesugo haa laamu asamanji, ɓuran Yuhanna maŋngu.
Matta 11.17: Diga zamanu Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma haa wargo hannde, konne'en ɗon kippo laamu asamanji, ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓa jaɓtugo ngu.
Matta 11.18: Tawreeta Muusa e annabi'en fuu mbaɗi annabaaku dow laamu asamanji haa yotti saa'i Yuhanna
Matta 11.20: To on njaɓi ko mbi'anmi kam, Yuhanna woni Eliya mo tammi wargo
Matta 11.24: Bee ɓeye nanndinanmi yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u? Ɓe nanndi bee ɓikkoy njooɗiikoy haa luuɓe. Koy ɗon ngookana ɓikkoy ngoɗkoy, koy ɗon mbi'a:
Matta 11.25: Min puufani on algaytaaru, on ngamaay, min ngimani on gimi bojji, on mboyaay.
Matta 11.26: Ngam Yuhanna wari, ɗon suumo, ɓe mbi'i: O woodi ginnawol.
Matta 11.28: wari, ɗon nyaama, ɗon yara, ɓe mbi'i: Ndaare goɗɗo oo, o ɗuuɗa-nyaamɗeejo e guykoowo, o soobaajo jomnooɓe e hakke'en. Ammaa hikma Allah gooŋɗinaama nder kuuɗe maako.”
Matta 11.30: Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi felugo berniiji ɗi o waɗi kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi ton, ammaa yimɓe maaji tuubaay. O wi'i:
Matta 11.31: “Bone laatano ma, an Korajin! Bone laatano ma, an Baytisayda! Ngam kaayeefiiji baɗaaɗi nder mooɗon, to ɗi mbaɗaano nder Tirus e Sidon kam, yimɓe maaji tuubanno law, ɓornotono buhuuje, ndufanno ndoondi dow ko'e muuɗum'en
Matta 11.33: Ngam maajum mi ɗon anndina on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita Tirus e Sidon hoyan dow kiita mooɗon.
Matta 11.34: An Kafarnahum, a ɗon tammo Allah ɓaŋgtete haa yotto asama na? Kayya! O sakkinte haa joonde maayɓe. Ngam kaayeefiiji baɗaaɗi nder maaɗa, to ɗi mbaɗano nder Sodoma, wuro ngo luttanno haa wargo hannde
Matta 11.36: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita Sodoma ɓuran kiita ma hoyugo
Matta 11.39: Saa'i man Yeesu wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, Jawmu asama e lesdi, mi yetti ma ngam a waŋginani ɓikkoy pamaroy kuuje ɗe'e ammaa a suuɗi ɗe hikma'en e marɓe faamu.
Matta 11.40: Nonnon yaa Baabiraawo, bana nii ɗum fottani ma.”
Matta 11.42: Nden o wi'i: “Baabiraawo am halfini yam kuuje fuu. Walaa annduɗo
Matta 11.44: sonaa Baabiraawo, walaa annduɗo Baabiraawo boo sonaa Ɓiɗɗo e mo Ɓiɗɗo yiɗi waŋginango mo fuu
Matta 11.48: tedduɗe fuu, ngare haa am, mi hokkan on siwtaare.
Matta 11.49: Ndoonde kaɓɓirgal am, ekkite haa am, ngam mi ɗelma-gikkuujo, mi jaŋkiniiɗo. Fakat, yoŋkiiji mooɗon ciwtoto
Matta 11.51: Ngam ɗum koyɗum roondaago kaɓɓirgal am e ko mi roondata on boo, ɗum teddantaa on.”

Matta 12.1: Saa'i man, Yeesu saali nder ngesa alkamaari, ɗum
Matta 12.3: Pukara'en maako maati dolo, nden ɓe ngewi cammeeje, ɓe ƴakki
Matta 12.5: Nde Farisa'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe mbi'i Yeesu: “Pukara'en maaɗa ɗon kuuwa ko dagaaki huuweego nyannde siwtorde.”
Matta 12.6: O jaabi ɓe: “On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko Daawuda waɗino, kaŋko e yimɓe maako nde ɓe maati dolo na?
Matta 12.7: Ɓe nasti suudu Allah, ɓe nyaami tamseeje jo'inaaɗe yeeso Allah, koo nde ɓe ngalaa duŋayeere nyaamugo ɗe, sey liman'en tan
Matta 12.9: Malla on meeɗaay jaŋngugo nder tawreeta, liman'en ɗon kuuwa nder haykaliiru koo nyannde siwtorde boo na? Bee man ɓe ɗon luuta umroore, ammaa ɓe ngalaa aybe
Matta 12.11: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Ndaa, ko ɓuri
Matta 12.14: To on paamino ko saawi nder bolle ɗe'e: Enɗam ngiɗmi, naa dabbaaji kirsaaɗi, nden kam on aybintaano yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe
Matta 12.20: Yeesu ummi ton, yehi, nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en.
Matta 12.21: Woodi goɗɗo waata-juŋngoojo ton. Farisa'en ngiɗi wullaago Yeesu, ngam man ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋani en yamɗitingo goɗɗo nyannde siwtorde na?”
Matta 12.22: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Goɗɗo caka mooɗon, to o woodi mbaalu ngootu tan, nden ngu yolli nder ngaska nyannde siwtorde, o wurtintaa ngu na
Matta 12.24: Fakat, neɗɗo ɓuri mbaalu saman, ngam maajum ɗum dagake huuwugo kuugal booɗŋgal nyannde siwtorde.”
Matta 12.25: Nden o wi'i gorko go: “Fortu juŋngo ma.” O forti ngo, ngo yamɗiti, warti bana ngoya.
Matta 12.26: Nden Farisa'en ngurti, carwootiri, kaɓɓi dabare ngam mbarugo Yeesu.
Matta 12.28: Ammaa Yeesu faami anniya maɓɓe, o ummi nokkuure man, o dilli, mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe tokki mo. O yamɗitini nyawɓe fuu.
Matta 12.33: “Allah wi'i: Ndaa suka am mo mi suɓi,
Matta 12.35: Mi neli Ruuhu am dow maako,
Matta 12.38: O jokkirtaa bee goɗɗo, o wookataa,
Matta 12.39: walaa mo nanata sawtu maako haa laabi.
Matta 12.42: O nyifataa pittirlayel, to ngel ɗon suura tawon,
Matta 12.43: haa to o heɓani kiita ngooŋɗuka jaalorgal.
Matta 12.48: Nden ɓe ngaddani Yeesu goɗɗo mo ginnawol ɗon nder muuɗum, o bumɗo, muukaajo boo. Yeesu yamɗitini mo, o wolwi, o yi'i.
Matta 12.49: Ɗum hayɗini mooɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Oo ɗo, naa o
Matta 12.52: Nde Farisa'en nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo ɗon riiwa ginnaaji bee baawɗe ɗe Be'elzebul, laamiiɗo ginnaaji hokki mo
Matta 12.54: Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “To yimɓe laamu koo nguye narraay, laamu man do'oto. To yimɓe wuro koo ngoye malla yimɓe saare koo ndeye narraay, ɗum darataako.
Matta 12.55: To Sayɗaanu ɗon riiwa Sayɗaanu, nden kam o narraay bee hoore maako, noy laamu maako tabitirta?
Matta 12.56: To min mi ɗon riiwa ginnaaji bee baawɗe Be'elzebul, bee baawɗe ɗeye ɓikkoy mooɗon boo ndiiwrata ɗi? Ngam maajum ɓikkoy mooɗon kiitoto on.
Matta 12.57: Ammaa to bee baawɗe Ruuhu Allah ndiiwranmi ginnaaji boo, nden kam laamu Allah yottanake on.
Matta 12.59: Walaa mo waawataa nastugo saare cemmbiɗɗo, wujja kuuje maako, sonaa o aarta, o haɓɓa mo tawon, nden o ɓofta kuuje saare maako fuu.
Matta 12.61: Mo wondaay bee am, o konneejo am. Mo wallaay yam mooɓtugo, saŋkitan
Matta 12.63: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Neɗɗo heɓan yaafuye hakkeeji mum e bolle mum kalluɗe dow Allah fuu. Ammaa mo wolwi kalluka dow Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, heɓataa yaafuye sam.
Matta 12.66: boo, heɓan yaafuye. Ammaa mo yeddi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, heɓataa yaafuye sam, koo nder zamanuuru jontaaru, koo nder waranndu boo
Matta 12.69: “To lekki wooɗi, ɓiɓɓe maaki boo mbooɗan. To lekki wooɗaay, ɓiɓɓe maaki boo mbooɗataa. Ɓe annditan lekki haa ɓiɓɓe mum
Matta 12.71: Onon ɓiɓɓe poosokje, noy on mbaawrata wolwugo kuuje booɗɗe nde onon on halluɓe? Ko heewi ɓernde goɗɗo, kanjum hunnduko muuɗum wolwata
Matta 12.73: Neɗɗo booɗɗo ɗon wurtina kuuje booɗɗe nder siga mum mbooɗka, neɗɗo kalluɗo boo ɗon wurtina kuuje kalluɗe nder siga mum kalluka.
Matta 12.74: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Nyalaade darŋgal, yimɓe njaabanto ko'e muuɗum'en dow bolle meereeje ɗe ɓe mbolwi fuu.
Matta 12.75: Allah gooŋɗinte fodde bolle maaɗa malla boo o aybinte.”
Matta 12.77: Nden woɗɓe nder moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en mbi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, min ngiɗi a waɗa alaama haa min ndaara
Matta 12.79: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, ɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah! Ɓe ngeli alaama, ammaa ɓe keɓataa, sonaa alaama annabi Yonas
Matta 12.81: Bana Yonas waɗi nyalawmaaje tati e jemmaaje tati nder reedu liiŋgu, bana non
Matta 12.83: boo waɗan nyalawmaaje tati e jemmaaje tati nder lesdi
Matta 12.85: Nyalaade darŋgal, yimɓe Niniwe ummanto yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, hiitoto ɓe, ngam yimɓe Niniwe tuubi nde ɓe nani waazu Yonas. Ndaa, ɓurɗum Yonas haa ɗo
Matta 12.88: , ummanto yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, wulloto ɓe nyalaade darŋgal, ngam o wari diga daayiiɗum haa o nana bolle Suleymaanu keewɗe hikma. Ndaa ɓurɗum Suleymaanu haa ɗo
Matta 12.91: “To ruuhuwol coɓŋgol wurtake goɗɗo, ngol yiiloyan haa karɗe ngam ɗaɓɓugo nokkuure siwtaago, to ngol heɓaay,
Matta 12.92: nden kam ngol wi'an: Mi loroto haa suudu am ndu mi wurtino. To ngol lori haa maaru, ngol tawan ndu sookru, wuuwaandu e mo'itinaandu,
Matta 12.93: nden ngol yaha, ngol wadda ruuhuuji goɗɗi joweeɗiɗi, ɓuranɗi ngol hallugo, ɗi nastan suudu man, ɗi njooɗoto nder maaru. Joonde goɗɗo oo hallan ko ɓuri naane. Bana nii ɗum laatanto yimɓe halluɓe nder zamanuuru ndu'u!”
Matta 12.95: Saa'i Yeesu ɗon wolwana mooɓre tawon, daada maako e deerɗiiko'en ɗon ndari yaasi, ngam ɓe ngiɗi wolwango mo.
Matta 12.96: Goɗɗo feere wi'i mo: “Ndaa, daada ma e deerɗiraaɓe ma ɗon ndari yaasi, ɓe ngiɗi wolwango ma.”
Matta 12.97: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Moy woni daada am? Ɓeye ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am?”
Matta 12.98: Nden o sappi pukara'en maako, o wi'i: “Ndaa, ɓe'e ngoni daada am e deerɗiraaɓe am.
Matta 12.99: Ngam waɗanɓe muuyo Baabiraawo am mo asama fuu, kamɓe ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am worɓe e rewɓe e daada am.”

Matta 13.1: Nyalaade man Yeesu wurti saare, yehi, jooɗi haa fomoonde weendu.
Matta 13.2: Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ngari haa maako. Ngam man o nasti koommbowal
Matta 13.3: , o jooɗi nder maagal, mooɓre boo dari haa fomoonde
Matta 13.5: O ekkitini nde kuuje ɗuuɗɗe bee balndi.
Matta 13.6: O wi'i ɓe: “Demoowo yehi ngesa ngam saakoygo.
Matta 13.7: Nde o ɗon saaka, aawdi ngoɗndi soli dow laawol, colli ngari, cuɓti ndi.
Matta 13.8: Aawdi ngoɗndi saami haa korka'e, haa lesdi ɗuuɗaay. Ndi fuɗi law ngam lesdi luggaay.
Matta 13.9: Nde naaŋge fuɗi, nge wuli fuɗŋgooji, ɗi njoori ngam ɗi ngalaa ɗaɗi.
Matta 13.10: Aawdi ngoɗndi soli caka gi'e. Gi'e mawnidi bee maari, ɓilli ndi.
Matta 13.11: Ammaa aawdi ngoɗndi soli haa lesdi mboondi, ndi nafi, waɗi cammeeje: Goɗɗe ɗon bee gabbe teemerre, goɗɗe bee cappanɗe joweego, goɗɗe boo bee cappanɗe tati.”
Matta 13.14: Ɓaawoɗon pukara'en ngari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume a ɗon wolwana yimɓe bee balndi?”
Matta 13.15: O jaabi ɓe: “Onon, Allah anndini on sirriiji laamu mum, ammaa kamɓe ɓe anndinaaka.
Matta 13.16: Ngam marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo haa o wona nder jeynitaare, ammaa mo maraay koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Matta 13.18: Ngam man mi ɗon wolwana ɓe bee balndi. Ngam ɓe ɗon ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa. Ɓe ɗon nana, ammaa ɓe paamataa sam.
Matta 13.19: Bana nii annabaaku Esaaya gooŋɗiri ngam maɓɓe, o wi'no:
Matta 13.20: On nanan bee noppi mon, ammaa on paamataa sam,
Matta 13.21: on ndaaran bee gite mon, ammaa on ngi'ataa koo ɗume.
Matta 13.23: Ngam ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓe'e maatataa koo ɗume,
Matta 13.25: ɓe maɓɓi gite maɓɓe, ngam taa ɓe ngi'a,
Matta 13.28: taa ɓe tuuba boo, ngam taa min mi yamɗitina ɓe
Matta 13.31: Ammaa onon, barka woodani gite mon ngam ɗe ɗon ngi'a, barka woodani noppi mon boo ngam ɗi ɗon nana.
Matta 13.32: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Annabi'en e adili'en ngiɗno yi'ugo ko ngi'oton, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay, ɓe ngiɗno nanugo ko nanoton, ammaa ɓe nanaay
Matta 13.36: Yimɓe woɗɓe nani habaru laamu asamanji, ammaa ɓe paamaay. Kamɓe ɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa laawol, ngam kalluɗo waran, wifto ko saaka nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Matta 13.37: Woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa korka'e. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, law ɓe njaɓa nde bee seyo.
Matta 13.38: Ammaa ɓe ngalaa ɗaɗi, ɓe tabitittaa, ngam to ɓillaare e toonyaare ukkanake ɓe daliila wolde Allah, ɓe accan nuɗɗinki law.
Matta 13.39: Woɗɓe boo nanndi bee aawdi caka gi'e. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, laruuraaji e esto risku ɓiɗɗan wolde man, nde waɗataa nafuuda sam.
Matta 13.40: Ammaa woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa lesdi mboondi. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, ɓe paami nde, ɓe mbaŋginan ɓenndalooje: Woɗɓe cowi teemerre, woɗɓe cappanɗe joweego, woɗɓe boo cappanɗe tati.”
Matta 13.42: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee goɗɗo mo saaki aawdi mboondi waato alkamaari nder ngesa muuɗum.
Matta 13.43: Jemmaare feere, nde yimɓe fuu ɗon ɗaani, ganyo maako wari, saaki aawdi geene caka alkamaari maako, dilli.
Matta 13.44: Nde alkamaari mawni, waɗi cammeeje, geene boo mbaŋgi.
Matta 13.45: Huuwooɓe jawmu ngesa ngari, mbi'i mo: Jaagorɗo, naa alkamaari a saaki nder ngesa maaɗa na? Ko waɗi geene boo mbaŋgi ton?
Matta 13.46: O wi'i ɓe: Ganyo am waɗi ɗum. Huuwanooɓe ƴami mo: Nden kam a yiɗi min ɗoofa ɗe na?
Matta 13.47: O jaabi ɓe: Aa'a, ngam to on ɗon ɗoofa ɗe, on ɗoofdan alkamaari bee maaje.
Matta 13.48: Acce ɗum fuu ɗum mawnida haa wakkati codol. Saa'i man mi wi'an sodooɓe: Aarte mooɓtugo geene, kaɓɓe ɗe, ngule ɗe. Ammaa alkamaari kam, mooɓtaneeɗam ndi haa beembal am.”
Matta 13.50: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere boo, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee gawel citta ndi goɗɗo hoo'i, saaki nder ngesa muuɗum.
Matta 13.51: Ndi ɓuri aawdiiji fuu famɗugo, ammaa to ndi fuɗi, ndi ɓuran haakooji goɗɗi fuu mawnugo, ndi laatoto lekki, haa colli ngara, mbaɗa caɓɓe maaji dow lice maaki.”
Matta 13.53: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere fahin, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee ufnirɗum. Debbo hoo'i ɗum, waati ɗum nder kuroori etirɗe tati, kuroori man fuu ƴuufi.”
Matta 13.55: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu Yeesu wolwani yimɓe bee balndi, o wolwani ɓe koo ɗume fuu bee balndi,
Matta 13.56: ngam hiɓɓingo annabaaku Esaaya. Kaŋko o wi'i:
Matta 13.58: mi anndinan ɓe kuuje cuuɗiiɗe diga tageeki duniyaaru
Matta 13.61: Nden Yeesu acci yimɓe, nasti saare. Pukara'en ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Sifana min balndol geene nder ngesa alkamaari go.”
Matta 13.62: O wi'i ɓe: “Mo saaki aawdi mboondi, kaŋko woni
Matta 13.65: Ngesa ɗum duniyaaru, alkamaari ɗum yimɓe laamu asamanji, geene boo ɗum tokkiiɓe Kalluɗo.
Matta 13.66: Ganyo mo saaki ɗe boo, ɗum Sayɗaanu, saa'i codol ɗum timmuki duniyaaru, sodooɓe boo ɗum malaa'ika'en.
Matta 13.67: Bana ɓe mooɓtirta geene, ɓe ngula ɗe bee yiite, bana non ɗum laatoto haa timmuki duniyaaru boo.
Matta 13.69: nelan malaa'ika'en muuɗum, ɓe ngurtina diga laamu maako nastinɓe yimɓe nder hakke e halluɓe fuu,
Matta 13.70: ɓe ngudina ɓe nder yiite ɓolinirde. Haa ton ɓe mboyan, ɓe kirƴindiran nyii'e.
Matta 13.71: Ammaa saa'i man adili'en njaynan bana naaŋge nder laamu Baabiraawo muuɗum'en. Mo woodi noppi fuu, nana!”
Matta 13.73: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee jawdi ndi ɓe nyukkini nder ngesa. Mo tawi ndi, nyukkini ndi fahin. O seyi masin, o yehi, o soorri mardi maako fuu, o soodi ngesa man.”
Matta 13.75: “Fahin, laamu asamanji nanndi bee piloowo ɗaɓɓanɗo luuluuje booɗɗe.
Matta 13.76: Nde o tawi luuluuri marndi saman masin, o yehi, o soorri mardi maako fuu, o soodi ndi.”
Matta 13.78: “Laamu asamanji nanndi boo bee zubaawol ngol waawooɓe ngubi nder weendu, ngol naŋngi liɗɗi feere feereeji.
Matta 13.79: Nde ngol heewi, ɓe pooɗi ngol haa fomoonde, ɓe njooɗi, ɓe ngurtini liɗɗi. Liɗɗi booɗɗi ɓe ndesi ɗi nder cilaaje maɓɓe, ammaa kalluɗi, ɓe ngudini ɗi.
Matta 13.80: Bana non ɗum laatoto haa timmuki duniyaaru boo: Malaa'ika'en ngaran, cenndan adili'en bee halluɓe,
Matta 13.81: ɓe nguboto halluɓe nder yiite ɓolinirde. Haa ton ɓe mboyan, ɓe kirƴindiran nyii'e.”
Matta 13.83: Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “On paami bolle ɗe fuu na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ooho, min paami.”
Matta 13.84: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngam maajum koo moy moodibboojo tawreeta, laatiiɗo pukaraajo, annduɗo haala laamu asamanji, nanndi bee jawmu saare, gurtinanɗo kuuje kese e kuuje kiiɗɗe diga ndesaari muuɗum.”
Matta 13.86: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwango yimɓe balndi ɗi'i, o ummi nokkuure man,
Matta 13.87: o yehi haa berniwol ngol o mawni. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe nder suudu dewal maɓɓe. Wonɓe ton kayɗini, mbi'i: “Moy hokki mo hikma ka e baawɗe waɗugo kaayeefiiji ɗi'i?
Matta 13.88: Naa kaŋko woni ɓii cehoowo na? Naa Mariyama woni daada maako na? Naa Yaakuba e Yoses e Simon e Yahuuda ngoni deerɗiraaɓe maako na?
Matta 13.89: Naa deerɗiraaɓe maako rewɓe boo ɗon ngondi bee meeɗen haa ɗo na? Noy o waawri waɗugo kuuje ɗe fuu?”
Matta 13.90: Ngam maajum ɓe cali nuɗɗingo mo.
Matta 13.91: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe teddinan annabiijo koo toy fuu, ammaa nder wuro muuɗum e caka yimɓe saare muuɗum ɓe teddintaa mo
Matta 13.93: Ngam daliila sooynde nuɗɗinki maɓɓe, Yeesu waɗaay kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi ton.

Matta 14.1: Saa'i man Hirudus Antipas nani habaru Yeesu.
Matta 14.2: O wi'i sukaaɓe maako: “Kaŋko woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma, o ummitake diga maayde, ngam maajum o woodi baawɗe waɗugo kaayeefiiji.”
Matta 14.4: Naane Hirudus umrino, ɓe naŋnga Yuhanna, ɓe kaɓɓa mo, ɓe nastina mo fursina
Matta 14.6: ngam Yuhanna wi'no mo: “Haanaay a te'a Hirudiya
Matta 14.8: Hirudus yiɗino mbarugo Yuhanna, ammaa o huli mooɓre, ngam ɓe ɗon ndaara Yuhanna bana o annabiijo.
Matta 14.10: Nyannde siftinorde danyeeki Hirudus, ɓiɗɗo Hirudiya debbo wami yeeso ewnaaɓe, ɗum fottani Hirudus.
Matta 14.11: O hunani mo o hokkan mo ko o ƴami fuu.
Matta 14.12: Daada maako loowi mo bolle, nden o wi'i: “Hokkam hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma nder le'al.”
Matta 14.13: Ɗum suni laamiiɗo, ammaa daliila hunayeere nde o hunanino mo yeeso ewnaaɓe, o umri ɓe ndokka mo ko o ƴami.
Matta 14.14: Hirudus neli goɗɗo haa suudu fursina, o yehi, o ta'i hoore Yuhanna.
Matta 14.15: O waddi nde nder le'al, o hokki nde ɓiɗɗo debbo go, yahrani nde daada muuɗum.
Matta 14.16: Pukara'en Yuhanna ngari, ɓe koosi ɓanndu maako, ɓe uwi ndu. Nden ɓe njehi, ɓe ngecci Yeesu ko laati.
Matta 14.18: Nde Yeesu nani habaru man, o ummi nokkuure man, o nasti koommbowal, o yehi ladde feere maako. Mooɓe nani ɗum, ɗe ngurti berniiji maaje, ɗe tokki mo bee kosɗe.
Matta 14.19: Nde Yeesu wurti koommbowal, o yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde, o yurmini nde, o yamɗitini nyawɓe maare.
Matta 14.21: Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, pukara'en Yeesu ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Naaŋge hiiri, nokkuure nde'e boo nde ferewnde. Ndikka a jaɓɓito yimɓe, ɓe ndilla haa kawyeeji, ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe nyaamdu.”
Matta 14.22: Yeesu jaabi: “Haanaay ɓe ndilla, ndokke ɓe nyaamdu, onon.”
Matta 14.23: Ammaa ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngalaa koo ɗume, sey tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi tan.”
Matta 14.24: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngaddaneeɗam ɗum haa ɗo.”
Matta 14.25: Nden o umri mooɓe njooɗo dow huɗo. O hoosi tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi go, o tijji asama, o yetti Allah. O yewi tamseeje man, o hokki pukara'en, ɓe ndokka mooɓe.
Matta 14.26: Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari. Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, ɗum hebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Matta 14.27: Limgal nyaamɓe tamseeje dillani baakin worɓe ujine njowo, rewɓe e ɓikkoy limaaka.
Matta 14.29: Nden law Yeesu dooli pukara'en muuɗum ɓe nasta koommbowal, ɓe aarta mo yahugo fomoonde gaɗaare, saa'i o ɗon jaɓɓito yimɓe.
Matta 14.30: O jaɓɓiti ɓe, o wa'i dow hooseere ngam waɗugo do'a. Haa jemma waɗi, o ɗon ton feere maako.
Matta 14.31: Nde koommbowal daayi masin bee fomoonde, henndu fuɗɗi ɓillugo ngal, ngam ngal ɗon fotta bee maaru.
Matta 14.32: Gal subaha, Yeesu wari haa pukara'en muuɗum, o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam bee kosɗe.
Matta 14.33: Nde pukara'en ngi'i mo o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe cakli, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum ginnawol!” Ɓe ngooki ngam kulol.
Matta 14.34: Law Yeesu wolwani ɓe, wi'i: “Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon, taa kultore, ɗum min.”
Matta 14.35: Piyer wi'i mo: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, to ɗum an kam, umru mi yaha haa maaɗa dow ndiyam.”
Matta 14.37: Piyer wurti koommbowal, fuɗɗi yahugo dow ndiyam, ngam haa o yotto haa Yeesu.
Matta 14.38: Ammaa nde o yi'i henndu, o hultori, o fuɗɗi mutugo, o wooki: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, hisnam!”
Matta 14.39: Law Yeesu forti juŋngo muuɗum, naŋngi mo, wi'i mo: “Hey an, famɗa-nuɗɗinkiijo, ngam ɗume a seki?”
Matta 14.41: Nde ɓe nasti koommbowal ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, henndu de'iti.
Matta 14.42: Nden pukara'en wonɓe nder koommbowal cujidani Yeesu, mbi'i: “Fakat a
Matta 14.45: Ɓe eeri weendu, ɓe njotti lesdi Genesaret.
Matta 14.46: Nde yimɓe lesdi man annditi Yeesu, ɓe ngeeyni habaru maako koo toy nder lesdi maɓɓe, ɓe ngaddani mo nyawɓe fuu.
Matta 14.47: Ɓe tori mo o acca nyawɓe man meema gawargal limce maako tan, meemɓe ngal fuu njamɗiti.

Matta 15.1: Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ngari diga Urusaliima haa Yeesu, ɓe ƴami mo:
Matta 15.2: “Koni pukara'en maaɗa ɗowtantaako al'aada kaakiraaɓe meeɗen? Ngam ɓe ɗon nyaama bilaa lootugo juuɗe.”
Matta 15.3: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Onon, koni on ɗowtantaako umroore Allah ngam daliila al'aada mooɗon?
Matta 15.4: Allah wi'i: Teddin baaba ma e daada ma, koo moy wolwi kalluka dow baaba malla daada mum, sey o mbare
Matta 15.6: Ammaa onon on ɗon mbi'a: To goɗɗo wi'i baaba malla daada mum: Geɗal jawdi am ndi mi waawanno wallugo ma bee maari, doole mi hokka ngal Allah.
Matta 15.7: Nden kam walaa haaje o teddina baaba maako. Bana non on mbonni umroore Allah ngam daliila al'aada mooɗon.
Matta 15.8: Naafiki'en! Annabaaku ngu Esaaya waɗi dow mooɗon gooŋɗi:
Matta 15.10: Allah wi'i: Yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon teddinammi bee kunnduɗe tan,
Matta 15.14: ngam ɓe ɗon ekkitina geccaaji yimɓe
Matta 15.17: Nden Yeesu ewni yimɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Nane, paame ɗu'um:
Matta 15.18: Naa ko nastata hunnduko neɗɗo soɓnata mo, ammaa ko wurtoto hunnduko maako, kanjum soɓnata mo.”
Matta 15.20: Pukara'en ngari haa Yeesu, mbi'i mo: “A anndi bolle ma mettini ɓerɗe Farisa'en na?”
Matta 15.21: O jaabi ɓe: “Fuɗŋgo ngo Baabiraawo mo asama tiggaay fuu, ngo ɗoofeteeŋgo.
Matta 15.22: Acce ɓe, ɓe wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe. To bumɗo ɗon ɗowa bumɗo, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe ndo'oto nder ngaska
Matta 15.25: Piyer wi'i mo: “Faamtin min balndol ngol.”
Matta 15.26: Yeesu wi'i: “Haa jonta, onon boo on paamataa na?
Matta 15.27: Ko nastata hunnduko neɗɗo fuu, haa reedu mum ɗum yahata, nden ɗum wurto ɓanndu maako. On anndaa ɗum na?
Matta 15.28: Ammaa ko wurtoto hunnduko, ɗum ɗon iwa haa ɓernde, kanjum soɓnata neɗɗo
Matta 15.30: Ngam haa ɓernde neɗɗo, numooji kalluɗi e mbar-hoore e njeenu e daakaareeku e nguyka e seedamkuuji pewooji e kuudi kalluɗi iwata.
Matta 15.31: Kanjum soɓnata neɗɗo. Ammaa nyaamugo bilaa lootugo juuɗe, ɗum soɓnataa neɗɗo.”
Matta 15.33: Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, dilli haa lesdi Tirus e Sidon.
Matta 15.34: Debbo Kanaaniijo, jooɗiiɗo lesdi man, wari haa maako, tori mo bee sawtu: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, Ɓii Daawuda, enɗam! Ndaa ɓiŋngel am deyel ngel ginnawol ɗon torra masin.”
Matta 15.35: Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo. Pukara'en maako ɓaditi mo, mbi'i mo: “Riiw mo, ngam o ɗon tokki en bee hoolo.”
Matta 15.36: Yeesu jaabi: “Mi nelaaka haa yimɓe feere, sey haa baali majjuɗi, ummaatoore Isra'iila.”
Matta 15.37: Ammaa debbo go wari, tuggani mo koppi, wi'i: “Wallam, yaa Jawmiraawo!”
Matta 15.38: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Wooɗaay hoo'ugo nyaamdu ɓikkoy, sakkinana ndawaakon.”
Matta 15.39: Debbo wi'i: “Nonnon, yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa koo ndawaakon boo ɗon nyaama caamɗum diga taabal jawmiikon.”
Matta 15.40: Nden Yeesu wi'i: “An debbo, nuɗɗinki maaɗa makki, ɗum laatano ma bana a yiɗi.” Ɓiŋngel maako deyel go yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Matta 15.42: Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, tokki kommbi weendu Galiili. O wa'i hooseere, o jooɗi ton.
Matta 15.43: Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ngari haa maako, ɓe ngaddi woosɓe e wumɓe e waata-terɗe'en e muuka'en e nyawɓe woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Ɓe mballini ɓe kommbi Yeesu, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Matta 15.44: Yimɓe mooɓre kayɗini nde ɓe ngi'i muuka'en ɗon mbolwa, waata-terɗe'en njamɗiti, woosɓe ɗon njaha bee kosɗe muuɗum'en, wumɓe boo ɗon ngi'a. Ɓe teddini Allah Isra'iila.
Matta 15.46: Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe: “Mi ɗon yurmina yimɓe ɓe'e, ngam ɓe ɗon ngondi bee am nyalɗe tati, ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe nyaama. Mi yiɗaa jaɓɓitaago ɓe bee dolo ngo'o, ngam taa ɓe tampa dow laawol.”
Matta 15.47: Pukara'en mbi'i mo: “Haa toy keɓeten tamseeje nder ladde hamaadaare ɗo, haa en ndokka mooɓre ɗuuɗnde nde'e fuu?”
Matta 15.48: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Tamseeje joweeɗiɗi e liikon seɗɗa.”
Matta 15.50: O hoo'i tamseeje joweeɗiɗi e liɗɗi go, o yetti Allah, o yewi ɗe, o hokki ɗe pukara'en maako, kamɓe boo ɓe ndokki ɗe mooɓre.
Matta 15.51: Yimɓe fuu nyaami, kaari. Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, ɗum hebbini cilaaje joweeɗiɗi.
Matta 15.52: Limgal nyaamɓe nyaamdu man dillani worɓe ujine nayo, rewɓe e ɓikkoy limaaka.
Matta 15.53: Nde Yeesu jaɓɓiti mooɓre, o nasti koommbowal

Matta 16.1: Farisa'en e Saduki'en ngari haa Yeesu ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo o waŋginana ɓe alaama iwka diga asama
Matta 16.3: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “To naaŋge muti, asama boo wooji, on ɗon mbi'a: Jaŋngo laaɓan.
Matta 16.4: Fajiri boo, to asama nyiɓɓi, duule mbooji, on ɗon mbi'a: Naargewol ummoto hannde! On mbaawi fassitirgo ko waŋgi haa asama, ammaa alaamaaji laatiiɗi jonta kam, on mbaawataa fassitirgo ɗi.
Matta 16.5: Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, ɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah! Ɓe ngeli alaama, ammaa ɓe keɓataa, sonaa alaama annabi Yonas.” Nden o acci ɓe, o dilli
Matta 16.8: Pukara'en eeri weendu. Ɓe ngejjiti hoo'ugo tamseeje.
Matta 16.9: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Kakkile, ayne ko'e mooɗon e ufnirɗum Farisa'en e Saduki'en
Matta 16.11: Pukara'en carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “O wolwi bana non ngam en koo'aay tamseeje.”
Matta 16.12: Yeesu anndi ko ɓe numata. O ƴami ɓe: “Koni mbi'oton on ngalaa tamseeje, onon famɗa-nuɗɗinki'en?
Matta 16.13: On paamaay tawon na? On ciftortaa haala tamseeje jowi ɗe mi senndani yimɓe ujine njowo e limgal cilaaje ɗe on adi
Matta 16.15: e haala tamseeje joweeɗiɗi ɗe mi senndani yimɓe ujine nayo e limgal cilaaje ɗe on adi na
Matta 16.17: Koni on paamataa? Mi wolwanaay on haala tamseeje! Kakkilane ufnirɗum Farisa'en e Saduki'en.”
Matta 16.19: Nden pukara'en paami o wi'aay ɓe ayna ko'e maɓɓe e ufnirɗum tamseeje ammaa ekkitinol Farisa'en e Saduki'en.
Matta 16.21: Yeesu yehi lesdi Kaysariya-Filippi. Ton o ƴami pukara'en maako: “Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a, min,
Matta 16.24: Ɓe njaabi mo: “Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a an woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma, woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Eliya. Woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Yeremiya malla gooto annabi'en
Matta 16.26: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo, on ɗon mbi'a mi moy?”
Matta 16.27: Simon Piyer jaabi mo: “An woni Almasiihu,
Matta 16.31: Yeesu wi'i mo: “A barkiɗinaaɗo, Simon ɓii Yonas, naa neɗɗo waŋginani ma gooŋga ka, ammaa ɗum Baabiraawo am mo asama.
Matta 16.32: Mi ɗon wi'e: An woni Piyer waato tapaare. Dow tapaare man mi mahan jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe yam. Koo maayde jaalataako nde sam.
Matta 16.33: Mi hokkete maɓɓitirɗum laamu asamanji. Ko a haɓɓi haa duniyaaru, ɗum haɓɓaama haa asama boo, ko a fiisti haa duniyaaru, ɗum fiistaama haa asama boo
Matta 16.36: Nden Yeesu umri pukara'en muuɗum taa ɓe ngecca koo moy kanyum woni Almasiihu.
Matta 16.38: Diga saa'i man Yeesu fuɗɗi faamtingo pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i: “Doole mi yaha Urusaliima, mi yara bone ɗuuɗɗum diga ndotti'en e mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, ɓe mbarammi, ammaa mi ummito diga maayde nyalaade tataɓre.”
Matta 16.39: Piyer wicciti mo sera, fuɗɗi felugo mo, wi'i: “Kayya, yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah haɗ ɗum! Irin man warantaa ma sam!”
Matta 16.40: Ammaa Yeesu yeesiti, wi'i Piyer: “Daayam, an Sayɗaanu! A laatani yam daliila fergere, ngam numooji maaɗa iwaay haa Allah, ammaa haa yimɓe.”
Matta 16.42: Nden Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “To goɗɗo yiɗi tokkaago yam, sey o acca muuyo maako, o roondo gaafaaŋgal maako, o tokko yam
Matta 16.44: Ngam koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki mum ngam am, heɓtan ki
Matta 16.46: To neɗɗo heɓi duniyaaru fuu, ammaa o halki yoŋki maako, ɗume ɗum nafata mo? Malla woodi ko goɗɗo waawata hokkugo ngam soottugo yoŋki muuɗum na? Walaa sam!
Matta 16.49: waran nder tedduŋgal Baabiraawo mum bee malaa'ika'en mum, saa'i man o warjoto koo moy deydey kuuɗe muuɗum
Matta 16.51: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, fakat woɗɓe caka mooɗon maayataa, sey to ɓe ngi'i garki Ɓii-neɗɗo bee laamu muuɗum.”

Matta 17.1: Ɓaawo nyalɗe joweego, Yeesu hoo'i Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna deerɗu Yaakuba, o dillidi bee maɓɓe dow hooseere townde, ɓe ɗon ton feere maɓɓe.
Matta 17.2: Jaati maako wayliti haa gite maɓɓe, yeeso maako yayni bana naaŋge, limce maako laati daneeje tal bana annoora.
Matta 17.3: Nden Muusa e Eliya mbaŋgani ɓe, ɗon mbolida bee Yeesu.
Matta 17.4: Piyer wi'i Yeesu: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, ɗum booɗɗum en ngona haa ɗo! To a yiɗi, mi waɗanan on bukkaaji tati, wooru ngam maaɗa, wooru ngam Muusa, wooru boo ngam Eliya.”
Matta 17.5: Nde o ɗon wolwa tawon, ndaa ruuldere ɗelkannde wari, suddi ɓe, sawtu iwi haa ruulde man, wi'i: “Oo woni
Matta 17.7: am giɗaaɗo, mi ɗon seyoro ɗum. Nanane mo
Matta 17.9: Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe ndo'i, ɓe kippi geese maɓɓe.
Matta 17.10: Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, meemi ɓe, wi'i: “Umme, taa kultore.”
Matta 17.11: Ɓe ɓaŋgti gite maɓɓe, ɓe ngi'aay goɗɗo feere, sey Yeesu tan.
Matta 17.13: Nde ɓe ɗon njippo hooseere go, Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa mbi'e koo moy ko on ngi'i, haa to
Matta 17.16: Nden pukara'en ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon mbi'a sey Eliya aarta wargo tawon
Matta 17.18: O jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga Eliya aartan wargo, o mo'itina kuuje fuu.
Matta 17.19: Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on Eliya wari timmi, yimɓe annditaay mo, ɓe mbaɗi mo ko ɓe ngiɗi, ɓe torran Ɓii-neɗɗo boo bana non
Matta 17.22: Pukara'en paami o wolwani ɓe haala Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma.
Matta 17.24: Nde ɓe njotti haa mooɓre, goɗɗo wari haa Yeesu, tuggani mo koppi,
Matta 17.25: wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, enɗu ɓiŋngel am! Ngel ɗon bee paɗɗe, o torraaɗo masin, nde ɗuuɗɗum o ɗon do'o nder yiite malla nder ndiyam.
Matta 17.26: Mi waddi ngel haa pukara'en maaɗa, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay yamɗitingo ngel.”
Matta 17.27: Yeesu wi'i: “Hey yimɓe sooya-nuɗɗinki'en, wonniiɓe! Haa ndey tokkotoomi wondugo bee mooɗon e munyango on? Ngaddaneeɗam ɓiŋngel ngel!”
Matta 17.28: Yeesu telɓani ginnawol, ngol wurti ɓiŋngel, ngel yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Matta 17.30: Ɓaawoɗon pukara'en Yeesu ngari haa maako feere maɓɓe, ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume min mbaawaay wurtingo ginnawol ngo'ol?”
Matta 17.31: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ngam nuɗɗinki mooɗon famɗi. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki koo seɗɗa bana gawel citta, on mbi'an hooseere nde'e sotta ɗo, yaha to, nde sottoto, walaa ko salorta on sam
Matta 17.33: Ammaa irin ginnawol ngo'ol wurtintaake sonaa bee do'aago e suumaago.]”
Matta 17.35: Pukara'en Yeesu kawti haa lesdi Galiili. Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe tammi hokkugo
Matta 17.38: yimɓe man mbaran mo, ammaa nyannde tataɓre o ummititto diga maayde.” Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe cuni masin.
Matta 17.40: Nde Yeesu bee pukara'en muuɗum njotti Kafarnahum, jomnooɓe jomorgol haykaliiru ngari haa Piyer, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo mooɗon yoɓataa jomorgol haykaliiru na
Matta 17.42: Piyer jaabi: “O ɗon yoɓa.” Saa'i Piyer nasti suudu, Yeesu aarti wolwango mo, wi'i: “Ko numɗa, Simon? Ɓeye njoɓata jomorli malla garaama ngam laamiiɓe duniyaaru ndu'u? Ɓiɓɓe lesdi naa malla jananɓe?”
Matta 17.43: Piyer jaabi: “Ɗum jananɓe njoɓata.” Yeesu wi'i: “Nden kam ɓiɓɓe lesdi njoɓataa.
Matta 17.44: Ammaa ngam taa en mettina ɓe ɓerɗe, yah haa weendu, sakkin ngalum nder ndiyam, liiŋgu ngu a aartata naŋngugo, hoocu ngu, maɓɓitu hunnduko maagu, a tawan ceede cardi ton. Hoocu, yoɓ ɓe ngam am e ma.”

Matta 18.1: Saa'i man pukara'en Yeesu ɓaditi mo, ƴami: “Moy ɓurdi maŋngu haa laamu asamanji
Matta 18.3: Yeesu ewni ɓiŋngel pamarel, darni ngel caka maɓɓe.
Matta 18.4: O wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngaylitaaki haa on laato bana ɓikkoy pamaroy, nden kam on nastataa laamu asamanji sam
Matta 18.6: Ngam maajum mo leestini hoore muuɗum bana ɓiŋngel nge'el, kaŋko woni ɓurduɗo maŋngu haa laamu asamanji.
Matta 18.7: Koo moy jaɓi ɓiŋngel pamarel bana nge'el ngam daliila innde am, min o jaɓi.”
Matta 18.9: “To goɗɗo do'i gooto ɓurɗo famɗugo caka nuɗɗinɓe yam nder hakke, ndikkana mo ɓe ɓila hayre namarde mawnde haa daande maako, ɓe njolla mo nder mbeela lugguŋga.
Matta 18.10: Bone laatanto duniyaaru ngam ndu ɗon nastina yimɓe nder hakke! Doole ko do'ata yimɓe nder hakke wona, ammaa bone laatanto neɗɗo mo laati daliila do'ere man.
Matta 18.12: To juŋngo ma malla kosŋgal ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ɗum, wudin ɗum daayiiɗum. Ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee juŋngo wooto malla kosŋgal gootal, dow nastugo yiite duumiiŋge bee juuɗe malla kosɗe ma ɗiɗi fuu
Matta 18.14: To yiitere ma nastinte nder hakke, ɗoof nde, wudin nde daayiiɗum. Ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee yiitere woore dow nastugo yiite jahannama bee gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu
Matta 18.17: “Kakkile ngam taa on njawo gooto haa famarɓe ɓe'e. Mi ɗon wi'a on: Malaa'ika'en maɓɓe haa asama ɗon ndari tum yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama. [
Matta 18.23: Ko numɗon? To goɗɗo woodi baali teemerre, nden ngootu maaji majji, o accataa cappanɗe joweenayi e joweenayi dow kooseeje ngam haa o yaha ɗaɓɓitoygo majjuŋgu na?
Matta 18.24: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To o heɓti ngu, o seyoto ngam daliila mbaalu ngootu ngu ko ɓuri baali cappanɗe joweenayi e joweenayi ɗi eeraay.
Matta 18.25: Bana non boo, Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama yiɗaa koo gooto nder famarɓe ɓe'e halka.”
Matta 18.28: , yah, fel mo, on ɗiɗo. To o nani ma, a heɓti mo
Matta 18.30: Ammaa to o salake nanango ma, yah haa maako bee goɗɗo gooto malla yimɓe ɗiɗo, ngam haa haala fuu laaɓa dow seedamku seedooɓe ɗiɗo malla tato
Matta 18.32: To o salake nanango ɓe boo, yeccu ɗum haa jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. To o sali nanango jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe, nden kam laar mo bana o keefeero malla o jomnoowo.”
Matta 18.34: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on kaɓɓi haa duniyaaru, ɗum haɓɓaama haa asama boo. Ko on piisti haa duniyaaru, ɗum fiistaama haa asama boo
Matta 18.37: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on fahin: To haa duniyaaru ndu yimɓe ɗiɗo caka mooɗon narri dow ko ɓe ƴamatammi fuu, Baabiraawo am mo asama hokkan ɓe ɗum.
Matta 18.38: Ngam haa yimɓe ɗiɗo malla tato kawti ngam innde am fuu, ton mi ɗon caka maɓɓe.”
Matta 18.40: Nden Piyer wari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Jawmiraawo, nde noy njaafotoomi deerɗiraawo am mo tokki waɗango yam aybe? Haa nde joweeɗiɗi na?”
Matta 18.41: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Aa'a, naa nde joweeɗiɗi, ammaa cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi
Matta 18.43: Ngam maajum laamu asamanji nanndi bee laamiiɗo mo yiɗi huuwooɓe mum mbaɗana mo lisaafi jawdi maako.
Matta 18.44: Nde o fuɗɗi kuugal man, ɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo mo o tokki suleyje miliyarji ɗuuɗɗi.
Matta 18.45: Goɗɗo man walaa ko o yoɓra nyamaande nde. Jaagorɗo maako umri ɓe coorra mo, kaŋko e debbo maako e ɓikkoy maako e mardi maako fuu ngam yoɓugo nde.
Matta 18.46: Gorko go tuggi koppi yeeso jaagorɗo muuɗum, tori mo, wi'i: “Useni munyanam, barkaama, ɗum fuu mi yoɓete.”
Matta 18.47: Jaagorɗo maako yurmini mo, yoofi mo, yaafani mo nyamaande man fuu.
Matta 18.49: Kuuwoowo man wurti, fotti bee kuuwdiɗɗiraawo muuɗum, mo o tokki ɗum baakin booro teemerre, o naŋngi mo daande, o ɗon ɗeɗɗa mo, o ɗon wi'a: “Yoɓam nyamaande am!”
Matta 18.50: Kuuwdiɗɗiraawo maako do'i les kosɗe maako, tori mo, wi'i: “Useni munyanam, mi yoɓete.”
Matta 18.51: Ammaa o sali, o yehi, o nastini mo nder fursina
Matta 18.52: , sey to o yoɓi nyamaande maako fuu.
Matta 18.53: Nde huuwdiɗɗiraaɓe maako woɗɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɗum suni ɓe masin, ɓe njehi, ɓe anndini jaagorɗo maɓɓe haala ka fuu.
Matta 18.54: Nden jaagorɗo ewni kuuwoowo go, wi'i mo: An kuuwoowo kalluɗo, mi yaafani ma nyamaande ma fuu ngam a tori yam.
Matta 18.55: Kadi haandaayno a enɗa kuuwdiɗɗiraawo ma bana mi enɗiri ma na?
Matta 18.56: Jaagorɗo ɓernani mo, o yahri mo haa boŋngo'en haa to o yoɓi mo nyamaande maako fuu.
Matta 18.57: Bana non boo Baabiraawo am mo asama waɗanta on, to koo moy mooɗon yaafanaaki deerɗum bee ɓernde woore.

Matta 19.1: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo, o ummi lesdi Galiili, o yehi lesdi Yahudiya, gaɗa maayo Urdun.
Matta 19.2: Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe tokki mo, o yamɗitini ɓe ton.
Matta 19.4: Farisa'en ngari haa maako ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋani gorko seera debbo mum ngam daliila koo kaye na?”
Matta 19.5: O jaabi ɓe: “On njaŋngaay ko winnda na? Haa fuɗɗam Allah tagi gorko e debbo
Matta 19.7: Nden o wi'i: “Ngam maajum gorko accan baaba muuɗum e daada muuɗum, ɗakkotiran bee debbo muuɗum, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe laatoto ɓanndu wooru
Matta 19.9: Bana non ɓe laatataako yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓaawoɗon, ammaa ɓanndu wooru. Ngam maajum taa neɗɗo fiista ko Allah haɓɓi.”
Matta 19.11: Farisa'en ƴami mo: “To non kam, ngam ɗume Muusa umri gorko hokka debbo muuɗum ɗereewol ceergal ngam seerugo ɗum
Matta 19.13: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Muusa duŋani on ɗum daliila caatal ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ammaa diga fuɗɗam ɗum laataaki non.
Matta 19.14: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Mo seeri debbo muuɗum, sonaa daliila daakaareeku, te'i debbo feere, waɗi njeenu
Matta 19.17: Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “To haala gorko bee debbo laatake non, ndikka taa ɓe te'a.”
Matta 19.18: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Naa yimɓe fuu njaɓata haala ka, sey ɓe Allah waawni:
Matta 19.19: Woɗɓe laati wahraaɓe diga danyeeki muuɗum'en, woɗɓe laati sortaaɓe, woɗɓe boo te'ataa ngam daliila laamu asamanji. Mo waawi jaɓugo haala ka, sey o jaɓa!”
Matta 19.21: Nden yimɓe ngaddi ɓikkoy pamaroy haa Yeesu ngam haa o yowa juuɗe maako dow maakoy, o waɗana koy do'a, ammaa pukara'en caatani ɓe.
Matta 19.22: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Acce ɓikkoy pamaroy ngara haa am, taa kaɗe koy, ngam laamu asamanji woodani yimɓe irin maakoy.”
Matta 19.23: O yowi juuɗe maako dow maakoy, nden o dilli.
Matta 19.25: Goɗɗo feere wari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, kuugal booɗŋgal ngale mi huuwata haa mi heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Matta 19.26: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam ɗume a ƴami yam ko wooɗi? Walaa booɗɗo, sey gooto tan. To a yiɗi nastugo nder ngeendam nduumiiɗam, sey a jogo umrooje.”
Matta 19.27: O ƴami Yeesu: “Umrooje ɗeye?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Taa mbar-hoore, taa waɗ njeenu, taa wujju, taa seeda fewre dow goɗɗo
Matta 19.29: Teddin baaba ma e daada ma, yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Matta 19.31: Suka go wi'i: “Umrooje ɗe'e fuu, mi ɗowtani ɗe, ko luttani yam fahin?”
Matta 19.32: Yeesu wi'i mo: “To a yiɗi laataago timmuɗo, yah, soorru ko marɗa, hokku ɗum talaka'en, nden kam a heɓoyan ndesaari haa asama. Nden war tokkam.”
Matta 19.33: Nde suka nani bolle ɗe, o dilli, ɓernde maako metti, ngam jawdi maako ɗuuɗndi masin.
Matta 19.35: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɗum caɗɗum haa diskuɗo nasta laamu asamanji.
Matta 19.36: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on fahin: Ngeelooba saalo nder wurdere baatal ɓuri hoyugo dow diskuɗo nasta laamu Allah.”
Matta 19.37: Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Kay, to non kam, moy waawata hisugo?”
Matta 19.38: Yeesu suti ɓe, wi'i: “Haa yimɓe ɗum waɗataako, ammaa haa Allah koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Matta 19.40: Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Ndaa, minin min acci kuuje fuu, min tokki ma, ko laatanto min kadi?”
Matta 19.41: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Saa'i
Matta 19.43: jooɗoto dow leeso laamu muuɗum tedduŋgo nde kuuje fuu kesɗiti, onon tokkiiɓe yam boo, on njooɗoto dow leese laamu sappo e ɗiɗi ngam hiitaago le'i Isra'iila sappo e ɗiɗi
Matta 19.45: Koo moy acci saare muuɗum e deerɗiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe malla saaro'en malla ɓikkoy malla gese muuɗum ngam daliila innde am, o heɓan cowi teemerre, o ronan ngeendam nduumiiɗam boo.
Matta 19.46: Ɗuuɗɓe aartuɓe laatoto sakkitiiɓe, ɗuuɗɓe sakkitiiɓe boo laatoto aartuɓe

Matta 20.1: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee jawmu ngesa mo wurti fajiri cub ngam tefoygo huuwooɓe ngam ngesa inabooje muuɗum.
Matta 20.2: O narri bee maɓɓe, o yoɓa ɓe nyalaade fuu suleyre cardi. Nden o neli ɓe haa ngesa maako.
Matta 20.3: O wurti fahin saa'a joweenayi, o yi'i yimɓe woɗɓe ɗon ndari haa luumo, ɓe ngalaa kuugal.
Matta 20.4: O wi'i ɓe: Njehe haa ngesa am onon boo, mi yoɓan on ko haani.
Matta 20.5: Ɓe ndilli haa ngesa maako. Jawmu saare wurti fahin caka nyalawma, o wurti saa'a tati boo, o waɗi bana naane.
Matta 20.6: Saa'a jowi o wurti fahin, o tawi yimɓe woɗɓe ɗon ndari. O ƴami ɓe: Ngam ɗume nyalluɗon daraago haa ɗo meere?
Matta 20.7: Ɓe njaabi: Ngam walaa mo tefi min ngam kuugal sam. O wi'i ɓe: Njehe, kuuwe onon boo haa ngesa am.
Matta 20.9: Nde naaŋge muti, jawmu ngesa wi'i ardiiɗo kuugal muuɗum: Ewna huuwooɓe, yoɓ ɓe ngeenaari maɓɓe, fuɗɗir bee sakkitiiɓe yahugo haa ngesa, timminir bee aartuɓe
Matta 20.11: Yahɓe ngesa deydey saa'a jowi ngari, ɓe keɓi koo moy maɓɓe suleyre suleyre.
Matta 20.12: Nde aartuɓe yahugo ngesa ngari, ɓe tammino ɓe keɓan ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa o hokki ɓe kamɓe boo suleyre suleyre.
Matta 20.13: Nde ɓe njaɓi, ɓe ngurŋgurti dow jawmu ngesa,
Matta 20.14: ɓe mbi'i: Ndaa, huuwɓe saa'a ngoota tan a yoɓi ɓe kal-kal bee amin, minin nyalluɓe huuwugo nder bone e gulɗum naaŋge!
Matta 20.15: Ammaa jawmu ngesa jaabi gooto maɓɓe, wi'i: Soobaajo am, mi waɗaay ma rikici. En narraay dow ngeenaari suleyre cardi woore nder nyalawmaare na?
Matta 20.16: Hoo'u ngeenaari ma, yah, min mi yiɗi yoɓugo cakitiiɗo yahugo haa kuugal boo bana mi yoɓi ma.
Matta 20.17: Malla mi waawataa huuwtinirgo jawdi am bana mi yiɗi? Malla a haaji ngam mi booɗɗo?
Matta 20.18: Bana non boo, sakkitiiɓe laatoto aartuɓe, aartuɓe boo laatoto sakkitiiɓe
Matta 20.21: Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha Urusaliima, o hoo'i pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo feere maɓɓe. Dow laawol o wi'i ɓe:
Matta 20.22: “Nane, en ɗon njaha Urusaliima, ton ɓe ndokkan
Matta 20.24: haa juuɗe mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta. Ɓe kiitoto mo kiita maayde.
Matta 20.25: Kamɓe ɓe ndokkan mo haa juuɗe heefeerɓe, ɓe njancan mo, ɓe ɓoccan mo, ɓe ɓilan mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ammaa nyalaade tataɓre, o ummititto diga maayde.”
Matta 20.27: Nden daada ɓiɓɓe Zebede wari haa Yeesu bee ɓiɓɓe mum. O sujidi, tori mo huunde.
Matta 20.28: Yeesu ƴami mo: “Ko ngiɗɗaa?” O jaabi: “Nyannde a laamake, accu ɓiɗɗo am gooto jooɗo haa nyaamo ma, gooto boo haa nano ma.”
Matta 20.29: Yeesu jaabi mo: “On anndaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaawan yarugo jardugel bone ngel min mi tammi yarugo na?” Ɓe mbi'i: “Min mbaawan.”
Matta 20.30: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga, on njaran jardugel am, ammaa jooɗaago haa nyaamo malla haa nano am, naa min hokkata ɗum, ɗum ɗon ngam yimɓe ɓe Baabiraawo am taaskitini.”
Matta 20.32: Nde pukara'en sappo luttuɓe nani haala ka'a, ɓe ɓernani deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo go.
Matta 20.33: Nden Yeesu ewni ɓe fuu, wi'i ɓe: “On anndi laamiiɓe ummaatooje ɗon ndoola yimɓe muuɗum'en, mawɓe boo ɗon kolla ɓe baawɗe.
Matta 20.34: Ammaa taa ɗum wona non caka mooɗon. To gooto mooɗon yiɗi laataago mawɗo, sey o laato jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Matta 20.36: Mo yiɗi ardaago caka mooɗon, laatoto maccuɗo mooɗon
Matta 20.38: Ngam Ɓii-neɗɗo boo waraay ngam yimɓe kuuwana mo, ammaa ngam o huuwana yimɓe, o hokka yoŋki maako ngam soottugo ɗuuɗɓe.”
Matta 20.40: Nde ɓe ngurti wuro Yeriko, mooɓre ɗuuɗnde tokki Yeesu.
Matta 20.41: Wumɓe ɗiɗo ɗonno njooɗi kommbi laawol, nde ɓe nani Yeesu ɗon saalo, ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo,
Matta 20.44: Mooɓre telɓani ɓe haa ɓe njeeɗo. Ammaa ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, Ɓii Daawuda, enɗu min!”
Matta 20.45: Yeesu dari, ewni ɓe, ƴami ɓe: “Ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on?”
Matta 20.46: Ɓe njaabi: “Jawmiraawo, haa gite amin mbumta.”
Matta 20.47: Yeesu yurmini ɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe, law yimɓe ɗiɗo go mbumti, ɓe tokki mo.

Matta 21.1: Nde ɓe ɓadi Urusaliima, ɓe njotti wuro Baytifaaji, gal Hooseere Jaytunje, Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo.
Matta 21.2: O wi'i ɓe: “Naste wuro wonŋgo yeeso mooɗon to, on tawan wamnde e molde maare ɗon kaɓɓi. Piiste ɗe, ngaddaneeɗam.
Matta 21.3: To goɗɗo wi'i on koo ɗume, njaabe mo: Jawmiraawo woodi haaje maaje, law o accanan on ɗe.”
Matta 21.4: Ɗum waɗi non ngam hiɓɓingo bolle annabiijo, biiɗo:
Matta 21.7: Ndaa laamiiɗo ma ɗon wara haa maaɗa,
Matta 21.8: o jaŋkiniiɗo, o ba'iiɗo wamnde e molde maare
Matta 21.11: Pukara'en go ndilli, ɓe mbaɗi bana Yeesu umruno ɓe.
Matta 21.12: Ɓe ngaddi wamnde e molde maare. Ɓe ndaɗɗi limce maɓɓe dow maaje, nden Yeesu wa'i.
Matta 21.13: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe'iti limce muuɗum'en dow laawol, woɗɓe boo itti lice leɗɗe mbe'iti ɗe dow laawol.
Matta 21.14: Mooɓre ardunde Yeesu e tokkiinde ɓaawoɗon mbi'a bee sawtu: “
Matta 21.18: Barka laatano garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo!
Matta 21.23: Nde Yeesu nasti Urusaliima, berniwol fuu dimmbi. Jooɗiiɓe ton ƴamƴamtiri: “Gorko oo, ɗum moy?”
Matta 21.24: Mooɓre jaabi ɓe: “Ɗum Yeesu, annabiijo iwɗo Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili.”
Matta 21.28: O faarti soorrooɓe e soodooɓe wonɓe nder maaru fuu, o hippi taabe sannjooɓe ceede e koromje soorrooɓe pooli.
Matta 21.29: O wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa ko winnda: Suudu am wi'ete suudu waɗugo do'a, ammaa onon, on laatini ndu lowol fasooɓe
Matta 21.32: Wumɓe e woosɓe ngari haa Yeesu nder haykaliiru, o yamɗitini ɓe.
