Matta 21.33: Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta tikki nde ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ɗe o waɗi, ɓikkoy boo ɗon ngooka nder haykaliiru, ɗon mbi'a: “
Matta 21.38: Ɓe mbi'i Yeesu: “A ɗon nana ko koy mbi'ata na?” Yeesu jaabi: “Ooho, mi ɗon nana. On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda na: Bee kunnduɗe ɓikkoy e musinankoy a taaskitinani hoore ma maŋgtoore
Matta 21.40: Nden o acci ɓe, o wurti berniwol, o dilli haa Baytaniya, o waali ton.
Matta 21.42: Jaŋngo man fajiri cub nde Yeesu ɗon loro haa berniwol, o maati dolo.
Matta 21.43: O yi'i ibbi kommbi laawol, o yehi les maaki, ammaa o tawaay koo ɗume, sey haakooji tan. Nden o wi'i ibbi: “Taa a meeta rimugo ɓiɓɓe sam!” Law ibbi go yoori.
Matta 21.44: Nde pukara'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kayɗini. Ɓe ƴami Yeesu: “Noy ibbi ki yoori law bana nii?”
Matta 21.45: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki, on cekaay, nden kam, on mbaawan waɗugo naa ko mi waɗi ibbi ki tan, ammaa ko ɓuri ɗum boo. Koo to on mbi'i hooseere nde'e: Ɗoofa diga ɗo ɗisoya nder weendu, ɗum waɗoto
Matta 21.47: To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki, on keɓan ko on tori fuu.”
Matta 21.49: Yeesu dilli, nasti haykaliiru. Nde o ɗon ekkitina yimɓe, mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en ngari haa maako, ƴami mo: “Bee duŋayeere moy a waarata kuuje ɗe'e? Moy duŋani ma waɗugo bana nii?”
Matta 21.50: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Min boo, mi ƴaman on huunde woore. To on njaabake yam, nden kam, min boo mi wi'an on bee duŋayeere moy mi waɗata kuuje ɗe'e.
Matta 21.51: Moy duŋani Yuhanna waɗango yimɓe baptisma?” Allah naa malla yimɓe? Ɓe puɗɗi sarwootirgo hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “To en mbi'i Allah, o ƴaman en: koni on nuɗɗinaay Yuhanna?
Matta 21.52: Ammaa to en mbi'i yimɓe boo, en ɗon kula yimɓe, ngam yimɓe fuu nuɗɗini Yuhanna o annabiijo.”
Matta 21.53: Ngam maajum ɓe njaabi: “Min anndaa.” Yeesu wi'i: “Min boo mi wi'ataa on bee duŋayeere moy mbaɗanmi kuuje ɗe'e.”
Matta 21.55: “Ko numoton dow balndol ngo'ol? Goɗɗo woodi ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo. O yehi haa arano, o wi'i mo: Ɓiŋngel am, yah huuwoy haa ngesa inabooje hannde.
Matta 21.56: O jaabi: Mi yahataa. Ammaa ɓaawo man o numti, o yehi.
Matta 21.57: Nden baaba yehi haa ɗiɗaɓo, wi'i mo ko o wi'no arano. Kaŋko boo o jaabi: Mi yahan, jawmam! Ammaa o yahaay.
Matta 21.58: Caka ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e, moy waɗi ko baaba mum yiɗi?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Arano.” Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Jomnooɓe e rewɓe daakaare'en aartan on nastugo laamu asamanji.
Matta 21.59: Ngam Yuhanna wari haa mooɗon, o holli on laawol adilaaku, on nuɗɗinaay mo. Ammaa jomnooɓe e rewɓe daakaare'en nuɗɗini mo. Koo nde on ngi'i ɗum, on tuubaay, koo ɓaawoɗon boo on nuɗɗinaay mo
Matta 21.62: “Nane balndol goɗŋgol: Woodi jawmu saare feere, o waɗi ngesa inabooje, o taarni ka bee kowaagol, o waɗi ɓiɗɗirde inaboojam, o mahi suudu towndu ngam aynoowo ngesa. Nden o halfini ka remooɓe, o dilli jahaaŋgal
Matta 21.64: Nde saa'i teɓugo inabooje waɗi, o neli jaggiiɓe maako haa remooɓe go ngam ɓe njaɓana mo inabooje ngesa maako.
Matta 21.65: Remooɓe naŋngi nelaaɓe maako, ɓe ɓocci gooto, ɓe mbari gooto, tataɓo boo ɓe piɗi mo bee kaa'e.
Matta 21.66: O neli nelaaɓe woɗɓe ɓurɓe ɓeya ɗuuɗugo haa maɓɓe fahin, ɓe mbaɗi ɓe bana no ɓe mbaɗino aartuɓe.
Matta 21.67: Ɓaawo man o neli ɓiyiiko haa maɓɓe, o wi'i: Ɓe teddinan ɓiyam.
Matta 21.68: Ammaa nde remooɓe ngi'i ɓiyiiko, ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe: Ndaa, kaŋko woni donoowo. En mbara mo ngam haa en mara ndonŋgu maako.
Matta 21.69: Ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe cakkini mo yaasi ngesa inabooje, ɓe mbari mo.”
Matta 21.71: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Kadi to jawmu ngesa inabooje wari, ɗume o waɗata yimɓe ɓe'e?”
Matta 21.72: Ɓe njaabi mo: “O halkan halluɓe ɓe'e bilaa enɗam, nden o halfitinan ka remooɓe woɗɓe, tammiiɓe hokkugo mo ɓenndalooje to saa'i man yottake.”
Matta 21.73: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe na?
Matta 21.80: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: “Allah hoositan laamu muuɗum, hokkan ngu ummaatoore woɗnde tammiinde rimugo ɓenndalooje. [
Matta 21.81: Koo moy do'i dow hayre nde'e, sampititto. To nde do'i dow goɗɗo boo, nde naman mo.]”
Matta 21.83: Mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en nani balndi ɗi Yeesu waɗi, ɓe paami dow maɓɓe o wolwi.
Matta 21.84: Nden ɓe tefi dabare naŋngugo mo, ammaa ɓe kuli yimɓe, ngam yimɓe ɗon ndaara mo bana annabiijo.

Matta 22.1: Kadiboo Yeesu waɗani ɓe balndi, wi'i ɓe:
Matta 22.2: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee laamiiɗo mo waɗi juulde ɓaŋgal ɓiyum.
Matta 22.3: O neli suka'en maako haa ewnaaɓe haa nyaamdu juulde man, ammaa ɓe cali wargo.
Matta 22.4: Fahin o neli suka'en feere bee umroore bana ni'i: Mbi'e ewnaaɓe: Ga'i am e nyalbi am payɗi kirsaama, nyaamdu defaama jonta, kuuje fuu taaskitinaama, ngare haa juulde ɓaŋgal.
Matta 22.5: Ammaa ewnaaɓe kakkilanaay ɗum, ɓe ndilli: Goɗɗo haa ngesa muuɗum, goɗɗo boo haa filu muuɗum,
Matta 22.6: luttuɓe naŋngi suka'en laamiiɗo go, ɓe torri ɓe, ɓe mbari ɓe.
Matta 22.7: Laamiiɗo ɓerni, neli sooje'en muuɗum, ɓe mbari mbarooɓe ko'e ɓe'e, ɓe nguli wuro maɓɓe boo.
Matta 22.8: Nden o wi'i suka'en maako: Nyaamdu juulde ɓaŋgal defaama, ammaa ewnaaɓe ke'aay wargo.
Matta 22.9: Ngam maajum njehe haa kawtirɗe laabi fuu, ewne mo tawɗon fuu haa juulde ɓaŋgal.
Matta 22.10: Sukaaɓe go njehi haa laabi, ɓe tawi halluɓe e wooɗɓe fuu, ɓe mooɓti ɓe. Suudu ɓaŋgal heewi ewnaaɓe.
Matta 22.12: Laamiiɗo nasti ngam laarugo ewnaaɓe. Ton o yi'i goɗɗo, mo ɓornaaki limce ɓaŋgal.
Matta 22.13: O wi'i mo: Soobaajo am, noy a nastiri haa ɗo bilaa toggoore ɓaŋgal? O waawaay jaabaago mo sam.
Matta 22.14: Nden laamiiɗo wi'i jaggiiɓe muuɗum: Kaɓɓe kosɗe maako e juuɗe maako, ngudine mo yaasi nder nyiɓre, o woya, o hirƴindira nyii'e ton
Matta 22.16: Ngam woodi ewnaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ammaa suɓaaɓe kam ɗuuɗaay.
Matta 22.18: Nden Farisa'en njehi, mbaɗi sawari ngam naŋngugo Yeesu nder bolle muuɗum nder tuuforgol.
Matta 22.19: Ɓe neli pukara'en maɓɓe bee yimɓe Hirudus haa Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi walaa ko yaalu ma bee goɗɗo, a senndindirtaa yimɓe, a ɗon anndina laawol Allah bee gooŋga.
Matta 22.20: Wi' min ko a numata: Ɗum kaanduɗum hokkugo laamiiɗo Roma jomorgol na malla naa non?”
Matta 22.21: Ammaa Yeesu anndi numo maɓɓe halluŋgo, o wi'i ɓe: “Hey onon naafiki'en, koni on tuufani yam tuuforgol?
Matta 22.22: Kolleeɗam ceede ɗe ɓe njoɓrata jomorgol.” Ɓe ngaddani mo suleyre.
Matta 22.23: Nden Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Suura e innde moy ɗo?”
Matta 22.24: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma jeyi.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Nden kam njoɓe Kaysara ko haanani mo, ndokke Allah boo ko haanani Allah.”
Matta 22.26: Nde ɓe nani jaawaabu man, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe ndilli, ɓe acci mo.
Matta 22.28: Nyalaade man Saduki'en, wi'anɓe maayɓe ummitittaako, ngari haa Yeesu. Ɓe ƴami mo
Matta 22.30: “Moodibbo, Muusa wi'i: To goɗɗo maayi, walaa ɓikkoy, sey deerɗiiko te'a debbo maako ngam haa o heɓana maayɗo ɓikkoy
Matta 22.32: Woodino haa amin deerɗiraaɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Arano te'i debbo, maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy. Bana nii o accani deerɗiiko debbo maako.
Matta 22.33: Ɗum laati bana non dow ɗiɗaɓo, dow tataɓo haa yotti joweeɗiɗaɓo.
Matta 22.34: Ɓaawo maɓɓe fuu, debbo boo maayi.
Matta 22.35: Nyannde ummitineeki maayɓe kam, debbo oo laatanto moy caka maɓɓe? Nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe te'ino mo.”
Matta 22.37: Ammaa Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On ɗon mboofa masin! Ngam on anndaa ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe, on anndaa baawɗe Allah boo.
Matta 22.38: To maayɓe ummitake, walaa teegal fahin, ammaa ɓe laatoto bana malaa'ika'en haa asama.
Matta 22.39: On njaŋngaay ko Allah wolwani on dow ummitineeki maayɓe na? O wi'i:
Matta 22.40: Min woni Allah Ibrahiima e Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu. Mi Allah yeeɗɓe naa mo maayɓe
Matta 22.43: Ekkitinol maako hayɗini mooɓe nanɗe mo fuu.
Matta 22.45: Nde Farisa'en nani no Yeesu je'iniri Saduki'en, ɓe mooɓtotiri.
Matta 22.46: Gooto maɓɓe, moodibbo tawreeta waɗani Yeesu ƴamol ngo'ol ngam jarribaago mo:
Matta 22.47: “Moodibbo, umroore ndeye ɓuri mawnugo haa tawreeta?”
Matta 22.48: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Yiɗ Jawmiraawo, Allah maaɗa bee ɓernde ma fuu, bee yoŋki ma fuu e bee hakkiilo ma fuu
Matta 22.50: Kayre woni umroore mawnde e arannde.
Matta 22.51: Ndaa ɗiɗawre nanndunde bee maare: Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Matta 22.53: Tawreeta Muusa e ko annabi'en ngaazini fuu ɗon ndari dow umrooje ɗiɗi ɗe'e
Matta 22.56: Nde Farisa'en mooɓtotiri, Yeesu ƴami ɓe:
Matta 22.57: “Ko numoton dow Almasiihu? O ɓii moy?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “O
Matta 22.60: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Kadi ngam ɗume Daawuda ewni mo Jawmiraawo bee baawɗe Ruuhu Allah? O wi'i:
Matta 22.64: haa to mi wallini konne'en maaɗa les kosɗe ma
Matta 22.67: Daawuda ewni mo Jawmiraawo, noy Almasiihu laatori ɓiyiiko kadi?”
Matta 22.69: Walaa mo waawi jaabaago mo koo wolde woore. Diga nyannde man koo moy huli ƴamugo mo ƴamɗe goɗɗe.

Matta 23.1: Nden Yeesu wolwani mooɓre e pukara'en muuɗum,
Matta 23.2: o wi'i: “Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en keɓi duŋayeere jaŋngingo yimɓe tawreeta Muusa.
Matta 23.3: Ɗowtane ɓe, mbaɗe ko ɓe mbi'ata on fuu, ammaa taa tokke kuuɗe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe mbaɗataa ko ɓe mbi'ata.
Matta 23.4: Ngam ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa doŋgle tedduɗe, ɓe ndoonda ɗe yimɓe, ammaa kamɓe ɓe meemataa ɗe koo bee hoondu maɓɓe.
Matta 23.5: Ɓe ɗon kuuwa kuuɗe maɓɓe fuu ngam haa yimɓe ndaara ɓe. Ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa filakterji
Matta 23.6: mawɗi haa tiiɗe maɓɓe e juuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa tuutuuji mawɗi haa limce maɓɓe boo
Matta 23.8: Ɓe ngiɗi joole marɗe saman haa pelle nyaamdu e joole tedduɗe nder cuuɗi dewal.
Matta 23.9: Ɓe ngiɗi hoofneego haa pelle kawte, yimɓe mbi'a ɓe: Moodibbo.
Matta 23.10: Ammaa onon, taa njaɓe ewneego Moodiɓɓe, ngam on fuu on deerɗiraaɓe e on ngoodi Moodibboojo gooto.
Matta 23.11: Taa ewne goɗɗo haa duniyaaru Baaba ngam on ngoodi Baabiraawo gooto, mo asama.
Matta 23.12: Taa ɗaɓɓe ewneego Ɗowooɓe, ngam on ngoodi Ɗowoowo gooto, kaŋko woni Almasiihu.
Matta 23.13: Ɓurɗo mawnugo caka mooɗon laatoto jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Matta 23.15: Koo moy mawnini hoore muuɗum, o leestinteeɗo. Koo moy leestini hoore muuɗum boo, o ɓaŋgteteeɗo
Matta 23.18: “Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On maɓɓani yimɓe feere dammugal laamu asamanji. Onon bee ko'e mooɗon boo on nastataa, on accataa yiɗɓe nastugo boo nasta ton.
Matta 23.20: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon njaɓta marle rewɓe yurumɓe, yeeso yimɓe, on ɗon njuutina do'aaje mon. Ngam maajum on hiiteteeɓe kiita naawka.]
Matta 23.22: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon mbaɗa jahaale dow lesdi e dow beeli ngam tefugo goɗɗo gooto mo yiɗi tokkaago diina mon. To o jaɓi, on ngartira mo ɓii-jahannamaajo haa ɓura on cowi ɗiɗi.
Matta 23.24: Bone laatanto on, onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe! On ɗon mbi'a: Koo moy hunori
Matta 23.26: ɗum meere, ammaa to o hunorake kaŋŋeeri ngonndi nder haykaliiru nden kam sey o hebbitina hunayeere maako.
Matta 23.27: Onon faataaɓe e wumɓe, ɗume ɓuri saman? Kaŋŋeeri naa malla haykaliiru ndu seni kaŋŋeeri man?
Matta 23.28: On ɗon mbi'a boo: Koo moy hunori hirsirde, ɗum meere, ammaa to o hunorake dokkal dow hirsirde, nden kam sey o hebbitina hunayeere maako.
Matta 23.29: Onon wumɓe, ɗume ɓuri saman? Dokkal naa malla hirsirde nde senata dokkal man?
Matta 23.30: Ngam maajum, mo hunori hirsirde, o hunorake hirsirde e ko woni dow maare fuu.
Matta 23.31: Mo hunori haykaliiru, o hunorake haykaliiru e Allah jooɗiiɗo nder maaru.
Matta 23.32: Mo hunori asama, o hunorake leeso laamu asamanji e Allah jooɗiiɗo dow maago fuu
Matta 23.35: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon ittana Allah zakka koo haa haako minti e haako anisa e haako algaru
Matta 23.36: , ammaa on acci ko ɓuri mawnugo nder tawreeta, waato waɗugo kuuɗe adilaaku, enɗam e gooŋgaaku. Kanjum haani waɗeego bilaa yeebaago luttuɗum boo
Matta 23.38: Onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe, on ɗon itta buubel nder njaram mooɗon, ammaa on ɗon moɗa ngeelooba!
Matta 23.40: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon loota yaasi njardukoy mooɗon e yaasi taasaaje mooɗon, asee boo nder maaje ɗon heewi kuuje gujjaaɗe e suunooji mon.
Matta 23.41: Onon Farisa'en wumɓe, layɓe nder njardukoy mooɗon tawon, nden kam yaasi maakoy boo laaɓan.
Matta 23.43: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon nanndi bee genaale ndanwinaaɗe, booɗɗe laareego, ammaa nder maaje ɗon heewi i'e maayɓe e nyolɗum fuu
Matta 23.45: Bana non onon boo, haa gite yimɓe on adili'en, ammaa ɓerɗe mooɗon ɗon keewi naafikaare e halleende fuu.”
Matta 23.47: “Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon maha genaale annabi'en, on ɗon pawna genaale adili'en,
Matta 23.48: nden on ɗon mbi'a: To min ɗonno wakkati kaakiraaɓe amin, min kawtantaano ɓe ngam mbarugo annabi'en.
Matta 23.49: Bana nii on ɗon ceedano ko'e mooɗon on ɓiɓɓe yimɓe mbarnooɓe annabi'en ɓe'e.
Matta 23.50: Nden kam kebbitine ko kaakiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗuno!
Matta 23.52: Onon boɗɗe, ɓiɓɓe poosokje! Noy on mbaawrata hisugo kiita jahannama
Matta 23.54: Ngam maajum mi ɗon nela, min bee hoore am, annabi'en e hikma'en e moodiɓɓe haa mooɗon. On mbaran woɗɓe, on ɓilan woɗɓe dow leggal gaafaaŋgal, woɗɓe boo on ɓoccan ɓe nder cuuɗi dewal mooɗon, on taasnan ɓe diga berniwol ngo'ol haa ngola.
Matta 23.55: Kiita ƴiiƴam adili'en ndufaaɗam nder duniyaaru fuu, diga ƴiiƴam Habila adiliijo, haa yotti ƴiiƴam Zekariya ɓii Barakiya mo on mbari hakkunde haykaliiru e hirsirde, do'oto dow mooɗon
Matta 23.57: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɗum fuu ɗum waran dow yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u.”
Matta 23.59: “Urusaliima! Urusaliima! A mbari annabi'en, a fiɗi nelaaɓe ɓe Allah neli haa ma bee kaa'e. Nde ɗuuɗɗum mi yiɗino mooɓtugo yimɓe ma, bana no gertogal mooɓtirta ɓikkoy mum les bileeji mum, ammaa on cali.
Matta 23.61: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo on ngi'ataa yam sam, haa yotto saa'i on mbi'ata: Barka laatano garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo

Matta 24.3: . Nde o ɗon dilla, pukara'en maako ɓaditi mo ngam sappingo mo nyiɓaalo haykaliiru ndu.
Matta 24.4: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ngi'a kuuje ɗe fuu na? Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Fakat, hayre luttataa dow hayre, ɓe ngibbinan koo ɗume fuu haa ɗo.”
Matta 24.6: Nde Yeesu ɗon jooɗi dow Hooseere Jaytunje, pukara'en maako ɓaditi mo, kamɓe feere maɓɓe, ɓe ƴami mo: “Yeccu min ndeye kuuje ɗe'e laatoto? Alaama kaye waŋginta saa'i loraaki ma e timmuki duniyaaru?”
Matta 24.7: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Kakkile, ngam taa goɗɗo majjina on.
Matta 24.8: Ngam ɗuuɗɓe ngaran bee innde am, ɓe mbi'an: Min woni Almasiihu. Ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Matta 24.9: On nanan kubaruuji konuuji ɓadiiɗi e daayiiɗi. Kakkile, taa kultore. Doole ɗum laato, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode tawon.
Matta 24.10: Ummaatoore ummanto ummaatoore feere. Laamu ummanto laamu feere. Weelooji e dimmbanɗe lesdi mbaɗan haa nokkuuje feere feereeje.
Matta 24.11: Boneeji ɗi fuu laatoto bana fuɗɗam luuwe ɓesnanɗo.
Matta 24.13: Yimɓe naŋngan on, njahran on haa woɗɓe ngam ɓe torra on, ɓe mbara on. Ummaatooje fuu nganyan on daliila innde am.
Matta 24.14: Saa'i man ɗuuɗɓe accan nuɗɗingo yam, ɓe zammbotiran, ɓe nganyindiran.
Matta 24.15: Fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en ɗuuɗɓe mbaŋgan, ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Matta 24.16: Ngam halleende ɗuuɗan masin, yiide yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe feewtan.
Matta 24.17: Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, hisan
Matta 24.19: Kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu asamanji waazinte nder duniyaaru fuu, ngol laatanto ummaatooje seedamku, nden duniyaaru timman.”
Matta 24.21: “To on ngi'i nyidduɗum nattinoojum ko annabi Daniyel wolwino dow muuɗum ɗon dari haa nokkuure seniinde - mo jaŋngi ɗum, sey faama booɗɗum!
Matta 24.23: Nden kam sey wonɓe haa lesdi Yahudiya ndogga haa kooseeje.
Matta 24.24: Mo ɗon dow soorowol, taa jippo ngam hoocugo kuuje nder maagol.
Matta 24.25: Mo ɗon haa ngesa boo, taa loro haa saare ngam hoocugo limce mum
Matta 24.27: Kayto, bone laatanto reedu'en e musininanɓe nder nyannde man!
Matta 24.28: Tore Allah ngam taa doggudu mon laato saa'i duumol malla
Matta 24.31: Ngam saa'i man torra makka laatoto, irin maaka meeɗaay laataago diga duniyaaru jooɗi haa wargo jonta, ka meetataa laataago boo
Matta 24.33: To Allah ustaayno limgal nyalɗe man, walaa koo gooto hisanno. Ammaa o usti ɗe ngam daliila suɓaaɓe maako.
Matta 24.35: Wakkati man, to goɗɗo wi'i on: Ndaa Almasiihu haa ɗo! Malla: Ndaa mo haa to! Taa njaɓe.
Matta 24.36: Ngam fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe almasiihu'en malla ɓe annabi'en mbaŋgan, ɓe mbaɗan alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji mawɗi ngam majjingo koo suɓaaɓe Allah, to ɗum heɓoto.
Matta 24.37: Mi anndini on ɗum diga ɗum siwaa laataago.”
Matta 24.39: “To ɓe mbi'i on: Ndaa Almasiihu ɗon haa ladde! Taa njehe ton malla to ɓe mbi'i: O ɗon nyukki haa ɗo! Taa njaɓe ɗum.
Matta 24.40: Bana ma'ere ma'irta diga fuunaaŋge haa hiirnaaŋge, non boo nyalaade loraaki
Matta 24.44: Ngam haa nyawmande woni fuu, ton jigaaje mooɓtoto
Matta 24.47: Law ɓaawo nyalɗe ɓillaare go, naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru accan yaynugo, koode asama njanan, baawɗeeji asama boo ndimmboto
Matta 24.51: waŋgan haa asama. Saa'i maajum ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu mboyan, ɓe ngi'an Ɓii-neɗɗo ɗon wara dow duule asama, bee baawɗe ɗuuɗɗe e tedduŋgal maŋngal
Matta 24.53: O nelan malaa'ika'en maako, ɓe puufan luwal maŋngal, ɓe mooɓtan suɓaaɓe maako wonɓe haa alkibilaaji duniyaaru nayi fuu diga keerol asama ngo'ol haa ngola.”
Matta 24.55: “Paame ko ibbi anndinta on: To lice maaki kesɗiti, haakooji maaki boo mbiliti, on anndi duumol ɓadake.
Matta 24.56: Bana non onon boo, to on ngi'i kuuje ɗe'e ɗon laato, annde o ɓadake wargo.
Matta 24.57: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatoto hiddeko yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u fuu maayda.
Matta 24.58: Asama e lesdi njinnan, ammaa bolle am njinnataa sam.”
Matta 24.60: “Walaa neɗɗo anndi nyalaade maajum malla saa'i man. Koo malaa'ika'en haa asama, koo
Matta 24.63: Ko laatino zamanu Nuuhu, ɗum waɗan saa'i loraaki
Matta 24.67: Nde ilam tuufaana siwaano wargo, yimɓe ɗonno nyaama, ɗonno njara, ɗonno ɓaŋga e ɗonno te'a haa nyalaade Nuuhu nasti koommbowal
Matta 24.69: Ɓe anndaa sam, haa ndiyam wari, halki ɓe fuu. Bana non loraaki
Matta 24.73: Saa'i man ɗiɗo ngondan haa ngesa, gooto hoo'e, gooto acce.
Matta 24.74: Rewɓe ɗiɗo namdan dow namarde, gooto hoose, gooto acce.
Matta 24.75: Ngam maajum ayne, nde nii on anndaa nyalaade loraaki Jawmiraawo mooɗon.
Matta 24.76: A anndi booɗɗum to jawmu saare anndino saa'iire ndeye gujjo warata, o ɗaanataakono, o accataano gujjo nasta saare maako.
Matta 24.77: Ngam maajum laate taaskiiɓe onon boo, ngam Ɓii-neɗɗo waran nder saa'iire nde on tammaaki sam
Matta 24.80: “Kadi, moy woni kuuwoowo koolaaɗo, kakkilɗo mo jaagorɗo mum halfini ɗum huuwooɓe saare mum, haa o hokka ɓe nyaamdu to saa'i man yottake?
Matta 24.81: Barka laatanto kuuwoowo oo, to jaagorɗo maako warti, tawti mo o ɗon suklani kuugal nga'al.
Matta 24.82: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Jaagorɗo darnan mo dow jawdi muuɗum fuu.
Matta 24.83: Ammaa to kuuwoowo oo o kalluɗo, o numi: Jaagorɗo am wartataa law,
Matta 24.84: o fuɗɗi fiyugo huuwooɓe wonduɓe bee maako, o ɗon nyaamda e o ɗon yarda bee wuykooɓe,
Matta 24.85: nden jaagorɗo maako wartan nyalaade nde o tammaaki, nder saa'iire nde o anndaa boo.
Matta 24.86: Jaagorɗo maako torran mo torra caatuka, hokkan mo ngeenaari naafiki'en. Kaŋko o woyan, o hirƴindiran nyii'e ngam bone.”

Matta 25.1: “Saa'i man laamu asamanji nanndan bee faanyɓe rewɓe sappo. Ɓe koo'i pittirlaaji maɓɓe, ɓe ngurti ngam fottoygo bee ɓaŋɗo
Matta 25.3: Njowo nder maɓɓe faataaɓe, njowo luttuɓe boo hakkilɓe.
Matta 25.4: Faataaɓe ngaddi pittirlaaji muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe njogaaki nebbam ngoɗɗam.
Matta 25.5: Hakkilɓe ngaddi pittirlaaji muuɗum'en, ɓe njogi nebbam ngoɗɗam nder paali boo.
Matta 25.6: Nde ɓaŋɗo waraay law, faanyɓe rewɓe ɓe'e fuu ngoŋngi, ɗaani.”
Matta 25.8: Caka jemma ɓe nani hoolo: “Ndaa ɓaŋɗo! Umme, njaɓɓe mo.”
Matta 25.9: Ɓe fuu ɓe pini, ɓe taaskitini pittirlaaji maɓɓe.
Matta 25.10: Faataaɓe mbi'i hakkilɓe: Useni ndokke min haa nebbam mooɗon seɗɗa, ngam pittirlaaji amin ɗon nyifa!
Matta 25.11: Hakkilɓe njaabi ɓe: Ɗum waɗataako! Ngam ɗum he'ataa en fuu, ndikka on njaha haa soorrooɓe, on coodoya.
Matta 25.12: Faataaɓe ndilli soodoygo nebbam, wakkati man boo ɓaŋɗo yotti. Faanyɓe taaskitiiɓe nastidi bee maako nder suudu ɓaŋgal. Nden dammugal maɓɓaama.
Matta 25.13: Nde neeɓi seɗɗa, faanyɓe rewɓe luttuɓe go ngari, ɓe tappi dammugal: Jaagorɗo! Jaagorɗo! Maɓɓitan min!
Matta 25.14: Ammaa o jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Mi anndaa on
Matta 25.16: Ngam maajum ayne, ngam on anndaa nyalaade koo saa'i maajum.”
Matta 25.18: “Ɗum laatoto bana goɗɗo mo yiɗi dillugo jahaaŋgal. O ewni huuwooɓe maako, o halfini ɓe mardi maako.
Matta 25.19: O hokki gooto ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi, gooto teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi, tataɓo boo teemerre, haa koo moy maɓɓe fuu deydey semmbe muuɗum. Nden o dilli.
Matta 25.20: Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi dilli law, waɗi filu bee maaje. O heɓi riba ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi goɗɗe.
Matta 25.21: Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi dilli, waɗi bana man boo. O heɓi riba ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi goɗɗe.
Matta 25.22: Ammaa keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre dilli, wasi lesdi, nyukkini ceede jaagorɗo mum ton.
Matta 25.24: Nde neeɓi jaagorɗo huuwooɓe go wartoyi, o ƴami ɓe lisaafi ceede maako.
Matta 25.25: Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi go ɓaditi, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, a hokki yam ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi. Ndaa, mi heɓi riba teemeɗɗe jowi goɗɗe.
Matta 25.26: Jaagorɗo maako wi'i mo: Booɗɗum, a kuuwoowo booɗɗo, koolaaɗo! A waŋgini adilaaku ma nder kuuje seɗɗa, mi halfinte kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. War, seyoda bee am!
Matta 25.27: Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi go ɓaditi, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, a hokki yam ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi. Ndaa mi heɓi riba teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi goɗɗe.
Matta 25.28: Jaagorɗo maako wi'i: Booɗɗum, a kuuwoowo booɗɗo, koolaaɗo, a huuwi booɗɗum bee kuuje seɗɗa, mi halfinte kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. War, seyoda bee am!
Matta 25.30: Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre boo wari, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, mi anndi a goɗɗo caatuɗo, a ɗon soda haa a aawaay, a ɗon mooɓta boo haa a saakaay.
Matta 25.31: Mi huli, mi yehi, mi nyukkini ceede ma nder lesdi. Ndaa ceede ma.
Matta 25.32: Jaagorɗo maako wi'i mo: A kuuwoowo kalluɗo, mbaateendamjo! A anndi mi ɗon soda haa mi aawaay, mi ɗon mooɓta haa mi saakaay,
Matta 25.33: haandino a resa ceede am haa sigooɓe ceede, to mi warti mi heɓtanno ɗe am bee riba.
Matta 25.34: Njaɓte ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre go haa maako, ndokke ɗe haa mo mari ceede kaŋŋeeri ujineere!
Matta 25.35: Ngam koo moy marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo haa o wona nder jeynitaare, ammaa mo walaa koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Matta 25.37: Ammaa kuuwoowo meereejo go, ngudine mo yaasi nder nyiɓre. O woya, o hirƴindira nyii'e ton
Matta 25.42: wari nder tedduŋgal muuɗum bee malaa'ika'en muuɗum fuu, o jooɗoto dow leeso laamu maako
Matta 25.44: Ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu mooɓtoto yeeso maako, o senndan yimɓe bana gaynaako senndirta baali bee be'i.
Matta 25.45: O darnan baali haa nyaamo maako, be'i boo haa nano maako.
Matta 25.46: Nden laamiiɗo wi'an wonɓe haa nyaamo muuɗum: Ngare, onon barkiɗinaaɓe Baabiraawo am, ndone laamu taaskitinaaŋgu ngam mooɗon diga tageeki duniyaaru.
Matta 25.47: Ngam mi beelaaɗono, on nyaamni yam, mi ɗomɗuɗono, on njarni yam, mi koɗono, on mbeerni yam,
Matta 25.48: mi walaano limce, on ɓorni yam, mi nyawɗono, on ngilli yam, mi kaɓɓaaɗono nder suudu fursina
Matta 25.50: Nden adili'en ɓe'e ƴaman mo: Jawmiraawo, ndey min ngi'i ma a beelaaɗo, min nyaamni ma? Malla a ɗomɗuɗo, min njarni ma?
Matta 25.51: Ndey min ngi'i ma a koɗo, min mbeerni ma? Malla a walaa limce, min ɓorni ma?
Matta 25.52: Ndey min ngi'i ma a nyawɗo malla a kaɓɓaaɗo nder suudu fursina, min ngilli ma?
Matta 25.53: Laamiiɗo jaaboto ɓe: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on mbaɗani gooto nder deerɗiraaɓe am ɓurɓe leesugo ɓe'e, min on mbaɗani.
Matta 25.55: Nden laamiiɗo wi'an wonɓe haa nano muuɗum: Ndaayeeɗam, onon naalaaɓe! Ndille nder yiite duumiiŋge, taaskitinaaŋge ngam Iblisa e malaa'ika'en muuɗum.
Matta 25.56: Ngam mi beelaaɗono, on nyaamnaay yam, mi ɗomɗuɗono, on njarnaay yam.
Matta 25.57: Mi koɗono, on mbeernaay yam, mi walaano limce, on ɓornaay yam, mi nyawɗono, mi kaɓɓaaɗono haa suudu fursina, on ngillaaki yam.
Matta 25.58: Nden ɓe ƴaman mo: Jawmiraawo, ndey min ngi'i ma a beelaaɗo malla a ɗomɗuɗo, a koɗo malla a walaa limce, a nyawɗo malla a kaɓɓaaɗo nder suudu fursina, min cuklanaaki ma?
Matta 25.59: Laamiiɗo jaaboto ɓe: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on mbaɗanaay gooto nder yimɓe am ɓurɓe leesugo ɓe'e, min on cali waɗango ɗum.
Matta 25.60: Kamɓe ɓe nastan haa yaŋgada nduumiika, ammaa adili'en go keɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam

Matta 26.1: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo bolle ɗe'e fuu, o wi'i pukara'en maako:
Matta 26.2: “On anndi lutti nyalɗe ɗiɗi haa juulde
Matta 26.6: ngam ɓilugo mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal
Matta 26.9: Saa'i man mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en ummaatoore kawti haa saare Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en.
Matta 26.10: Ɓe carwootiri haa ɓe ƴoyra Yeesu, ɓe naŋnga mo, ɓe mbara mo.
Matta 26.11: Ammaa ɓe mbi'i: “Taa en mbaɗa ɗum wakkati juulde, ngam taa ɗum ummina fitina caka ummaatoore.”
Matta 26.13: Yaake Yeesu ɗonno haa Baytaniya nder saare Simon, kuturuujo,
Matta 26.14: debbo feere ɓaditi mo. O ɗon jogi faandu saɗndu heewndu uurdi marndi saman masin. O rufi ndi dow hoore Yeesu saa'i o ɗonno nyaama
Matta 26.16: Nde pukara'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe ɓerni, ɓe mbi'i: “Wonnuru meere, ko ɗum nafi!
Matta 26.17: To ɓe coorrino uurdi man, ɓe keɓanno ceede ɗuuɗɗe, haa ɓe ndokka ɗe talaka'en.”
Matta 26.18: Nde Yeesu anndi ko ɓe mbolwata, o wi'i ɓe: “Koni on ɗon pitina debbo oo? O huuwani yam kuugal booɗŋgal.
Matta 26.19: Ngam talaka'en ngondan bee mooɗon foroy, ammaa min, mi wondataa bee mooɗon foroy
Matta 26.21: O rufi uurdi dow ɓanndu am ngam uweeki am.
Matta 26.22: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Haa ɓe ngaazoto Linjiila ka'a nder duniyaaru fuu, ɓe mbolwan ko debbo oo waɗi, ngam siftorgo mo.”
Matta 26.24: Nden gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo mo innde muuɗum Yahuuda Iskariyot, yehi haa mawɓe liman'en.
Matta 26.25: O wi'i ɓe: “Ɗume on ndokkatammi to mi hokki on Yeesu?” Ɓe limani mo ceede cardi cappanɗe tati.
Matta 26.26: Diga saa'i man Yahuuda fuɗɗi tefugo saa'iire fottannde haa o hokka ɓe Yeesu.
Matta 26.28: Nder nyalaade go'oore juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, pukara'en Yeesu ɓaditi, ƴami mo: “Haa toy a yiɗi min mbaɗa taaskara kiirtaari
Matta 26.31: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Njehe nder berniwol, haa wayne, mbi'e mo: Moodibbo wi'i: Wakkati am wari, mi yiɗi waɗugo juulde Paska bee pukara'en am haa saare maaɗa.”
Matta 26.32: Pukara'en mbaɗi ko Yeesu umri ɓe, ɓe taaskitini kiirtaari Paska.
Matta 26.34: Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, Yeesu jooɗodi bee pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo ngam haa ɓe nyaama.
Matta 26.35: Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu wi'i: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: “Gooto mooɗon zammboto yam.”
Matta 26.36: Ɗum suni pukara'en masin, koo moy maɓɓe fuɗɗi ƴamugo mo: “Naa ɗum min sika, Jawmiraawo?”
Matta 26.37: Yeesu jaabi: “Mo ɗon suuwa juŋngo mum bee am nder le'al jonta, kaŋko zammboto yam
Matta 26.41: maayan bana ko winnda dow maako. Ammaa bone laatanto mo zammboto Ɓii-neɗɗo, to o danyaakano, ɓurananno mo.”
Matta 26.42: Yahuuda zammbotooɗo mo ƴami: “Naa ɗum min sika, Moodibbo?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Bana mbi'ɗa, ɗum an!”
Matta 26.44: Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu hoo'i tamseere, o yetti Allah, o yewi nde, o hokki pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Koo'e ɗum, nyaame, ɗum ɓanndu am.”
Matta 26.45: Nden o hoo'i jardugel, o yetti Allah, o hokki ɓe, o wi'i: “Njare on fuu,
Matta 26.46: ngam ɗum ƴiiƴam am, ndufaaɗam ngam yaafuye hakkeeji yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, bee maajam Allah tabitiniri alkawal muuɗum
Matta 26.48: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo, mi meetataa yarugo inaboojam ɗa'am sam, haa nyannde njardanmi kesam bee mooɗon nder laamu Baabiraawo am.”
Matta 26.49: Nden ɓe ngimi gime maŋgtooje, ɓe ndilli haa Hooseere Jaytunje.
Matta 26.51: Dow laawol Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Jemmaare nde'e on accatam on fuu. Ngam Deftere wi'i: Mi mbaran gaynaako, tokkere baali boo saŋkititto
Matta 26.53: Ammaa to mi ummitake, mi aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili
Matta 26.55: Piyer wi'i mo: “Koo to yimɓe fuu acci ma, min kam mi accataa ma sam!”
Matta 26.56: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmaami: Jemmaare nde'e, hiddeko asgumri
Matta 26.57: u'a, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.”
Matta 26.58: Piyer wi'i mo: “Mi meeɗataa wi'go mi anndaa ma koo to doole mi maayda bee maaɗa.” Pukara'en luttuɓe fuu mbi'i non.
Matta 26.60: Nden Yeesu wardi bee pukara'en muuɗum haa nokkuure wi'eteende Gecemane, o wi'i ɓe: “Njooɗe haa ɗo, haa mi waɗoya do'a haa to.”
Matta 26.61: O yahdi bee Piyer e ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɗiɗo, o fuɗɗi sunaago e maatugo torra nder ɓernde maako.
Matta 26.62: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Torra ɓernde am yiɗi mbarugo yam. Tokke jooɗaago haa ɗo, ayne bee am.”
Matta 26.63: O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o hippi yeeso maako haa lesdi, o waɗi do'a bana ni'i: “Baabiraawo am, to ɗum heɓoto, daaynanam jardugel torra nge'el. Ammaa waɗ ko ngiɗɗa, naa ko ngiɗmi.”
Matta 26.65: O lori haa pukara'en tato go, o tawi ɓe ɗaanake. O wi'i Piyer: “On mbaawaay aynugo bee am koo saa'a ngoota!
Matta 26.66: Ayne, tore, ngam taa on nasta jarribeeki. Ko ruuhu neɗɗo yiɗi, ɓanndu muuɗum waawataa waɗugo ɗum, ngam ndu tampundu.”
Matta 26.68: O yehi ɗiɗawre, o waɗi do'a bana ni'i: “Baabiraawo am, to heɓataako jardugel ngel daayo, accammi, nden kam sey mi yara ngel, muuyo maaɗa laato.”
Matta 26.69: O lorti haa pukara'en maako fahin, o tawi ɓe ɓe ɗon ɗaani, ngam gite maɓɓe teddi.
Matta 26.70: O acci ɓe, o yehi fahin, o waɗi do'a kal-kal bana naane.
Matta 26.71: Nden o lorti haa pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ɗaani haa jonta na? On ɗon ciwto na? Ndaa saa'i waɗi haa ɓe ndokka
Matta 26.74: Umme, ndillen! Ndaa zammbotooɗo yam ɓaditake.”
Matta 26.76: Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, Yahuuda, gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo wari. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngardi bee maako, ɓe ɗon njogi kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en neli ɓe.
Matta 26.77: Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo Yeesu, hokkuno ɓe alaama, wi'i: “Mo mi hebbata, ɗum kaŋko, naŋnge mo.”
Matta 26.78: Law Yahuuda ɓaditi Yeesu, wi'i mo: “Sannu, moodibbo!” Nden o hebbi mo.
Matta 26.79: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Soobaajo, timmin ko waddu ma haa ɗo.” Nden yimɓe ɓaditi, ukki dow Yeesu, naŋngi ɗum.
Matta 26.80: Gooto nder wonduɓe bee Yeesu losi kaafahi muuɗum, fe'i suka hooreejo liman'en, ta'i mo nofru.
Matta 26.81: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Waatu kaafahi maaɗa haa suudu maaki! Ngam hoosanɓe kaafahi kalkiran bee maaki.
Matta 26.82: Malla a anndaa mi waawanno toraago Baabiraawo am ballal, kaŋko boo o neldanno yam mooɓe malaa'ika'en mawɗe sappo e ɗiɗi na?
Matta 26.83: Ammaa to non kam, noy ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe gooŋɗirta? Ngam ɗe mbi'i sey ɗum laato bana nii.”
Matta 26.85: Saa'i man, Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On ngari naŋngugo yam bee kaafaaje e cabbi bana mi pasoowo! Tum mi ɗonno jooɗi nder
Matta 26.87: mi ɗonno ekkitina yimɓe, on naŋngaay yam
Matta 26.89: Ammaa ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi ngam haa ko winnda nder defte annabi'en ngooŋɗa.” Nden pukara'en fuu acci mo, ndoggi.
Matta 26.91: Naŋnguɓe Yeesu njahri mo haa saare Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en. Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Ndotti'en ɗon mooɓi ton.
Matta 26.92: Piyer tokki Yeesu haa daayiiɗum, haa yotti daldal saare hooreejo liman'en. O nasti saare, o jooɗodi bee aynooɓe ton, haa o laara no ɗum timmirta.
Matta 26.94: Mawɓe liman'en e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu ɗaɓɓi wullaandu dow Yeesu haa ɓe ndo'a mo kiita maayde.
Matta 26.95: Ammaa ɓe keɓaay, koo nde seedooɓe fewooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari. Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe ɗiɗo ngari,
Matta 26.96: mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo wi'no: Mi waawan yibbingo haykaliiru Allah, mi mahita ndu nder nyalɗe tati
Matta 26.99: Hooreejo liman'en ummi, wi'i Yeesu: “A jaabataako koo ɗume na? Ko mbi'ɗa dow gullaali wulliiɓe ma ɓe'e?”
Matta 26.100: Ammaa Yeesu jeeɗi. Nden hooreejo liman'en wi'i mo: “Mi ɗon hunne bee innde Allah geeto, wi' min: An woni Almasiihu,
Matta 26.103: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Nonnon, bana mbi'ɗa. Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo, on ngi'an
Matta 26.105: ɗon jooɗi haa nyaamo Allah Baawɗo. On ngi'an mo boo o ɗon wara dow duule asama
Matta 26.107: Nden hooreejo liman'en seeki limce muuɗum, wi'i: “O wolwi kalluka dow Allah! En ngalaa haaje seedooɓe feere, kalluka ka on nani jonta he'i.
Matta 26.108: Ko mbi'ɗon?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “O he'i mbareego
Matta 26.111: Nden ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe haa yeeso, ɓe lukki mo bee juuɗe, ɓe maari mo,
Matta 26.112: ɓe mbi'i: “An Almasiihu, heɓtu mo fiyi ma, to a annabiijo
Matta 26.115: Piyer ɗonno jooɗi haa daldal saare go, nden korɗo hooreejo liman'en wari haa maako, wi'i mo: “An boo a ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu mo Galiili.”
Matta 26.116: Ammaa Piyer yeddi ɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu, wi'i: “Mi anndaa ko a yiɗi wi'go.”
Matta 26.118: Nde o yehi gal dammugal zawleeru, debbo feere yi'i mo, wi'i yimɓe wonɓe ton: “Goɗɗo oo ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu mo Nasaratu.”
Matta 26.119: Piyer yeddi fahin, wi'i: “Mi hunake, gooŋga mi anndaa mo.”
Matta 26.120: Yeeso seɗɗa, yimɓe dariiɓe ton ngari haa Piyer, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Fakat a gooto maɓɓe, ɗemŋgal maaɗa ɗon waŋgina ɗum bee laaɓɗum.”
Matta 26.121: Nden Piyer wi'i: “Allah hiito yam to mi fewi. Mi hunake, gooŋga mi anndaa gorko oo!” Saa'i man nden, asgumri
Matta 26.123: Piyer siftori ko Yeesu wi'no mo: “Hiddeko asgumri u'a, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.” O wurti haa yaasi, o woyi masin.

Matta 27.1: Fajiri cub, mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en fuu ndawri mbarugo Yeesu.
Matta 27.2: Ɓe kaɓɓi mo, ɓe njahri mo haa ngomna Pilaatu.
Matta 27.4: Nde Yahuuda, zammbiiɗo Yeesu yi'i ɓe ndo'i Yeesu kiita, o mimsiti, o wartiri ceede cardi cappanɗe tati go haa mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en.
Matta 27.5: O wi'i ɓe: “Mi waɗi hakke, ngam mi zammbi goɗɗo mo walaa aybe.” Ammaa ɓe mbi'i mo: “Walaa ko yaali min! Ɗum haala maaɗa!”
Matta 27.8: Nden o dilli, o ɓili hoore maako.
Matta 27.10: Mawɓe liman'en koo'i ceede go, ɓe mbi'i: “Tawreeta duŋanaaki en nastingo ceede ɗe'e nder ndesaari haykaliiru, ngam ɗum ceede ƴiiƴam.”
Matta 27.11: Ɓe ndawri, ɓe coodi ngesa mahoowo payanɗe bee maaje, ngam uwugo jananɓe ton.
Matta 27.12: Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon ewno ngesa man Ngesa-ƴiiƴam haa wargo hannde
Matta 27.14: Bana nii ko annabi Yeremiya wi'i, hiɓɓi: “Ɓe koo'i ceede cardi cappanɗe tati, coggu ngu yimɓe Isra'iila ndarni ngam maako,
Matta 27.15: ɓe coodi ngesa mahoowo payanɗe, bana Jawmiraawo umrino yam
Matta 27.18: Ɓe ndarni Yeesu yeeso Pilaatu ngomnaajo. Nden o ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Nonnon, bana mbi'ɗa.”
Matta 27.19: Ammaa yaake mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en ngulli mo, o jaabaaki sam.
Matta 27.20: Nden Pilaatu ƴami mo: “A nanaay gullaali ɗi ɓe ngulli ma fuu na?”
Matta 27.21: Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo koo wolde woore, haa ngomnaajo hayɗini masin.
Matta 27.25: waɗi fuu, ngomna woowi yoofango ummaatoore kaɓɓaaɗo gooto haa fursina
Matta 27.27: Saa'i man woodino kaɓɓaaɗo nanaaɗo, innde maako Barabbas.
Matta 27.28: Nden Pilaatu ƴami yimɓe mooɓtiiɓe: “Moy on ngiɗi mi yoofana on? Barabbas naa malla Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu?”
Matta 27.29: Ngam o anndi ɓe njahri Yeesu haa maako daliila kaajal.
Matta 27.31: Saa'i Pilaatu ɗon jooɗi haa leeso kiita, debbo maako neli goɗɗo haa maako, wi'i mo: “Taa waɗ gorko adiliijo oo koo ɗume. Ngam jemmaare nde'e mi hoyɗi dow haala maako, ɗum ɓilli yam masin.”
Matta 27.33: Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en irni mooɓe fuu haa ɓe ƴama o yoofa Barabbas, o mbara Yeesu.
Matta 27.34: Ngomna ƴami ɓe fahin: “Moy caka yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e on ngiɗi mi yoofana on?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Yoofan min Barabbas!”
Matta 27.35: O ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume mi waɗata Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu kadi?” Ɓe njaabi ɓe fuu: “Ɓil mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Matta 27.36: Pilaatu ƴami ɓe: “Halleende ndeye o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓesdi wookugo bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Matta 27.37: Nde Pilaatu yi'i o waawataa waɗugo koo ɗume, hoolo boo ɗon ɓesdo, o hoo'i ndiyam, o looti juuɗe maako yeeso mooɓre nde'e, o wi'i: “Mi laaɓɗo e ƴiiƴam goɗɗo oo, ɗum haala mooɗon
Matta 27.39: Ummaatoore fuu wi'i: “Ƴiiƴam maako yowo dow amin e ɓiɓɓe amin!”
Matta 27.40: Nden Pilaatu yoofani ɓe Barabbas, o umri ɓe, ɓe ɓocci Yeesu, o hokki mo haa juuɗe maɓɓe ngam haa ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Matta 27.42: Sooje'en Pilaatu ngomnaajo njahri Yeesu haa laamorde, sooje'en wonɓe nder yeɓre woore fuu mooɓti dow maako.
Matta 27.43: Ɓe ɓorti mo, ɓe moji mo mojaare woɗeere,
Matta 27.44: ɓe mbaɗi meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ngol dow hoore maako, ɓe ndokki mo sawru haa juŋngo maako nyaamo. Nden ɓe tuggi koppi yeeso maako, ɓe njanci mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Allah woonane, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en!”
Matta 27.45: Ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe, ɓe njaɓti sawru haa juŋngo maako go, ɓe piyi mo bee maaru haa hoore.
Matta 27.46: Nde ɓe timmini jancugo mo, ɓe ɓorti mo mojaare go, ɓe ɓorni mo limce maako, ɓe njahri mo ngam haa ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Matta 27.48: Nde ɓe ɗon ngurto, ɓe potti bee goɗɗo Sirene, innde maako Simon. Ɓe ndooli mo roondaago gaafaaŋgal Yeesu.
Matta 27.49: Ɓe njotti haa nokkuure wi'eteende Golgota, bana wi'go Gumbal-hoore.
Matta 27.50: Ton ɓe ndokki mo inaboojam njillindiraaɗam bee ndiyam kaaɗɗam, ngam haa o yara. Ammaa nde Yeesu metti ɗam, o sali yarugo.
Matta 27.52: Ɓe ɓili mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe cenndi limce maako hakkunde maɓɓe bee waɗugo kur'u
Matta 27.54: Nden ɓe njooɗi ton, ɓe ayni mo.
Matta 27.55: Ɓe mbinndi daliila kiita maako dow alluha, ɓe ɓili ka haa dow hoore maako: “Oo woni Yeesu, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Matta 27.56: Ɓe ɓildi fasooɓe ɗiɗo bee maako, gooto haa nyaamo maako, gooto boo haa nano maako.
Matta 27.58: Saalotooɓe ton ndimmbini ko'e muuɗum'en, kuɗi mo
Matta 27.60: mbi'i: “A wi'no a yibbinan haykaliiru, a mahtoto ndu nder nyalɗe tati. Hisnu hoore ma! To a
Matta 27.64: Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en boo njanci mo, mbi'i:
Matta 27.65: “O hisni yimɓe feere, o waawataa hisnugo hoore maako. Naa o laamiiɗo Isra'iila na? Sey o jippo jonta diga leggal gaafaaŋgal haa en nuɗɗina mo.
Matta 27.66: O ɗon hooli Allah, o wi'i o Ɓiɗɗo maako. Booɗɗum, sey en ndaara to Allah yiɗi hisnugo mo jonta
Matta 27.68: Fasooɓe ɓildaaɓe bee maako boo kallini mo bana non.
Matta 27.70: Diga caka nyalawma nyiɓre waɗi dow lesdi fuu, haa yotti saa'a tati.

Matta 27.73: Bana wi'go: “Yaa Allah am, yaa Allah am, ngam ɗume a wudini yam
Matta 27.75: Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton nani ɗum, mbi'i: “O ɗon ewno Eliya!”
Matta 27.76: Gooto maɓɓe doggi law, hoo'i irin sooso, suuwi ɗum nder lammuɗam, o ɓaŋgti ɗum bee loosol haa hunnduko Yeesu haa o yara
Matta 27.78: Ammaa woɗɓe mbi'i: “Sey en ndeena haa en ndaara to Eliya waran ngam hisnugo mo.”
Matta 27.79: Yeesu hooli bee sawtu fahin, nden o maayi.
Matta 27.83: seeki caka cak, diga dow haa les. Lesdi dimmbi, tapaaje ceeki
Matta 27.85: genaale maɓɓiti, senaaɓe maaynooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ummiti diga maayde.
Matta 27.86: Ɓe ngurti genaale ɓaawo ummitineeki Yeesu, ɓe nasti nder berniwol ceniiŋgol, ɓe mbaŋgani yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Matta 27.88: Nde ardiiɗo dow sooje'en Roma teemerre e aynooɓe woɗɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum ngi'i dimmbannde lesdi bee ko waɗi fuu, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Fakat, kaŋko woni
Matta 27.91: Rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ton, ɓe ndari daayiiɗum, ɓe ɗon ndaara, ɓe tokkino Yeesu diga lesdi Galiili ngam huuwango mo.
Matta 27.92: Mariyama mo wuro Magdala e Mariyama, daada Yaakuba e Yusufu e daada ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɗon nder maɓɓe
Matta 27.95: Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, goɗɗo diskuɗo mo wuro Arimatiya wari. Innde maako Yusufu, kaŋko boo o pukaraajo Yeesu.
Matta 27.96: O yehi haa Pilaatu, o ƴami mo ɓanndu Yeesu. Pilaatu umri ɓe ndokka mo ndu.
Matta 27.97: Yusufu hoosi ndu, hasni ndu bee kasa kesa.
Matta 27.98: Nden o wallini ndu nder yenaande hesre nde o wasino nder tapaare ngam hoore maako. O talli hayre mawnde, o maɓɓi yenaande go bee maare, o dilli.
Matta 27.99: Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama goɗɗo ɗon njooɗi ton, ɗon tiiti yenaande.
Matta 27.101: Jaŋngo man, ɓaawo nyalaade taaskara, mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en kawti, njehi haa Pilaatu.
Matta 27.102: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Barkaama, min ciftori, nde pewoowo oo geetono, o wi'i: Ɓaawo nyalɗe tati mi ummititto diga maayde
Matta 27.104: Ndikka a umra ɓe ayna yenaande maako nyalɗe tati, ngam taa pukara'en maako ngara, ngujja ɓanndu maako, nden ɓe mbi'a ummaatoore: O ummitake diga maayde. Fewre ɓaawoore nde'e ɓuran aranndeere hallugo.”
Matta 27.105: Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa sooje'en. Njehe, ayne yenaande bana on mbaawi fuu.”
Matta 27.106: Ɓe njehi, ɓe ayni yenaande, ɓe mbaɗi lammba ngomna dow hayre nde ɓe maɓɓiri yenaande. Ɓe ndarni sooje'en aynooɓe ton.

Matta 28.3: Alat subaha, Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama goɗɗo njehi laarugo yenaande.
Matta 28.4: Dimmbannde lesdi mawnde waɗi, ngam malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jippi diga asama, ɓaditi, talli hayre go, jooɗi dow maare.
Matta 28.5: Jaati maako ɗon yayna bana ma'ere, limce maako boo daneeje bana hottollo.
Matta 28.6: Nde aynooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe ndiwtori, ɓe laati bana maayɓe.
Matta 28.8: Malaa'ikaajo wi'i rewɓe: “Taa kultore onon kam, ngam mi anndi on ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu gaafaaɗo.
Matta 28.9: O walaaɗon haa ɗo, o ummitake diga maayde bana o wi'no. Ngare, ndaare nokkuure haa o waalino.
Matta 28.10: Nden njehe law, mbi'e pukara'en maako: O ummitake diga maayde, o aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili, on ngi'an mo ton. Kanjum ngeccumi on!”
Matta 28.12: Rewɓe ndilli diga yenaande bee jaawal, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi kulol e seyo maŋngo. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe njahri habaru man haa pukara'en Yeesu.
Matta 28.13: Nden Yeesu fotti bee maɓɓe, wi'i: “Mi hoofni on!” Rewɓe ɓaditi mo, naŋngi kosɗe maako, cujidani mo.
Matta 28.14: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! Njehe, anndine deerɗam'en, ɓe njaha haa lesdi Galiili, ton ɓe ngi'atammi!”
Matta 28.16: Nde rewɓe go ɗon ndilla, woɗɓe nder sooje'en aynooɓe yenaande go njehi nder berniwol. Ɓe ngecci mawɓe liman'en ko waɗi fuu.
Matta 28.17: Mawɓe ɓe'e carwootiri bee ndotti'en. Nde ɓe narri, ɓe ndokki sooje'en go ceede ɗuuɗɗe,
Matta 28.18: ɓe mbi'i ɓe: “Mbi'e: Pukara'en maako ngari jemma, ɓe ngujji ɓanndu maako saa'i min ɗonno ɗaani.
Matta 28.19: To ngomna nani haala ka, min keɓtan dabare de'itingo mo, min kisnan on bone fuu.”
Matta 28.20: Sooje'en go njaɓi ceede man, mbaɗi bana ɓe tinndini ɓe. Geccawol ngol saŋkiti caka Yahuudu'en haa wargo hannde.
Matta 28.22: Pukara'en sappo e go'o ndilli haa lesdi Galiili, haa hooseere nde Yeesu umruno ɓe ɓe njaha ton
Matta 28.24: Nde ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe cujidani mo, ammaa woɗɓe maɓɓe ceki.
Matta 28.25: Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, wi'i: “Baawɗe haa asama e dow lesdi fuu ndokkaama yam.
Matta 28.26: Ndille haa yimɓe ummaatooje fuu, mbaɗe ɓe pukara'en am, mbaɗane ɓe baptisma bee innde Baabiraawo e
Matta 28.30: Ekkitine ɓe haa ɓe tokko ko mi umri on fuu. Min mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon nyalɗe fuu haa yotto timmuki duniyaaru.”

Markus 1.1: Haa ɗo Kubaruwol Belŋgol dow Yeesu Almasiihu Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuɗɗi.
Markus 1.2: Bana ko winnda nder deftere annabi Esaaya: “Allah wi'i: Ndaa mi ɗon nela nelaaɗo am yeeso ma, ngam o mo'ina laawol maaɗa
Markus 1.9: Bana non Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma waŋgi nder ladde, o ɗon waazina yimɓe, o ɗon wi'a ɓe: “Tuube, njaɓe baptisma, Allah boo yaafanto on hakkeeji mooɗon.”
Markus 1.10: Lesdi Yahudiya e yimɓe Urusaliima fuu ngari haa Yuhanna, ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe, nden Yuhanna waɗani ɓe baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
Markus 1.12: Yuhanna ɗon ɓorni limce kuuwraaɗe bee gaasa ngeelooba, o ɗon taadi taadorgol laral, baɓɓatti e njumri ladde ngoni nyaamdu maako
Markus 1.14: Nder waazu maako, o wi'i: “Goɗɗo waran ɓaawo am. Kaŋko o ɓuratam daraja, koo turaago fiista ɓoggi paɗe maako mi he'aay.

Markus 1.31: Nde Yeesu tokki laawol kommbi weendu Galiili, o yi'i Simon e deerɗiraawo mum Andire, ɓe ɗon ngubo zubaaji

Markus 1.36: Nde o yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o yi'i deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo, Yaakuba e Yuhanna, ɓiɓɓe Zebede. Ɓe ɗon nder koommbowal

Markus 1.42: waɗi, Yeesu nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o ekkitini ɓe.

Markus 1.48: Yeesu telɓani ruuhu coɓŋgu, wi'i: “Jeeɗa, wurta nder maako.”
Markus 1.49: Ngu ɓosli gorko go, nden ngu wooki, ngu wurti diga maako.
Markus 1.50: Yimɓe fuu kayɗini, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗum ɗume? Ɗum ekkitinol kesol bee baawɗe! Goɗɗo oo ɗon umra koo ruuhuuji coɓɗi ɗi ɗowtano mo!”
Markus 1.51: Law habaru Yeesu saŋkiti koo toy fuu nder lesdi Galiili.
Markus 1.53: Ɓe ngurti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, law ɓe njehi haa saare Simon e Andire. Yaakuba e Yuhanna njahdi bee maako.
Markus 1.54: Esiraawo Simon debbo ɗon waali o nyawɗo yontere. Nde Yeesu wari, ɓe ngecci mo haala nyawu maako.
Markus 1.55: Yeesu yehi haa maako, naŋngi juŋngo maako, ummini mo. O yamɗiti, o weerni ɓe.
Markus 1.57: Nde naaŋge muti, yimɓe ngaddi nyawɓe e marɓe ginnaaji fuu haa Yeesu.
Markus 1.58: Ummaatoore berniwol man fuu mooɓi haa yolnde saare.
Markus 1.59: Yeesu yamɗitini nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe e nyawuji maɓɓe feere feere, o riiwi boo ginnaaji ɗuuɗɗi. O accaay ginnaaji ɗi mbolwa koo ɗume, ngam ɗi anndi mo.
Markus 1.61: Jaŋngo maajum Yeesu dawi cub. O wurti, o dilli ladde. O waɗi do'a haa ton.
Markus 1.62: Simon e wonduɓe bee muuɗum taasni mo, ndilli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo.
Markus 1.63: Nde ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Yimɓe fuu ɗon ɗaɓɓite.”
Markus 1.64: Ammaa o jaabi: “Ndillen haa kawyeeji ɓadiiɗi, haa mi waazina yimɓe ton boo. Ngam kuugal man waddi yam.”
Markus 1.65: Bana non, o yehi cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en nder lesdi Galiili fuu, o waazi e o riiwi boo ginnaaji
Markus 1.68: Kuturuujo wari haa Yeesu, tuggi koppi yeeso maako, tori mo: “To a muuyi, a waawan yamɗitingo yam.”
Markus 1.69: Yeesu yurmini mo, forti juŋngo muuɗum, meemi mo, wi'i: “Mi muuyi, a yamɗita!”
Markus 1.70: Law saɗawre acci mo, o yamɗiti.
Markus 1.71: Nden, Yeesu jaɓɓiti mo, wi'i mo bee caatal, dillu!
Markus 1.72: “Hakkil, taa yeccu ɗum koo moy. Ammaa yah jonta, hollu limanjo hoore ma. Nden lii'a dokkal ngal Muusa umri, ngam seedamku yeeso yimɓe
Markus 1.74: Ammaa goɗɗo oo dilli, o fuɗɗi saŋkitugo habaru man koo toy. Ngam daliila man, Yeesu waawaay nastugo berniwol. Ammaa o jooɗi yaasi berniwol. Yimɓe ngari haa maako diga koo toy.

Markus 2.1: Ɓaawo nyalɗe seɗɗa, Yeesu lorti haa Kafarnahum. Yimɓe nani o ɗon nder saare.
Markus 2.2: Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde hawti haa babal luttaay koo haa yolnde boo. Nden Yeesu waazini ɓe Kubaruwol Belŋgol.
Markus 2.3: Yimɓe feere ngari haa maako, ɓe ngaddani mo waata-terɗeejo, worɓe nayo ɗon ndoondi mo.
Markus 2.4: Ammaa ɓe mbaawaay yottingo mo haa Yeesu ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗi. Nden ɓe maɓɓiti kippol suudu haa dow nokkuure nde Yeesu woni. Nden ɓe nastini waata-terɗeejo baaliiɗo dow be'itte mum, ɓe njippini mo.
Markus 2.5: Nde Yeesu yi'i nuɗɗinki yimɓe ɓe'e, o wi'i waata-terɗeejo: “Ɓiŋngel am, hakkeeji ma njaafaama.”
Markus 2.6: Moodiɓɓe tawreeta woɗɓe jooɗiiɓe ton numi nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe:
Markus 2.7: “Koni goɗɗo oo wolwata kalluka bana ka'a? Moy waawata yaafaago hakkeeji sonaa Allah feere mum?”
Markus 2.8: Yeesu annditi nder muuɗum ko ɓe numi. O ƴami ɓe: “Koni numoton bana nii?
Markus 2.9: Ko ɓuri hoyugo? Wi'go waata-terɗeejo: Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama naa malla wi'go mo: Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, yah?
Markus 2.10: Ammaa ngam haa mi faamtina on
Markus 2.12: woodi baawɗe yaafaago hakkeeji nder duniyaaru.” Nden o wi'i waata-terɗeejo:
Markus 2.13: “Mi ɗon wi'e: Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, hootu.”
Markus 2.15: Law o ummi, o hoosi be'itte maako, o wurti, o dilli gite yimɓe fuu, haa ɓe kayɗini, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Min meeɗaay yi'ugo irin ɗu'um.”
Markus 2.17: Yeesu dilli fahin haa weendu Galiili. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa maako, o ekkitini ɓe.
Markus 2.18: Nde o ɗon tokki laawol, o yi'i Lewi ɓii Halfa ɗon jooɗi haa baariki jomorgol. O wi'i mo: “Tokkam.” Lewi ummi, tokki mo.
Markus 2.20: Ɓaawo man Yeesu jooɗodi nder saare Lewi bee pukara'en
Markus 2.21: muuɗum e jomnooɓe e hakke'en ɗuuɗɓe tokkiiɓe mo, ɓe nyaamdi.
Markus 2.22: Moodiɓɓe Farisa'en Woɗɓe ngi'i mo o ɗon nyaamda bee jomnooɓe e hakke'en, ɓe ƴami pukara'en maako: “Koni o nyaamdata bee yimɓe ɓe'e?”
Markus 2.23: Nde Yeesu nani ɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “Yamɓe ngalaa haaje kurgoowo, sey nyawɓe. Mi waraay ngam ewnaago adili'en, sey hakke'en.”

Markus 2.26: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On numi ewnaaɓe haa ɓaŋgal cuumoto nde ɓaŋɗo ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe na? Walaa sam! Ɓe cuumataako yaake ɓaŋɗo ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe.
Markus 2.27: Ammaa saa'i waran nde ɓaŋɗo tawataake caka maɓɓe, wakkati man ɓe cuumoto.

Markus 2.40: O nasti suudu Allah, o nyaami tamseeje ɗe ɓe lii'ani

Markus 3.1: Ɓaawoɗon, Yeesu lorti haa suudu dewal Yahuudu'en. Goɗɗo waata-juŋngoojo ɗonno ton.

Markus 3.5: Yeesu wi'i waata-juŋngoojo go: “Umma, dara yeeso yimɓe fuu.”
Markus 3.6: Nden Yeesu ƴami yimɓe ɓe ɗonno ndaara mo: “Ɗume tawreeta meeɗen duŋi nyalaade siwtorde? Waɗugo mbooɗeeŋga naa malla waɗugo halleende? Hisnugo yoŋki goɗɗo naa malla mbarugo mo?” Ammaa ɓe cali jaabaago mo.

Markus 5.1: Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum njotti Galiili nder lesdi Geraseni'en gaɗa weendu.
Markus 5.3: , law goɗɗo wurti caka genaale, o ɗon wara haa o fotta bee maako. Goɗɗo oo o marɗo ruuhu coɓŋgu.

Markus 5.6: Tum jemma e naaŋge fuu o ɗon caka genaale e nder kooseeje, o ɗon hoola, o ɗon ŋaasa ɓanndu maako bee kaa'e.
Markus 5.8: Ammaa nde o eewi Yeesu, o doggi, o wari, o tuggi koppi haa yeeso muuɗum,
Markus 5.9: Nden o wooki, o wi'i: “An Yeesu,
Markus 5.11: Ɓaŋiiɗo, ɗume ngiɗɗa haa am? Mi tori ma bee innde Allah, taa yaŋgitam!”

Markus 5.13: Nden Yeesu ƴami mo: “Noy innde ma?” O jaabi: “Innde am Mooɓre, ngam min ɗuuɗi.”
Markus 5.14: O tori Yeesu ɗuuɗɗum, taa o riiwa ɗi daayiiɗum diga lesdi man.
Markus 5.16: Woodi tokkere gaduuji ɗuuɗɗi ton, ɗi ɗon ndura baŋnge kooseeje.

Markus 5.18: Yeesu duŋani ɗi. Ɗi ngurti diga goɗɗo oo, ɗi nasti nder gaduuji. Gaduuji man caamni, ndo'i diga dow fomoonde townde nder weendu. Ɗi fuu ɗi kalki, ɗi ndillani ujine ɗiɗi.
Markus 5.20: Durooɓe gaduuji ndoggi, ngecci haala maajum nder wuro e haa kawyeeji. Yimɓe ngurti ngam ɓe ndaara ko waɗi.
Markus 5.21: Ɓe ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe ngi'i marnooɗo mooɓre ginnaaji go ɗon jooɗi, ɗon ɓorni, hakkiilo maako boo de'iti. Ɓe kultori.
Markus 5.22: Yi'ɓe ɗum fuu ngecci yimɓe ko waɗi marɗono ginnaaji go e ko fe'ani gaduuji.
Markus 5.23: Nden yimɓe puɗɗi toraago Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: Wurta, daaya lesdi amin.
Markus 5.25: Yaake Yeesu ɗon nasta koommbowal, gurtinaaɗo ruuhuuji coɓɗi go tori mo, wi'i: “Accu mi jooɗodo bee ma.”
Markus 5.26: Yeesu duŋanaaki mo, ammaa o wi'i mo: “Hootu haa yimɓe ma, yeccu ɓe ko Jawmiraawo waɗani ma nder enɗam muuɗum fuu.”
Markus 5.27: Goɗɗo oo dilli, o fuɗɗi anndingo yimɓe haa jihaaji bi'eteeɗi Berniiji-Sappo ko Yeesu huuwani mo fuu, haa yimɓe fuu kayɗini.
Markus 5.29: Yeesu eerti weendu bee koommbowal, warti gaa'e. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde mooɓti haa maako baŋnge weendu.
Markus 5.30: Gooto haa ardiiɓe suudu dewal Yahuudu'en mo innde muuɗum Jayrus wari haa maako. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o tuggi koppi yeeso maako,
Markus 5.31: o tori mo ɗuuɗɗum, o wi'i: “Ɓiŋngel am deyel nyawi haa ngel ɓadake maayugo. Useni war, wallin juuɗe ma dow maagel haa ngel hisa, ngel yeeɗa.”
Markus 5.33: Yeesu dillidi bee maako. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde yahdi bee maako, nde ɗon ɓiɗɗa mo.
Markus 5.34: Woodi boo debbo feere ton. Duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, o nyawi nyawu ilugo ƴiiƴam.
Markus 5.35: O yehi haa hurgooɓe ɗuuɗɓe, o majjini jawdi maako fuu. Ammaa nyawu maako waɗaay daama sam, sey tullititgo.
Markus 5.36: Nde o nani habaru Yeesu, o wari nder mooɓre ɓaawo maako, o meemi limce maako.
Markus 5.37: Ngam o numno: “To mi heɓi mi meemi koo limce maako tan, mi yamɗitan.”
Markus 5.38: Nde o meemi limce Yeesu, law ilugo ƴiiƴam maako ta'i, o maati nder ɓanndu maako o yamɗiti diga nyawu maako.
Markus 5.39: Wakkati man Yeesu anndi semmbe wurti haa muuɗum. O wayliti caka mooɓre, o ƴami: “Moy meemi limce am?”
Markus 5.40: Pukara'en maako njaabi: “A ɗon yi'a mooɓre ɗon ɓiɗɗe. Noy ƴamrata: Moy meemi yam?”
Markus 5.42: Ammaa Yeesu laari taariiɓe mo haa o yi'a debbo meemɗo mo.
Markus 5.43: Debbo oo diwni ngam kulol ngam o anndi ko waɗi mo, nden o wari, o tuggi koppi les kosɗe Yeesu, o yecci mo gooŋga man fuu.
Markus 5.44: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, nuɗɗinki maaɗa yamɗitini ma. Yah jam, a rimɗi e bone ma.”
Markus 5.46: Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, ardiiɓe saare Jayrus ngari, mbi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel ma maayi. Ngam ɗume a ɗon ɓilla moodibbo fahin?”
Markus 5.47: Ammaa Yeesu faalaay bolle maɓɓe. O wi'i Jayrus: “Taa hul, nuɗɗin tan!”
Markus 5.48: Nden o duŋanaay koo gooto yahda bee maako, sey Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna, deerɗiraawo Yaakuba.
Markus 5.49: Nde ɓe njotti saare Jayrus ardiiɗo suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, Yeesu laari yimɓe ɗon koola, ɗon mboya, ɗon njooyna ɗuuɗɗum ton.
Markus 5.50: O nasti saare, o wi'i ɓe: “Koni on koolata bana nii? Koni on mboyata? Ɓiŋngel maayaay, ngel ɗaani non.”
Markus 5.51: Ɓe njanci mo. Nden o wurtini ɓe fuu. O luttidi bee baaba ɓiŋngel e daada maagel e pukara'en maako tato go, ɓe nasti suudu ndu ɓiŋngel woni.
Markus 5.52: O naŋngi juŋngo maagel, o wi'i ngel: “
Markus 5.54: bana wi'go: “Ɓiŋngel, mi ɗon wi'e: Umma!”
Markus 5.55: Law ɓiŋngel deyel ummi, fuɗɗi yahugo. Ngel ɗon mari duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi. Nde yimɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kayɗini masin.
Markus 5.56: Ammaa Yeesu barri ɓe bee caatal, taa ɓe anndina ɗum koo moye. Nden o wi'i: “Ndokke ngel nyaamdu.”
