Markus 6.30: Ngam maajum Hirudiya wanyi Yuhanna, yiɗi mbarugo mo. Ammaa o waawaay,
Markus 6.31: ngam Hirudus huli Yuhanna, ngam o anndi o gooŋgaajo, o cenaaɗo. O ayni mo booɗɗum. Ammaa nde o nani mo fuu, o wemmboto masin, bee non fuu, o yiɗi nanugo haala maako.
Markus 6.33: Nde nyalaade siftinorde danyeeki Hirudus yotti, nde laati nyalaade fottunde ngam Hirudiya. Hirudus waɗi nyaamduuji ngam mawɓe lesdi muuɗum e ardiiɓe dow sooje'en ujineeje e ardiiɓe lesdi Galiili fuu.
Markus 6.34: Ɓii Hirudiya debbo nasti, wami, seyni Hirudus e ewnaaɓe muuɗum. Laamiiɗo wi'i paanyo debbo: “Ƴamam ko a yiɗi, mi hokkete ɗum.”
Markus 6.35: E o hunani mo hunayeere nde'e: “Mi hokkete ko a ƴami, koo reeta laamu am.”
Markus 6.36: Paanyo wurti, wi'i daada muuɗum: “Ɗume mi ƴamata mo?” O jaabi: “Hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma.”
Markus 6.37: Law paanyo lori haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Mi yiɗi a hokkammi hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma jonta nder le'al.”
Markus 6.38: Ɗum suni laamiiɗo, ammaa o yiɗaa salanaago mo, ngam daliila kunayeeje ɗe o hunino yeeso ewnaaɓe maako.
Markus 6.39: Nden o neli gooto nder sooje'en aynanɓe mo, o umri mo o wadda hoore Yuhanna. Soojeejo dilli haa suudu fursina
Markus 6.41: Nden o waddi nde nder le'al, o hokki nde paanyo debbo. Kaŋko boo o hokki nde daada maako.
Markus 6.42: Nde pukara'en Yuhanna nani ɗum, ɓe ngari, ɓe kooci ɓanndu Yuhanna, ɓe uwi ndu.
Markus 6.44: Nelaaɓe go lorti, kawti haa Yeesu. Ɓe ngecci mo ko ɓe mbaɗi e ko ɓe ekkitini fuu.
Markus 6.45: Ammaa, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ngara, ɗon ndilla, haa Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum keɓaay wakkati nyaamugo. Ngam maajum o wi'i ɓe: “Ngare ndillen haa nokkuure ferwunde haa on ciwto seɗɗa.”
Markus 6.47: ɓe ndilli feere maɓɓe, haa nokkuure ferwunde.
Markus 6.49: Ammaa ɗuuɗɓe ngi'i ɓe ɗon ndilla e ɓe paami haa ɓe njahata, nden ɓe ngurti gure fuu, ɓe ndoggi bee kosɗe, ɓe aarti Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum yottaago haa nokkuure man.
Markus 6.50: Nde Yeesu jippi koommbowal, o yi'i mooɓre yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. O yurmini ɓe, ngam ɓe nanndi bee baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓe kuuje ɗuuɗɗe
Markus 6.52: Nde hiiri, pukara'en maako ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Naaŋge hiiri, nokkuure nde'e boo nde ferwunde.
Markus 6.53: Jaɓɓita yimɓe ɓe ndilla haa kawyeeji e gure ɓadiiɗe ɓe cooda ko ɓe nyaamata.”
Markus 6.54: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Onon man ndokke ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.” Pukara'en mbi'i mo: “A yiɗi min njaha, min majjina suleyje cardi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi ngam soodugo tamseeje haa ɓe nyaama na?”
Markus 6.55: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon? Njehe, ndaare.” Nde ɓe kumpiti, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngoodi tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi.”
Markus 6.57: Nden, Yeesu umri pukara'en ɓe njo'ina yimɓe fuu geɓe geɓe dow huɗo hecco.
Markus 6.58: Ɓe njo'ini yimɓe teemerre teemerre, cappanɗe njowo cappanɗe njowo.
Markus 6.59: Nden Yeesu hoo'i tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi go, o tijji asama, o yetti Allah. Nden o yewi tamseeje, o hokki pukara'en ngam ɓe cenndana yimɓe. Bana non boo o senndani ɓe liɗɗi ɗiɗi go ɓe fuu.
Markus 6.60: Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari.
Markus 6.61: Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum tamseeje e liɗɗi go, kebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Markus 6.62: Limgal nyaamɓe tamseeje man waɗi worɓe ujine njowo.
Markus 6.64: Ɓaawo man Yeesu dooli pukara'en muuɗum ɓe nasta koommbowal
Markus 6.65: , ɓe aarta mo yahugo Baytisayda haa fomoonde weendu gaɗaare, saa'i o ɗon jaɓɓito mooɓre.
Markus 6.66: Ɓaawo o jaɓɓiti nde, o dilli hooseere ngam waɗugo do'a.
Markus 6.67: Nde jemma waɗi, koommbowal boo ɗon caka weendu, Yeesu ɗon haa lesdi feere muuɗum.
Markus 6.68: O yi'i pukara'en maako ɗon kaɓda laanyugo koommbowal, ngam ɓe ɗon tiitotira bee henndu, deydey subaha, o wari haa maɓɓe, o ɗon yaha dow mbeela bee kosɗe, bana o saaloto ɓe.
Markus 6.69: Nde ɓe ngi'i mo o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe tammi ɗum ginnawol, ɓe ngooki.
Markus 6.70: Ngam ɓe fuu ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe kuli. Ammaa law Yeesu wolwani ɓe, wi'i: “Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon, ɗum min, taa kultore!”
Markus 6.71: Nden o nasti koommbowal, henndu de'iti. Pukara'en kayɗini masin.
Markus 6.72: Ngam ɓe paamaay kaayeefiwol tamseeje go, ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe caati.
Markus 6.74: Nde ɓe timmini eeraago weendu, ɓe njotti lesdi Genesaret, ɓe tiggi koommbowal maɓɓe haa fomoonde.
Markus 6.75: Ɓe ngurti koommbowal, law yimɓe annditi Yeesu,
Markus 6.76: ɓe ndoggoy koo toy nder lesdi man fuu, ɓe ngaddani mo nyawɓe waaliiɓe dow be'itte.
Markus 6.77: Koo toy Yeesu yehi, nder gure malla berniiji malla kawyeeji, yimɓe ɗon mballina nyawɓe maɓɓe haa luuɓe, ɓe toro mo haa nyawɓe keɓa meemugo koo gawargal limce maako. Meemɓe ngal fuu njamɗiti.

Markus 7.1: Farisa'en e woɗɓe nder moodiɓɓe tawreeta warɓe diga Urusaliima kawti haa Yeesu.
Markus 7.2: Ɓe ngi'i woɗɓe caka pukara'en maako ɗon nyaama bee juuɗe coɓɗe, waato ɓe lootaay ɗe fodde al'aada Farisa'en.
Markus 7.4: Ngam Farisa'en e Yahuudu'en fuu ɗon kakkilana al'aadaaji kaakiraaɓe, ɓe nyaamataa sonaa to ɓe looti juuɗe maɓɓe laaɓi tal.
Markus 7.5: To ɓe ngarti luumo, ɓe nyaamataa sonaa to ɓe ngiiwake. Ɓe ɗon ɗowtano umrooje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe ɗe ɓe ekkiti ngam ɗowugo ɓe, bana laɓɓingo njardukoy e payanɗe e taasaaje njamndi mboɗeeri.
Markus 7.7: Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ƴami Yeesu: “Koni pukara'en maaɗa ɗowtantaako al'aada kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, ɓe ɗon nyaama bee juuɗe coɓɗe?”
Markus 7.8: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Annabaaku ngu Esaaya waɗi dow mooɗon gooŋɗi. On naafiki'en, bana no o winndiri:
Markus 7.9: Allah wi'i: Yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon teddinammi bee kunnduɗe,
Markus 7.13: ngam ɓe ɗon ekkitina geccaaji yimɓe
Markus 7.16: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On acci umrooje Allah, on ɗon njogi al'aadaaji yimɓe.”
Markus 7.17: Nden o ɓesdi wi'ugo: “On mbaawi wudingo umroore Allah ngam jogaago al'aada mooɗon.
Markus 7.18: Muusa wi'i: Teddin baaba ma e daada ma. Koo moy wolwi kalluka dow baaba malla daada mum, sey o mbare
Markus 7.20: Ammaa onon, on ɗon mbi'a to goɗɗo wi'i baaba malla daada mum: Geɗal jawdi am ndi mi waawanno wallugo ma bee maari laatake
Markus 7.23: nden kam walaa haaje o walla baaba malla daada maako fahin, on ɗon njaɓana mo ɗum.
Markus 7.24: Bana nii, on ɗon mbonna ko wolde Allah ƴami bee al'aadaaji mooɗon ɗi on ɗon ekkitina. E on ɗon mbaɗa kuuje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe bana maaji.”
Markus 7.26: Fahin Yeesu ewni yimɓe ɓe ngara haa maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Naneeɗam on fuu, paame:
Markus 7.27: Walaa koo ɗume ko woni yaasi neɗɗo waawata soɓnugo mo bee nastugo nder maako. Ammaa ko wurtoto haa maako, kanjum soɓnata mo.
Markus 7.30: Nde Yeesu seedi bee mooɓre, o nasti suudu, pukara'en maako ƴami mo maana balndol ngo'ol.
Markus 7.31: O wi'i ɓe: “Onon boo on ngoodaa faamu na? On paamaay nii ko nastata neɗɗo diga yaasi fuu, waawataa soɓnugo mo,
Markus 7.32: ngam ɗum nastataa ɓernde maako, ammaa nder reedu, ɓaawoɗon ɗum wurto haa ɓaawo suudu.” Yeesu wi'i bana nii ngam o sena nyaamdu fuu.
Markus 7.33: Fahin o wi'i: “Ko wurtoto diga nder neɗɗo, kanjum soɓnata mo.
Markus 7.34: Ngam haa nder, haa ɓernde neɗɗo, numooji kalluɗi iwata, ɗi njahra mo haa daakaareeku e nguyka e mbar-hoore
Markus 7.35: e njeenu e suuno e halleende e fewjere e kuuje cemtiniiɗe e kaajal e kuudi kallundi e mawnitaare e faataare.
Markus 7.36: Kuuje kalluɗe ɗe'e fuu nder neɗɗo ɗe iwata, ɗe coɓna mo.”
Markus 7.38: Yeesu ummi ton, dilli haa lesdi Tirus. O nasti saare woɗnde, o yiɗaa yimɓe annda ɗum. Ammaa o waawaay nyukkaago.
Markus 7.39: Nden debbo mo ruuhu coɓŋgu ɗon torra ɓiŋngel muuɗum deyel, nani habaru Yeesu, o wari law haa maako, o tuggi koppi yeeso maako.
Markus 7.41: mo asŋgol Sirofiniiki'en. O tori Yeesu o riiwa ruuhu coɓŋgu diga ɓiŋngel maako.
Markus 7.42: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Accu ɓikkoy kaara tawon, ngam wooɗaay hoo'ugo nyaamdu ɓikkoy sakkinana ndawaakon.”
Markus 7.43: Debbo wi'i mo: “Nonnon yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa koo ndawaakon ngonkon les taabal boo nyaaman caamɗum nyaamdu ɓikkoy.”
Markus 7.44: Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam daliila wolde maaɗa nde'e, yah, ruuhu coɓŋgu wurtake ɓiŋngel ma.”
Markus 7.45: O hooti, o tawi ɓiŋngel maako ɗon waali dow be'itte, ruuhu coɓŋgu wurtake nder maagel.
Markus 7.47: Ɓaawo man Yeesu wurti lesdi Tirus. O saali gal lesdi Sidon, o lorti gal weendu Galiili, o yotti haa lesdi wi'eteendi Berniiji-Sappo.
Markus 7.48: Ɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo paho mo waawataa wolwugo laaɓɗum. Ɓe tori mo o wallina juŋngo dow maako.
Markus 7.50: Nden Yeesu wurtini mo nder mooɓre, darni mo feere maako, o nastini kooli nder noppi goɗɗo oo e o meemi ɗemŋgal maako bee tuuɗe mum.
Markus 7.51: Nden o tijji asama, o uumi, o wi'i goɗɗo go: “
Markus 7.54: Law noppi maako cukkiti, ko haɓɓino ɗemŋgal maako fiisti, o wolwi bee laaɓɗum.
Markus 7.55: Yeesu umri ɓe fuu taa ɓe anndina goɗɗo haala man. Ammaa koo nde o ɗuɗɗini bolle, kamɓe ɓe ngeeyni ɗum masin.
Markus 7.56: Nanɓe ɗum kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Ko o waɗata fuu, wooɗi masin! O waɗi haa fahɓe nana, muuka'en boo mbolwa.”

Markus 8.1: Saa'i man mooɓre ɗuuɗnde mooɓti fahin. Nde ɓe ngoodaa ko ɓe nyaama, Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe:
Markus 8.2: “Mi ɗon yurmina yimɓe ɓe'e, ngam ɓe ɗon ngondi bee am jonta nyalɗe tati, ɓe ngoodaa ko ɓe nyaama boo.
Markus 8.3: To mi jaɓɓiti ɓe, ɓe koota mi hokkaay ɓe nyaamdu, nden kam ɓe tampan dow laawol, woɗɓe maɓɓe boo ngari diga daayiiɗum.”
Markus 8.4: Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “Noy goɗɗo heɓrata nyaamdu he'anndu yimɓe ɓe fuu haa nder ladde hamaadaare nde'e?”
Markus 8.5: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon?” Ɓe njaabi: “Joweeɗiɗi.”
Markus 8.7: O umri yimɓe njooɗo. Nden o hoo'i tamseeje joweeɗiɗi go, o yetti Allah, o yewi ɗe, o hokki pukara'en maako ɓe cenndana yimɓe. Pukara'en mbaɗi bana non.
Markus 8.8: Ɓe ngoodi boo liɗɗi pamari seɗɗa. Yeesu waɗi yettoore ngam maaji, nden o umri pukara'en maako ɓe cenndana ɗi yimɓe.
Markus 8.9: Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari, pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, kebbini cilaaje joweeɗiɗi.
Markus 8.10: Limgal yimɓe man waɗi baakin worɓe ujine nayo, nden Yeesu jaɓɓiti ɓe.
Markus 8.12: bee pukara'en maako, o yehi lesdi Dalmanuta.
Markus 8.14: Farisa'en ngari puɗɗi waabotirgo bee Yeesu. Ɓe ngiɗi jarribaago mo. Ngam maajum ɓe ƴami mo o waŋginana ɓe alaama iwka diga asama
Markus 8.16: Yeesu uumi nder muuɗum, wi'i: “Koni yimɓe ɓe'e ɗaɓɓata alaama? Fakat mi ɗon wi'a on, ɓe keɓataa alaama ka sam
Markus 8.18: Nden o acci ɓe, o lorti nder koommbowal, o eeri haa fomoonde gaɗaare.
Markus 8.20: Pukara'en ngejjiti hoo'ugo tamseeje. Ɓe ngalaa tamseeje, sey woore ɓe mari haa maɓɓe nder koommbowal.
Markus 8.22: ɓe, wi'i: “Kakkile, ndeente ngam ufnirɗum Farisa'en e ufnirɗum Hirudus
Markus 8.24: Pukara'en carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “O wi'i ɗum ngam en ngoodaa tamseeje.”
Markus 8.25: Yeesu anndi ko ɓe mbi'i, o ƴami ɓe: “Koni mbi'ɗon on ngalaa tamseeje? On anndaa na? Haa jonta on paamataa na? Ɓerɗe mon ɗon caati na?
Markus 8.26: On ngoodi gite, on ngi'ataa na? On ngoodi noppi, on nanataa na? On ciftortaa na
Markus 8.28: Nde mi senndani yimɓe ujine njowo tamseeje jowi, cilaaje noy on kebbini bee luttuɗe?” Ɓe njaabi: “Sappo e ɗiɗi.”
Markus 8.29: “Yeesu wi'i ɓe, nde mi senndani yimɓe ujine nayo tamseeje joweeɗiɗi, cilaaje noy on kebbini bee luttuɗe?” Ɓe njaabi: “Joweeɗiɗi.”
Markus 8.30: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Haa jonta on ngalaa faamu na?”
Markus 8.32: Ɓe njotti Baytisayda, ton, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu bumɗo, ɓe tori mo o meema mo.
Markus 8.33: Yeesu naŋngi juŋngo bumɗo oo, yahri mo yaasi wuro. Nden o tuuti tuuɗe dow gite bumɗo man, o wallini juŋngo dow maako, o ƴami mo: “A ɗon yi'a na?”
Markus 8.34: Bumɗo ɓaŋgti gite, wi'i: “Mi ɗon yi'a yimɓe, ammaa bana leɗɗe jahanɗe.”
Markus 8.36: Fahin Yeesu wallini juuɗe dow gite maako, o wumti, o yi'i kuuje fuu laaɓɗum.
Markus 8.37: Nden Yeesu jaɓɓiti mo, wi'i: Hootu saare. “Taa nastu wuro.”
Markus 8.39: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum ndilli gure ɓadiiɗe bee Kaysariya Filippi. Dow laawol, o ƴami ɓe: “Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a min mi moy?”
Markus 8.40: Ɓe njaabi mo: “Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a an woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma. Woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Eliya. Fahin woɗɓe ɗon ndaare bana gooto annabi'en ɓooyma
Markus 8.42: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo, on ɗon mbi'a mi moy?” Piyer jaabi: “An woni Almasiihu
Markus 8.44: Nden Yeesu umri ɓe bee caatal, wi'i: “Taa yeccu ɗum koo moy.”
Markus 8.46: Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi anndingo pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i: “Doole
Markus 8.48: yara bone ɗuuɗɗe, ndotti'en e mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta boo ngudina mo. Ɓe mbaran mo, ammaa ɓaawo nyalɗe tati o ummititto.”
Markus 8.49: O wi'i ɓe ɗum bee baŋguɗum. Piyer wicciti mo sera, fuɗɗi felugo mo.
Markus 8.50: Ammaa Yeesu wayliti, laari pukara'en muuɗum. Nden o telɓani Piyer, o wi'i: “Daayam, an Sayɗaanu, numooji maaɗa ɗi yimɓe, naa ɗi Allah.”
Markus 8.52: Nden Yeesu ewni mooɓre e pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “To goɗɗo yiɗi tokkaago yam, sey o acca muuyo maako, o roondo gaafaaŋgal maako, o tokko yam
Markus 8.54: Ngam koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki mum ngam am e ngam Linjiila, hisnan ki
Markus 8.56: To goɗɗo heɓi duniyaaru fuu, ammaa o halki yoŋki maako, ɗume ɗum nafata mo?
Markus 8.57: Malla woodi ko goɗɗo waawata hokkugo ngam soottugo yoŋki maako na? Walaa sam!
Markus 8.58: To goɗɗo semti yam e bolle am hannde caka yimɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah ɓe'e, nden kam
Markus 8.60: boo semtan mo to o wardi bee malaa'ika'en seniiɓe nder tedduŋgal Baabiraawo maako.”

Markus 9.1: Fahin Yeesu wolwani ɓe, o wi'i: “Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, woɗɓe caka wonɓe haa ɗo, maayataa sey to ɓe ngi'i laamu Allah wari bee baawɗe.”
Markus 9.3: Ɓaawo nyalɗe joweego, Yeesu hoo'i Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna, o yahri ɓe dow hooseere townde, kamɓe feere maɓɓe. Jaati maako wayliti haa gite maɓɓe,
Markus 9.4: limce maako ɗelki, daneeje tal, walaa koo gooto haa duniyaaru fuu waawata ranwingo limce bana non.
Markus 9.5: Nden Eliya e Muusa mbaŋgani ɓe, ɓe ɗon mbolida bee Yeesu.
Markus 9.6: Piyer wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, ɗum booɗɗum en ɗon ɗo. Accu min mbaɗa bukkaaji tati, wooru ngam maaɗa, wooru ngam Muusa, wooru boo ngam Eliya.”
Markus 9.7: O anndaa ko o wi'ata, ngam kaŋko e pukara'en woɗɓe ɗiɗo go, ɓe kultori masin.
Markus 9.8: Ruuldere jippi, suddi ɓe, ɓe nani sawtu ɗon wolwa nder maare: “Oo woni
Markus 9.12: Ɗon nii pukara'en ndaari haa kommbi maɓɓe, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay goɗɗo, sey Yeesu ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe.
Markus 9.14: Nde ɓe ɗon njippo hooseere go, Yeesu umri ɓe taa ɓe ngecca yimɓe woɗɓe ko ɓe ngi'i, sey to
Markus 9.17: Ɓe ɗowtani wolde nde, ammaa ɓe ƴamƴamtiri hakkunde maɓɓe: “Ɗume ummitaago diga maayde yiɗi wi'go?”
Markus 9.18: Nden ɓe ƴami Yeesu: “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon mbi'a sey Eliya aarta wargo tawon
Markus 9.20: O jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga Eliya aartan wargo, o mo'itina kuuje fuu. Kadi ngam ɗume Deftere wi'ata doole
Markus 9.22: yara bone ɗuuɗɗe, yimɓe boo meeriɗina mo?
Markus 9.23: Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: Eliya wari timmi, yimɓe mbaɗi mo ko ɓe ngiɗi, bana ko winnda dow maako.”
Markus 9.25: Nde ɓe njotti haa pukara'en luttuɓe, ɓe ngi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde ɗon taari ɓe. Moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon ngaabotira bee maɓɓe.
Markus 9.26: Nde yimɓe ngi'i Yeesu, ɓe kayɗini masin. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe ngari ɓe koofni mo.
Markus 9.27: Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “Dow ɗume on ngaabotirta bee maɓɓe?”
Markus 9.28: Gooto nder mooɓre jaabi mo: “Moodibbo, mi waddani ma ɓiŋngel am gorgel marŋgel ruuhu muukaaŋgu.
Markus 9.29: Koo toy ruuhu ngu naŋngi ngel fuu, ngu do'an ngel haa lesdi. Hunnduko maagel waɗan nguufo, ngel hirƴindiran nyii'e, ɓanndu maagel saatan. Mi ƴami pukara'en maaɗa ɓe ndiiwa ruuhu ngu, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.”
Markus 9.30: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Hey yimɓe sooya-nuɗɗinki'en, haa ndey tokkotoomi wondugo bee mooɗon e munyango on? Ngadde ɓiŋngel man!”
Markus 9.31: Ɓe ngaddi ngel haa maako. Nde ɓiŋngel yi'i Yeesu, law ruuhu dimmbi ngel. Ngel do'i haa lesdi, ngel talli, hunnduko maagel waɗi nguufo.
Markus 9.32: Yeesu ƴami baaba maagel: “Diga ndey ɗum fuɗɗi waɗugo ngel?” Baaba maagel jaabi: “Diga ngel pamarel.
Markus 9.33: Nde ɗuuɗɗum boo ruuhu ngu do'i ngel nder yiite koo nder ndiyam, ngam halkugo ngel. To a waawi, useni enɗu min, wallu min!”
Markus 9.34: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Koni a wi'i: To a waawi? Walaa ko salorta nuɗɗinɗo, koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Markus 9.35: Law baaba ɓiŋngel hooli: “Mi nuɗɗini, ammaa ɗum caɗɗum haa am, wallam!”
Markus 9.37: Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓre ɗon dogga wara haa maɓɓe, o telɓani ruuhu coɓŋgu go: “An ruuhu muukaaŋgu, pahu! Mi umri ma: Wurta ɓiŋngel nge'el, taa meetu nastugo nder maagel.”
Markus 9.38: Ruuhu hooli, ɓosli ngel, wurti haa maagel. Ngel laati bana maayɗo, haa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbi'i: “Ngel maayi.”
Markus 9.39: Ammaa Yeesu naŋngi ngel juŋngo, ummini ngel, ngel dari.
Markus 9.40: Nde Yeesu nasti suudu, pukara'en maako ƴami mo bee sirri: “Ngam ɗume minin min mbaawaay riiwugo ngu?”
Markus 9.41: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Walaa baawɗe feere riiwata irin ruuhu ngu'u, sey do'a.”
Markus 9.43: Ɓe ummi ton, ɓe caali nder lesdi Galiili. Yeesu yiɗaa koo gooto annda haa o woni.
Markus 9.44: Ngam o ɗon anndina pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe ndokkan
Markus 9.46: haa juuɗe yimɓe. Kamɓe ɓe mbaran mo, ammaa ɓaawo nyalɗe tati o ummititto.”
Markus 9.47: Pukara'en paamaay maana anndinol ngol, ammaa ɓe kuli ƴamugo mo boo.
Markus 9.49: Ɓe njotti Kafarnahum. Nde ɓe nasti saare, Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “Dow ɗume on ngaabotiri haa laawol?”
Markus 9.50: Ammaa ɓe njeeɗi, ngam haa laawol ɓe ngaabotiri dow moy ɓurata mawnugo caka maɓɓe
Markus 9.52: Yeesu jooɗi, ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, wi'i ɓe: “To goɗɗo yiɗi o laato arano, sey o waɗa hoore maako o ɓaawoojo yimɓe fuu e o laato jaggiiɗo yimɓe fuu
Markus 9.54: Nden o hoo'i ɓiŋngel pamarel, o darni ngel caka maɓɓe. O huufi ngel, o wi'i pukara'en maako:
Markus 9.55: “Mo jaɓi ɓiŋngel pamarel bana nge'el daliila innde am, min o jaɓi. Mo jaɓi yam, naa min o jaɓi, ammaa nelɗo yam
Markus 9.58: Yuhanna wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, min ngi'i goɗɗo ɗon riiwra ginnaaji bee innde ma. Min ngiɗno haɗugo mo, ngam o tokkaaki en.”
Markus 9.59: Ammaa Yeesu jaabi: “Taa kaɗe mo, ngam walaa mo waawata waɗugo kaayeefi bee innde am, law ɓaawoɗon o hallina yam.
Markus 9.60: Ngam koo moy mo honnaaki en, ɗon bee meeɗen
Markus 9.62: Ngam koo moy yarni on ndiyam seɗɗa daliila innde am ngam on yimɓe Almasiihu, mi ɗon wi'a on fakat o heɓan mbarjaari maako
Markus 9.65: To goɗɗo do'i gooto ɓurɗo famɗugo caka nuɗɗinɓe yam nder hakke, ndikkana mo ɓe ɓila hayre namarde mawnde haa daande maako, ɓe ngubo mo nder weendu.
Markus 9.66: To ɗum juŋngo ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ngo, ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam a guddo dow nastugo bee juuɗe ma ɗiɗi nder yiite jahannama nge nyifataa sam
Markus 9.68: [Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam.]
Markus 9.69: To ɗum kosŋgal ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ngal, ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee kosŋgal gootal dow wubeego bee kosɗe ma ɗiɗi nder yiite jahannama nge nyifataa sam.
Markus 9.70: [Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam.]
Markus 9.71: E to ɗum yiitere ma nastinte nder hakke, ɗoof nde, ndikka a nasta laamu Allah bee yiitere woore dow wubeego nder yiite jahannama bee gite ma ɗiɗi
Markus 9.73: Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam
Markus 9.75: Ngam yiite lamminan koo moy fuu bana mannda.
Markus 9.77: “Mannda wooɗi, ammaa to lammeeŋga maajam ittake, bana noy on lamminirta ɗam fahin? Sey on laato on marɓe mannda nder mooɗon. Njooɗode jam bee koo moy

Markus 10.1: Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, dilli lesdi Yahudiya, nden o eeri maayo Urdun. Fahin yimɓe mooɓti haa maako. O ekkitini ɓe bana ko woowa.
Markus 10.3: Farisa'en woɗɓe ngari haa maako ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋanake gorko seera debbo mum na?”
Markus 10.4: Yeesu jaabori ɓe bee ƴamol ngol: “Ɗume Muusa umri on?”
Markus 10.5: Ɓe njaabi: “Muusa duŋani gorko winnda ɗereewol ceergal, nden o seera debbo maako
Markus 10.7: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngam caatal ko'e mooɗon Muusa winndani on umroore nde'e.
Markus 10.8: Ammaa haa fuɗɗam, Allah tagi gorko e debbo
Markus 10.10: Ngam maajum gorko accan baaba muuɗum e daada muuɗum, ɗakkotiran bee debbo muuɗum.
Markus 10.11: Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe laatoto ɓanndu wooru. Bana non ɓe laatataako yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓaawoɗon, ammaa ɓanndu wooru
Markus 10.13: Ngam maajum taa neɗɗo fiista ko Allah haɓɓi.”
Markus 10.15: Nde ɓe nasti saare, pukara'en maako ƴamti mo haala man.
Markus 10.16: Yeesu faamtini ɓe, wi'i: “Koo moy seeri debbo muuɗum, te'i debbo feere, o waɗi njeenu dow debbo arano.
Markus 10.17: Non boo to debbo acci gorko muuɗum, te'ri bee gorko feere, o waɗi njeenu
Markus 10.20: Yimɓe ngaddi ɓikkoy pamaroy haa Yeesu ngam o meema koy. Ammaa pukara'en caatani yimɓe ɓe.
Markus 10.21: Nde Yeesu yi'i ɗum, o ɓerni, o wi'i pukara'en maako: “Acce ɓikkoy pamaroy ngara haa am. Taa kaɗe koy, ngam laamu Allah woodani irin maakoy.
Markus 10.22: Mi ɗon wi'a on, mo jaɓaay laamu Allah bana ɓiŋngel pamarel, fakat o nastataa ngu sam
Markus 10.24: Nden o huufi ɓikkoy go, o wallini juuɗe maako dow maakoy, o barkiɗini koy.
Markus 10.26: Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha dow laawol, goɗɗo doggoy wari, tuggi koppi yeeso maako, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo booɗɗo, ɗume mi waɗata haa mi heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Markus 10.27: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam ɗume a wi'ata yam mi booɗɗo? Sey Allah gooto tan woni booɗɗo.
Markus 10.28: A anndi umrooje: Taa mbar-hoore, taa waɗ njeenu, taa wujju, taa seeda fewre, taa waɗ rikici, teddin baaba ma e daada ma
Markus 10.30: Goɗɗo oo wi'i: “Moodibbo, mi ɗowtani umrooje ɗe'e fuu diga mi derkeejo tawon.”
Markus 10.31: Yeesu suti mo bee yiide, wi'i mo: “Luttani ma huunde woore: Yah soorru ko a mari fuu, hokku talaka'en ceede man, nden a heɓoyan ndesaari haa asama, ɓaawoɗon, war tokkam.”
Markus 10.32: Ammaa nde goɗɗo oo nani bolle ɗe'e, yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, ɓernde maako metti, o dilli, ngam o diskuɗo masin.
Markus 10.34: Yeesu laari pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum saɗani riskuɓe nastugo laamu Allah.”
Markus 10.35: Bolle ɗe'e kayɗini pukara'en masin. Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Ɓikkoy am, nastugo laamu Allah saɗi masin!
Markus 10.36: Ngeelooba saalo nder wurdere baatal ɓuri hoyugo dow diskuɗo nasta laamu Allah.”
Markus 10.37: Pukara'en ɓesdi hayɗingo masin, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri, ɓe mbi'i: “To non kam, moy waawata hisugo?”
Markus 10.38: Yeesu suti ɓe, wi'i: “Haa yimɓe, ɗum waɗataako, ammaa haa Allah ɗum waɗoto, ngam haa Allah, koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Markus 10.40: Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Ndaa minin min acci kuuje fuu, min tokki ma.”
Markus 10.41: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Gooŋga. Min boo mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo moy acci saare malla deerɗiraaɓe malla daada malla baaba malla ɓikkoy malla gese muuɗum ngam daliila am e ngam Linjiila,
Markus 10.42: o heɓtan ɗum cowi teemerre nder ngeendam maako jonta: Calaaje e deerɗiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe e daadiraaɓe e ɓikkoy e gese e bee toonyaaŋgeeji boo. Nder zamanuuru waranndu boo o heɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Markus 10.43: Ɗuuɗɓe aartuɓe laatoto sakkitiiɓe, ɗuuɗɓe sakkitiiɓe boo laatoto aartuɓe
Markus 10.46: Ɓe ɗon dow laawol yahugo Urusaliima. Yeesu ɗon ardi pukara'en muuɗum, ɓe kayɗini, yimɓe tokkiiɓe ɓaawo maɓɓe ɗon kula boo. Fahin Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo feere maɓɓe, o anndini ɓe ko tammi waɗugo mo.
Markus 10.47: O wi'i ɓe: “Nane, en ɗon njaha Urusaliima, ton ɓe ndokkan
Markus 10.49: haa juuɗe mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta. Ɓe kiitoto mo kiita maayde, nden ɓe ndokka mo haa juuɗe heefeerɓe.
Markus 10.50: Kamɓe boo ɓe njancan mo, ɓe tuutan mo tuuɗe, ɓe ɓoccan mo, ɓe mbaran mo. Ammaa ɓaawo nyalɗe tati o ummititto diga maayde.”
Markus 10.52: Nden Yaakuba e Yuhanna ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɓaditi Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min ngiɗi a waɗana min ko min ƴamata ma.”
Markus 10.53: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume on ngiɗi mi waɗana on?”
Markus 10.54: Ɓe njaabi mo: “To a jooɗake dow leeso laamu ma nder tedduŋgal ma, nden kam min ngiɗi a jo'ina min gooto haa nyaamo ma e gooto haa nano ma.”
Markus 10.55: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On anndaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaawan yarugo jardugel bone ngel mi yarata na malla jaɓugo baptisma bone ɗe mi jaɓata na
Markus 10.57: Ɓe njaabi mo: “Min mbaawan.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga, on njaran jardugel bone bana am, on njaɓan boo baptisma ka mi jaɓata.
Markus 10.58: Ammaa ko laarani jooɗaago haa nyaamo malla haa nano am, naa min hokkata ɗum, ɗum ɗon ngam yimɓe ɓe Allah taaskani.”
Markus 10.60: Nde pukara'en sappo luttuɓe nani haala man, ɓe ɓernani Yaakuba e Yuhanna.
Markus 10.61: Nden Yeesu ewni ɓe fuu, wi'i ɓe: “On anndi, yimɓe ɓe on ndaarata bana ardiiɓe ummaatooje, ɓe ɗon ndoola yimɓe maɓɓe, mawɓe boo ɗon kolla ɓe baawɗe.
Markus 10.62: Ammaa taa ɗum wona non caka mooɗon. To gooto mooɗon yiɗi laataago mawɗo, sey o laato jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Markus 10.64: Mo yiɗi ardaago caka mooɗon, sey o wona maccuɗo yimɓe fuu
Markus 10.68: boo waraay ngam yimɓe kuuwana mo, ammaa ngam o huuwana yimɓe, o hokka yoŋki maako ngam soottugo ɗuuɗɓe.”
Markus 10.70: Ɓe njotti Yeriko. Nde Yeesu wurti wuro maajum bee pukara'en muuɗum e mooɓre ɗuuɗnde, bumɗo bi'eteeɗo Bartime ɓii Time ɗonno jooɗi sera laawol, o ɗonno rooko.
Markus 10.71: Nde o nani Yeesu Nasaratuujo ɗon saalo, o fuɗɗi hoolugo: “Yeesu
Markus 10.74: Ɗuuɗɓe telɓani mo, mbi'i mo o jeeɗo, ammaa o ɓurti hoolugo: “Ɓii Daawuda, enɗam!”
Markus 10.75: Yeesu dari, wi'i: “Ewne mo.” Ɓe ewni bumɗo go, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, umma, o ɗon ewne.”
Markus 10.76: Nden o wudini alkibbaare maako, o ummi, o wari haa Yeesu.
Markus 10.77: Yeesu ƴami mo: “Ɗume ngiɗɗa mi waɗane?” Bumɗo jaabi: “Moodibbo, wumtinam haa mi yi'a fahin.”
Markus 10.78: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Yah, nuɗɗinki ma hisni ma.” Law o wumti o ɗon yi'a, nden o tokki Yeesu.

Markus 11.1: Nde ɓe ɓaditi Urusaliima, gal wakeere gure Baytifaaji e Baytaniya, kommbi Hooseere Jaytunje, Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo,
Markus 11.2: o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe wuro wonŋgo yeeso mooɗon. To on nasti ngo, on tawan wamnde molde haɓɓaande nde goɗɗo meeɗaay wa'aago. Piiste nde, ngadde.
Markus 11.3: To goɗɗo ƴami on: Koni piistoton nde? Njaabe mo: Jawmiraawo woodi haaje maare, o lornan nde law.”
Markus 11.5: Nden ɓe ndilli, ɓe tawi molde haa laawol, nde ɗon haɓɓi haa yolnde goɗɗo, ɓe piisti nde.
Markus 11.6: Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume mbaɗoton ɗo? Ngam ɗume piistoton molde nde?”
Markus 11.8: Ɓe njaabi bana Yeesu wi'no ɓe, nden yimɓe man acci ɓe.
Markus 11.9: Ɓe ngaddani Yeesu molde, ɓe ndaɗɗi limce maɓɓe dow maare, Yeesu wa'i nde.
Markus 11.10: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe'iti limce muuɗum'en dow laawol, woɗɓe itti haakooji haa gese, caɓɓi ɗi dow laawol.
Markus 11.11: Yimɓe ardiiɓe Yeesu e tokkiiɓe ɓaawo fuu kooli, mbi'i: “
Markus 11.13: barka laatano garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo
Markus 11.15: Allah barkiɗina laamu ngaranŋgu, ngu baaba meeɗen Daawuda!
Markus 11.19: Yeesu nasti Urusaliima. O nasti haykaliiru boo, o timmini laarugo ko woni nder maaru fuu, nde hiiri, o dilli Baytaniya bee pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo.
Markus 11.21: Jaŋngo maajum nde ɓe ngurti Baytaniya, Yeesu maati dolo.
Markus 11.22: O eewi ibbi bee haakooji ɗuuɗɗi, o yehi ngam o laara teema ibbe ɗon haa maaki. Ammaa nde o yehi les maaki, o tawi sey haakooji tan, ngam naa ɗum saa'i ibbe.
Markus 11.23: Nden Yeesu wi'i ibbi: “Taa goɗɗo meeta nyaamugo ibbe haa maaɗa!” Pukara'en maako nani.
Markus 11.25: Nde ɓe njotti Urusaliima, Yeesu nasti
Markus 11.27: O fuɗɗi faartugo soorrooɓe e soodooɓe nder haykaliiru. O hippi taabe sannjooɓe ceede e koromje soorrooɓe pooli.
Markus 11.28: O accaay koo gooto saalo nder haykaliiru bee doŋngal.
Markus 11.29: Nden o ekkitini yimɓe, o wi'i: “Ndaa ko winnda nder Deftere Seniinde: Suudu am wi'ete suudu waɗugo do'a ngam ummaatooje fuu. Ammaa onon on ngartiri ndu lowol fasooɓe
Markus 11.32: Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta nani haala man, ɓe puɗɗi tefugo dabare mbarugo Yeesu, ammaa ɓe ɗon kula mo ngam mooɓre fuu hayɗini ekkitinol maako.
Markus 11.34: Nde hiiri, Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum ngurti berniwol.
Markus 11.36: Jaŋngo man fajiri, nde ɓe ɗon caalo, ɓe ngi'i ibbi go, ki yoori bee ɗaɗi maaki fuu.
Markus 11.37: Piyer siftori, wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, ndaa ibbi ki a naali go. Ki yoori.”
Markus 11.38: Nden Yeesu jaabi pukara'en muuɗum: “Nuɗɗine Allah.
Markus 11.39: Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, to goɗɗo wi'i hooseere nde'e: Sootta diga ɗo, yolla nder mbeela, to o sekaay nder ɓernde maako sam, ammaa o nuɗɗini ko o wi'i laato, ɗum laatanto mo fakat
Markus 11.41: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Nde on toroto huunde fuu, nuɗɗine on keɓi nde e on keɓan nde.
Markus 11.42: Yaake on ndarake ngam waɗugo do'a, to woodi huunde hakkunde mooɗon bee goɗɗo, njaafe mo, ngam haa Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo haa asama boo yaafano on aybeeji mooɗon.
Markus 11.43: [Ammaa to on njaafaaki woɗɓe, nden kam Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo haa asama boo yaafantaako on aybeeji mooɗon
Markus 11.46: Ɓe lorti haa Urusaliima. Yaake Yeesu ɗon waanca nder haykaliiru, mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en dawrooɓe ngari haa maako.
Markus 11.47: Ɓe ƴami mo: “Bee duŋayeere moy a waarata kuuje ɗe'e? Moy duŋani ma waɗugo bana nii?”
Markus 11.48: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Min boo mi ƴaman on huunde woore. To on njaabake yam, nden kam min boo mi jaaboto on bee duŋayeere moy kuuwranmi kuuje ɗe'e.
Markus 11.49: Moy duŋani Yuhanna waɗango yimɓe baptisma? Allah naa malla yimɓe? Njaabe.”
Markus 11.50: Nden ɓe carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “To en njaabake: Allah, o ƴaman en: Koni on nuɗɗinaay mo?
Markus 11.51: Haa en njaabo ɗum yimɓe…” ndaa ɓe ɗon kula ummaatoore ngam yimɓe fuu ndaari Yuhanna o annabiijo fakat.
Markus 11.52: Nden ɓe njaabi Yeesu: “Min anndaa.” Yeesu wi'i: “Min boo mi wi'ataa on bee duŋayeere moy mbaɗanmi kuuje ɗe'e.”

Markus 12.1: Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango ɓe bee balndi. O wi'i: “Goɗɗo jubi ngesa inabooje, o howi ka, o waɗi ɓiɗɗirde inaboojam, o mahi suudu towndu ngam aynoowo ngesa. Nden o halfini ka remooɓe, o dilli jahaaŋgal
Markus 12.3: Nde saa'i teɓugo inabooje waɗi, o neli jaggiiɗo maako haa remooɓe go ngam o jaɓana mo geɗal maako haa inabooje.
Markus 12.4: Ammaa ɓe naŋngi jaggiiɗo oo, ɓe piyi mo, ɓe ndiiwi mo juŋngo sooko.
Markus 12.5: Nden jawmu ngesa neli jaggiiɗo muuɗum feere. Kaŋko boo remooɓe naawni mo haa hoore, ɓe toski mo.
Markus 12.6: Jawmu ngesa neli jaggiiɗo muuɗum feere fahin, ammaa ɓe mbari mo. Bana non ɓe mbaɗi ɗuuɗɓe, ɓe piyi woɗɓe, ɓe mbari woɗɓe boo.
Markus 12.7: Luttani jawmu ngesa ɓiɗɗo gooto tan, giɗaaɗo maako. Haa ragare man o neli mo haa remooɓe go, o numi: Ɓe teddinan ɓiyam kam.
Markus 12.8: Ammaa remooɓe ɓe'e carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: Ndaa kaŋko tammi ronugo. Sey en mbara mo, nden en marta ndonŋgu maako.
Markus 12.9: Nden ɓe naŋngi ɓiɗɗo go, ɓe mbari mo, ɓe ngudini mo yaasi ngesa.”
Markus 12.11: Nden Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Ɗume jawmu ngesa waɗata? O waran, o halkan remooɓe go, o hokkan ngesa inabooje haa woɗɓe.
Markus 12.12: Walaa seko on njaŋngi aaya ka'a:
Markus 12.20: Mawɓe Yahuudu'en ɗaɓɓi naŋngugo Yeesu, ngam ɓe anndi o wolwi balndol ngol dow maɓɓe. Ammaa ɓe kuli mooɓre, ngam maajum ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
Markus 12.22: Ɓe neli Farisa'en woɗɓe e yimɓe Hirudus haa Yeesu ngam naŋngugo mo nder ƴamol tuufnorgol.
Markus 12.23: Ɓe ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi walaa ko yaali ma bee goɗɗo, ngam a senndindirtaa yimɓe, ammaa a ɗon anndina laawol Allah bee gooŋga. Yeccu min, ɗum kaanduɗum hokkugo laamiiɗo Roma jomorgol na? Min ndokka na malla min calo hokkugo?”
Markus 12.24: Nde Yeesu anndi naafikaare maɓɓe, o jaabi ɓe: “Koni on tuufani yam tuuforgol? Ngaddaneeɗam suleyre haa mi yi'a.”
Markus 12.25: Ɓe ngaddani mo. Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Suura moy e innde moy dow maare?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma jeyi.”
Markus 12.26: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Njoɓe Kaysara, ko haanani mo, ndokke Allah boo ko haanani mo.” Jaawaabu maako hayɗini ɓe masin.
Markus 12.28: Saduki'en wi'anɓe maayɓe ummitittaako ngari haa Yeesu. Ɓe ƴami mo ƴamol ngo'ol
Markus 12.30: “Moodibbo, Muusa winndani en umroore nde'e: To goɗɗo maayi, acci debbo mo walaano ɓiŋngel, sey deerɗiiko te'a mo ngam haa ɓe keɓana maayɗo danygol
Markus 12.32: Woodino deerɗiraaɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Arano te'i debbo, maayi, accaay ɓikkoy.
Markus 12.33: Ɗiɗaɓo te'i mo, maayi, kaŋko boo o accaay ɓikkoy, bana non boo tataɓo.
Markus 12.34: Haa njoweeɗiɗo te'ɓe debbo oo fuu maayi, ɓe accaay ɓikkoy. Ɓaawo maɓɓe debbo boo maayi.
Markus 12.35: Nyalaade ummitineeki, to maayɓe ummitake, debbo moy o laatanto caka maɓɓe kadi? Ngam ɓe njoweeɗiɗo fuu ɓe te'ino mo.”
Markus 12.37: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On ɗon mboofa masin! Ngam on anndaa Defte Ceniiɗe, on anndaa boo baawɗe Allah.
Markus 12.38: Ngam to maayɓe ummitake, walaa teegal fahin, ɓe laatoto bana malaa'ika'en haa asama.
Markus 12.39: Ko laarani haala maayɓe e ummitineeki maɓɓe, on meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda nder deftere Muusa dow haala wumre na? Ton Allah wi'i Muusa: Min woni Allah Ibrahiima e Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu na
Markus 12.41: Allah o Allah yeeɗɓe, naa o Allah maayɓe. Ngam maajum on mboofi masin.”
Markus 12.43: Gooto nder Moodiɓɓe tawreeta nani kujjootiral maɓɓe, o nani Yeesu jaabi Saduki'en booɗɗum, nden o ƴami mo: “Dow umrooje fuu, umroore ndeye ɓuri mawnugo?”
Markus 12.44: Yeesu jaabi: “Ndaa umroore ɓurnde mawnugo: Onon Isra'iila'en, nane: Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen, o gooto.
Markus 12.45: Yiɗ Jawmiraawo, Allah maaɗa bee ɓernde ma fuu, bee yoŋki ma fuu, bee hakkiilo ma fuu e bee semmbe ma fuu
Markus 12.47: Ndaa umroore ɗiɗawre: Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana hoore maaɗa. Walaa umroore feere ɓuri ɗe'e.
Markus 12.49: Nden moodibbo tawreeta wi'i Yeesu: “Booɗɗum moodibbo. Ko a wi'i, ɗum gooŋga: Jawmiraawo Allah o gooto, walaa Allah feere, sey kaŋko tan
Markus 12.51: Sey koo moy fuu yiɗa Allah bee ɓernde e hakkiilo e semmbe mum fuu, sey o yiɗa keeddiɗɗiiko boo bana no o yiɗirta hoore maako. Ɗum ɓuri dokke dabbaaji gulaaɗi e lii'aaɗi fuu
Markus 12.53: Yeesu nani o jaabi booɗɗum bee hikma, nden o wi'i mo: “A daayaaki laamu Allah.” Ɓaawo maajum koo moy huli ƴamugo mo ƴamɗe goɗɗe.
Markus 12.55: Nde Yeesu ɗon ekkitina nder haykaliiru, o waɗi ƴamol ngo'ol: “Noy moodiɓɓe mbi'rata Almasiihu woni
Markus 12.58: Ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗowi Daawuda, o wi'i bee hoore maako:
Markus 12.61: haa to mi wallini konne'en maaɗa les kosɗe ma.
Markus 12.63: Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum ewni mo Jawmiraawo, kadi noy Almasiihu laatori ɓii Daawuda?” Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde heɗiti haala Yeesu bee seyo.
Markus 12.65: Ndaa ko o ɗon ekkitina koo moy: “Ndeente e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, yiɗɓe waancugo bee ngapaleeji juuɗɗi, ɓe ngiɗi yimɓe koofna ɓe haa luuɓe.
Markus 12.66: Nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, ɓe ngiɗi jooɗaago haa joole tedduɗe e to ɓe ewnake ɓe ngam nyaamdu boo ɓe ɗaɓɓitan joole camɗinaaɗe.
Markus 12.67: Ɓe ɗon njaɓta marle rewɓe yurumɓe, ɓe ɗon njuutina do'aare ngam yimɓe ngi'a ɓe. Ɓe keɓan kiita naawka masin.”
Markus 12.69: Nden Yeesu jooɗi baŋnge baatirɗum ceede nder haykaliiru. O hakkilani yimɓe waatanɓe ceede nder baatirɗum ceede man. Riskuɓe ɗuuɗɓe ndokki ceede ɗuuɗɗe.
Markus 12.70: Debbo jurumɗo talakaajo boo wari, waati aniini ɗiɗi, waato ceede seɗɗa non.
Markus 12.71: Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, debbo jurumɗo talakaajo oo waati nder baatirɗum ceede ko ɓuri yimɓe woɗɓe fuu.
Markus 12.72: Ngam kamɓe ɓe ndokki seɗɗa diga ɗuuɗeeŋga jawdi maɓɓe, ammaa debbo oo, koo nde o laafuɗo, o hokki ko o mari ngam nguure maako fuu.”

Markus 13.1: Nde Yeesu wurti haykaliiru, gooto haa pukara'en maako wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, laar no kaa'e e nyiɓle ɗe'e mbooɗiri!”
Markus 13.2: Yeesu jaabi mo: “A ɗon yi'a nyiɓle mawɗe ɗe'e na? Fakat, hayre luttataa dow hayre, ɓe ngibbinan koo ɗume fuu.”
Markus 13.4: Yeesu ɗon jooɗi dow Hooseere Jaytunje haa huucitirde haykaliiru. Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna e Andire feere maɓɓe ƴami mo:
Markus 13.5: “Yeccu min ndey kuuje ɗe'e laatoto e alaama kaye waŋginta saa'iire timmoode kuuje ɗe'e fuu?”
Markus 13.7: Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi wi'ugo ɓe: “Kakkile, ngam taa goɗɗo majjina on.
Markus 13.8: Ɗuuɗɓe ngaran bee innde am, ɓe mbi'an: Min woni Almasiihu, ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Markus 13.9: To on nani habaru konuuji ɓadiiɗi e daayiiɗi, taa kultore, doole ɗum laato, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode tawon.
Markus 13.10: Ummaatoore haɓan bee ummaatoore woɗnde, laamu ummanto laamu feere. Dimmbanɗe lesdi mbaɗan haa nokkuuje feere feere, non boo weelo. Ɗum laatoto bana fuɗɗam luuwe danyugo.
Markus 13.12: Ammaa onon, kakkilane ko'e mooɗon, ngam ɓe naŋngan on, ɓe njahran on yeeso hiitooɓe. Ɓe piyan on nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en. On ndaroto yeeso mawɓe e laamiiɓe ngam daliila am, haa on mbaɗa seedamku mooɗon yeeso maɓɓe.
Markus 13.13: Sey ummaatooje fuu nana waazu Linjiila tawon.
Markus 13.14: To ɓe naŋngi on, ɓe njahri on yeeso hiitooɓe, taa cuklane ko mbi'oton. Ammaa to wakkati man wari, mbolwe bolle ɗe on keɓata. Kanje ɗe iwataa haa mooɗon, ammaa haa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Markus 13.16: Yimɓe ndokkan deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe ngam mbareego, baabiraaɓe mbaɗan ɓikkoy maɓɓe bana non, ɓikkoy ummanto saaro'en maɓɓe e koy mbaran ɓe.
Markus 13.17: Koo moy fuu wanyan on daliila innde am. Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, o hisan
Markus 13.20: Yeesu wi'i boo: “On ngi'an ko wi'ete nyidduɗum nattinoojum ɗon dari haa pellel ngel haanaay ɗum daro. Mo jaŋngi ɗum, sey faama booɗɗum! Nden kam sey wonɓe lesdi Yahudiya ndogga haa kooseeje
Markus 13.22: Mo ɗon dow soorowol, taa jippo ngam hoocugo koo ɗume nder maagol.
Markus 13.23: Mo ɗon haa ngesa, taa hoota saare ngam hoo'ugo limce mum
Markus 13.25: Kayto! Bone laatanto reedu'en e musininanɓe nder nyalɗe man!
Markus 13.26: Tore Allah ngam taa ɗum laato saa'i duumol.
Markus 13.27: Ngam nder nyalɗe maajum ɓillaare naawnde waɗan, bana maare meeɗaay waɗeego diga fuɗɗoode duniyaaru haa wargo hannde, nde meetataa waɗugo boo
Markus 13.29: To Allah ustaayno limgal nyalɗe man, walaa koo gooto hisanno. Ammaa o usti ɗe ngam daliila yimɓe maako ɓe o suɓi.
Markus 13.31: Wakkati man, to goɗɗo wi'i on: Ndaa
Markus 13.33: haa ɗo malla: Ndaa mo haa to, taa njaɓe.
Markus 13.34: Ngam fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe almasiihu'en malla ɓe annabi'en mbaŋgan, ɓe mbaɗan alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji ngam ɓe majjina koo suɓaaɓe boo, to ɗum heɓoto.
Markus 13.35: Onon, kakkile! Mi yecci on ɗum fuu diga aran.”
Markus 13.37: Nder nyalɗe ɓaawo ɓillaare nde'e, naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru accan yaynugo
Markus 13.39: koode asama njanan, baawɗeeji asama boo ndimmboto
Markus 13.43: waŋgan gite yimɓe, o waran nder duule bee tedduŋgal e baawɗe mawɗe
Markus 13.45: O nelan malaa'ika'en haa alkibilaaji nayi ngam mooɓtugo suɓaaɓe maako diga keerol duniyaaru ngo'ol haa ngola.
Markus 13.47: Paame ko ibbi anndinta on: To lice maaki kesɗiti, haakooji maaki boo mbiliti, on anndi duumol ɓadake.
Markus 13.48: Bana non onon boo, to on ngi'i kuuje ɗe'e ɗon laato, annde o ɓadake wargo.
Markus 13.49: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatoto hiddeko yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u fuu maayda.
Markus 13.50: Asama e lesdi njinnan, ammaa bolle am njinnataa sam.
Markus 13.52: “Ammaa walaa mo anndi nyalaade maajum koo saa'a maajum, malaa'ika'en anndaa, koo
Markus 13.54: boo anndaa, sey Baabiraawo tan anndi
Markus 13.56: Kakkile! Ayne! Ngam on anndaa ndey saa'i maajum laatoto.
Markus 13.57: Ɗum laatoto bana to goɗɗo dilli jahaaŋgal, acci saare mum, halfitini huuwooɓe muuɗum gooto gooto fuu kuugal muuɗum, umri aynoowo saare o ayna
Markus 13.59: Ngam maajum ayne, nde nii on anndaa ndey jawmu saare wartata, kiikiiɗe malla caka jemma malla boo baɓɓol, koo fajiri.
Markus 13.60: To o warti bee juhuki, taa o tawta on ɗon ɗaani.
Markus 13.61: Ko mi wi'i on, mi ɗon wi'a ɗum yimɓe fuu: Ayne!”

Markus 14.3: e tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka waɗe. Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗaɓɓi no ɓe ƴoyra Yeesu, ɓe naŋnga mo, ɓe mbara mo
Markus 14.5: Ɓe mbi'i: “Taa en mbaɗa ɗum wakkati juulde, ngam taa ɗum ummina fitina caka ummaatoore.”
Markus 14.7: Yeesu ɗon haa Baytaniya nder saare Simon kuturuujo. Saa'i o ɗon nyaama, debbo feere wari, o ɗon jogi faandu saɗndu heewndu uurdi mbi'eteendi nardi, ndi laaɓndi e caɗndi masin. O fusi hunnduko faandu man, o rufi uurdi go dow hoore Yeesu
Markus 14.9: Woɗɓe caka yimɓe ton ɓerni, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Koni o majjini nebbam ɗa'am meere?
Markus 14.10: To o soorrino ɗam ko ɓuri suleyje cardi teemeɗɗe tati, o hokkuno ceede man haa talaka'en, ɓuranno nafugo.” Ɓe peli mo bee caatal.
Markus 14.11: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Acce mo! Koni on pitinta mo? O huuwani yam kuugal booɗŋgal.
Markus 14.12: Talaka'en ɗon ngondi bee mooɗon foroy, on mbaawan waɗango ɓe ko wooɗi koo ndey on ngiɗi fuu. Ammaa min mi wondataa bee mooɗon foroy
Markus 14.14: Kaŋko o waɗi ko o waawi. Diga saa'i siwaa o rufi nebbam dow ɓanndu am ngam uweego.
Markus 14.15: Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo toy nder duniyaaru haa nuɗɗinɓe yam ngaazinta Linjiila fuu, ɓe ngeccan boo ko debbo oo waɗi e ɓe ciftoran mo.”
Markus 14.17: Nden Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo, dilli haa mawɓe liman'en ngam o hokka Yeesu haa juuɗe maɓɓe.
Markus 14.18: Nde ɓe nani haala maako, ɓe ceyi. Ɓe iinani mo ceede. Nden Yahuuda ɗaɓɓiti wakkatiire ɓurnde fottugo ngam o hokka Yeesu haa juuɗe maɓɓe.
Markus 14.20: Nyalaade arannde haa juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, nde ɓe kirsata jawgel
Markus 14.22: pukara'en ƴami Yeesu: “Toy a yiɗi min njaha, min taaskitina kiirtaari Paska ngam maaɗa?”
Markus 14.23: Nden Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo, wi'i ɓe: “Naste nder berniwol, on pottan bee goɗɗo doondiiɗo mbulku ndiyam, tokke mo.
Markus 14.24: Haa saare nde o nastata, mbi'e jawmu saare man: Moodibbo wi'i: Toy suudu haa mi nyaama kiirtaari Paska bee pukara'en am?
Markus 14.25: O hollan on suudu mawndu, dowru, mo'itinaandu, taaskitinaandu, on taaskitina kuuje fuu ngam meeɗen ton.”
Markus 14.26: Pukara'en go ndilli, nasti berniwol, ɓe tawi koo ɗume fuu bana o wi'i ɓe, ɓe taaskitini kiirtaari Paska.
Markus 14.28: Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, Yeesu wardi bee pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo.
Markus 14.29: Saa'i ɓe njooɗi ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, gooto mooɗon mo ɗon nyaamda bee am, zammboto yam
Markus 14.31: Ɗum naawi ɓerɗe pukara'en, koo moy maɓɓe fuɗɗi ƴamugo mo: “Naa ɗum min sika?”
Markus 14.33: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ɗum gooto haa sappo e ɗiɗo mooɗon, mo ɗon suuwa loŋngere mum bee am nder le'al.
Markus 14.36: maayan bana ko winnda dow maako. Ammaa bone laatanto goɗɗo mo zammboto Ɓii-neɗɗo. To o danyaakano, ɓurananno mo.”
Markus 14.38: Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu hoo'i tamseere, waɗi yettoore, yewi tamseere man, hokki ɓe, wi'i: “Koo'e, ɗum ɓanndu am.”
Markus 14.39: Ɓaawo maajum o hoo'i jardugel, o yetti Allah, o hokki ɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe njari nder maagel.
Markus 14.40: O wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum ƴiiƴam am ndufaaɗam ngam ɗuuɗɓe, bee maajam Allah tabitiniri alkawal muuɗum
Markus 14.42: Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on: Mi meetataa yarugo inaboojam ɗam haa nyalaade mi yarata kesam nder laamu Allah.”
Markus 14.43: Nden ɓe ngimi gime maŋgtooje, ɓe ndilli haa Hooseere Jaytunje.
Markus 14.45: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “On fuu on accatam on ndoggan, bana ko winnda nder Deftere: Mi mbaran gaynaako, baali caŋkititto
Markus 14.47: Ammaa to mi ummitake, mi aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili
Markus 14.49: Piyer wi'i mo: “Koo to yimɓe fuu acci ma, min kam mi accataa ma.”
Markus 14.50: Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmaami: Jemmaare nde'e, hiddeko asgumri
Markus 14.51: u'a nde ɗiɗi, an a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.”
Markus 14.52: Ammaa Piyer tabitini ko o wi'i bee sawtu: “Mi meeɗataa wi'go mi anndaa ma, koo to doole mi maayda bee maaɗa.” Pukara'en luttuɓe fuu njaabi bana non.
Markus 14.54: Nde ɓe njotti nokkuure wi'eteende Gecemane, Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Njooɗe haa ɗo, haa mi waɗoya do'a.”
Markus 14.55: Nden o yahdi bee Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna. Kulol e saklere ukkani mo.
Markus 14.56: O wi'i ɓe: “Torra ɓernde am yiɗi mbarugo yam. Tokke jooɗaago haa ɗo, ayne.”
Markus 14.57: O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o do'i haa lesdi, o tori haa saa'iire torra nde'e saalo acca mo, to heɓoto.
Markus 14.58: O wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo am, an a waawi waɗugo koo ɗume fuu. Ittanam jardugel torra nge'el. Ammaa waɗ ko ngiɗɗa, naa ko ngiɗmi.”
Markus 14.60: Nden o lori, o tawti pukara'en tato go, ɓe ɗon ɗaani. O wi'i Piyer: “Simon, a ɗon ɗaani na? A waawaay aynugo koo saa'a ngoota na?
Markus 14.61: Ayne, tore Allah ngam taa on nasta jarribeeki. Ko ruuhu neɗɗo yiɗi, ɓanndu muuɗum waawataa waɗugo ɗum, ngam ndu tampundu.”
Markus 14.63: Fahin o yehi, o waɗi do'a bana o waɗno naane.
Markus 14.64: Nde o lorti, o tawti ɓe ɓe ɗon ɗaani fahin, ngam gite maɓɓe teddi. Ɓe anndaa ko ɓe njaaboto mo.
Markus 14.66: Nde o wari haa maɓɓe tataɓre, o wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ɗaani haa jonta na? On ɗon ciwto na? He'i kadi, saa'i waɗi! Jonta ɓe ndokkan
Markus 14.69: Umme, ndillen! Ndaa zammbotooɗo yam ɓaditake.”
Markus 14.71: Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, Yahuuda, gooto nder pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo go wari. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde wardi bee maako bee kaafaaje e cabbi, mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en dawrooɓe neli ɓe.
Markus 14.72: Yahuuda zammbotooɗo Yeesu hokkuno ɓe alaama, wi'i: “Mo mi hebbata, ɗum kaŋko. Naŋnge mo, ndillire mo, ayne mo booɗɗum.”
Markus 14.73: Nde o yotti, o ɓaditi Yeesu, o wi'i mo: “Moodibbo.” Nden o hebbi mo.
Markus 14.74: Nden woɗɓe boo ukki dow Yeesu, naŋngi mo.
Markus 14.75: Ammaa gooto haa dariiɓe ton losi kaafahi muuɗum, fe'i maccuɗo hooreejo liman'en, ta'i mo nofru.
Markus 14.76: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Koni on ngari bee kaafaaje e cabbi ngam naŋngugo yam bana mi pasoowo?
Markus 14.77: Nyalɗe fuu mi ɗonno wondi bee mooɗon nder
Markus 14.79: mi ɗon ekkitina on, on naŋngaay yam. Ammaa ɗum waɗi ngam gooŋɗingo ko winnda nder Deftere Seniinde
Markus 14.81: Nden pukara'en fuu ndoggi acci mo.
Markus 14.83: Suka feere tokki Yeesu, o ɗon wakki suddaare tan dow ɓanndu maako. Ɓe naŋngi mo,
Markus 14.84: ammaa o teeti, o wudini suddaare, o doggi o temmbo, o daɗi.
Markus 14.86: Ɓe njahri Yeesu haa hooreejo liman'en. Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta fuu ɗon mooɓti ton.
Markus 14.87: Piyer tokki daayiiɗum, o nasti saare hooreejo liman'en. O jooɗodi bee aynooɓe, o ɗon aytino yiite.
Markus 14.88: Mawɓe liman'en e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu ɗaɓɓi wullaandu dow Yeesu haa ɓe ndo'a mo kiita maayde, ammaa ɓe keɓaay.
Markus 14.89: Seedooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ceedi pewe dow maako, ammaa bolle maɓɓe luutindiri.
Markus 14.90: Nden woɗɓe maɓɓe ummi ceedi fewre nde'e dow maako, ɓe mbi'i:
Markus 14.91: “Min nani bee noppi amin o wi'i: Mi yibbinan haykaliiru ndu yimɓe mahi e mi mahitan ndu nder nyalɗe tati, naa bee juuɗe yimɓe
Markus 14.93: Ammaa kamɓe boo, seedamkuuji maɓɓe njahdaay.
Markus 14.95: Hooreejo liman'en ummi, dari caka yimɓe, ƴami Yeesu: “A jaabataako koo ɗume dow gullaali wulliiɓe ɓe'e na?”
Markus 14.96: Ammaa Yeesu jeeɗi, jaabaaki sam. Fahin hooreejo liman'en ƴami mo: “An a Almasiihu,
Markus 14.99: Yeesu wi'i: “Ooho, min woni kaŋko, onon boo on ngi'an
Markus 14.101: ɗon jooɗi haa nyaamo Allah Baawɗo, o waran nder duule asama
Markus 14.103: Hooreejo liman'en seeki limce mum, wi'i: “Walaa haaje en ɗaɓɓita seedooɓe feere.
Markus 14.104: On nani kalluka maako dow Allah. Ɗume on mbi'ata dow maajum?” Ɓe fuu ɓe njaabi o aybuɗo, ɓe kiiti mo kiita mbareego
Markus 14.107: Woɗɓe maɓɓe tuuti tuuɗe dow Yeesu. Ɓe cuddi gite maako, ɓe lukki mo, nden ɓe mbi'i mo: “Annditu, moy waɗi ma ɗum?” Aynooɓe boo koo'i mo, maari mo.
Markus 14.109: Nde Piyer ɗonno haa les, haa daldal saare tawon, gooto haa horɓe hooreejo liman'en wari.
Markus 14.110: Nde o yi'i Piyer ɗon aytino yiite, o laari mo, o wi'i: “An boo a ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu Nasaratuujo.”
Markus 14.111: Ammaa Piyer yeddi, wi'i: “Mi anndaa, mi faamaay ko a wi'i.” Nden o dilli haa zawleeru. Saa'i maajum asgumri
Markus 14.113: Korɗo go yi'i mo, wi'i dariiɓe ton fahin: “Oo ɗo, o gooto maɓɓe.”
Markus 14.114: Ammaa fahin Piyer yeddi. Ɓaawo maajum seɗɗa dariiɓe ton mbi'i Piyer: “Fakat a gooto maɓɓe, ngam an boo a goɗɗo Galiili.”
Markus 14.115: Piyer fuɗɗi hunaago: “Allah hiito yam to mi fewi! Mi anndaa gorko mo on mbolwanta ɗo.”
Markus 14.116: Saa'i maajum asgumri u'i ɗiɗawre. Piyer siftori wolde nde Yeesu wi'no mo: “Hiddeko asgumri u'a nde ɗiɗi, an a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.” Nden o wayliti o fuɗɗi woyugo.

Markus 15.1: Fajiri cub, mawɓe liman'en kawti bee ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu, ɓe carwootiri. Ɓe kaɓɓi Yeesu, ɓe njahri mo, ɓe ndokki mo haa juuɗe Pilaatu
Markus 15.3: Kaŋko boo o ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Nonnon bana mbi'ɗa.”
Markus 15.4: Mawɓe liman'en ngullori Yeesu kuuje ɗuuɗɗe.
Markus 15.5: Nden Pilaatu ƴami mo fahin: “A jaabataako koo ɗume na? Laar no ɓe ngullori ma gullaali ɗuuɗɗi.”
Markus 15.6: Ammaa Yeesu sali wolwugo, haa Pilaatu hayɗini.
Markus 15.10: waɗi fuu, Pilaatu woowi yoofango yimɓe kaɓɓaaɗo gooto mo ɓe ƴami.
Markus 15.11: Wakkati maajum goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Barabbas ɗon haa suudu fursina
Markus 15.12: bee woɗɓe, ɓe mbaɗino fitina, ɓe mbarno goɗɗo nder fitina ka'a.
Markus 15.13: Nden yimɓe mooɓre ndilli haa saare Pilaatu, ɓe mbi'i mo o waɗana ɓe ko o woowi waɗango ɓe.
Markus 15.14: Pilaatu ƴami ɓe: “On ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?”
Markus 15.15: Ngam o anndi, mawɓe liman'en njahrani mo Yeesu ngam kaajal.
Markus 15.16: Ammaa mawɓe liman'en tiɗɗini yimɓe ɓe mbi'a mo ndikka o yoofana ɓe Barabbas.
Markus 15.17: Fahin Pilaatu wolwani yimɓe: “Mo on mbi'ata laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en, mi waɗa mo ɗume kadi?”
Markus 15.18: Ɓe kooli fahin, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Markus 15.19: Pilaatu ƴami: “Kadi halleende ndeye o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓesdi wookugo bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Markus 15.20: Pilaatu yiɗi fottango mooɓre. Ngam maajum o yoofani ɓe Barabbas. Nden o umri sooje'en, ɓe ɓocci Yeesu, o hokki mo haa juuɗe maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Markus 15.22: Sooje'en njahri Yeesu haa daldal laamorde, ɓe mooɓti sooje'en wonɓe nder yeɓre woore fuu.
Markus 15.23: Ɓe ɓorni mo mojaare woɗeere, ɓe mbaɗi meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ngol dow hoore maako.
Markus 15.24: Nden ɓe koofni mo: “Allah woonane, an laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Markus 15.25: Ɓe piyi mo bee sawru dow hoore, ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe, ɓe tuggi koppi ɓe cujidani mo.
Markus 15.26: Nde ɓe timmini jancugo mo, ɓe ɓorti mo mojaare woɗeere go, ɓe ɓorni mo limce maako. Nden ɓe njahri mo yaasi berniwol ngam ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Markus 15.28: Haa laawol ɓe potti bee goɗɗo Sirene, bi'eteeɗo Simon, baaba Aleksandire e Rufus, o ɗon warta ngesa. Sooje'en ndooli mo roondaago leggal gaafaaŋgal Yeesu
Markus 15.30: Ɓe njahri Yeesu haa nokkuure nde ɓe mbi'ata Golgota bana wi'ugo: nokkuure Gumbal-hoore.
Markus 15.31: Ton ɓe ngiɗi yarnugo mo inaboojam ɓennduɗam jillaaɗam bee ɗacce, ammaa Yeesu sali yarugo.
Markus 15.33: Nden ɓe ɓili mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal, ɓe cenndi limce maako bee waɗugo kur'u ngam ɓe keɓta ko koo moy maɓɓe hoo'ata
Markus 15.35: Ɗum ɗonno saa'a joweenayi fajiri, ɓe ɓili mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Markus 15.36: Ɓe mbinndi daliila kiita maako dow alluha bana ni'i: “Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Markus 15.38: Ɓe ɓildi fasooɓe ɗiɗo bee Yeesu haa leɗɗe gaafaaɗe, gooto haa nyaamo maako, gooto boo haa nano maako.
Markus 15.39: [Bana nii ko deftere wi'i gooŋɗiri, nde wi'i: “Ɓe limi mo nder huuwooɓe zunuuba
Markus 15.42: Saalotooɓe ton ndimmbini ko'e muuɗum'en, kuɗi mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Hey! A wi'no a yibbinan
Markus 15.44: a mahtoto ndu nder nyalɗe tati
Markus 15.46: Jippa leggal gaafaaŋgal kadi, hisnu hoore ma!”
Markus 15.47: Bana non boo mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta njanci Yeesu, ɓe mbolwi hakkunde maɓɓe ɓe mbi'i: O hisni woɗɓe, ammaa o waawataa hisnugo hoore maako.
Markus 15.50: laamiiɗo Isra'iila jippo leggal gaafaaŋgal jonta, ngam haa en nuɗɗina mo. Koo ɓildaaɓe bee maako go boo kallini mo.
Markus 15.52: Caka naaŋge nyiɓre suddi lesdi fuu haa yotti saa'a tati asiri.

Markus 15.55: Bana wi'go: “Yaa Allah am, yaa Allah am, ngam ɗume a wudini yam
Markus 15.57: Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Ndaa o ɗon ewno Eliya.”
Markus 15.58: Gooto maɓɓe yaawi suuwi sooso nder lammuɗam, taari ɗum dow loosol, nden o ɓaŋgti ɗum ngam yarnugo Yeesu, o wi'i: “Sey en ndeena e en ndaara to Eliya waran jippina mo diga leggal gaafaaŋgal.”

Markus 15.68: Woodi boo rewɓe ton, ɓe ɗon ndaara diga daayiiɗum. Nder maɓɓe Mariyama mo wuro Magdala e Mariyama daada Yaakuba pamaro e Yoses e Salome.
Markus 15.69: Ɓe tokkino Yeesu, ɓe njagganino mo nde o ɗonno haa Galiili. Woodi boo rewɓe feere ɗuuɗɓe, ɓe ngarduno bee Yeesu haa Urusaliima
Markus 15.72: Nde ɗum nyalaade taaskara, bana wi'go nyalaade nde aartata
Markus 15.75: Yusufu mo wuro Arimatiya wari. O mawɗo tedduɗo caka dawrooɓe. O ɗon reeni garki laamu Allah boo. Kaŋko o tiɗɗini ɓernde maako, o yehi haa Pilaatu, o tori mo ɓanndu Yeesu.
Markus 15.76: Pilaatu hayɗini nanugo Yeesu maayi law bana nii. O ewni mawɗo sooje'en go, o ƴami mo: “Neeɓi o maayi na?”
Markus 15.77: Ɓaawo mawɗo sooje'en Roma anndini mo habaru man, o duŋani Yusufu hoosugo ɓanndu Yeesu.
Markus 15.78: Yusufu soodi kasa ɗigguka, o jippini ɓanndu Yeesu, o hasni ndu, o wallini ndu nder yenaande wasaande nder tapaare. Nden o talli hayre mawnde, o maɓɓi nastirde yenaande.
Markus 15.79: Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama daada Yoses ndaari haa ɓe mballini ɓanndu Yeesu.

Markus 16.3: saali, Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama daada Yaakuba e Salome coodi uurle ngam ɓe njaha, ɓe ndufa dow ɓanndu Yeesu.
Markus 16.4: Alat, nyannde go'oore nder asaweere, ɓe ndawi cub yahugo yenaande, ɓe njotti ton saa'i puɗki naaŋge.
Markus 16.5: Ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde maɓɓe: “Moy sottinanta en hayre haa nastirde yenaande?”
Markus 16.6: Ammaa nde ɓe ɓaŋgti gite, ɓe ngi'i hayre mawnde go sottinaama.
Markus 16.7: Ɓe nasti nder yenaande. Ɓe ngi'i suka ɗon jooɗi ton haa wakeere nyaamre, o ɗon ɓorni toggoore raneere. Ɓe kultori.
Markus 16.8: Ammaa o wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! On ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu Nasaratuujo mo ɓe ɓilino haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. O walaaɗon haa ɗo, o ummitake. Ndaa haa ɓe mballinno mo.
Markus 16.9: Jonta ndille, mbi'e pukara'en maako e Piyer kubaruwol ngo'ol: O aartan on yahugo Galiili, ton ngi'oton mo bana o wi'no on
Markus 16.11: Rewɓe ngurti yenaande man, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe ndiwni ɓe kultori masin. Ɓe mbi'aay haala man koo moy, ngam ɓe kultori.
Markus 16.13: Ɓaawo Yeesu ummiti diga maayde, nyannde Alat fajiri cub, o aarti waŋgango Mariyama mo Magdala mo o riiwi ruuhuuji coɓɗi joweeɗiɗi haa maako.
Markus 16.14: O yehi, o anndini ɗum hawtiɗiraaɓe Yeesu. Kamɓe ɓe ɗonno mboya, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ta'ino.
Markus 16.15: Ɓe nani Mariyama ɗon wi'a: “Yeesu o geeto, mi yi'i mo!” Ammaa ɓe nuɗɗinaay ko o wi'i.
Markus 16.17: Ɓaawo maajum Yeesu waŋgani ɗiɗo maɓɓe bee jaati feere, nde ɓe ɗon njaha kawye.
Markus 16.18: Ɓe lori, ɓe ngecci ɗum luttuɓe, ammaa kamɓe boo ɓe nuɗɗinaay ɗum.
Markus 16.20: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en sappo e go'o saa'i ɓe ɗon nyaama. O feli ɓe ngam sooynde nuɗɗinki maɓɓe. O feli ɓe boo ngam caatal ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay bolle yi'ɓe mo ɓaawo o ummiti.
Markus 16.21: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe koo toy nder duniyaaru, ngaazine koo moy Linjiila
Markus 16.23: Koo moy nuɗɗini, jaɓi baptisma, hisan. Mo nuɗɗinaay, Allah hiitoto mo.
Markus 16.24: Nuɗɗinɓe mbaŋginan alaamaaji ɗi'i: Ɓe ndiiwan ginnaaji bee innde am, ɓe mbolwan bee ɗemɗe kese.
Markus 16.25: To ɓe naŋngi boɗɗe bee juuɗe malla to ɓe njari njaram mbaroojam, ɗum naawnataa ɓe sam. Ɓe njowan juuɗe maɓɓe dow nyawɓe, ɓe njamɗitan.”]
Markus 16.27: Ɓaawo nde Jawmiraawo timmini wolwango pukara'en muuɗum, o eeŋgti haa asama, o jooɗi haa nyaamo Allah
Markus 16.29: Pukara'en kam ndilli, ngaazini Linjiila koo toy fuu. Jawmiraawo boo huuwdi bee maɓɓe, gooŋɗini waazu maɓɓe bee alaamaaji go.

Luka 1.1: Yaa Teyofilus tedduɗo: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kaɓdi winndugo kubaruwol kuuje laatiiɗe caka meeɗen.
Luka 1.2: Ɓe mbinndi ko min nani haa yi'ɓe kuuje ɗe'e bee gite muuɗum'en diga fuɗɗam, halfitinaaɓe kuugal anndingo kubaruwol man.
Luka 1.3: Ngam maajum nde mi humpiti laaɓka kuuje ɗe'e fuu diga fuɗɗoode maaje, ɗum haandani yam haa mi winndane ɗum bee tokkindirki, yaa Teyofilus tedduɗo.
Luka 1.4: Mi waɗi ɗum ngam haa a faama hoolɗinaare ekkitinolji ɗi keɓɗa.
Luka 1.6: Nder zamanu Hirudus ɗonno laamani lesdi Yahudiya, woodino goɗɗo limanjo, mo innde muuɗum Zekariya, gonɗo nder yeɓre
Luka 1.7: liman'en Abiya. Innde debbo maako Elizabet, mo danygol Haruna, hooreejo liman'en
Luka 1.9: Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe adili'en yeeso Allah, ɓe ɗon ɗowtano umrooje Jawmiraawo e farillaaji muuɗum fuu bee booɗɗum.
Luka 1.10: Ammaa ɓe ngalaano ɓiŋngel, ngam Elizabet laatino dimaro e non boo ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe naywi.
Luka 1.12: Nyannde feere Zekariya ɗon huuwa kuugal limanku muuɗum yeeso Allah, ngam ɗum wakkati kuugal yeɓre maako.
Luka 1.13: Liman'en mboowi senndugo kuuɗe hakkunde muuɗum'en bee waɗugo
Luka 1.15: Nyalaade man, Zekariya suɓaama, o heɓi nastugo nder haykaliiru ngam wulugo uurle yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Luka 1.16: Saa'i o ɗon wula uurle, mooɓre ummaatoore fuu ɗon waɗa do'a haa yaasi.
Luka 1.17: Ɗon nii, Zekariya yi'i malaa'ikaajo ɗon dari haa wakeere gulduɗum uurle nyaamre.
Luka 1.18: Nde o yi'i mo, o hultori, o sakli.
Luka 1.19: Ammaa malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Taa hultor, Zekariya, ngam Allah nani do'aare maaɗa. Debbo maaɗa Elizabet danyante ɓiŋngel, a innda ngel Yuhanna.
Luka 1.20: A seyoto masin, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ceyodoto bee maaɗa ngam danyeeki maagel.
Luka 1.21: Ngam o laatoto mawɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo. O yarataa inaboojam malla nguykinoojam koo ɗame. O kebbinteeɗo bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo diga nder reedu daada maako
Luka 1.23: O lornan Isra'iila'en ɗuuɗɓe haa Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe.
Luka 1.24: O aartan Jawmiraawo wargo nder ruuhu e baawɗe ɗe annabi Eliya heɓno, ngam o lortina ɓerɗe baabiraaɓe haa ɓikkoy muuɗum'en, o wartira ɓerɗe tuurtooɓe haa hikma ka adili'en, o taaskitina ummaatoore ngam Jawmiraawo.”
Luka 1.26: Ammaa Zekariya wi'i malaa'ikaajo: “Noy anndiranmi ɗum gooŋga? Ngam min mi naywi, debbo am boo duuɓi muuɗum ɗuuɗi.”
Luka 1.27: Malaa'ikaajo jaabi mo: “Min mi Jibirilla, mi ɗon daro yeeso Allah ngam huuwango mo. Kaŋko neli yam mi wolwane, mi anndine kubaruwol belŋgol ngo'ol
Luka 1.29: Ammaa a nuɗɗinaay bolle am tammiiɗe gooŋɗugo to wakkati man waɗi. Ngam maajum a laatoto muukaajo, a waawataa wolwugo haa to kuuje ɗe'e laatake.”
Luka 1.31: Saa'i man yimɓe ɗon ndeena Zekariya. Ɓe kayɗini ngam o neeɓi nder haykaliiru.
Luka 1.32: Nde o wurti, o waawaay wolwango ɓe, ɓe paami o yi'i kaayeefi nder haykaliiru. O ɗonno waɗana ɓe alaamaaji bee juuɗe, ngam o waawaay wolwugo.
Luka 1.34: Nde wakkati kuugal Zekariya nder haykaliiru timmi, o hooti saare maako.
Luka 1.35: Nyalɗe seɗɗa ɓaawoɗon, debbo maako Elizabet reedi, o suuɗi baakin lebbi jowi. O wi'i:
Luka 1.36: “Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo waɗani yam: O ittani yam semteende ndimaraaku am caka yimɓe fuu.”
Luka 1.38: Nde Elizabet reedi, waɗi lebbi joweego, Allah neli malaa'ikaajo Jibirilla haa berniwol bi'eteeŋgol Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili.
Luka 1.39: O neli mo haa paanyo debbo, kaɓɓanaaɗo gorko bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, mo danygol Daawuda. Innde paanyo debbo boo Mariyama
Luka 1.41: Malaa'ikaajo wari haa maako, wi'i mo: “Seya, an keɓɗo mo'ere Allah! Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maaɗa!”
Luka 1.42: Bolle ɗe'e cakli Mariyama masin, o numi ko ɗum yiɗi wi'go.
Luka 1.43: Malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Taa hultor, Mariyama, ngam a heɓi mo'ere Allah.
Luka 1.44: A tammi reedugo, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko, a inndan mo Yeesu
Luka 1.46: O laatoto mawɗo, ɓe ewnoto mo
Luka 1.48: Ɓaŋiiɗo. Jawmiraawo Allah hokkan mo laamu kaaka maako Daawuda.
Luka 1.49: O laamanto ummaatoore Isra'iila haa foroy, laamu maako timmataa sam
Luka 1.52: Mariyama wi'i malaa'ikaajo: “Noy ɗum laatorto, nde min mi anndaa gorko sam?”
Luka 1.54: Malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waran dow maaɗa, baawɗe Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo suddete bana ɗowdi. Ngam maajum ɓiɗɗo mo a tammi danyugo, laatoto Ceniiɗo e ɓe ewnoto mo Ɓiɗɗo
Luka 1.57: Elizabet, banndiraawo maaɗa ɗon bee reedu, o danyan ɓiŋngel gorgel, koo nde o naywi, ɓe mbi'no mo o dimaro boo, ammaa jonta o ɗon bee reedu lebbi joweego.
Luka 1.61: Mariyama wi'i: “Min mi korɗo Jawmiraawo, ɗum laatano yam bana mbi'ɗa.” Nden malaa'ikaajo dilli, acci mo.
Luka 1.63: Nder balɗe man Mariyama ummi, dilli bee jaawal haa wuro woɗŋgo, nder kooseeje lesdi Yahudiya.
Luka 1.64: O nasti saare Zekariya, o hoofni Elizabet.
Luka 1.65: Saa'i Elizabet nani koofŋgol Mariyama, ɓiŋngel fuɗɗi dimmbaago nder reedu maako. Nden Elizabet heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
Luka 1.66: wi'i bee sawtu: “A barkiɗinaaɗo caka rewɓe fuu, ɓiŋngel ngel a tammi danyugo boo barkiɗinaaŋgel!
Luka 1.69: Ngam ndaa, saa'i mi nani koofŋgol ma, ɓiŋngel dimmbi nder reedu am ngam seyo.
Luka 1.70: Barka laatani ma ngam a nuɗɗini ko Jawmiraawo wi'i ma, ɗum laatoto.”
Luka 1.75: ɓernde am ɗon heewi seyo ngam Allah am, kisnoowo yam!
Luka 1.77: Ngam o yerdi laarugo korɗo maako leesɗo.
Luka 1.78: Fakat, diga jonta yimɓe gide fuu mbi'an mi barkiɗinaaɗo,
Luka 1.80: ngam Allah Baawɗo waɗani yam kuuje mawɗe!
Luka 1.83: enɗam maako ɗon dow hulɓe mo diga yidere haa yidere.
Luka 1.85: O huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe bee juŋngo maako semmbiɗŋgo,
Luka 1.86: o saŋkiti mawnitiiɓe nder numooji muuɗum'en.
Luka 1.88: O jippini semmbiɗɓe diga leese laamu muuɗum'en,
Luka 1.91: O haarni dolɓe bee kuuje booɗɗe,
Luka 1.92: riskuɓe boo, o riiwi ɓe juuɗe meere.
Luka 1.97: bana o wi'no kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, waato Ibrahiima e danygol muuɗum haa foroy
Luka 1.100: Mariyama jooɗodi bee Elizabet ko dillani lebbi tati, nden o hooti saare maako.
Luka 1.102: Nde saa'i Elizabet danyata yotti, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Luka 1.103: Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako e banndiraaɓe maako nani Jawmiraawo waɗani mo enɗam ɗuuɗɗam, ɓe ceyodi bee maako.
Luka 1.104: Nde nyalaade joweetataɓre waɗi, ɓe ngari ngam juulnugo
Luka 1.105: ɓiŋngel go, ɓe ngiɗno inndugo ngel Zekariya, bana innde baaba maagel
Luka 1.107: Ammaa daada maagel wi'i: “Aa'a, naa non, ngel inndete Yuhanna.”
Luka 1.108: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Walaa koo gooto nder banndiraaɓe ma mari innde nde'e.”
Luka 1.110: Nden ɓe mbaɗani baaba maagel alaama bolle bee juuɗe, ngam haa ɓe ƴama mo innde ndeye o yiɗi inndugo ngel.
Luka 1.111: Zekariya anndini ɓe, ɓe ndokka mo alluha. Nden o winndi: “Innde maagel Yuhanna.” Yimɓe fuu kayɗini.
Luka 1.112: Saa'i man nden hunnduko Zekariya maɓɓiti, ɗemŋgal maako fiisti, o fuɗɗi wolwugo, o maŋgti Allah bee sawtu.
Luka 1.113: Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako fuu kultori masin. Haa lesdi kooseeje Yahudiya fuu ɓe mbolwi haala kuuje ɗe'e.
Luka 1.114: Nanɓe ɗum fuu tokki numugo: “Ɗume ɓiŋngel nge'el tammi laataago?” Ngam fakat, baawɗe Jawmiraawo ɗon ngondi bee maagel.
Luka 1.116: Zekariya, baaba ɓiŋngel go heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, o waɗi annabaaku, o wi'i:
Luka 1.119: ngam o hakkilani ummaatoore maako, o rimɗini nde.
Luka 1.124: Kanjum woni ko o anndinno diga ɓooyma
Luka 1.127: o wi'no o rimɗinan en diga juuɗe konne'en meeɗen,
Luka 1.130: O waŋginani kaakiraaɓe meeɗen enɗam maako,
Luka 1.133: Ngam Allah hunani kaakiraawo meeɗen Ibrahiima,
Luka 1.135: o hisnan en baawɗe konne'en meeɗen,
Luka 1.136: haa en njaggano mo bilaa kulol,
Luka 1.138: ngam haa en laato yimɓe maako seniiɓe e adili'en nder balɗe ngeendam meeɗen fuu.
Luka 1.140: An boo, ɓiŋngel pamarel, ɓe ewnoto ma annabiijo Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo,
Luka 1.141: ngam a aartan Jawmiraawo ngam haa a mo'inana mo laawol
Luka 1.144: A anndinan yimɓe maako o hisnan ɓe,
Luka 1.148: daliila enɗam ɗa'am, o yaynan dow meeɗen bana naaŋge puɗanŋge,
Luka 1.150: ngam yaynango wonɓe nder nyiɓre e les ɗowdi maayde
Luka 1.151: e ɗowugo kosɗe meeɗen dow laawol salaaman
Luka 1.154: Yuhanna mawni, o semmbiɗi boo nder ruuhu. O jooɗi nder ladde haa yotti wakkati o waŋgi haa ummaatoore Isra'iila.

Luka 2.1: Nder saa'i man laamiiɗo Agustus, umri binndol yimɓe nder lesɗe maral maako fuu.
Luka 2.2: Kaŋgol woni binndol aranol, ngol waɗi yaake Kiriniyus ɗonno ngomna lesdi Siriya.
Luka 2.3: Yimɓe njehi ngam winndeego, koo moy fuu haa wuro iwde muuɗum.
Luka 2.5: Yusufu ummi wuro Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili, yehi nder lesdi Yahudiya, haa Baytilaama, wuro laamiiɗo Daawuda danyano, ngam o iwi haa asŋgol Daawuda.
Luka 2.6: O yehi ton ngam winndeego, kaŋko e Mariyama, kaɓɓanaaɗo maako, reeduujo.
Luka 2.7: Yaake ɓe ɗon ton, nyalaade haa Mariyama ɓesna yotti.
Luka 2.8: O danyi ɓiŋngel gorgel, afel maako, o saawi ngel nder limce, o wallini ngel nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji, ngam ɓe keɓaay nokkuure nder saare haa hoɗɓe mbeerata.
Luka 2.10: Woodino waynaaɓe haa ladde nder lesdi maajum, ɓe ɗon ayna tokke dammooji maɓɓe jemma.
Luka 2.11: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani ɓe, tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo yayni dow maɓɓe, ɓe kultori masin.
Luka 2.12: Ammaa malaa'ikaajo wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! Ngam mi waddani on kubaruwol belŋgol, ceynanŋgol masin ngam ummaatoore fuu.
Luka 2.13: Jemmaare hanndeere nde'e, kisnoowo danyanaama on nder wuro Daawuda, kaŋko woni Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo.
Luka 2.14: Ndaa, on keɓtiran mo bee alaama ka'a: On tawan ɓiŋngel caawaaŋgel bee limce, ballinaaŋgel nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji.”
Luka 2.16: Law, mooɓre malaa'ika'en asama kawti bee malaa'ikaajo go, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe mbi'i:
Luka 2.19: salaaman boo dow lesdi haa yimɓe yiɗaaɓe Allah!”
Luka 2.21: Nde malaa'ika'en acci ɓe, lorti haa asama, waynaaɓe mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde muuɗum'en: “Ndillen haa en njotto Baytilaama, en ndaara ko Jawmiraawo anndini en go.”
Luka 2.22: Ɓe njaawi yahugo ton, ɓe tawi Mariyama bee Yusufu e ɓiŋngel keccel, ngel ɗon waali nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji.
Luka 2.23: Nde ɓe ngi'i ngel, ɓe ngecci ko malaa'ikaajo wi'no ɓe dow maagel.
Luka 2.24: Nanɓe ko waynaaɓe mbi'i fuu, kayɗini.
Luka 2.25: Ammaa Mariyama jogi ɗum fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum, o tokki numtugo ɗum.
Luka 2.26: Nden waynaaɓe lori, ɓe ɗon teddina Allah, ɓe ɗon maŋgta mo ngam kuuje ɗe ɓe nani e ɓe ngi'i fuu, ngam ɗum fuu ɗum laati bana malaa'ikaajo anndinno ɓe.
Luka 2.28: Nde nyalɗe joweetati caali, ɓe njuulni
Luka 2.29: ɓiŋngel, ɓe inndi ngel Yeesu. Innde nde malaa'ikaajo wi'no daada maagel diga o siwaa reedugo
Luka 2.33: Mariyama fodde tawreeta Muusa hiɓɓi, saaro'en njahri ɓiŋngel haa Urusaliima, ngam ɓe ngadda ngel yeeso Jawmiraawo nder
Luka 2.36: Ngam tawreeta Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ɓiɗɗo gorko afo fuu, Jawmiraawo jeyi
Luka 2.38: Ɓe ngari boo ngam ɓe lii'o kirseteeɗum bana Jawmiraawo umri: “Pooli masar ɗiɗi malla pooloy ɗiɗoy
Luka 2.41: Woodino goɗɗo feere ton, innde maako Simeyon, o adiliijo e kulɗo Allah, o ɗonno reena kisnoowo Isra'iila garanɗo. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗon wondi bee maako,
Luka 2.42: anndini mo o maayataa, sey to o yi'i
Luka 2.45: Ruuhu yerɓi mo, o yehi nder haykaliiru. Saa'i maajum saaro'en Yeesu ngaddi ɓiŋngel muuɗum'en ngam ɓe mbaɗana ngel ko tawreeta umri.
Luka 2.46: Simeyon hoo'i ngel haa juuɗe muuɗum, o yetti Allah e o wi'i:
Luka 2.48: “Jonta yaa Jawmiraawo, a hebbitini iinawol ngol a waɗi.
Luka 2.49: Accu maccuɗo maaɗa maaya nder salaaman.
Luka 2.51: Ngam mi yi'i kisndam maaɗa bee gite am,
Luka 2.53: kisndam ɗam a taaskitinani ummaatooje fuu.
Luka 2.55: Kanjum woni annoora ka waŋginte haa ummaatooje goɗɗe,
Luka 2.56: kaŋka laatoto boo tedduŋgal ummaatoore maaɗa Isra'iila
Luka 2.59: Baaba e daada Yeesu kayɗini nde ɓe nani Simeyon ɗon wolwa dow maako bana non.
Luka 2.60: Simeyon barkiɗini ɓe e o wi'i Mariyama, daada Yeesu: “Allah suɓi ɓiŋngel nge'el ngam laataago daliila do'uki e ummuki yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder Isra'iila, o laatoto alaama Allah ka yimɓe tammaay jaɓugo.
Luka 2.61: O waŋginan numooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi. An bee hoore maaɗa boo, naaworla tufete ɓernde bana kaafahi!”
Luka 2.63: Woodino annabiijo debbo, innde maako Anna, ɓii Fanuwel, mo lenyol Aser. O naywi masin. O jooɗino duuɓi joweeɗiɗi tan bee goriiko yaake o derkeejono.
Luka 2.64: O jooɗi o jurumɗo haa duuɓi maako mbaɗi cappanɗe joweetati e nayi. O ɗon haa
Luka 2.66: tum, o ɗon jaggano Allah jemma e naaŋge fuu, o ɗon suumo, o ɗon waɗa do'a.
Luka 2.67: O wari wakkati man, o fuɗɗi yettugo Allah. O wolwi dow ɓiŋngel nge'el haa yimɓe reenanɓe ndimu Urusaliima fuu.
Luka 2.69: Nde saaro'en Yeesu timmini waɗugo ko tawreeta Jawmiraawo umri, ɓe kooti bee maako haa lesdi Galiili, haa Nasaratu berniwol maɓɓe
Luka 2.71: Ɓiŋngel tokki mawnugo e semmbiɗiɗgo, ngel heewi faamu. Ngel heɓi yerduye Allah.
Luka 2.73: Hitaande fuu saaro'en Yeesu ɗon njaha Urusaliima ngam waɗugo juulde
Luka 2.76: Nde Yeesu waɗi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njehi ton fodde al'aada.
Luka 2.77: Nde juulde timmi, ɓe kooti, ammaa Yeesu lutti haa Urusaliima, saaro'en maako kattitaaki ɗum.
Luka 2.78: Ɓe tammino o ɗon wondi bee yahdanɓe bee maɓɓe. Ɓe njehi baakin nyalaade woore, nden ɓe puɗɗi ɗaɓɓititgo mo caka banndiraaɓe maɓɓe e soobiraaɓe maɓɓe.
Luka 2.79: Ammaa ɓe keɓtaay mo, ngam maajum ɓe lori haa Urusaliima ngam ɗaɓɓitoygo mo.
Luka 2.80: Nyannde tataɓre maajum, ɓe tawi mo nder
Luka 2.82: O ɗon jooɗi caka moodiɓɓe Yahuudu'en, o ɗon nana ɓe e o ɗon waɗana ɓe ƴamɗe.
Luka 2.83: Nanooɓe mo fuu kayɗini daliila faamu maako e jaawaabuuji ɗi o jaabori.
Luka 2.84: Nde saaro'en maako ngi'i mo, ɓe kayɗini masin. Daada maako wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, ngam ɗume ngaɗɗa min bana nii? Min bee baaba maaɗa fuu, min cakli masin bee ɗaɓɓititgo ma!”
Luka 2.85: O jaabi ɓe, o wi'i: “Ngam ɗume ɗaɓɓititton yam? On anndaa sey mi wona nder suudu Baabiraawo am na?”
Luka 2.86: Ammaa ɓe paamaay ko o wi'i ɓe.
Luka 2.88: Nden Yeesu hooti bee maɓɓe haa Nasaratu, o ɗowtani ɓe. Daada maako tokki jogaago kuuje ɗe'e fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum.
Luka 2.89: Yeesu ɗon mawna, faamu maako yehi yeeso yeeso, o heɓi yerduye Allah e nde yimɓe fuu

Luka 3.1: Nder hitaande sappo e jowaɓre haa laamu Tiberiyus Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma, Pontiyus Pilaatu wonno ngomna dow lesdi Yahudiya, Hirudus laamani lesdi Galiili, deerɗum Filip boo laamani lesdi Itureya e lesdi Tarakonitis, Lisaniya boo laamani lesdi Abilen,
Luka 3.2: Annas e Kayafas ngonno mawɓe liman'en. Saa'i man Allah wolwani Yuhanna ɓii Zekariya nder ladde.
Luka 3.3: O waanci lesdi kommbi maayo Urdun fuu, o waazini yimɓe ɓe tuuba, ɓe njaɓa baptisma ngam yaafuye hakkeeji maɓɓe.
Luka 3.4: Ɗum laati bana annabi Esaaya winnduno nder deftere muuɗum:
Luka 3.17: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa Yuhanna ngam o waɗana ɓe baptisma. O wi'i ɓe: “Ɓiɓɓe poosokje, moy wi'i on on kisan tikkere Allah warannde
Luka 3.19: Kuuwe kuuɗe ɗe mbaŋginta on tuubi! Taa nume nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, on mbi'a: Ibrahiima woni kaaka amin. Ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, Allah woodi baawɗe waɗango Ibrahiima ɓiɓɓe bee kaa'e ɗe'e.
Luka 3.21: Jonta ma fe'irde ɗon taaski ngam fe'ugo lekki diga ɗaɗi mum: Lekki ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe fuu, ki fe'e, ki wudine nder yiite
Luka 3.24: Yimɓe ƴami mo: “Ɗume haani min mbaɗa kadi?”
Luka 3.25: O jaabi ɓe: “Mo mari toggooje ɗiɗi, sey o sennda ɗe bee mo walaa sam. Marɗo nyaamdu boo, sey waɗa bana non.”
Luka 3.26: Jomnooɓe boo ngari haa Yuhanna ngam ɓe njaɓa baptisma, ɓe ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, ɗume haani min mbaɗa
Luka 3.28: O jaabi ɓe: “Taa on njomna yimɓe ɓura ko ɓe umri on jaɓugo haa maɓɓe.”
Luka 3.29: Sooje'en boo ngari, ƴami mo bana non, ɓe mbi'i: “Minin boo, ko haani min mbaɗa?” O jaabi ɓe: “Taa on njaɓta jawdi koo moy malla on kooca ndi dow seedamku fewre. Ammaa ceyore ngeenaari mooɗon tan.”
Luka 3.31: Yimɓe ɗonno ndeena bee tammunde, koo moy ɗonno numa: “Teema Yuhanna oo woni Almasiihu.”
Luka 3.32: Yuhanna wi'i ɓe fuu maɓɓe: “Min mi ɗon waɗana on baptisma bee ndiyam, ammaa goɗɗo ɓurɗo yam baawɗe tammi wargo. Koo fiistugo ɓoggi paɗe maako maa, mi he'aay. O waɗanan on baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e bee yiite.
Luka 3.33: O woodi jaartirɗum haa juŋngo maako, ngam senndirgo alkamaari bee nyaande. O mooɓtan alkamaari haa beembal maako, ammaa o wulan nyaande bee yiite nge nyifataa sam.”
Luka 3.35: Bee wasuyeeji ɗuuɗɗi, Yuhanna heɓi waazingo ummaatoore kubaruwol belŋgol.
Luka 3.36: Yuhanna feli Hirudus ngam o te'i Hirudiya, debbo deerɗiiko e ngam kuuɗe kalluɗe feere feereeje ɗe o huuwi.
Luka 3.37: Nden Hirudus waɗi ko ɓuri hallugo fahin: O nastini Yuhanna fursina
Luka 3.40: Ɓaawo yimɓe fuu njaɓi baptisma, Yeesu boo jaɓi ka. Nde o ɗon waɗa do'a, asama maɓɓiti,
Luka 3.41: Ruuhu Allah jippi dow maako bana poola. Sawtu boo iwi haa asama, wi'i: “An woni
Luka 3.43: am giɗaaɗo, mi ɗon seyoro ma masin
Luka 3.46: Yeesu waɗi baakin duuɓi cappanɗe tati nde o fuɗɗi kuugal maako. Fodde ko yimɓe numi, kaŋko o ɓii Yusufu, Yusufu boo o ɓii Heli.
Luka 3.47: Heli ɓii Mattat, Mattat ɓii Lewi, Lewi ɓii Melki, Melki ɓii Yannay, Yannay ɓii Yusufu,
Luka 3.48: ɓii Mattatiya, ɓii Amos, ɓii Nahum, ɓii Hesli, ɓii Naggay,
Luka 3.49: ɓii Maata, ɓii Mattatiya, ɓii Seme'in, ɓii Yosek, ɓii Yoda,
Luka 3.50: ɓii Yowanan, ɓii Resa, ɓii Zorobaabila, ɓii Salatiyel, ɓii Neri,
Luka 3.51: ɓii Melki, ɓii Addi, ɓii Koosam, ɓii Elmadam, ɓii Eri,
Luka 3.52: ɓii Yosuwa, ɓii Eli'ezer, ɓii Yorim, ɓii Mattat, ɓii Lewi,
Luka 3.53: ɓii Simeyon, ɓii Yahuuda, ɓii Yusufu, ɓii Yonam, ɓii Eliyakim,
Luka 3.54: ɓii Meleya, ɓii Menna, ɓii Mattata, ɓii Natan, ɓii Daawuda,
Luka 3.55: ɓii Yessa, ɓii Obet, ɓii Bo'es, ɓii Salmuuna, ɓii Nahasunu,
Luka 3.56: ɓii Amminadabu, ɓii Admin, ɓii Arni, ɓii Hesruunu, ɓii Peres, ɓii Yahuuda,
Luka 3.57: ɓii Yaakubu, ɓii Isiyaaku, ɓii Ibrahiima, ɓii Tara, ɓii Nahor,
Luka 3.58: ɓii Saruku, ɓii Re'u, ɓii Falek, ɓii Eber, ɓii Sala,
Luka 3.59: ɓii Kaynam, ɓii Arfasada, ɓii Sem, ɓii Nuuhu, ɓii Lamek,
Luka 3.60: ɓii Matusala, ɓii Anuhu, ɓii Yaret, ɓii Maleliyel, ɓii Kaynam,
Luka 3.61: ɓii Enos, ɓii Setu, ɓii Aadamu, ɓii Allah.

Luka 4.1: Yeesu loroyi diga Urdun, o keewɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo e Ruuhu man yahri mo ladde.
Luka 4.2: Iblisa jarribi mo ton nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi. O nyaamaay sam nyalɗe man e nde nyalɗe ɗe'e caali, o maati dolo.
Luka 4.5: Allah kam, umru hayre nde'e, nde laato nyaamdu.”
Luka 4.6: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Deftere wi'i: Neɗɗo yeeɗirtaa nyaamdu tan
Luka 4.9: Iblisa yahri mo haa dow, nder ma'annde non o sappini mo laamuuji duniyaaru fuu,
Luka 4.10: o wi'i mo: “Mi hokkete baawɗe e risku laamuuji ɗi'i fuu, ngam ɗum hokkaama yam, min boo mi hokkan ɗum mo ngiɗmi fuu.
Luka 4.11: Ɗum fuu mi hokkete to a sujidani yam.”
Luka 4.12: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Deftere wi'i: Sujidan Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa tan, kaŋko feere maako a rewata
Luka 4.15: Fahin, Iblisa yahri mo haa Urusaliima, jo'ini mo dow yeereere
Luka 4.19: Allah kam, diw diga ɗo haa lesdi,
Luka 4.20: ngam deftere wi'i: Allah umran malaa'ika'en muuɗum ngam aynugo ma
Luka 4.22: Fahin boo: Ɓe taɓɓoto ma bee juuɗe maɓɓe, ngam taa kosŋgal ma fergo dow hayre
Luka 4.24: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Deftere wi'i: Taa jarriba Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa
Luka 4.26: Nde Iblisa timmini jarribaago Yeesu bee dabare mum fuu, o dilli, o acci mo, sey saa'i feere fahin.
Luka 4.28: Yeesu lori haa lesdi Galiili, o kebbinaaɗo baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Habaru maako saŋkiti nder lesdi man fuu.
Luka 4.29: O ekkitini yimɓe nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, yimɓe fuu teddini mo.
Luka 4.31: Yeesu yehi Nasaratu, wuro ngo o mawnino haa muuɗum.
Luka 4.33: o nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en bana o woowi waɗugo. O ummi ngam o jaŋnga deftere,
Luka 4.34: ɓe ndokki mo deftere annabi Esaaya taggaande, o taggiti nde, o tawi aayaaje binndaaɗe bana ni'i:
Luka 4.37: o mooyti yam ngam haa mi waazina laafuɓe habaru seyo.
Luka 4.38: O neli yam haa mi wooynana haɓɓaaɓe ndimu muuɗum'en,
Luka 4.42: ngam yeeynugo hitaande baŋguki mo'ere Jawmiraawo
Luka 4.45: Nden o taggi deftere go, o hokkiti nde balloowo nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o jooɗi. Yimɓe wonɓe ton fuu tokki laarugo mo.
Luka 4.46: Nden o fuɗɗi wolwango ɓe: “Aayaaje binndaaɗe ɗe'e, ɗe ngooŋɗi haa mooɗon wakkati on nani ɗe njaŋngaama jonta.”
Luka 4.47: Ɓe fuu ɓe ngerdi haala maako, ɓe kayɗini ngam bolle belɗe gurtiiɗe diga hunnduko maako. Ɓe mbi'i: “Naa o ɓii Yusufu na?”
Luka 4.48: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Fakat, on ngeccatam geccawol ngo'ol: Kurgoowo, hurgu hoore maaɗa! On mbi'atam boo: Min nani ko mbaɗɗa haa Kafarnahum fuu, waɗ ɗum nder wuro maaɗa boo!”
Luka 4.49: Fahin o wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, walaa annabiijo koo gooto mo ɓe njaɓɓata nder wuro muuɗum
Luka 4.51: Mi ɗon wi'a on, fakat, rewɓe yurumɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno nder Isra'iila zamanu annabi Eliya, saa'i iyeende toɓaayno baakin duuɓi tati e lebbi joweego, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi nder lesdi fuu
Luka 4.53: Ammaa Allah nelaay Eliya haa jurumɗo koo gooto maɓɓe, sey haa mo wuro Sarepta, nder lesdi Sidon
Luka 4.55: Kuturu'en ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno boo nder lesdi Isra'iila zamanu annabi Elisa. Ammaa koo gooto maɓɓe yamɗitaay, sey Na'aman mo lesdi Siriya tan
Luka 4.58: Yimɓe wonɓe nder suudu dewal man fuu keewi tikkere, nde ɓe nani bolle ɗe'e.
Luka 4.59: Ɓe ummi, ɓe ngerɓi mo haa yaasi wuro maɓɓe, ɓe njahri mo dow towndiire nde berniwol maɓɓe Nasaratu mahano dow maare, ngam ɓe cakkina mo haa les.
Luka 4.60: Ammaa o wurti caka maɓɓe, o tokkitini laawol maako.
Luka 4.62: Yeesu yehi Kafarnahum, berniwol nder lesdi Galiili, o ekkitini yimɓe ton
Luka 4.65: Ɓe kayɗini dow no o ekkitinirta, ngam o ɗon wolwa bee baawɗe
Luka 4.67: Woodino goɗɗo feere nder suudu dewal man, o woodi ruuhuwol coɓŋgol, o fuɗɗi wookugo bee sawtu, o wi'i:
Luka 4.68: “Hey, an Yeesu mo Nasaratu, ko ngiɗɗa bee amin? A wari ngam halkugo min na? Mi anndi ma: A Ceniiɗo, nelaaɗo Allah.”
Luka 4.69: Yeesu ruggi ruuhuwol coɓŋgol go, wi'i: “Jeeɗa, wurta gorko oo.” Ngol do'i gorko go yeeso yimɓe fuu, nden ngol wurti, ngol acci mo, bilaa naawnere sam.
Luka 4.70: Yimɓe fuu kayɗini, ɓe mbolwi hakkunde maɓɓe: “Haala irin kaye ka boo? O ɗon umra ruuhuuji coɓɗi bee baawɗe, ɗi ngurto goɗɗo!”
Luka 4.71: Ɓe mbolwi haala Yeesu haa lesdi maajum fuu.
Luka 4.73: Yeesu wurti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o yehi saare Simon. Esiraawo Simon debbo ɗon waali nyawu yontere naawnde, ɓe tori Yeesu o yamɗitina mo.
Luka 4.74: O turi dow nyawɗo go, o telɓani yontere man, nde acci debbo go, nden o ummi law, o weerni ɓe.
Luka 4.76: Haa mutki naaŋge, ɓen ɓe mari nyawɓe e torraaɓe nyawuji feere feereeji ngaddi ɓe haa Yeesu. O yowi juuɗe maako dow gooto gooto maɓɓe, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Luka 4.77: Ginnaaji ngurti yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ɗi ɗon ngooka bana ni'i: “An woni
Luka 4.80: Ammaa Yeesu ruggi ɗi bee caatal, o haɗi ɗi wolwugo boo, ngam kanji ɗi anndi kaŋko woni
Luka 4.83: Nde weeti, o wurti o dilli haa nokkuure ferewnde. Yimɓe puɗɗi tefugo mo. Nde ɓe tawi mo, ɓe ngiɗi haɗugo mo dillugo ngam taa o acca ɓe.
Luka 4.84: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Haani mi waazina kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu Allah haa gure goɗɗe boo, ngam man Allah neli yam.”
Luka 4.85: O dilli, o waazi nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en nder lesdi Yahudiya.

Luka 5.1: Nyannde feere Yeesu ɗon dari dow fomoonde weendu Genesaret, yimɓe boo ɗon ɓiɗɗotira ngam nanugo wolde Allah.
Luka 5.3: ɗiɗi haa fomoonde, waawooɓe ngurti, ɗon lalla zubaaji muuɗum'en.
Luka 5.4: Yeesu nasti nder gootal koommbooje man, ɗum koommbowal
Luka 5.5: Simon. O tori mo o daayna ngal seɗɗa bee fomoonde. Yeesu jooɗi nder maagal, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe
Luka 5.8: Nde o timmini wolwugo, o wi'i Simon: “Yahru koommbowal haa ndiyam lugguɗam, nden an bee huuwdiɗɗiraaɓe maaɗa, cakkine zubaaji mooɗon, on ngaawo.”
Luka 5.9: Simon jaabi mo: “Jaagorɗo, min torri jemmaare fuu min keɓaay koo ɗume, ammaa dow wolde maaɗa, mi sakkinan zubaaji
Luka 5.12: Ɓe cakkini zubaaji, ɓe naŋngi liɗɗi ɗuuɗɗi, haa zubaaji maɓɓe puɗɗi seekugo
Luka 5.14: Ɓe ewni hawtiɗiraaɓe maɓɓe woɗɓe nder koommbowal feere ngam ɓe ngara, ɓe mballa ɓe. Ɓe ngari, ɓe kebbini koommbooje ɗiɗi fuu bee liɗɗi, haa koommbooje maɓɓe puɗɗi moɗaago nder ndiyam.
Luka 5.15: Nde Simon Piyer yi'i ɗum, o tuggi koppi yeeso Yeesu, o wi'i: “Taa ɓaditam, Jawmiraawo, ngam mi marɗo hakke!”
Luka 5.16: Simon e yimɓe wonduɓe bee maako fuu kayɗini ngam ɗuuɗal liɗɗi ɗi ɓe ngaawi.
Luka 5.17: Non boo Yaakuba e Yuhanna ɓiɓɓe Zebede, hawtiɗiraaɓe Simon kayɗini. Ammaa Yeesu wi'i Simon: “Taa hultor, yeeso ɗo, a laatoto gaawoowo yimɓe!”
Luka 5.18: Ɓe njahri koommbooje maɓɓe haa fomoonde, ɓe acci kuuje fuu, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
Luka 5.20: Nde Yeesu ɗon nder wuro feere, goɗɗo mo saɗawre fiilti ɓanndu mum wari. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o sujidi, o tori mo, o wi'i: “Moodibbo, to a muuyi, a waawan yamɗitingo yam.”
Luka 5.21: Yeesu forti juŋngo, meemi mo, wi'i: “Mi muuyi, a yamɗita.” Law saɗawre acci goɗɗo man.
Luka 5.22: Yeesu umri mo: “Taa a yecca ɗum koo moy, ammaa yah, hollu hoore maaɗa haa limanjo, nden a lii'a dokkal bana Muusa umri, ngam haa ɓe tabitina a laɓɓinaama
Luka 5.24: Koo non fuu haala Yeesu ɓesdi saŋkitaago caka yimɓe yeeso yeeso. Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ngari haa maako ngam nanugo mo e ngam o yamɗitini ɓe diga nyawuji maɓɓe boo.
Luka 5.25: Ammaa Yeesu woowi wurtaago, yaha nokkuure ferewnde ngam waɗugo do'a.
Luka 5.27: Nyannde feere Yeesu ɗonno ekkitina. Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon njooɗi ton. Ɓe ngaroyi diga gure lesdi Galiili, lesdi Yahudiya e berniwol Urusaliima. Baawɗe Jawmiraawo ɗonno bee Yeesu ngam yamɗitingo nyawɓe.
Luka 5.28: Yimɓe ngaddi goɗɗo waata-terɗeejo dow be'itte, ɓe ɗaɓɓi nastingo mo suudu e ɓe mballina mo yeeso Yeesu.
Luka 5.29: Ammaa ɓe anndaa toy ɓe nastinirta mo, ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗi. Nden ɓe mba'i bee maako dow suudu, ɓe mbaɗi wurdere haa kippol maaru, ɓe njippini mo bee be'itte go caka mooɓre haa yeeso Yeesu.
Luka 5.30: Nde Yeesu yi'i nuɗɗinki maɓɓe, o wi'i nyawɗo go: “Soobaajo am, hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama!”
Luka 5.32: Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en puɗɗi numugo: “Ɗum neɗɗo moye oo, bolwanɗo kalluka dow Allah? Moy waawata yaafaago hakkeeji sonaa Allah feere mum?”
