Luka 5.33: Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Koni maroton irin numooji ɗi'i nder mooɗon?
Luka 5.34: Ko ɓuri hoyugo? Wi'go: Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama naa malla wi'go: Umma, yah?
Luka 5.35: Ammaa ngam haa mi faamtina on
Luka 5.37: woodi baawɗe nder duniyaaru yaafaago hakkeeji.” Nden o wi'i waata-terɗeejo go: “Mi ɗon wi'e: Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, hootu saare maaɗa!”
Luka 5.38: Nyawɗo go ummi law yeeso yimɓe fuu, hoosi be'itte ɗe o waalino dow muuɗum'en, hooti saare muuɗum, o ɗon teddina Allah.
Luka 5.39: Yimɓe kayɗini, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe keewi kulol, ɓe mbi'i: “Hannde en ngi'i kuuje kayɗiniiɗe!”
Luka 5.41: Ɓaawo maajum Yeesu wurti, yi'i jomnoowo, innde maako Lewi, o ɗon jooɗi haa baariki maako. Yeesu wi'i mo: “Tokkam!”
Luka 5.42: Lewi ummi, acci kuuje fuu, tokki mo.
Luka 5.44: Nden Lewi waɗi nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi haa saare muuɗum ngam Yeesu. Jomnooɓe e woɗɓe feere ɗuuɗɓe nyaamdi bee maɓɓe.
Luka 5.45: Ɗum fottanaay Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, ngam maajum ɓe ngurŋgurti, ɓe mbi'i pukara'en
Luka 5.46: Yeesu: “Ngam ɗume nyaamdoton bee jomnooɓe e hakke'en
Luka 5.48: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Yamɓe ngalaa haaje kurgoowo, sey nyawɓe.
Luka 5.49: Mi waraay ewnaago adili'en, ammaa hakke'en, ngam ɓe tuuba.”
Luka 5.51: Farisa'en mbi'i Yeesu: “Pukara'en Yuhanna ɗon cuumo ndego, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa do'a, non boo pukara'en amin, ammaa ɓe maaɗa ɗon nyaama, ɗon njara.”
Luka 5.52: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On ɗon tammo on mbaawan doolugo ewnaaɓe haa ɓaŋgal ɓe cuumo nde ɓaŋɗo ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe na? Naa non sam.
Luka 5.53: Ammaa wakkati waran, ɓaŋɗo ittete caka maɓɓe, nden kadi nyalɗe man ɗen ɓe cuumoto.”
Luka 5.54: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol: “Walaa mo seekata leppol haa limce kese ngam o mo'ina limce kiiɗɗe. To o waɗi non, o wonni limce kese e leppol man boo hawtataa bee kiiɗɗe.
Luka 5.55: Walaa mo loowata inaboojam kesam nder kanyakanyaaji
Luka 5.56: kiiɗɗi. To o waɗi non, inaboojam kesam seekan ɗi, ɗam rufan e kanyakanyaaji boo mbonnoto.
Luka 5.57: Ammaa sey ɓe loowa inaboojam kesam nder kanyakanyaaji kesi.
Luka 5.58: Walaa mo marata haaje inaboojam kesam to o aartiri kiiɗɗam, ngam maajum ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Inaboojam kiiɗɗam ɓuri wooɗugo.”

Luka 6.3: woɗnde, Yeesu ɗonno saalo nder ngesa alkamaari bee pukara'en muuɗum. Pukara'en itti cammeeje alkamaari, ɓe pofli ɗe bee juuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ƴakki
Luka 6.5: Farisa'en woɗɓe mbi'i ɓe: “Ngam ɗume on ɗon ngaɗa ko tawreeta duŋaaki nyannde siwtorde?”
Luka 6.6: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On njaŋngaay ko Daawuda bee yimɓe muuɗum mbaɗno nyannde feere, nde dolo naawi ɓe na?
Luka 6.7: O nasti suudu Allah, o hoosi tamseeje jo'inaaɗe yeeso Allah, o nyaami, o hokki yimɓe maako boo, ɓe nyaami, koo nde tawreeta meeɗen duŋanaaki woɗɓe feere nyaamugo, sey liman'en tan
Luka 6.15: woɗnde boo, Yeesu nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo. Goɗɗo mo juŋngo mum nyaamo waati ɗon ton.
Luka 6.16: Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en ɗonno ayna ngam haa ɓe ngi'a to Yeesu yamɗitinan goɗɗo nyannde siwtorde, ngam haa ɓe keɓa hujja wullaago mo.
Luka 6.17: Ammaa Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe. O wi'i waata-juŋngoojo go: “Umma, dara caka yimɓe haa ɗo.” Goɗɗo oo ummi, dari.
Luka 6.18: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mi ɗon ƴama on: Ɗume tawreeta meeɗen duŋi waɗugo nder nyalaade siwtorde? Mbooɗeeŋga naa malla halleende? Hisnugo yoŋki neɗɗo naa malla halkugo ki?”
Luka 6.19: O laari ɓe fuu, nden o wi'i goɗɗo go: “Fortu juŋngo ma!” O forti ngo, ngo yamɗiti.
Luka 6.20: Moodiɓɓe Tawreeta e Farisa'en keewi tikkere masin, ɓe ndawridi dow ko ɓe mbaɗata Yeesu.
Luka 6.22: Nyannde man Yeesu wa'i dow hooseere ngam haa o waɗa do'a, o tori Allah jemmaare man fuu.
Luka 6.23: Nde weeti, o ewni pukara'en maako, o suɓi sappo e ɗiɗo caka maɓɓe, o ewni ɓe Nelaaɓe:
Luka 6.24: Simon mo o inndi ɗum boo Piyer e deerɗum Andire, Yaakuba e Yuhanna, Filip e Bartolome,
Luka 6.25: Matta e Tomas, Yaakuba ɓii Halfa, Simon mo goɗɗo yeɓre zelot'en,
Luka 6.26: Yahuuda ɓii Yaakuba e Yahuuda Iskariyot, zammbotooɗo Yeesu.
Luka 6.28: Yeesu jippidi hooseere go bee maɓɓe, o dari haa babal peeciiŋgal, pukara'en maako ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ton, non boo yimɓe ɓe lesdi Yahudiya fuu e yimɓe Urusaliima e yimɓe fomoonde mbeela kommbi Tirus e Sidon.
Luka 6.29: Ɓe ngari ngam nanugo mo e ngam o yamɗitina ɓe diga nyawuji maɓɓe. Torraaɓe ruuhuuji coɓɗi boo ngari, ɓe njamɗiti.
Luka 6.30: Yimɓe fuu ɗonno tefa meemugo mo, ngam baawɗe ɗon ngurto haa maako, njamɗitina ɓe fuu.
Luka 6.32: Nden Yeesu laari pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i:
Luka 6.36: Barka laatano on, onon dolɓe jonta,
Luka 6.38: Barka laatano on, onon woyanɓe jonta,
Luka 6.41: Barka laatanto on, to yimɓe nganyi on, ngurtini on caka maɓɓe, kuɗi on, mbolwi kalluka dow mooɗon daliila
Luka 6.44: Mbelmbelte nyannde maajum, ndiwe ngam seyo, ngam mbarjaari mawndi ɗon reena on haa asama. Ngam bana non kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe mbaɗno annabi'en naane
Luka 6.47: Ammaa bone laatano on, onon riskuɓe,
Luka 6.48: ngam on keɓi hayru mooɗon timmi.
Luka 6.50: Bone laatano on, onon haarɓe jonta,
Luka 6.52: Bone laatano on, onon jalanɓe jonta,
Luka 6.53: ngam on ngonan nder suno e bojji.
Luka 6.55: Bone laatano on, to yimɓe fuu mbi'ani on booɗɗum,
Luka 6.56: ngam bana non kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe mbi'ani fewooɓe wi'ɓe ɓe annabi'en.”
Luka 6.58: “Mi ɗon wi'a on, onon nananɓe yam: Ngiɗe konne'en mooɗon, mboonane wanyanɓe on.
Luka 6.59: Mbarkiɗine naalanɓe on. Ndo'ane torranɓe on.
Luka 6.60: To goɗɗo maari ma haa galaŋgal nga'al, waylitan mo ngala boo. To goɗɗo hoosi ma ngapaleewol, taa haɗ mo hoosugo toggoore maaɗa.
Luka 6.61: Hokku toriiɗo ma koo ɗume fuu. To goɗɗo hoosi ko marɗa, taa ƴamtu ɗum.
Luka 6.62: Mbaɗane yimɓe ko ngiɗɗon ɓe mbaɗana on
Luka 6.65: To on ngiɗi yiɗɓe on tan, yettoore ndeye ndeenoton? Koo hakke'en boo ngiɗi yiɗɓe ɗum'en.
Luka 6.66: To on ɗon mbaɗa mbooɗeeŋga haa waɗananɓe on mbooɗeeŋga, yettoore ndeye ndeenoton? Koo hakke'en boo ɗon mbaɗa bana non.
Luka 6.67: To on ɗon ndokka nyamaande haa ɓe on tammoto njoɓan on tan, yettoore ndeye ndeenoton? Koo hakke'en ɗon ndokka hakke'en nyamaande ngam ɓe njoɓa ɓe bana no ɗum foti.
Luka 6.68: Ammaa ngiɗe konne'en mooɗon, mbaɗane ɓe mbooɗeeŋga e ndokke ɓe nyamaande bilaa tammaago koo ɗume. Mbarjaari mooɗon laatoto mawndi, on laatoto boo ɓiɓɓe Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo. Ngam o booɗɗo heedi yettarɓe e halluɓe.
Luka 6.69: Laate enɗooɓe bana Baabiraawo mooɗon o enɗuɗo.”
Luka 6.71: “Taa laate hiitooɓe woɗɓe, Allah boo hiitataako on. Taa ndo'e woɗɓe kiita, Allah boo do'ataa on kiita. Njaafe woɗɓe, Allah boo yaafoto on.
Luka 6.72: Ndokke woɗɓe, Allah boo hokkan on, o rufan nder jiiba mooɗon makka etaaɗum booɗɗum, tiɗɗiiɗum, keewɗum haa rufa. Ngam Allah etanan on bee etirgel ngel on etirani woɗɓe bee muuɗum.”
Luka 6.74: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol fahin: “Bumɗo waawan ɗowugo bumɗo na? Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe ndo'ataako nder ngaska na
Luka 6.76: Jaŋngoowo ɓurataa jaŋnginoowo muuɗum maŋngu, ammaa jaŋnginaaɗo booɗɗum fuu laatoto bana jaŋnginoowo muuɗum
Luka 6.79: Koni a ɗon yi'a kuɗel haa yiitere deerɗa, ammaa a hakkilantaa leggal gonŋgal nder yiitere ma?
Luka 6.80: Noy mbi'rata deerɗa: Accu mi ittane kuɗel haa yiitere ma, an maa, leggal ɗon nder yiitere maaɗa! An naafikiijo, aartu ittugo leggal gonŋgal nder yiitere maaɗa, nden kam a yi'an laaɓɗum, haa a itta kuɗel nder yiitere deerɗa.”
Luka 6.82: “Walaa lekki booɗki rimata ɓiɓɓe kalluɗe, walaa lekki kalluki boo rimata ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe.
Luka 6.83: Lekki fuu ɗon annditire diga ɓiɓɓe muuɗum. Ɓe teɓataa ibbe haa lekki gi'e. Ɓe teɓataa inabooje haa jaajiihi
Luka 6.85: Neɗɗo booɗɗo ɗon wurtina mbooɗeeŋga diga siga ɓernde mum mbooɗka. Neɗɗo kalluɗo boo ɗon wurtina halleende diga siga ɓernde mum kalluka. Ngam ko ɓernde neɗɗo heewri kanjum hunnduko wolwata.”
Luka 6.87: “Ngam ɗume ewnotooɗon yam Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo, ammaa on mbaɗataa ko mbi'anmi on?
Luka 6.88: Koo moy garanɗo haa am, nananɗo bolle am, ɗowtantooɗo ɗe, mi hollanan on bee moy o nanndiri.
Luka 6.89: O nanndi bee neɗɗo mahanɗo suudu, mo wasi ngaska, luggini ka haa jokki tapaare, o saɓɓi caɓɓawal dow maare. Ilam wari, ndiyam maaje lukki ndu, ammaa ndu dimmbaaki sam, ngam ndu mahaandu booɗɗum.
Luka 6.90: Ammaa nananɗo bolle am, ɗowtantaako ɗe, o nanndi bee goɗɗo mahɗo suudu dow mbulwuldi bilaa saɓɓugo caɓɓawal. Nde ilam lukki ndu, law ndu fuu maaru ndu yibbi yibbere naawnde.”

Luka 7.1: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwango mooɓre bolle ɗe'e, o dilli Kafarnahum.
Luka 7.2: Woodi ton Romaajo, mawɗo dow sooje'en teemerre, mo suka mum giɗaaɗo nyawi, ɓadake maayugo.
Luka 7.3: Nde mawɗo sooje'en oo nani habaru Yeesu, o neli ndotti'en Yahuudu'en haa maako ngam toraago mo o wara o yamɗitina suka maako.
Luka 7.4: Ɓe ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe tori mo ɗuuɗɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo, haani a walla mo,
Luka 7.5: ngam o yiɗi ummaatoore meeɗen, kaŋko mahani min suudu dewal.”
Luka 7.6: Nden Yeesu dillidi bee maɓɓe. Nde o daayotiraay fahin bee saare, mawɗo sooje'en go neli soobiraaɓe mum, ɓe mbi'a mo: “Moodibbo, taa ɓillu hoore ma, ngam mi he'aay a nasta saare am.
Luka 7.7: Ngam maajum mi laari mi he'aay yahugo haa maaɗa bee hoore am. Ammaa wolwu wolde woore tan, suka am yamɗitan.
Luka 7.8: Min boo, mi woodi mawɓe dow am, mi woodi sooje'en boo les baawɗe am. To mi wi'i oo: Yah, o yahan. To mi wi'i oya boo: War, o waran. To mi wi'i suka am: Waɗ nii, o waɗan.”
Luka 7.9: Nde Yeesu nani bolle ɗe'e, o hayɗini daliila mawɗo sooje go, o yeesiti e o wi'i tokkiiɓe mo: “Mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo nder Isra'iila, mi meeɗaay tawugo nuɗɗinki makki bana ki'i.”
Luka 7.10: Nde nelaaɓe lori haa saare mawɗo sooje'en, ɓe tawi suka go yamɗiti.
Luka 7.12: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu yehi haa wuro wi'eteeŋgo Nayin. Pukara'en maako bee yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe njahdi bee maako.
Luka 7.13: Nde o ɓadi nastorde wuro, ndaa yimɓe ɗon ndoondi maayɗo haa ɓe uwoya. Ɗum ɓiŋngel bajjel haa daada e daada boo jurumɗo. Yimɓe wuro ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ngondi bee debbo man.
Luka 7.14: Nde Yeesu yi'i mo, o yurmini mo, o wi'i: “Taa woy.”
Luka 7.15: Nden o yehi, o meemi kes maayɗo man. Roondiiɓe ndari. Yeesu wi'i: “Sukaajo, mi wi'i ma: Umma!”
Luka 7.16: Maayɗo ummi, jooɗi, fuɗɗi wolwugo. Yeesu hokkiti mo daada maako.
Luka 7.17: Yimɓe fuu kultori, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Annabiijo mawɗo waŋgi caka meeɗen! Allah wari wallugo yimɓe muuɗum!”
Luka 7.18: Habaru Yeesu saŋkiti haa lesdi Yahudiya e lesɗe taariiɗe fuu.
Luka 7.20: Pukara'en Yuhanna ngecci mo kuuje ɗe'e fuu. O ewni ɗiɗo nder maɓɓe,
Luka 7.21: o neli ɓe haa Jawmiraawo, ɓe ƴama mo: “An woni Almasiihu mo tammi wargo malla min ndeena goɗɗo feere?”
Luka 7.22: Nde ɓe ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma neli min haa ma, haa min ƴame: An woni Almasiihu mo tammi wargo malla min ndeena goɗɗo feere?”
Luka 7.23: Nder wakkati man nden boo Yeesu yamɗitini ɗuuɗɓe marɓe nyawuji feere feere e marɓe ruuhuuji coɓɗi e o wumtini wumɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Luka 7.24: Nden o jaabi nelaaɓe Yuhanna go: “Njehe, mbi'e Yuhanna ko on ngi'i e ko on nani: Wumɓe ɗon ngi'a, woosɓe ɗon njaha, kuturu'en njamɗiti, muukaaɓe ɗon nana, maayɓe ɗon ummito, kubaruwol ceynoowol boo anndinaama haa laafuɓe
Luka 7.26: Barka laatanto koo moy mo accaay nuɗɗingo yam sam.”
Luka 7.28: Nde nelaaɓe Yuhanna ndilli, Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango yimɓe dow Yuhanna, o wi'i: “Ɗume njahɗon laaroygo haa ladde? Ƴommbal ngal henndu dimmbata na?
Luka 7.29: Kadi ɗume njahɗon laaroygo? Goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce booɗɗe na? Ɓorniiɓe limce booɗɗe, jeynitiiɓe, haa laamorɗe ngoni.
Luka 7.30: Ɗume njahɗon laaroygo kadi? Annabiijo na? Ooho, mi ɗon wi'a on: Fakat, o ɓuri annabiijo.
Luka 7.31: Ngam Yuhanna woni mo deftere wi'i dow muuɗum:
Luka 7.32: Allah wi'i: Mi nelan nelaaɗo am yeeso ma,
Luka 7.33: haa o mo'ina laawol yeeso maaɗa
Luka 7.36: Yeesu wi'i fahin: “Mi ɗon wi'a on: Caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama fuu walaa ɓurɗo Yuhanna maŋngu. Ammaa mo ɓuri leesugo haa laamu Allah, ɓuran mo.”
Luka 7.38: Ummaatoore e jomnooɓe nanɓe mo fuu annditi adilaaku Allah, ɓe njaɓi baptisma Yuhanna.
Luka 7.39: Ammaa Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ngudini muuyo Allah ngam maɓɓe, ɓe cali jaɓugo baptisma diga Yuhanna
Luka 7.42: Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Bee moy nanndinanmi yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u? Bee ɓeye ɓe nanndinte?
Luka 7.43: Ɓe nanndi bee ɓikkoy njooɗiikoy haa luumo, ɓe ɗon ewnotira, ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Min puufani on algaytaaru, on ngamaay. Min ngimani on gimol bojji, on mboyaay.
Luka 7.44: Ngam Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma wari, o ɗon suumo, o yarataa nguykinoojam boo, ammaa on mbi'i o ginnaaɗo.
Luka 7.46: wari, o ɗon nyaama, o ɗon yara, on mbi'i o ɗuuɗa-nyaamɗeejo e guykoowo, o soobaajo jomnooɓe e hakke'en.
Luka 7.47: Ammaa hikma Allah gooŋɗinaama haa yimɓe ɓe njaɓi ka fuu.”
Luka 7.49: Farisaajo feere ewni Yeesu ngam o nyaamda bee maako. Yeesu yehi haa saare Farisaajo man, o jooɗi haa o nyaama.
Luka 7.50: Woodi debbo hakkeejo haa wuro man. Nde o nani Yeesu ɗon nyaama haa saare Farisaajo go, o waddi faandu saɗndu heewndu uurdi.
Luka 7.51: O dari ɓaawo Yeesu heedi kosɗe muuɗum. O ɗon woya, haa o soofni kosɗe Yeesu bee gonɗi maako, nden o woosti ɗum bee gaasa hoore maako, o hebbi ɗe, o rufani ɗe uurdi
Luka 7.53: Nde Farisaajo ewniiɗo Yeesu go yi'i ɗum, o numi nder ɓernde maako: “To gorko oo o annabiijono, o anndanno debbo meemɗo mo oo, o hakkeejo.”
Luka 7.54: Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwugo, o wi'i Simon: “Woodi ko mi yiɗi wi'go ma.” Simon jaabi: “Wolwu, moodibbo.”
Luka 7.55: Yeesu wi'i: “Woodi goɗɗo mo tokki yimɓe ɗiɗo nyamaande. O tokki arano suleyje cardi teemeɗɗe jowi e gooto boo cappanɗe jowi.
Luka 7.56: Ɓe mbaawaay yoɓugo mo. Ngam maajum o yaafani ɓe, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu. Moy ɓurata yiɗugo mo caka ɗiɗo ɓe'e?”
Luka 7.57: Simon jaabi: “Mi tammi mo o yaafani ɓurɗum ɗuuɗugo.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Gooŋga mbi'ɗa.”
Luka 7.58: Nden Yeesu wayliti gal debbo, o wi'i Simon: “A ɗon laara debbo oo na? Mi wari saare ma, a hokkaay yam ndiyam ngam lootugo kosɗe am, ammaa kaŋko o soofni ɗe bee gonɗi maako, o woosti ɗe bee gaasa hoore maako.
Luka 7.59: A hebbaaki yam, ammaa kaŋko, diga mi wari saare ma, o accaay hebbaago kosɗe am.
Luka 7.60: A rufaay nebbam dow hoore am, ammaa kaŋko, o rufi uurdi haa kosɗe am.
Luka 7.61: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'e: Yiide maako mawnde waŋgini hakkeeji maako ɗuuɗɗi njaafaama. Ammaa mo ɓe njaafani pamarum, yiide nde o waŋginta famɗan.”
Luka 7.62: Nden Yeesu wi'i debbo: “Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama.”
Luka 7.63: Nyaamdanɓe bee maako puɗɗi numugo: “Moy oo, mo waawi yaafugo hakkeeji?”
Luka 7.64: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i debbo: “Nuɗɗinki ma hisni ma, yah jam.”

Luka 8.1: Ɓaawo maajum Yeesu yiiloyi berniiji e gure fuu, o waazini habaru laamu Allah. Pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo ɗon bee maako non boo rewɓe woɗɓe yamɗitinaaɓe e ruuhuuji kalluɗi e nyawuji fuu ɗon ngondi bee maako. Kamɓe ngoni: Mariyama bi'eteeɗo Mariyama mo wuro Magdala mo ginnaaji joweeɗiɗi ngurtuno haa muuɗum
Luka 8.2: e Yowanna, debbo Cuja, kaliifaajo dow saare laamiiɗo Hirudus e Suzan e rewɓe woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe, wallooɓe worɓe go bee jawdi muuɗum'en
Luka 8.5: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe diga gure feere feere ngari, mooɓti haa Yeesu. Nden o wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol:
Luka 8.6: “Demoowo yehi ngesa ngam saakoygo. Nde o ɗon saaka, aawdi ngoɗndi soli sera laawol. Yimɓe njaaɓi ndi, colli boo cuɓti ndi fuu.
Luka 8.7: Aawdi ngoɗndi boo soli haa pellel kaa'e. Ndi fuɗi, aawre man yoori law, ngam peewol ŋakkani nde.
Luka 8.8: Fahin aawdi ngoɗndi soli caka gi'e, ɗum fuu ɗum fuɗi, ammaa gi'e ɓiɗɗi aawre man.
Luka 8.9: Ammaa ngoɗndi boo soli haa lesdi mboondi. Aawre fuɗi, mawni, waɗi cammeeje: Gawel fuu rimi teemerre teemerre.” Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo, o wi'i bee sawtu: “Marɗo noppi ngam nanugo fuu, nana!”
Luka 8.11: Pukara'en Yeesu ƴami mo ko balndol ngo'ol yiɗi wi'go.
Luka 8.12: O jaabi: “Haa mooɗon ɗum hokkaama anndugo sirriiji laamu Allah, ammaa haa yimɓe feere sey bee balndi.
Luka 8.13: Ngam haa ɓe ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa,
Luka 8.17: “Ndaa ko balndol ngo'ol yiɗi wi'go: Aawdi ɗum wolde Allah.
Luka 8.18: Woɗɓe feere nanndi bee sera laawol haa aawdi soli. Ɗum nananɓe, nden Iblisa wara wifta bolle man nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ngam taa ɓe nuɗɗina, ɓe kisa.
Luka 8.19: Woɗɓe boo nanndi bee pellel kaa'e, ɗum nananɓe wolde, ɓe njaɓa nde bee seyo. Ammaa nde walaa ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nuɗɗina ngam wakkati seɗɗa. To jarribeeki wari, ɓe njoofa.
Luka 8.20: Aawdi colndi caka gi'e boo, nanndi bee nananɓe wolde. Ammaa ɓe acca laruuraaji, yiɗugo risku e belɗum duniyaaru ɓiɗɗa wolde go, nde waɗataa nafuuda.
Luka 8.21: Aawdi colndi nder lesdi mboondi, ɗum nananɓe wolde, ɓe njogo nde bee ɓerɗe laaɓɗe, booɗɗe, ɓe mbaɗa nafuuda daliila tiinaare maɓɓe.”
Luka 8.23: Walaa jamnanɗo pittirla ngam jo'ingo nga les bokoti malla les leeso. Ammaa o jo'inan nga dow jo'inirɗum pittirla, ngam haa nga yaynana nastanɓe fuu
Luka 8.25: Ngam walaa cuuɗiiɗum ɗum waŋgintaake, walaa sirriijum boo ɗum anndataake nder laaɓɗum
Luka 8.28: “Kakkilane no nanroton. Ngam marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo, ammaa mo maraay koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum ɗum o tammi marugo
Luka 8.31: Daada Yeesu e deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum ngari, tawi mo, ammaa ɓe keɓaay yottaago mo ngam ɗuuɗal yimɓe.
Luka 8.32: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Daada maaɗa e deerɗiraaɓe maaɗa ɗon yaasi, ɓe ngiɗi laarugo ma.”
Luka 8.33: Ammaa o jaabi: “Daada am e deerɗiraaɓe am ngoni nananɓe wolde Allah, ɗowtano nde.”
Luka 8.35: Nyannde feere Yeesu nasti koommbowal bee pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “En eero gaɗa weendu.” Ɓe ndilli.
Luka 8.36: Nde ɓe ɗon eero bee koommbowal
Luka 8.37: , Yeesu ɗaani. Law henndu ummi dow ndiyam, koommbowal ɗonno heewa ndiyam, ɓe ɗon yeeso joote.
Luka 8.39: Pukara'en ɓaditi mo, ɓe pindini mo bee wi'go: “Jaagorɗo, jaagorɗo, en ɗon kalka!” Yeesu fini, o telɓani henndu e ƴuuge ndiyam, ɗum de'iti. De'ere mawnde waɗi.
Luka 8.41: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en: “Toy nuɗɗinki mooɗon kadi?” Ammaa ɓe kultori, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum moyjo, umranɗo koo henndu e ƴuuge ndiyam, ɗum ɗowtano mo?”
Luka 8.43: Ɓe njotti haa lesdi Geraseni'en gaɗa weendu Galiili.
Luka 8.44: Nde Yeesu wurti koommbowal, goɗɗo wuro man wari, fotti bee maako. Goɗɗo oo mari ruuhuuji coɓɗi ɗuuɗɗi nder maako. Duuri o ɓornataako limce, o jooɗataako haa saare, sey haa genaale.
Luka 8.45: Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o wooki, o do'i kommbi Yeesu, o wolwi bee sawtu: “Ɗume ngiɗɗa haa am, Yeesu,
Luka 8.47: Ɓaŋiiɗo? Mi tori ma, taa torram!”
Luka 8.48: Ngam Yeesu ɗonno umra ruuhuwol coɓŋgol wurto haa maako. Ngol ɗonno naŋnga mo nde ɗuuɗɗum, ɓe ɗonno kaɓɓa kosɗe e juuɗe maako bee callalluuji e ge'elle ngam aynugo mo, ammaa o ɗonno ta'a ɗum. Ngol ɗonno yahra mo nder ladde.
Luka 8.49: Yeesu ƴami mo: “Noy innde ma?” O jaabi: “Innde am Mooɓre”, ngam ruuhuuji ɗuuɗɗi nasti haa maako.
Luka 8.50: Ɗi tori Yeesu taa o riiwa ɗi, taa o yahra ɗi haa
Luka 8.53: Woodi tokkere gaduuji haa ton, ɗon dura dow towndiire. Ruuhuuji go tori Yeesu, o acca ɗi nasta gaduuji man. O duŋani ɗi.
Luka 8.54: Nden ruuhuuji coɓɗi ngurti haa gorko go, ɗi nasti gaduuji. Gaduuji man fuu caamni, do'i diga dow fomoonde townde nder weendu, kalki ton.
Luka 8.56: Nde durooɓe gaduuji ngi'i ko waɗi, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe anndini haala man nder wuro e haa kawyeeji.
Luka 8.57: Yimɓe ngurti haa ɓe ndaara ko waɗi. Ɓe ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe tawi gorko mo ruuhuuji coɓɗi ngurtuno e mum go, ɗon jooɗi kommbi maako, o ɗon ɓorni, o ɗon bee hakkiilo. Ɓe kultori.
Luka 8.58: Yi'ɓe ko waɗi ngecci ɓe no ginnaaɗo yamɗitiri.
Luka 8.59: Geraseni'en nder lesdi man fuu tori Yeesu o wurto lesdi maɓɓe, ngam ɓe kultori masin. Yeesu nasti koommbowal, o dilli.
Luka 8.60: Goɗɗo mo ruuhuuji coɓɗi ngurti haa mum go, tori Yeesu yerdo o wonda bee maako. Yeesu lorni mo, wi'i mo:
Luka 8.61: “Hootu saare ma, yeccu ko Allah waɗani ma fuu!” O dilli, o yecci yimɓe wuro fuu ko Yeesu waɗani mo.
Luka 8.63: Nde Yeesu wartoyi, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe njaɓɓi mo, ngam ɓe fuu ɓe ɗonno ndeena mo.
Luka 8.64: Nden goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Jayrus, ardiiɗo suudu dewal Yahuudu'en wari haa Yeesu, do'i yeeso maako, tori mo o yaha saare muuɗum,
Luka 8.65: ngam o woodi ɓiŋngel deyel, bajjel, mo duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓadake maayugo.
Luka 8.66: Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha ton, yimɓe ɓiɗɗi mo.
Luka 8.67: Woodi boo debbo feere ton. Duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi o nyawɗo nyawu ilol ƴiiƴam. O majjini jawdi maako fuu haa hurgooɓe, ammaa walaa mo waawi yamɗitingo mo.
Luka 8.68: O ɓaditi Yeesu haa ɓaawo, o meemi gawargal limce maako. Law nii ilol ƴiiƴam maako go dari.
Luka 8.69: Yeesu ƴami: “Moy meemi yam?” Koo moy fuu wi'i: “Naa min.” Piyer wi'i: “Jaagorɗo, ɗum taariiɓe ma ɓiɗɗata ma.”
Luka 8.70: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i: “Woodi mo meemi yam, ngam mi maati baawɗe ngurti haa am.”
Luka 8.71: Nde debbo yi'i o waawataa suuɗaago, o wari, o ɗon diwna, o do'i yeeso maako, o limti caka yimɓe fuu daliila ka o meemri Yeesu e boo no o yamɗitiri wakkati man.
Luka 8.72: Nden Yeesu wi'i: “Ɓiŋngel am, nuɗɗinki maaɗa yamɗitini ma, yah jam!”
Luka 8.74: Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, goɗɗo mo saare Jayrus wari, wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel ma maayi, taa ɓillu jaagorɗo.”
Luka 8.75: Ammaa nde Yeesu nani ɗum, o wi'i Jayrus: “Taa hul, nuɗɗin tan, o yeeɗitan.”
Luka 8.76: Nde o yotti haa saare, o duŋanaaki koo moy nastida bee maako, sey Piyer, Yuhanna e Yaakuba e baaba bee daada ɓiŋngel.
Luka 8.77: Yimɓe fuu ɗonno mboya, ɗonno ngooyna ngam ɓiŋngel go. Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa mboye, ngel maayaay, ammaa ngel ɗon ɗaani non.”
Luka 8.78: Ɓe njanci mo ngam ɓe anndi ɓiŋngel maayi.
Luka 8.79: Ammaa Yeesu naŋngi juŋngo maagel, o wi'i bee sawtu: “Ɓiŋngel, fin!”
Luka 8.80: Yoŋki maagel wartani ngel, ngel ummi law nder wakkati man nden e Yeesu umri ɓe ndokka ngel ko ngel nyaama.
Luka 8.81: Saaro'en ɓiŋngel kayɗini, ammaa Yeesu wi'i, taa ɓe mbi'a koo moy ko laati.

Luka 9.1: Yeesu mooɓti pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo, o hokki ɓe semmbe e baawɗe riiwugo ruuhuuji coɓɗi e yamɗitingo nyawuji.
Luka 9.2: O neli ɓe waazingo laamu Allah e hurgugo nyawɓe.
Luka 9.3: O wi'i ɓe: “Taa koo'e koo ɗume ngam jahaaŋgal, koo sawru malla booro, koo nyaamdu malla ceede. Koo moy, taa jogo limce ɗiɗi boo.
Luka 9.4: Saare nde ɓe mbeerni on fuu, njooɗe ton haa to on ndilli.
Luka 9.5: To yimɓe cali jaɓɓaago on haa wuro, ngurte wuro man, piɗɗe collaaje kosɗe mooɗon, ɗum laato seedamku dow maɓɓe
Luka 9.7: Ɓe ndilli, ɓe njehi gure feere feere, ɓe ngaazini kubaruwol ceynoowol e ɓe njamɗitini nyawɓe koo toy.
Luka 9.9: Hirudus, ardiiɗo lesdi nde nani ko laati fuu, o sakli masin. Ngam woɗɓe mbi'i: “Yuhanna ummitake diga caka maayɓe.”
Luka 9.10: Woɗɓe boo mbi'i: “Eliya waŋgi.” Fahin woɗɓe mbi'i: “Gooto haa annabi'en ɓooyma ummitake
Luka 9.12: Ammaa Hirudus wi'i: “Mi ta'i hoore Yuhanna. Goɗɗo moy nananmi ɓe mbi'anta kuuje bana ɗe'e?” O annini yi'ugo mo.
Luka 9.14: Nelaaɓe ngarti, ɓe ngecci Yeesu ko ɓe mbaɗi fuu. O hoosi ɓe feere maɓɓe, ɓe ummi, ɓe ndilli wuro wi'eteeŋgo Baytisayda.
Luka 9.15: Ammaa nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓe tokki mo. Yeesu jaɓɓi ɓe, o wolwani ɓe habaru laamu Allah, o yamɗitini marɓe haaje yamɗitineego boo.
Luka 9.17: Nde naaŋge ɓadake mutugo, pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo go ɓaditi mo, mbi'i mo: “Wi' yimɓe ɓe ndilla haa gure e kawyeeji, ngam ɓe keɓa ko nyaame e weerde, ngam haa ladde ngonɗen.”
Luka 9.18: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ndokke ɓe ko ɓe nyaama, onon bee ko'e mooɗon.” Ammaa ɓe njaabi: “Min ngoodi sey tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi tan. Sonaa to a yiɗi min njaha, min coodana yimɓe ɓe'e fuu nyaamdu kam.”
Luka 9.19: Limgal yimɓe man dillani ujine njowo. Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Njo'ine ɓe cappanɗe njowo cappanɗe njowo.”
Luka 9.20: Ɓe mbaɗi bana non, ɓe njo'ini ɓe fuu.
Luka 9.21: Yeesu hoo'i tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi go, o tijji dow, o yetti Allah ngam man, o yewi ɗum, nden o hokki pukara'en ngam ɓe cenndana yimɓe.
Luka 9.22: Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari, ɓe mooɓti luttuɗum tamseeje, ɗum hebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Luka 9.24: Nyannde feere Yeesu ɗon waɗa do'a feere muuɗum. Pukara'en ɗon ngondi bee maako. O ƴami ɓe: “Mooɓe ɗon mbi'a min mi moy?”
Luka 9.25: Ɓe njaabi: “Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a an woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma, woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a: Eliya, fahin woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a a gooto annabi'en ɓooyma mo ummiti diga maayde
Luka 9.27: O ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo, on ɗon mbi'a mi moy?” Piyer jaabi: “An woni
Luka 9.32: Yeesu umri ɓe bee caatal ngam taa ɓe mbi'a ɗum koo moy.
Luka 9.35: yara bone ɗuuɗɗum, ndotti'en e mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ngudina mo. Ɓe mbaran mo, ammaa nyalaade tataɓre ɓaawoɗon, o ummititto.”
Luka 9.36: O wi'i yimɓe fuu fahin: “To goɗɗo yiɗi tokkaago yam, sey o acca muuyo maako, o roondo gaafaaŋgal maako nyalaade fuu e o tokko yam
Luka 9.38: Ngam koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki mum ngam am, hisnan ki
Luka 9.40: Ɗume ɗum nafata goɗɗo to o heɓi duniyaaru fuu ammaa o majjini yoŋki maako malla o halki hoore maako?
Luka 9.41: To goɗɗo semti yam e bolle am, Ɓii-neɗɗo semtan mo yaake o warata nder tedduŋgal maako e nder ngal Baabiraawo maako e nder ngal malaa'ika'en seniiɓe.
Luka 9.42: Gooŋga mbi'an mi on, woɗɓe caka wonɓe ɗo jonta maayataa sey to ɓe ngi'i laamu Allah.”
Luka 9.44: Balɗe joweetati ɓaawo o wolwi bolle ɗe'e, Yeesu hoosi Piyer e Yuhanna e Yaakuba, o wa'i hooseere ngam waɗugo do'a.
Luka 9.45: Nde o ɗon do'o, yeeso maako sannji, limce maako ndanwi tal, ɗelki.
Luka 9.46: Ɗon nii, worɓe ɗiɗo ɗon ngeewtida bee maako: Ɗum Muusa e Eliya.
Luka 9.47: Ɓe mbaŋgi nder tedduŋgal, ɓe mbolwi dow dilluki e dow no maayde maako laatorto haa Urusaliima.
Luka 9.48: Piyer e wonduɓe bee maako ɗoyɗi teddani ɓe, ammaa ɓe pini, ɓe ngi'i tedduŋgal Yeesu e worɓe ɗiɗo wonduɓe bee muuɗum.
Luka 9.49: Nde yimɓe ɗiɗo go ɗon ceeda bee Yeesu, Piyer wi'i mo: “Jaagorɗo, ɗum booɗɗum en njooɗo haa ɗo! Ngaɗen bukkaaji tati, wooru ngam maaɗa, wooru ngam Muusa e wooru boo ngam Eliya!” O anndaano ko o wi'ata.
Luka 9.50: Nde o ɗon wolwa ɗum, ruuldere wari, suddi ɓe. Pukara'en kultori nde ɓe ngi'i ɓe nasti ruuldere.
Luka 9.51: Sawtu wurti ruuldere go, wi'i: “Oo woni
Luka 9.55: Nde sawtu go wolwi, ɓe ngi'aay goɗɗo feere, sey Yeesu tan. Pukara'en njeeɗi, ɓe mbolwanaay koo moy saa'i man ko ɓe ngi'i.
Luka 9.57: Nde ɓe njippi hooseere jaŋngo man, mooɓre ɗuuɗnde wari, fotti bee Yeesu.
Luka 9.58: Goɗɗo hooli nder mooɓre go, wi'i: “Moodibbo, mi tori ma, laar ɓiŋngel am gorgel, ngel bajjel!
Luka 9.59: Wakkati feere ruuhuwol ɗon naŋnga ngel, law ngel wooka, ngol ɗon dimmba ngel bee semmbe, waɗa ngel nguufo haa hunnduko, ngol ɗon torra ngel. Ɗon saɗa seɗɗa haa ngol acca ɓiŋngel nge'el, sey to ngol tampini ngel masin.
Luka 9.60: Mi tori pukara'en ma ɓe ndiiwa ngol, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.”
Luka 9.61: Yeesu jaabi: “Hey yimɓe sooya nuɗɗinki'en, wonniiɓe! Haa ndey tokkotoomi wondugo bee mooɗon e munyango on? Waddu ɓiŋngel ma haa ɗo!”
Luka 9.62: Nde ngel ɗon wara, ruuhuwol do'i ngel, dimmbi ngel bee semmbe. Ammaa Yeesu telɓani ruuhuwol coɓŋgol ngo'ol, yamɗitini ɓiŋngel go, hokkiti ngel baaba maagel.
Luka 9.63: Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini ngam daliila maŋngu Allah.
Luka 9.64: Nde koo moy hayɗini dow ko Yeesu waɗi fuu, o wi'i pukara'en maako:
Luka 9.65: “Keɗite booɗɗum ko mbi'anmi on jonta: Ɓe ndokkan
Luka 9.68: Ammaa pukara'en paamaay maana maaka, ka laati cuuɗiika haa maɓɓe ngam taa ɓe paama. Ɓe kuli boo ƴamugo mo dow maajum.
Luka 9.70: Nden pukara'en puɗɗi ƴamƴamtirgo moy laatoto mawɗo caka maɓɓe
Luka 9.72: Ammaa nde Yeesu anndi dow ɗume ɓe ɗon ƴamƴamtindira, o hoo'i ɓiŋngel pamarel, o darni ngel kommbi maako,
Luka 9.73: o wi'i ɓe: “Koo moy jaɓi ɓiŋngel pamarel ngel ngam innde am, min o jaɓi. Koo moy jaɓi yam boo, jaɓi nelɗo yam. Ngam ɓurduɗo famɗugo caka mooɗon fuu, kaŋko woni mawɗo
Luka 9.76: Yuhanna wi'i: “Jaagorɗo, min ngi'i goɗɗo ɗon riiwra ginnaaji bee innde ma. Min ngiɗno haɗugo mo, ngam o tokkaaki ma bee amin.”
Luka 9.77: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Taa kaɗe mo, ngam koo moy mo honnaaki on, ɗon bee mooɗon.”
Luka 9.79: Nde wakkati dilluki maako haa asama ɓadake, o waɗi anniya timmuka yahugo Urusaliima.
Luka 9.80: O neli nelaaɓe yeeso maako. Ɓe ndilli, ɓe nasti wuro Samariya'en ngam taaskanango mo weerde.
Luka 9.81: Ammaa wonɓe nder wuro ngo njaɓɓaaki mo, ngam o ɗon tiiti yahugo Urusaliima.
Luka 9.82: Nde Yaakuba e Yuhanna ngi'i ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, a yiɗi min ewno yiite jippo diga asama, wulda ɓe na
Luka 9.87: Nde ɓe ɗon dow laawol, goɗɗo wi'i mo: “Mi tokkete koo toy njahata fuu.”
Luka 9.88: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Doldolɗe ngoodi gasɗe, colli boo ngoodi caɓɓe, ammaa
Luka 9.91: O wi'i goɗɗo feere: “Tokkam!” Goɗɗo man wi'i mo: “Duŋanam mi yaha, mi uwoya baaba am tawon.”
Luka 9.92: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Accu maayɓe uwa maayɓe muuɗum'en, ammaa an, yah waazin laamu Allah.”
Luka 9.93: Goɗɗo feere boo wi'i mo: “Mi tokkete, yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa duŋanam mi jaɓɓito yimɓe saare am tawon
Luka 9.95: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Koo moy wallini juŋngo dow baaneewo ga'i, nden laari ɓaawo, walaa nafuuda ngam laamu Allah.”

Luka 10.1: Ɓaawo maajum Jawmiraawo suɓi pukara'en woɗɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo, o neli ɓe ɗiɗo ɗiɗo yeeso maako, nder berniiji e gure haa o yahata fuu.
Luka 10.2: O wi'i ɓe: “Ƴaamle ɗuuɗi, ammaa sodooɓe ɗuuɗaay. Tore jawmu ƴaamnde o ɓesda nelugo sodooɓe haa ƴaamnde maako
Luka 10.4: Njehe, mi neli on bana baali caka caafaali
Luka 10.6: Taa njahde bee booro ceede malla booro njooɓaari, koo paɗe. Taa ndare ngam koofnotiron bee goɗɗo dow laawol boo.
Luka 10.7: Saare ndeyeere nastoton fuu, mbi'e tawon: Salaaman laatano saare nde'e.
Luka 10.8: To goɗɗo giɗɗo salaaman ɗon haa saare man, salaaman mooɗon jooɗoto dow maako. To woodaa boo, salaaman man lortoto haa mooɗon.
Luka 10.9: Njooɗe haa saare maajum, nyaame, njare ko ɓe ndokkata on fuu. Ngam kuuwoowo he'i heɓugo ngeenaari muuɗum. Taa cotte saare nde'e haa ndeya
Luka 10.11: To on nasti wuro koo ngoye, to ɓe njaɓɓake on, nyaame ko ɓe ngaddanta on.
Luka 10.12: Njamɗitine nyawɓe ɓe on tawi ton fuu, mbi'e ɓe: Laamu Allah ɓaditake on!
Luka 10.13: Ammaa to on nasti wuro koo ngoye, ɓe njaɓɓaaki on, ngurte haa laabi maago, mbi'e:
Luka 10.14: Min piɗɗani on koo collaaje wuro mooɗon haa kosɗe amin, ammaa annde laamu Allah ɓaditake
Luka 10.16: Mi ɗon wi'a on, nyannde darŋgal, kiita Sodoma hoyan dow kiita wuro man
Luka 10.19: “Bone laatano ma, an Korajin. Bone laatano ma, an Baytisayda. Ngam kaayeefiiji baɗaaɗi nder mooɗon, to ɗi mbaɗaano nder Tirus e Sidon kam, ɓooyma yimɓe ton njooɗotono nder ndoondi, ɓe ɓornotono buhuuje e ɓe ndufanno ndoondi dow ko'e maɓɓe
Luka 10.21: Ngam maajum nyalaade darŋgal, kiita Tirus e Sidon hoyan dow kiita mooɗon.
Luka 10.22: An Kafarnahum, a ɗon tammo Allah ɓaŋgtete haa yotto asama na? Kayya! A leestinteeɗo haa a nasta joonde maayɓe
Luka 10.25: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Nananɗo on, nanani yam, caliiɗo on, salake yam, caliiɗo yam boo, salake nelɗo yam
Luka 10.28: Nelaaɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo go ngarti bee seyo, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, koo ginnaaji ɗowtanake min ngam innde ma!”
Luka 10.29: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mi yi'i Sayɗaanu do'i diga dow bana ma'ere.
Luka 10.30: Ndaa, mi hokki on baawɗe dammugo boɗɗe e jahe e jaalaago baawɗe konneejo fuu. Koo ɗume naawnataa on
Luka 10.32: Ammaa taa ceye ngam ruuhuuji ɗowtanake on, ceye ngam inɗe mooɗon binndaaɗe haa asamanji.”
Luka 10.34: Wakkati man Ruuhu hebbini Yeesu seyo, o wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, Jawmu asama e lesdi, mi yetti ma ngam a waŋginani ɓikkoy pamaroy ko a suuɗi marɓe anndal e faamu. Ooho, yaa Baabiraawo, bana nii ɗum fottani ma.
Luka 10.36: Baabiraawo am halfini yam kuuje fuu. Walaa annduɗo moy woni
Luka 10.38: sonaa Baabiraawo, walaa annduɗo boo moy woni Baabiraawo, sonaa Ɓiɗɗo e mo Ɓiɗɗo yiɗi waŋginango mo ɗum
Luka 10.41: Nden o wayliti haa pukara'en, o wolwani ɓe feere maɓɓe: “Barka laatano gite gi'anɗe ko ngi'oton!
Luka 10.42: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Annabi'en ɗuuɗɓe e laamiiɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngiɗno yi'ugo ko ngi'oton, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay. Ɓe ngiɗno nanugo ko nanoton, ammaa ɓe nanaay.”
Luka 10.44: Moodibbo tawreeta ummi, ngam jarribaago Yeesu, o ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, ɗume mbaɗanmi ngam heɓugo ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Luka 10.45: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ko winnda nder tawreeta men? Ko jaŋngata ton?”
Luka 10.46: O jaabi: “Ƴiɗ Jawmiraawo, Allah maaɗa bee ɓernde ma fuu, bee yoŋki ma fuu, bee semmbe ma fuu, bee hakkiilo ma fuu, non boo yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo ma bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Luka 10.48: Yeesu wi'i mo: “A jaabake booɗɗum, waɗ bana non, a heɓan ngeendam
Luka 10.51: Ammaa o yiɗi gooŋɗingo hoore maako, o wi'i Yeesu: “E moy woni keeddiɗɗiraawo am?”
Luka 10.52: Yeesu wi'i: “Goɗɗo ummi Urusaliima ɗon yaha Yeriko. Fasooɓe pasi mo, ɓe njaɓti ko o mari fuu e ɓe piyi mo, ɓe ndilli, ɓe acci mo daande maayde.
Luka 10.53: Fottotiri boo limanjo feere tokki laawol man, yi'i goɗɗo go. O widdi sera, o saali.
Luka 10.54: Bana non Lewiijo wari haa nokkuure man, yi'i goɗɗo go. Kaŋko boo o widdi sera, o saali.
Luka 10.55: Ammaa woodi Samariyaajo ɗonno yaha jahaaŋgal, o yotti kommbi pasaaɗo go. Nde o yi'i goɗɗo go, o yurmini mo.
Luka 10.56: O ɓaditi, o rufi nebbam e inaboojam dow kuuduuje maako, o haɓɓi ɗe, o wa'ini mo mba'aawa maako, o yahri mo suudu, haa hoɗɓe mbeerata, o suklani mo.
Luka 10.57: Jaŋngo man, o hoosi suleyje cardi ɗiɗi, o hokki jawmu suudu hoɗɓe, o wi'i: Suklan mo, to mi yaalti, mi lornante ɓurɗum ko a majjini.”
Luka 10.58: Nden Yeesu wi'i: “Haa maaɗa kam, nder tato ɓe'e, moy a tammi o keeddiɗɗiraawo pasaaɗo?”
Luka 10.59: Moodibbo tawreeta jaabi: “Mo waɗani mo enɗam.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Yah an boo, waɗ bana non.”
Luka 10.61: Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha haa laawol bee pukara'en muuɗum, o nasti wuro feere, debbo bi'eteeɗo Marta jaɓɓi mo haa saare muuɗum.
Luka 10.62: O woodi deerɗiraawo debbo, bi'eteeɗo Mariyama, mo jooɗi kommbi Jawmiraawo, ɗon nana wolde maako
Luka 10.64: Marta ɗon sukli jamum bee kuuɗe feere feere haa saare. O wari, o wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, walaa ko yaalu ma nde deerɗiraawo am acci yam, mi ɗon sukli feere am bee kuuɗe na? Wi' mo o wallammi!”
Luka 10.65: Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Marta, Marta, a ɗon ɓillori hoore ma bee kuuje ɗuuɗɗe.
Luka 10.66: Huunde woore tan wonete haandunde. Mariyama suɓi geɗal booɗŋgal, ngal hoosataake haa maako.”

Luka 11.1: Nyannde feere Yeesu ɗonno waɗa do'a haa nokkuure woɗnde. Nde o timmini, gooto haa pukara'en maako wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, ekkitin min waɗugo do'a bana Yuhanna ekkitini pukara'en muuɗum.”
Luka 11.2: O wi'i ɓe: “To on ɗon mbaɗa do'a, mbi'e:
Luka 11.4: waɗ koo moy teddina innde ma.
Luka 11.7: Hokku min nyaamdu deydey haaje amin nyalaade fuu.
Luka 11.10: ngam minin boo min ɗon njaafano waɗɓe min aybe
Luka 11.12: Aynu min ngam taa min nasta jarribeeki.”
Luka 11.14: O wi'i ɓe fahin: “To gooto mooɗon woodi soobaajo, o yehi haa muuɗum caka jemma ngam wi'go mo: Soobaajo, wu'am tamseeje tati.
Luka 11.15: Ngam gooto nder sooba'en am wari haa am, mi walaa ko mi hokka mo.
Luka 11.16: Ammaa soobaajo mo nder suudu go boo jaabake mo: Taa daamam, jonta dammugal ɗon maɓɓi, min bee ɓikkoy am fuu min ɗon mbaali, mi waawataa ummaago ngam mi hokke tamseeje.
Luka 11.17: Mi ɗon wi'a on, koo to o ummataako ngam hokkugo mo ɗum ngam o soobaajo maako, ammaa ngam o ɗon daama mo, o ummoto, o hokka mo ko o mari haaje fuu.
Luka 11.18: Min kam mi ɗon wi'a on: Tore, on keɓan. Ɗaɓɓite, on tawan. Cilmine, ɓe maɓɓitanan on.
Luka 11.19: Ngam koo moy tori, heɓan. Koo moy ɗaɓɓiti, tawan. Koo moy silmini boo, ɓe maɓɓitanan mo.
Luka 11.20: Moy haa mooɗon to o baaba, o hokkan ɓiŋngel maako mboodi to ngel torake mo liiŋgu?
Luka 11.21: Malla to ngel torake mo yeeraande, o hokkan ngel yaare na?
Luka 11.22: Onon halluɓe maa, on anndi hokkugo ɓiɓɓe mooɗon kuuje booɗɗe. Sakkomaa Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama, o hokkataa toranɓe mo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo na?”
Luka 11.24: Yeesu wurtini ginnawol muukɗinŋgol goɗɗo. Nde ginnawol man wurti, goɗɗo go wolwi, haa yimɓe fuu kayɗini.
Luka 11.25: Ammaa woɗɓe feere mbi'i: “Bee baawɗe Be'elzebul
Luka 11.28: Woɗɓe boo ngiɗi jarribaago mo, ngam maajum ɓe ƴami mo o waŋginana ɓe alaama iwka diga asama
Luka 11.30: Ammaa nde Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “To laamu senndake, ngu do'oto e ci'e boo ngibboto bee tokkindirki
Luka 11.32: To Sayɗaanu honi hoore mum, noy laamu mum tabitirta? On ɗon mbi'a mi ɗon riiwra ruuhuuji coɓɗi bee baawɗe Be'elzebul
Luka 11.34: To min mi ɗon riiwa ginnaaji bee baawɗe Be'elzebul, bee baawɗe ɗeye ɓikkoy mooɗon boo ndiiwrata ɗi? Ngam maajum ɓikkoy mooɗon kiitoto on.
Luka 11.35: Ammaa to bee baawɗe Allah ndiiwranmi ginnaaji boo, nden kam ɗum laamu Allah yottanake on.
Luka 11.37: To goɗɗo cemmbiɗɗo taaskiiɗo bee balmi ɗon ayna saare muuɗum, ko o mari fuu jooɗoto jam.
Luka 11.38: Ammaa to ɓurɗo mo semmbe wari dow maako, jaali mo, o jaɓta balmi maako ɗi o hoolɗinori, o senndana woɗɓe jawdi maako.
Luka 11.40: Mo wondaay bee am, o konneejo am. Mo wallaay yam mooɓtugo, saŋkitan
Luka 11.43: “To ruuhuwol coɓŋgol wurtake goɗɗo, ngol yiiloyan haa karɗe ngam ɗaɓɓugo nokkuure siwtaago, to ngol heɓaay, nden kam ngol wi'an: Mi loroto haa suudu am ndu mi wurtino.
Luka 11.44: To ngol lori haa maaru, ngol tawan ndu wuuwaandu, mo'itinaandu.
Luka 11.45: Nden ngol yaha, ngol wadda ruuhuuji goɗɗi joweeɗiɗi, ɓuranɗi ngol hallugo, ɗi nastan suudu man, ɗi njooɗoto nder maaru. Timmoode goɗɗo oo tullitan dow naane.”
Luka 11.47: Nde Yeesu wolwi bana nii, debbo feere ɓaŋgti sawtu nder mooɓre, wi'i: “Barka laatani reedu danyndu ma e enɗi ɗi musinɗa!”
Luka 11.48: Ammaa kaŋko o wi'i: “Barka laatanto nananɓe wolde Allah, ɗowtantooɓe nde!”
Luka 11.50: Nde yimɓe ɗon mooɓto kommbi Yeesu, o fuɗɗi wi'ugo: “Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, ɓe halluɓe, ɓe ɗon ƴama alaama. Ammaa ɓe keɓataa, sonaa alaama annabi Yonas
Luka 11.52: Ngam bana Yonas laatino alaama haa yimɓe Niniwe, non
Luka 11.57: , ummanto yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, o wulloto ɓe nyalaade darŋgal, ngam o wari diga daayiiɗum haa o nana bolle Suleymaanu keewɗe hikma. Ndaa ɓurɗum Suleymaanu haa ɗo
Luka 11.59: Nyalaade darŋgal, yimɓe Niniwe ummanto yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, hiitoto ɓe, ngam yimɓe Niniwe tuubi nde ɓe nani waazu Yonas. Ndaa, ɓurɗum Yonas haa ɗo
Luka 11.62: “Walaa mo jamnata pittirla, ngam nyukkingo nga malla o hippa nga bee bokoti, ammaa o jo'inan nga dow jo'inirɗum pittirla, ngam haa nastanɓe fuu ngi'a annoora
Luka 11.64: Gite ma laati pittirla ɓanndu maaɗa. To gite ma njame, ɓanndu ma fuu ɗon nder annoora. Ammaa to gite ma njamɗaay, ɓanndu ma fuu ɗon nder nyiɓre.
Luka 11.65: Hakkil, ngam taa annoora ngonka nder maaɗa laato nyiɓre!
Luka 11.66: To ɓanndu ma fuu ɗon nder annoora, to walaa goɗɗum lutti nder nyiɓre, ndu fuu ndu wonan nder annoora, bana to pittirla ɗon yaynane bee annoora muuɗum.”
Luka 11.68: Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo, Farisaajo goɗɗo ewni mo haa saare muuɗum ngam ɓe nyaamda. O nasti, o fuɗɗi nyaamugo.
Luka 11.69: Farisaajo hayɗini nde o yi'i Yeesu fuɗɗi nyaamugo bilaa lootugo juuɗe muuɗum.
Luka 11.70: Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Onon Farisa'en, on ɗon laɓɓina yaasi jardugel e nyaamrugel, ammaa nder mooɗon ɗon heewi bee suunooji e halleende.
Luka 11.71: Sooya-hakkiilo'en, Allah mo waɗi yaasi, o waɗaay nder boo na?
Luka 11.72: Caahe talaka'en ko woni nder jardugel mooɗon e nyaamrugel mooɗon, nden kuuje fuu laatoto laaɓɗe ngam mooɗon.
Luka 11.74: Ammaa bone laatano on, onon Farisa'en! Ngam on ɗon itta zakka
Luka 11.75: haako minti e haako jarne e haakooji nyaameteeɗi fuu e on ɗon ngeeba adilaaku e yiide Allah. Kanji ɗi kaandi jogeego, ammaa taa on ngejjita luttuɗi boo
Luka 11.78: Bone laatano on, onon Farisa'en! Ngam on ngiɗi joole tedduɗe nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, on ngiɗi ɓe koofna on haa daldal mooɓtorɗe.
Luka 11.79: Bone laatano on! Ngam on nanndi bee genaale ɗe yimɓe njahata dow mum'en bilaa anndugo ɗum.”
Luka 11.81: Nden gooto haa moodiɓɓe tawreeta wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, ko mbi'ata ɗo, minin kuɗata.”
Luka 11.83: Yeesu jaabi: “Bone laatano on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta boo! On ɗon ndoonda yimɓe doŋgle caɗɗe roondeego ɗe onon on meemataa koo bee hoondu mooɗon sam.
Luka 11.84: Bone laatano on! Ngam on ɗon maha genaale annabi'en ɓe kaakiraaɓe mooɗon mbari.
Luka 11.85: To non kam on ɗon ceedo kuuɗe kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, on ɗon ngerdo ɗe, ngam kamɓe ɓe mbari annabi'en. Onon boo, on mahi genaale maɓɓe.
Luka 11.86: Ngam maajum hikma Allah wi'i: Mi nelan annabi'en e nelaaɓe, ɓe mbaran woɗɓe, ɓe toonyan woɗɓe boo.
Luka 11.87: Mi ƴamtan ƴiiƴam annabi'en ndufaaɗam diga puɗɗuki duniyaaru haa yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u,
Luka 11.88: diga ƴiiƴam Habila haa yotto ƴiiƴam Zekariya, mbaraaɗo hakkunde nokkuure seniinde e hirsirde. Nonnon, mi ɗon wi'a on, yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u ɓe hiiteteeɓe ngam mbar-hooreeji ɗi'i fuu
Luka 11.91: Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta, ngam on kaɗi yimɓe anndugo gooŋga: Onon, on cali anndugo ka bee ko'e mooɗon, on kaɗi yiɗɓe anndugo ka boo.”
Luka 11.93: Saa'i o wurti ton, moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en tikkani mo masin, tokki mo bee haala, ƴami mo ngam haa o wolwa dow kuuje ɗuuɗɗe.
Luka 11.94: Ɓe tuufni mo nder bolle ngam haa ɓe nana kalluka diga hunnduko maako, ɓe ngulloro mo.

Luka 12.1: Wakkati man yimɓe ujineeje mooɓotiri haa ɓe ɗon njaaɓnjaaɓtira. Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango pukara'en muuɗum: “Kakkilane ufnirɗum Farisa'en, waato naafikaaku
Luka 12.3: Cuuɗiiɗum fuu waŋgan, sirriijum fuu faamoto
Luka 12.5: Ngam ko mbolwuɗon nder nyiɓre fuu, ɗum naneteeɗum nder annoora. Ko on cofndotiri nder cuuɗi, ɗum ngooyneteeɗum nder baŋguɗum.”
Luka 12.7: “Mi ɗon wi'a on ɗum, onon soobiraaɓe am: Taa kule waawanɓe mbarugo ɓanndu, ammaa ɓe mbaawataa waɗugo koo ɗume ko ɓuri non.
Luka 12.8: Mi hollan on mo kuloton: Kule mo waawi mbarugo, mo woodi baawɗe sakkingo nder yiite jahannamaaye boo. Nonnon, mi ɗon wi'a on, kaŋko haani huleego.
Luka 12.10: Ɓe coorrataa colloy njowoy bee suleyje ɗiɗi na? Ammaa Allah yejjitittaa koo gootel maakoy.
Luka 12.11: Koo gaasaaji ko'e mooɗon limaaɗi fuu. Taa kule sam, saman mooɗon ɓuri colloy ɗuuɗkoy.”
Luka 12.13: “Mi ɗon wi'a on, koo moy seedi yeeso yimɓe o anndi yam,
Luka 12.15: boo seedoto o anndi mo yeeso malaa'ika'en Allah.
Luka 12.16: Ammaa mo yeddi yam yeeso yimɓe, o geddeteeɗo boo yeeso malaa'ika'en Allah.
Luka 12.20: heɓan yaafuye. Ammaa mo wolwi kalluka dow Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, o yaafataake sam
Luka 12.23: To ɓe njahri on hiiteego nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en malla yeeso laamiiɓe e marɓe baawɗe, taa ɓillore numugo no mbaŋginirton hujja mon malla ko mbi'oton.
Luka 12.24: Ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ekkitinan on ko mbi'oton nder saa'iire man
Luka 12.27: Goɗɗo nder mooɓre wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, wi' deerɗiraawo am senndana min ndonŋgu ngu baaba amin acci.”
Luka 12.28: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Hey an! Moy waɗi yam kiitoowo dow mooɗon malla cenndoowo jawdi mon?”
Luka 12.29: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Ndeente e suunooji koo ɗiye, ngam ngeendam neɗɗo iwataa haa jawdi mum, koo no o riskiri fuu.”
Luka 12.30: O wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol: “Woodi goɗɗo diskuɗo, o woodi gese, ɗe mbaɗani mo ƴaamnde ɗuuɗnde.
Luka 12.31: O numi nder ɓernde maako: Ko mbaɗanmi? Ngam mi walaa babal haa mooɓtanmi ƴaamnde am.
Luka 12.32: O wi'i: Yowwa, ndaa ko mbaɗanmi: Mi fusan beembe am, mi maha ɓurɗe mawnugo, mi mooɓta alkamaari e jawdi am fuu haa ton.
Luka 12.33: Nden mi wi'ana yoŋki am: A woodi jawdi ɗuuɗndi sigaandi, he'anndi ngam duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi! Siwta, nyaam, yar, seya!
Luka 12.34: Ammaa Allah wi'i mo: Sooya-hakkiiloojo, jemmaare nde'e mi hoosan yoŋki ma, kuuje maaɗa mooɓtaaɗe ɗe'e fuu, moy marata ɗe?
Luka 12.35: Bana nii ɗum laatanto mo mooɓtani hoore mum jawdi, mo laataaki diskuɗo yeeso Allah.”
Luka 12.37: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Taa caklane nguure mooɗon, waato ko on nyaamata malla ko on ɓornoto.
Luka 12.38: Ngam yoŋki ɓuri nyaamdu saman, ɓanndu boo ɓuri limce saman?
Luka 12.39: Ndaare leekuuje: Ɗe aawataa, ɗe codataa, ɗe mooɓtataa koo ɗume nder cigorɗum malla beembal, ammaa Allah ɗon nyaamna ɗe. On ɓurataa colli saman piw na?
Luka 12.40: Moy caka mooɗon waawi ɓesdugo balɗe muuɗum koo seɗɗa bee saklere muuɗum?
Luka 12.41: Nde on mbaawataa waɗugo koo peetum, ngam ɗume cuklantooɗon luttuɗum?
Luka 12.42: Ndaare pinndi ladde no ndi mawnirta. Ndi huuwataa, ndi sannyataa, ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo Suleymaanu bee daraja muuɗum fuu meeɗaay ɓornaago limce booɗɗe bana ngoori man
Luka 12.44: Allah ɓorni huɗooji ɗi tawe hannde nder ladde, jaŋngo boo ɗi cakkine nder yiite. To non kam, o ɓornataa on ko ɓuri non na, onon famɗa-nuɗɗinki'en?
Luka 12.45: Taa ɓillore ko nyaamoton malla ko njaroton. Taa cakle ko'e mooɗon.
Luka 12.46: Heefeerɓe duniyaaru cuklanto kuuje ɗe'e nde weeti fuu. Ammaa Baabiraawo mooɗon anndi on ngoodi haaje kuuje ɗe'e.
Luka 12.47: Aarte suklanaago laamu maako, nden o hokkan on kuuje ɗe'e fuu bana ɓesdaari.”
Luka 12.49: “Taa kultore, onon tokkere famarde, ngam Baabiraawo yiɗi hokkugo on laamu muuɗum.
Luka 12.50: Coorre ko marɗon, caahe ɗum talaka'en, mbaɗane ko'e mooɗon boorooji sigaago ceede ɗi mbonnataako e jawdi ndi re'ataa haa asama: Haa ton gujjo ɓadataako, gilɗi boo mbonnataa ɗum.
Luka 12.51: Ngam haa jawdi mooɗon woni, ton ɓerɗe mooɗon boo ngonata.”
Luka 12.53: “Taaskitine ko'e mon, pittirlaaji mooɗon boo jamnaaɗi
Luka 12.55: Laate bana yimɓe reenanɓe jaagorɗo muuɗum'en gartanɗo diga ɓaŋgal, ngam ɓe maɓɓitana mo to o yottake, o tappi dammugal
Luka 12.57: Barka laatano suka'en ɓe jaagorɗo mum'en yaake wartata, tawa ɗon ayna. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, o taadoto, o jo'inan ɓe haa taabal nyaamdu, o ɓaditan ɓe, o huuwanan ɓe.
Luka 12.58: Barka laatano suka'en ɓe'e, koo to o warti caka jemma malla saali seɗɗa, o tawi ɓe ɓe ɗon ayna.
Luka 12.59: Paame booɗɗum: To jawmu saare anndino saa'iire ndeye gujjo warata, o accataano gujjo nasta mo saare.
Luka 12.62: waran nder saa'iire nde on tammaaki sam
Luka 12.65: Piyer wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, minin tan mbolwanɗa balndol ngo'ol na malla yimɓe fuu?”
Luka 12.66: Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Moy woni kaliifaajo koolaaɗo, kakkilɗo, mo jaagorɗo mum tammi darnugo dow huuwooɓe mum, ngam o hokka ɓe geɗal nyaamdu maɓɓe nder wakkati man?
Luka 12.67: Barka laatanto kuuwoowo oo, to jaagorɗo maako warti, tawti mo o ɗon suklani kuugal nga'al.
Luka 12.68: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Jaagorɗo darnan mo dow jawdi muuɗum fuu.
Luka 12.69: Ammaa to kuuwoowo man wi'i nder ɓernde muuɗum: Jaagorɗo am neeɓi wartugo, nden o fuɗɗi fiyugo huuwooɓe woɗɓe, worɓe e rewɓe, o ɗon nyaama, ɗon yara e wuyka,
Luka 12.70: jaagorɗo wartoyan nyalaade nde suka oo tammataako e nder saa'iire nde o anndaa. O riiwan mo, o hokkan mo ngeenaari naafiki'en.
Luka 12.72: Kuuwoowo annduɗo ko jaagorɗo mum yiɗi, ammaa taaskitinaay koo ɗume ko jaagorɗo maako yiɗi, o heɓan piyɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
Luka 12.73: Ammaa mo anndaa ko jaagorɗo mum yiɗi, waɗi ko he'i fiyeego, o heɓan piyɗe seɗɗa non. Mo ɓe ndokki ɗuuɗɗum, ɓe ƴaman mo ɗuuɗɗum boo. Mo ɓe kalfini ɗuuɗɗum, ɓe ƴaman mo ko ɓuri ɗuuɗugo.”
Luka 12.75: “Mi wari ngam sakkingo yiite dow lesdi. Mi yiɗino nge huɓɓe jonta!
Luka 12.76: Woodi baptisma ka njaɓanmi, mi ɓilli haa ɗum hebbitine
Luka 12.78: On tammi mi wari ngam waddugo salaaman dow lesdi na? Mi ɗon wi'a on, naa salaaman, ammaa cennduki.
Luka 12.79: Ngam yeeso ɗo, yimɓe njowo nder saare woore cenndoto: Tato narrataa bee ɗiɗo, ɗiɗo boo narrataa bee tato.
Luka 12.80: Baaba waadan bee ɓiyum, ɓiɗɗo gorko boo bee baaba mum. Daada waadan bee ɓiyum debbo, ɓiɗɗo debbo boo bee daada mum. Esiraawo debbo boo waadan bee esum debbo
Luka 12.83: Yeesu wi'i mooɓre fahin: “To on ngi'i ruuldere ummake haa hiirnaaŋge, law on ɗon mbi'a iyeende toɓan, ɗum waɗan boo.
Luka 12.84: To on ngi'i henndu iwi fombina boo, on ɗon mbi'a: Gulɗum waɗan, ɗum waɗan boo.
Luka 12.85: Naafiki'en! On anndi fassitirgo ko laatoto dow lesdi e ko laatoto haa dow, ngam ɗume on anndaa fassitirgo zamanuuru jontaaru ndu'u?”
Luka 12.87: “Ngam ɗume on keɓtantaa ko'e mon ko haani waɗugo?
Luka 12.88: To a ɗon yahda bee mo njokkirɗa haa pellel kiita, haɓdu narrugo bee maako diga laawol, ngam taa o yahre haa kiitoowo, nden kiitoowo hokke haa sooje'en e sooje'en boo nastine fursina
Luka 12.90: Mi ɗon wi'e: A wurtataako ton sam, sonaa to a yoɓi ko ɓe kiiti ma fuu.”

Luka 13.1: Saa'i man yimɓe woɗɓe wonɓe ton ngecci Yeesu haala yimɓe Galiili ɓe Pilaatu mbarno nde ɓe ɗonno lii'ano Allah kirseteeɗi.
Luka 13.2: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On tammi Galiili'en man laatino hakke'en ɓuri Galiili'en woɗɓe ngam sarru man heɓi ɓe na?
Luka 13.3: Aa'a, mi ɗon wi'a on, to onon boo on tuubaay, on kalkiran on fuu bana non!
Luka 13.4: Malla yimɓe sappo e njoweetato ɓe mahdi suudu aynirdu yibbi dow muuɗum'en haa Silowam, mbari ɓe, on tammi ɓe aybuɓe ɓuri yimɓe Urusaliima woɗɓe fuu na?
Luka 13.5: Aa'a mi ɗon wi'a on, to on tuubaay, on kalkiran on fuu bana non!”
Luka 13.7: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol: “Goɗɗo feere woodi ibbi ki o jubi nder ngesa maako, o wari teɓugo ibbe, ammaa o heɓaay.
Luka 13.8: Nden o wi'i aynoowo ngesa: Ndaa duuɓi tati mi ɗon tefa ibbe haa ibbi ki'i, ammaa mi heɓaay. Fe'u ki, ngam ɗume ki ɗon usta semmbe lesdi meere?”
Luka 13.9: Aynoowo ngesa wi'i mo: “Jaagorɗo, accu ki fahin hitaande nde'e, mi wasan sera maaki, mi rufan koonal.
Luka 13.10: Teema hitaande warannde ki riman, to naa non, a fe'a ki.”
Luka 13.12: Yeesu ɗonno ekkitina nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en woɗndu
Luka 13.15: Woodino debbo haa ton, marɗo ginnawol baakin duuɓi sappo e joweetati, ginnawol jiiji mo, o ɗon turi, o waawataa daraago.
Luka 13.16: Nde Yeesu yi'i mo, o ewni mo, o wi'i: “Debbo, a yamɗitinaama diga jiija ma.”
Luka 13.17: O jo'ini juuɗe maako dow hoore debbo, ɗon nii debbo darti, teddini Allah.
Luka 13.18: Ammaa ardiiɗo suudu dewal Yahuudu'en ɓerni ngam jamɗitinki goɗɗo nyannde siwtorde, o wi'i mooɓre: “Nyalɗe joweego fuu ɗon ngam huuwugo, ngare nyalɗe man ngam njamɗiton, ammaa naa nyannde siwtorde
Luka 13.20: Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Naafiki'en! Koo moy mooɗon yoofataa ngaari mum malla wamnde mum diga nyaamnirde nyannde siwtorde, ngam o yarnoya ɗum na?
Luka 13.21: Debbo mo danygol Ibrahiima, mo Sayɗaanu haɓɓi duuɓi sappo e joweetati, ɗum haanaay o yoofe diga kaɓɓorgol ngo'ol nyannde siwtorde na?”
Luka 13.22: Nde o wolwi bana nii, konne'en maako fuu cemti, ammaa mooɓre fuu seyi ngam kuuje tedduɗe ɗe o waɗi.
Luka 13.24: Yeesu wi'i fahin: “Bee ɗume laamu Allah nanndi? Bee ɗume nanndinanmi ngu?
Luka 13.25: Ngu nanndi bee gawel citta, ngel goɗɗo hoo'i, aawi nder jarne muuɗum, ngel fuɗi, ngel laati lekki, haa colli mbaɗi caɓɓe muuɗum'en dow lice maaki.”
Luka 13.27: Yeesu wi'i fahin: “Bee ɗume nanndinanmi laamu Allah?
Luka 13.28: Ngu nanndi bee ufnirɗum ɗum debbo hoo'i, waati nder kuroori ɗuuɗndi, haa kuroori man fuu uufi.”
Luka 13.30: Yeesu saali berniiji e gure, o ekkitini nde o ɗon yaha Urusaliima.
Luka 13.31: Goɗɗo wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, yimɓe seɗɗa tan kisata na?” O jaabi:
Luka 13.32: “Tiiɗe nastirgo dammugal paaɗŋgal. Mi ɗon wi'a on: Ɗuuɗɓe ngiɗi nastugo, ammaa ɓe mbaawataa.
Luka 13.34: To jawmu saare ummake, maɓɓi dammugal, onon boo on lutti haa yaasi, on puɗɗan tappugo dammugal, on mbi'an: Jaagorɗo, maɓɓitanan min! O jaaboto on: Mi anndaa toy iwɗon.
Luka 13.35: Nden on puɗɗan wi'ugo: Min nyaami, min njari yeeso maaɗa, a ekkitini dow laabi amin!
Luka 13.36: Ammaa o jaaboto on: Ndille, mi anndaa toy iwɗon, onon waɗooɓe halleende
Luka 13.38: On mboyan, on kirƴindiran nyii'e haa ton, yaake on ngi'ata Ibrahiima, Isiyaaku e Yaakubu bee annabi'en fuu nder laamu Allah e onon boo on ngudinaama yaasi
Luka 13.40: Yimɓe ngaran diga fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge, woyla
Luka 13.42: , ɓe njooɗoto nder laamu Allah ngam ɓe nyaama
Luka 13.44: Nden kadi yimɓe aartuɓe cakkititto e sakkitiiɓe boo aartoto
Luka 13.47: Wakkati man nden, Farisa'en woɗɓe ngari, mbi'i Yeesu: “Dillu diga ɗo, ngam Hirudus yiɗi mbarugo ma!”
Luka 13.49: man, ndaa: Mi ɗon riiwa ruuhuuji coɓɗi, mi ɗon yamɗitina nyawɓe, hannde e jaŋngo, nyannde tataɓre boo ɗum timmoode kuugal am.
Luka 13.50: Ammaa sey mi tokkita laawol am hannde, jaŋngo e faɓɓijaŋngo, ngam haanaay annabiijo maaya yaasi Urusaliima.
Luka 13.52: Urusaliima! Urusaliima! A mbari annabi'en, a fiɗi nelaaɓe ɓe Allah neli haa ma bee kaa'e. Nde ɗuuɗɗum mi yiɗino mooɓtugo yimɓe ma, bana no gertogal mooɓtirta ɓikkoy mum les bileeji mum, ammaa on cali.
Luka 13.53: Ndaa, suudu mooɗon laatoto wudinaandu. Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: On ngi'ataa yam ɓaawoɗon haa saa'i on mbi'ata: Barka laatano garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo

Luka 14.3: feere, Yeesu yehi saare gooto nder mawɓe Farisa'en, ngam o nyaama ton. Wonɓe ton ayni mo.
Luka 14.4: Ndaa goɗɗo mo ɓanndu mum uppi daliila nyawu ɗon ndari yeeso maako.
Luka 14.5: Yeesu ƴami moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, wi'i: “Ɗum duŋaaɗum yamɗitingo nyannde siwtorde na?”
Luka 14.6: Ɓe njeeɗi. Nden Yeesu jogi nyawɗo go, yamɗitini mo, acci mo o dilla.
Luka 14.7: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Moy caka mooɗon, to ɓiŋngel mum malla ngaari mum yollake nder ɓulndu, wurtintaa ɗum law koo to nyannde siwtorde na
Luka 14.9: Ɓe mbaawaay jaabaago mo koo ɗume dow maajum.
Luka 14.11: Yeesu yi'i no ewnaaɓe cuɓri joole tedduɗe, o wolwani ɓe, o wi'i:
Luka 14.12: “To goɗɗo ewnake ma haa nyaamduuji ɓaŋgal, taa jooɗoya haa babal tedduŋgal. Teema woodi caka ewnaaɓe mo ɓuri ma daraja.
Luka 14.13: Taa mo ewni on ɗiɗo fuu wara wi'e: Accan oo ɗo babal nga'al. A semtan jooɗoyaago haa babal ɓaawowal.
Luka 14.14: Ammaa to a ewnaama, yah jooɗa haa babal ɓaawowal, haa to ewniiɗo ma wari, wi'i ma: Soobaajo am, war haa joonde ɓurnde wooɗugo nde'e. Ɗum laatante tedduŋgal yeeso ɓe a nyaamdata fuu
Luka 14.16: Ngam mo mawnini hoore mum, o leestinteeɗo, mo leestini hoore mum boo, o ɓaŋgteteeɗo
Luka 14.19: Nden o wolwani boo ewniiɗo mo go: “To a waɗani yimɓe nyaamduuji koo ndey, taa ewna soobiraaɓe ma malla deerɗiraaɓe ma malla banndiraaɓe ma, koo heeddiɗɗiraaɓe ma riskuɓe, ngam taa ɓe ewne kamɓe boo, ɓe mbarjo ma.
Luka 14.20: Ammaa to a waɗi nyaamdu juulde, ewna talaka'en e jiijiiɓe e woosɓe e wumɓe.
Luka 14.21: A heɓan barka ngam ɓe mbaawataa warjaago ma. Allah warjoto ma ɗum nyannde ummitineeki adili'en.”
Luka 14.23: Nde gooto caka nyaamdanɓe bee Yeesu nani bolle ɗe'e, o wi'i: “Barka laatanto nyaamanɗo nyaamdu mum nder laamu Allah.”
Luka 14.24: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Goɗɗo feere waɗi nyaamdu ɗuuɗndu, o ewni yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Luka 14.25: Wakkati nyaamugo, o neli suka maako o wi'a ewnaaɓe: Ngare, ngam koo ɗume fuu taaskake.
Luka 14.26: Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe puɗɗi yelditaago. Arano wi'i suka go: Mi soodi ngesa, sey mi yaha mi laara ka, mi tori ma, yaafam.
Luka 14.27: Goɗɗo boo wi'i: Mi soodi ga'i sappo cindaaɗi ɗiɗi ɗiɗi, mi yiɗi laarndaago ɗi, mi tori ma, yaafam.
Luka 14.28: Goɗɗo feere boo wi'i: Mi ɓaŋgi neeɓaay, ngam maajum mi heɓataa wargo.
Luka 14.29: Suka lorti haa jaagorɗo muuɗum, yecci mo ɗum fuu. Nden jawmu saare ɓerni, wi'i suka muuɗum: Yah law haa dalde wuro e haa laabi, ewna talaka'en e jiijiiɓe e wumɓe e woosɓe.
Luka 14.30: Suka yehi, warti, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, ko a umri waɗaama, ammaa babal ɗon lutti fahin.
Luka 14.31: Jaagorɗo wi'i suka go: Yah haa buuwi e laabi kommbi gese, doolu yimɓe ɓe a fottata bee muuɗum'en fuu ɓe nasta, ngam haa saare am heewa.
Luka 14.32: Mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo gooto haa aartuɓe ewneego mettataa nyaamdu am!”
Luka 14.34: Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ndillidi bee Yeesu. O yeesiti, o wi'i ɓe:
Luka 14.35: “To goɗɗo wari haa am e o ɓuraay yiɗugo yam dow baaba maako e daada maako e debbo maako e ɓikkoy maako e deerɗiraaɓe maako worɓe e rewɓe, koo yoŋki maako boo, o waawataa laataago pukaraajo am
Luka 14.37: Koo moy mo roondaaki gaafaaŋgal mum ngam tokkaago yam, waawataa laataago pukaraajo am
Luka 14.39: Moy haa mooɗon, to yiɗi mahugo suudu aynirdu, o jooɗataako, o hiimo ko o majjinta, o laara to o waawan timmingo.
Luka 14.40: Ngam taa o wallina caɓɓawal nden o waawaay timmingo, yi'ɓe mo njancan mo, mbi'an:
Luka 14.41: Gorko oo fuɗɗi mahugo, o waawaay timmingo.
Luka 14.42: Malla laamiiɗo moye, to yiɗi yahugo waɗa konu bee laamiiɗo goɗɗo, o jooɗataako tawon, o hiimo, to o waawan yahugo bee yimɓe ujine sappo, ngam fottugo bee garananɗo mo bee yimɓe ujine noogas?
Luka 14.43: To o waawataa, diga laamiiɗo man ɗon daayi tawon, o nelan nelaaɓe ngam ƴamugo no ɓe culhotira.
Luka 14.44: Bana non haa mooɗon boo, mo accaay jawdi muuɗum fuu, waawataa laataago pukaraajo am.”
Luka 14.46: “Mannda wooɗi, ammaa to lammeeŋga maajam ittake, noy ɗam heɓtirta lammeeŋga man fahin?
Luka 14.47: Ɗam nafataa haa lesdi, ɗam nafataa ngam koonal, ɓe ndufan ɗam yaasi. Mo woodi noppi nanugo, nana!”

Luka 15.1: Jomnooɓe e hakke'en ɗuuɗɓe ɓaditi Yeesu ngam nanugo mo.
Luka 15.2: Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ngurŋgurti, mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo ɗon jaɓɓo hakke'en, ɗon nyaamda bee maɓɓe boo
Luka 15.4: Nden o wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol:
Luka 15.5: “To goɗɗo haa mooɗon woodi baali teemerre, nden ngootu eeri, o accataa cappanɗe joweenayi e joweenayi goɗɗi nder ladde ngam o ɗaɓɓitoya eerŋgu, haa to o heɓti ngu na?
Luka 15.6: To o heɓti, o roondoto ngu dow balbe maako bee seyo,
Luka 15.7: to o warti saare, o ewnoto soobiraaɓe maako e heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako, o wi'a ɓe: Ceyode bee am, ngam mi heɓti mbaalu am eernooŋgu go!
Luka 15.8: Mi ɗon wi'a on, bana non boo seyo laatorto haa asama to hakkeejo gooto tuubi, ɓuran cappanɗe njoweenayo e njoweenayo adili'en ɓe maraay haaje tuubugo.”
Luka 15.10: “Malla debbo moy, to woodi suleyje cardi sappo, woore majji, o jamnataa pittirla, o wuuwa suudu, o ɗaɓɓita bee tiɗɗinaare haa to o heɓti nde na?
Luka 15.11: To o heɓti nde, o ewnoto soobiraaɓe maako e heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako, o wi'a ɓe: Ceyode bee am, ngam mi heɓti suleyre am majjunoonde go.
Luka 15.12: Mi ɗon wi'a on, bana non boo malaa'ika'en Allah ceyorto ngam hakkeejo gooto mo tuubi.”
Luka 15.14: Yeesu wi'i fahin: “Gorko feere woodino ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo.
Luka 15.15: Minyiraawo wi'i baaba mum: Baaba, hokkam geɗal jawdi ngal mi tammi ronugo. Baaba go senndani ɓe jawdi mum.
Luka 15.16: Ɓaawo balɗe seɗɗa, ɓiɗɗo go sorri jawdi mum fuu, dilli lesdi ndaayiindi. O majjini jawdi maako bee yeeɗugo nder daakaareeku
Luka 15.18: Nde o timmini ɗum fuu, weelo saatuŋgo waɗi haa lesdi man, o fuɗɗi maatugo ɓillaare.
Luka 15.19: O yehi, o huuwani gooto yimɓe nder lesdi man. Goɗɗo man neli mo nder gese durugo gaduuji.
Luka 15.20: O yiɗi nyaamugo ko gaduuji nyaamata, ammaa walaa mo hokkata mo ɗum
Luka 15.22: Nden o fuɗɗi numtugo joonde maako, o wi'i: Huuwanooɓe baaba am ngoodi nyaamdu ɗuuɗndu, nden nii mi ɗon maaya bee dolo haa ɗo
Luka 15.24: Mi loroto haa baaba am, mi wi'an mo: Baaba, mi waɗi hakke heedi Allah e heedi maaɗa
Luka 15.26: mi he'aay ewneego ɓiya fahin. Waɗam bana gooto caka huuwanooɓe ma.
Luka 15.28: Nde o ɗon daayi tawon, baaba maako eewi mo, yurmini mo: O doggi, o harli mo, o hebbi mo.
Luka 15.29: Ɓiɗɗo go wi'i mo: Baaba am, mi waɗi hakke heedi Allah e heedi maaɗa, mi he'aay ewneego ɓiya fahin.
Luka 15.30: Ammaa baaba wi'i suka'en muuɗum: Njaawɗe ngadde ngapaleewol ɓurŋgol wooɗugo, ɓorne mo ngol, mbaɗane mo halagaare haa hoondu e paɗe boo haa kosɗe!
Luka 15.31: Ngadde gaggel payŋgel, kirse, en nyaama, en ceya!
Luka 15.32: Ngam ɓiɗɗo am oo, o maayno, ammaa o yeeɗiti, o majjuno, ammaa o heɓtaama! Ɓe puɗɗi seyaago.
Luka 15.34: Wakkati man ɓiɗɗo afo ɗonno haa ngesa. Nde o ɗon warta, o ɓaditi saare go, o nani pijirle e gamarle.
Luka 15.35: O ewni gooto suka'en, o ƴami mo ko waɗi.
Luka 15.36: Suka man wi'i mo: Deerɗiraawo ma warti, baaba ma hirsi gaggel payŋgel, ngam o heɓti mo o jamo.
Luka 15.37: Nden ɓiɗɗo afo go ɓerni, sali nastugo saare. Baaba wurti, tori mo o nasta.
Luka 15.38: Ammaa o jaabi baaba maako: Ndaa duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi mi ɗon huuwane, mi meeɗaay salaago ɗowtanaago umrooje ma, ammaa a meeɗaay hokkugo yam koo jawgel be'el ngam haa mi seyodo bee soobiraaɓe am.
Luka 15.39: Ammaa nde ɓiɗɗo ma oo warti, mo majjini jawdi ma bee daakaare'en, a hirsi gaggel payŋgel ngam maako!
Luka 15.40: Baaba wi'i mo: Ɓiŋngel am, an a ɗon wondi bee am tum, ko marmi fuu an mari ɗum.
Luka 15.41: Haani ngaɗen juulde, en ceyo, ngam deerɗiraawo ma oo, o maayno, o yeeɗiti, o majjuno, o heɓtaama!”

Luka 16.1: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Goɗɗo diskuɗo woodino kaliifaajo. Ɓe ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo kaliifaajo man ɗon wonna jawdi maako.
Luka 16.2: Diskuɗo ewni mo, wi'i mo: Ɗume nananmi dow ma? Waɗanam lisaafi kuugal ma, ngam yeeso ɗo a laatataako kaliifaajo am fahin!
Luka 16.3: Kaliifaajo go numi nder ɓernde mum: No mbaɗanmi? Ngam jaagorɗo am ɗon itta kaliifaaku jawdi mum haa am? Remugo, mi walaa semmbe man, rookaago mi semtan.
Luka 16.4: Yowwa, mi anndi no mbaɗanmi, ngam haa yimɓe feere njaɓɓo yam haa ci'e
Luka 16.5: maɓɓe, to mi wurtinaama kuugal am.
Luka 16.6: O ewni gooto gooto jaɓɓe nyamaale haa jaagorɗo maako fuu. O wi'i arano: Noy jaagorɗo am tokkoto ma?
Luka 16.7: O jaabi: Nebbam jaytunje goŋgoŋji teemerre. Nden kaliifaajo wi'i mo: Ndaa ɗereewol ma. Law, jooɗa winndu goŋgoŋji cappanɗe jowi!
Luka 16.8: Nden o wi'i goɗɗo feere boo: Noy jaagorɗo am tokkoto ma? O jaabi: Buhuuje alkamaari teemerre. Kaliifaajo wi'i mo: Ndaa ɗereewol ma, winndu cappanɗe joweetati!
Luka 16.9: Jaagorɗo mani kaliifaajo faasikiijo oo, ngam o huuwi bee ƴoyre. Ngam yimɓe duniyaaru ndu'u, ɓe ƴoyɓe hakkunde muuɗum'en ɓuri yimɓe annoora”.
Luka 16.11: Yeesu ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Min mi ɗon wi'a on: Keɓane ko'e mooɗon soobiraaɓe bee jawdi duniyaaru ndu'u. To ndi timmiri on, ɓe njaɓa on haa joole duumiiɗe.
Luka 16.12: Mo huuwi kuugal pamaral bee hoolaare, huuwan boo kuugal maŋngal bee hoolaare. Mo huuwi kuugal pamaral bee faasikaare, huuwan boo kuugal maŋngal bee faasikaare.
Luka 16.13: To on laataaki hoolaaɓe bee jawdi duniyaaru kalfitinaandi on, moy halfinta on jawdi gooŋgaari?
Luka 16.14: To on laataaki hoolaaɓe bee jawdi yimɓe feere, moy hokkata on ko maroton?”
Luka 16.16: “Walaa suka mo waawata jagganaago jaagorɓe ɗiɗo, ngam o wanyan oo e o yiɗan oya malla o ɗakkotira bee oo e o meeriɗina oya. On mbaawataa jagganaago Allah e jawdi.”
Luka 16.18: Farisa'en, yiɗa-jawdi'en nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe njali mo.
Luka 16.19: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Onon ngoni waɗanɓe bana adili'en yeeso yimɓe, ammaa Allah anndi ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam ko yimɓe ndaarata bana mawɗum, ɗum nyidduɗum yeeso Allah.
Luka 16.21: Tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en ɗonno haa yotti wakkati Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma. Diga wakkati man boo kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu Allah wooynaama, koo moy ɗon haɓda bee semmbe ngam nastugo ndu.
Luka 16.22: Koyɗum asama e lesdi majjita dow harfeere tawreeta woore halka.
Luka 16.24: Koo moy seeri debbo muuɗum, te'i debbo feere, waɗi njeenu. Koo moy te'i debbo ceeraaɗo boo, waɗi njeenu.”
Luka 16.26: “Woodino goɗɗo diskuɗo, ɓorniiɗo limce ɗelemɗe boɗeeje e ɗuuɗa cogguuje. Nyalaade fuu o ɗon nder seyo e jeynitaare.
Luka 16.27: Haa dammugal maako, talakaajo bi'eteeɗo Laazarus ɗon waali, ɓanndu muuɗum fuu heewi kuuduuje.
Luka 16.28: O yeli nyaamugo ko solata les taabal diskuɗo oo. Dawaaɗi ɗon ngara, taha kuuduuje maako.
Luka 16.29: Talakaajo oo maayi, malaa'ika'en efti mo, njahri mo haa kommbi Ibrahiima. Diskuɗo boo maayi, ɓe uwi ɗum.
Luka 16.30: Nde o ɗon yaŋgito haa joonde maayɓe, o ɓaŋgti gite, o yi'i Ibrahiima daayiiɗum bee Laazarus haa kommbi muuɗum.
Luka 16.31: O wooki, o wi'i: Yaa baabiraawo am Ibrahiima, hinnam. Nel Laazarus ngam o suuwa hoondu maako nder ndiyam, o feewtina ɗemŋgal am, ngam mi ɗon yaŋgito nder yiite nge'e.
Luka 16.32: Ammaa Ibrahiima jaabi: Ɓiŋngel am, siftor yaake a ɗonno bee yoŋki, a heɓi neeminaare, ammaa Laazarus, bone o heɓi. Jonta ndaa mo haa ɗo, o de'itinaaɗo, an boo a ɗon yaŋgito.
Luka 16.33: Dow maajum fuu boo, woodi lowol lugguŋgol hakkunde meeɗen, ngam yiɗɓe salaago njaha haa mooɗon mbaawataa, non boo diga ton haa ɗo.
Luka 16.34: Diskuɗo wi'i: Mi ɗon toro ma kadi, yaa baabiraawo am, nel Laazarus haa saare baaba am.
Luka 16.35: Ngam mi woodi deerɗiraaɓe njowo, haa o reentina ɓe, ngam taa ɓe ngara kamɓe boo haa nokkuure yaŋgada nde'e.
Luka 16.36: Nden Ibrahiima jaabi mo: Muusa e annabi'en fuu ɗon, sey ɓe nanana ɓe.
Luka 16.37: Diskuɗo wi'i: Naa non, yaa baabiraawo am Ibrahiima, to goɗɗo diga maayɓe yehi haa maɓɓe, ɓe tuuban.
Luka 16.38: Ibrahiima wi'i mo: To ɓe nananaay Muusa e annabi'en, ɓe njaɓantaa goɗɗo koo to ummiti diga maayɓe.”

Luka 17.1: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Walaa mo waawata haɗugo ko nastinta yimɓe nder hakke. Ammaa bone laatanto neɗɗo mo laati daliila maajum!
Luka 17.2: Ndikkana mo ɓe ɓila hayre namarde mawnde haa daande maako, ɓe njolla mo nder mbeela, dow o do'a gooto ɓurɗo famɗugo oo nder hakke.
Luka 17.4: To deerɗiraawo ma waɗi hakke, fel mo. To o tuubi, yaafa mo
Luka 17.6: To o waɗi ma aybe nde joweeɗiɗi nder nyalaade, nden boo nde joweeɗiɗi man fuu, o lori haa maaɗa bee wi'go: Mi tuubi, yaafa mo.”
Luka 17.9: Jawmiraawo boo wi'i: “To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki koo seɗɗa bana gawel citta, on mbi'an dundeehi ki'i: Ɗoofa, yah ɗisoya nder mbeela. Ki ɗowtanto on.”
Luka 17.11: “Moy haa mooɗon mari kuuwoowo, mo ɗon rema malla ɗon dura dabbaaji, to kuuwoowo oo warti ngesa, o wi'a mo: War law, nyaam?
Luka 17.12: Naa o wi'an mo: Taaskitinam ko mi nyaama, ɓorna limce kuugal, huuwanam, haa to mi nyaami e mi yari, ɓaawo maajum an boo a nyaama a yara kadi. Naa non na?
Luka 17.13: Kadi o yettan suka oo ngam o huuwani mo ko o umri mo na?
Luka 17.14: Bana non onon boo, to on mbaɗi ko Allah umri on fuu, mbi'e: Minin min huuwooɓe meere, ngam min kuuwi ko haandanino min kuuwa tan.”
Luka 17.16: Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha Urusaliima, o saalori hakkunde Samariya bee Galiili.
Luka 17.17: O ɗonno nasta wuro feere, kuturu'en sappo ngari fottugo bee maako. Ɓe ndari daayiiɗum,
Luka 17.18: ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Yeesu, jaagorɗo, yurmin min!”
Luka 17.19: Nde o yi'i ɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe, cappine ɓalli mooɗon haa liman'en.” Nde ɓe ɗon njaha, ɓe njamɗiti
Luka 17.21: Gooto maɓɓe, nde yi'i yamɗiti, lori, ɗon teddina Allah bee sawtu.
Luka 17.22: O sujidi kommbi Yeesu, o yetti mo. Goɗɗo oo o Samariyaajo.
Luka 17.23: Yeesu ƴami: “Naa sappo fuu njamɗiti na? E toy njoweenayo woɗɓe?
Luka 17.24: Walaa koo gooto mo numi loraago, teddina Allah, sey jananno oo na?”
Luka 17.25: Nden o wi'i mo: “Umma, dillu, nuɗɗinki ma hisni ma.”
Luka 17.27: Farisa'en ƴami Yeesu: “Ndeye laamu Allah warata?” O jaabi ɓe: “Laamu Allah warataa bee alaamaaji gi'eteeɗi.
Luka 17.28: Ɓe mbi'ataa boo: Ndaare ngu ɗon ɗo malla ngu ɗon to ngam laamu Allah ɗon caka mooɗon.”
Luka 17.30: O wi'i pukara'en: “Nyalɗe ngaran, on ngelan yi'ugo nyalaade woore nder nyalɗe
Luka 17.33: Ɓe mbi'an on: Ndaa o ɗon ɗo, o ɗon to. Taa njehe ton, taa ndogge ton.
Luka 17.34: Ngam bana ma'ere ma'irta wakeere asama nde'e nden jayŋgol maare ɗon yotto haa wakeere ndeya, bana non Ɓii-neɗɗo laatorto nder nyalaade mum.
Luka 17.35: Ammaa aran, o yaran bone ɗuuɗɗum, yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u ngudinan mo.
Luka 17.36: Ko laatino nder zamanu Nuuhu, ɗum laatoto bana non boo nder nyalɗe Ɓii-neɗɗo
Luka 17.38: Yimɓe ɗonno nyaama, njara, te'a, te'ana ɓiyum'en, haa nyalaade Nuuhu nasti koommbowal
Luka 17.39: , ilam tuufaana wari halki ɓe fuu
Luka 17.41: Ɗum laatoto boo bana nder zamanu Ludu: Yimɓe ɗonno nyaama, njara, cooda, coorra, aawa, maha cuuɗi.
Luka 17.42: Ammaa nyalaade Ludu wurti Sodoma, Allah toɓni yiite e baruudu
Luka 17.43: diga dow bana iyeende, halki luttuɓe fuu
Luka 17.45: Bana non ɗum laatoto nyannde baŋguki Ɓii-neɗɗo.
Luka 17.47: Nyalaade man, mo ɗon dow soorowol taa jippo ngam hoo'ugo kuuje muuɗum nder suudu mum. Non boo ngam gonɗo haa ngesa, taa loro sam
Luka 17.51: Koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki mum, majjinan ki, ammaa mo majjini ki boo, heɓtan ki
Luka 17.53: Mi ɗon wi'a on, jemmaare maajum yimɓe ɗiɗo ngondan dow leeso wooto, gooto hoose, gooto acce.
Luka 17.54: Rewɓe ɗiɗo namdan dow namarde woore, gooto hoose, gooto acce. [
Luka 17.55: Yimɓe ɗiɗo ngondan nder ngesa, gooto hoosete, gooto boo acce.]”
Luka 17.56: Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “Haa toy ɗum laatoto, Jawmiraawo?” O wi'i ɓe: “Haa nyawmande woni fuu, ton jigaaje mooɓtoto.”

Luka 18.1: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol ngam faamtingo ɓe sey ɓe tokko toraago, taa ɓe tampa sam.
Luka 18.2: O wi'i ɓe: “Woodino haa berniwol feere kiitoowo mo hulataa Allah sam, walaa ko yaali mo bee koo moy fuu.
Luka 18.3: Woodi boo nder berniwol man debbo jurumɗo mo ɗon wara tum, wi'a mo: Waɗanam kiita hakkunde am e konneejo am.
Luka 18.4: Kiitoowo man sali, haa duuri. Ammaa ɓaawoɗon o numi nder ɓernde maako: Mi hulataa Allah, walaa ko yaali yam bee koo moy boo,
Luka 18.5: ammaa nde nii jurumɗo oo ɗon daamammi, mi waɗanan mo kiita, ngam taa o tokko wargo, o jiiɓa hakkiilo am.”
Luka 18.6: Jawmiraawo ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Nane booɗɗum ko kiitoowo kalluɗo oo wi'ata.
Luka 18.7: Kadi, Allah waɗanta suɓaaɓe muuɗum wookananɓe mo jemma e naaŋge kiita gooŋgɗuka bee law na?
Luka 18.8: Mi ɗon wi'a on, o waɗanan ɓe kiita ngooŋɗuka bee law. Ammaa wakkati loraaki
Luka 18.10: o tawan marɗo nuɗɗinki dow lesdi na?”
Luka 18.12: Yeesu wolwi balndol feere fahin ngam laaranɓe ko'e muuɗum'en ɓe adili'en, ɓe ɗon njawo woɗɓe:
Luka 18.15: ngam waɗugo do'a, gooto Farisaajo, gooto boo jomnoowo.
Luka 18.16: Farisaajo dari, waɗi do'a nder ɓernde mum bana ni'i: Yaa Allah, mi yetti ma ngam mi laataaki bana yimɓe feere, laatiiɓe wuyɓe, sooyɓe-adilaaku, jeenooɓe malla bana jomnoowo oo.
Luka 18.17: Mi ɗon suumo asaweere fuu nde ɗiɗi, mi ɗon itta zakka
Luka 18.19: Jomnoowo dari daayiiɗum, o numaay koo ɓaŋgtugo gite haa asama, ammaa o fiyi wiɓɓere maako, o wi'i: Yaa Allah am, yurminam, min mi hakkeejo!
Luka 18.20: Mi ɗon wi'a on, kaŋko o heɓi yerduye Allah nde o hooti saare maako, ammaa Farisaajo heɓaay. Ngam koo moy mawnini hoore mum, o leestinteeɗo e mo leestini hoore mum boo, o ɓaŋgteteeɗo
Luka 18.23: Ɓe ngaddani Yeesu ɓikkoy pamaroy ngam o meema koy, ammaa nde pukara'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe peli wadduɓe koy.
Luka 18.24: Yeesu ɓadini ɓikkoy go kommbi mum, wi'i: “Acce ɓikkoy pamaroy ngara haa am. Taa kaɗe koy, ngam laamu Allah woodani irin maakoy.
Luka 18.25: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Mo jaɓaay laamu Allah bana ɓiŋngel pamarel, fakat o nastataa ngu sam.”
Luka 18.27: Yahuuduujo mawɗo feere ƴami Yeesu: “Moodibbo booɗɗo, ko mbaɗanmi haa mi heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Luka 18.28: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Ngam ɗume a wi'ata yam mi booɗɗo? Walaa booɗɗo, sey Allah gooto tan woni booɗɗo!
Luka 18.29: A anndi umrooje: Taa waɗ njeenu, taa mbar-hoore, taa wujju, taa seeda fewre, teddin baaba ma e daada ma
Luka 18.31: Gorko go wi'i: “Mi ɗowtani umrooje ɗe'e fuu diga mi derkeejo tawon.”
Luka 18.32: Nde Yeesu nani ɗum, o wi'i mo: “Luttani ma huunde woore: Soorru ko marɗa fuu, hokku ɗum talaka'en, nden kam a heɓoyan ndesaari haa asamanji. Nden war, tokkam.”
Luka 18.33: Nde o nani bolle ɗe'e, o suni masin, ngam o diskuɗo masin.
Luka 18.34: Nde Yeesu yi'i o cuniiɗo, o wi'i: “Ɗum saɗani riskuɓe nastugo laamu Allah.
Luka 18.35: Ngeelooba saalo nder wurdere baatal ɓuri hoyugo dow diskuɗo nasta laamu Allah.”
Luka 18.36: Nanɓe mo mbi'i: “To non kam, moy waawata hisugo?”
Luka 18.37: Yeesu jaabi: “Ko waɗataako haa yimɓe, ɗum waɗoto haa Allah.”
Luka 18.38: Nden Piyer wi'i: “Ndaa, min acci mardi amin fuu, min tokki ma!”
Luka 18.39: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, koo moy acci saare mum, debbo mum, deerɗum'en, saaro'en mum malla ɓikkoy mum ngam daliila laamu Allah,
Luka 18.40: heɓan cowi ɗuuɗɗi nder zamanuuru jontaaru ndu'u e nder waranndu boo o heɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam.”
Luka 18.42: Yeesu ewni pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo haa muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa, en ɗon njaha Urusaliima, ko annabi'en mbinnduno dow
Luka 18.45: Ngam ɓe ndokkan mo haa juuɗe heefeerɓe, ɓe njancan mo, ɓe torran mo, ɓe tuutan tuuɗe dow maako,
Luka 18.46: ɓe ɓoccan mo. Ɓaawoɗon ɓe mbaran mo, nyalaade tataɓre o ummititto.”
Luka 18.47: Ammaa ɓe paamaay koo ɗume nder ko o wi'i. Haala ka'a laati cuuɗiika haa maɓɓe, ɓe anndaa ko o yiɗi wi'go.
Luka 18.49: Nde Yeesu ɓadi Yeriko, bumɗo feere ɗon jooɗi kommbi laawol, o ɗon rooko.
Luka 18.50: Nde o nani mooɓre ɗon saalo, o ƴami ko waɗi.
Luka 18.51: Ɓe anndini mo: “Ɗum Yeesu Nasaratuujo saaloto.”
Luka 18.55: Ardiiɓe yeeso peli mo, ngam haa o jeeɗo. Ammaa o ɓurti hoolugo: “Ɓii Daawuda, enɗam!”
Luka 18.56: Yeesu dari, umri: Ngadde mo haa kommbi am. Nde bumɗo ɓaditi, Yeesu ƴami mo:
Luka 18.57: “Ɗume ngiɗɗa mi waɗane?” O jaabi: “Jawmiraawo, wumtinam.”
Luka 18.58: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Wumtu, nuɗɗinki ma hisni ma!”
Luka 18.59: Wakkati man nden o wumti, o tokki Yeesu, o ɗon teddina Allah. Yimɓe yi'ɓe ɗum fuu maŋgti Allah.

Luka 19.1: Yeesu nasti Yeriko, saali nder berniwol.
Luka 19.2: Ndaa, goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Jakayus, mawɗo jomnooɓe ɗon ton e o diskuɗo.
Luka 19.3: O tefi yi'ugo moy woni Yeesu, ammaa o waawaay ngam daliila mooɓre, ngam o dammuɗo.
Luka 19.4: O doggi haa yeeso, o wa'i dundeehi ngam haa o yi'a mo, ngam Yeesu saaloto ton.
Luka 19.5: Nde Yeesu yotti haa nokkuure man, o tijji, o wi'i mo: “Jakayus, yaawɗa jippa, ngam hannde sey mi weera haa saare maaɗa.”
Luka 19.6: Jakayus yaawɗi jippi, jaɓɓi mo bee seyo.
Luka 19.7: Nde yimɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓe fuu ɓe ngurŋgurti, ɓe mbi'i: “O dilli weerugo haa goɗɗo hakkeejo.”
Luka 19.8: Ammaa Jakayus dari yeeso Jawmiraawo, wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, mi hokkan reeta jawdi am haa talaka'en. To woodi mo mi hoosino ɗum huunde bee faasikaare, mi lornanan mo ɗum cowi nayi.”
Luka 19.9: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Kisndam nasti nder saare nde'e hannde, ngam kaŋko boo o ɓii Ibrahiima.
Luka 19.15: Yimɓe ɗon nana bolle Yeesu. Nde o ɗon ɓadito Urusaliima, o wolwani ɓe balndol feere ngam ɓe tammi no laamu Allah waranno nder wakkati man nden.
Luka 19.16: O wi'i: “Goɗɗo tedda-asŋgoljo dilli lesdi ndaayiindi ngam o heɓana hoore maako laamu, nden o loro.
Luka 19.17: O ewni sappo nder suka'en maako, o hokki koo moy maɓɓe suleyre kaŋŋeeri ɗuuɗa-samanre, o wi'i ɓe: Mbaɗe filu bee maaje haa to mi warti.
Luka 19.18: Ammaa yimɓe lesdi maako nganyi mo, ɓe neli nelaaɓe ɓaawo maako ngam ɓe mbi'a: Min ngiɗaa gorko oo laamano min.
Luka 19.20: Nde ɓe laamini mo, o warti lesdi maako, o ewni suka'en ɓe o hokkuno ceede go ngam anndugo riba ka koo moy maɓɓe heɓi.
Luka 19.21: Arano wari, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, suleyre maaɗa waddi suleyje goɗɗe sappo.
Luka 19.22: Jaagorɗo wi'i mo: Booɗɗum, a suka booɗɗo! A huuwi kuugal pamaral bee hoolaare, ngam maajum laamana berniiji sappo!
Luka 19.23: Ɗiɗaɓo wari, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, suleyre maaɗa waddi suleyje goɗɗe jowi.
Luka 19.24: O wi'i mo: An boo laamana berniiji jowi!
Luka 19.25: Goɗɗo boo wari, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, ndaa suleyre maaɗa, mi sigi nde nder leppol,
Luka 19.26: ngam mi huli ma, ngam a goɗɗo caatuɗo, a hoosan ko a jo'inaay, a sodan ko a aawaay.
Luka 19.27: Jaagorɗo wi'i mo: Mi hiitete dow bolle ma, suka kalluɗo! A anndi min mi goɗɗo caatuɗo, mi hoosan ko mi jo'inaay, mi sodan ko mi aawaay.
Luka 19.28: Ngam ɗume a jo'inaay ceede am haa sigordu ceede, to mi warti mi heɓtanno ɗe bee riba?
Luka 19.29: O wolwani wonɓe ton: Njaɓte mo suleyre man, ndokke nde marɗo suleyje sappo go! [
Luka 19.30: Ɓe mbi'i mo: Jaagorɗo, o woodi suleyje sappo timmi.]
Luka 19.31: Mi ɗon wi'a on, ngam marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo, ammaa mo walaa koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Luka 19.33: Konne'en am ɓe'e, ɓe ngiɗaano mi laamo dow maɓɓe go, ngadde ɓe, mbare ɓe yeeso am
Luka 19.36: Ɓaawo bolle ɗe'e, Yeesu ardi yimɓe, dilli Urusaliima.
Luka 19.37: Nde o ɓadake Baytifaaji e Baytaniya, kommbi hooseere wi'eteende Hooseere Jaytunje, Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo,
Luka 19.38: wi'i ɓe: “Njehe haa wuro yeeso too. To on nasti ngo, on tawan wamnde molde haɓɓaande, nde goɗɗo meeɗaay wa'aago. Piiste nde, ngaddaneeɗam.
Luka 19.39: To goɗɗo ƴami on koni piistoton nde? Njaabe mo: Jawmiraawo woodi haaje maare.”
Luka 19.40: Nelaaɓe njehi, tawi kuuje man fuu bana Yeesu wi'no ɓe.
Luka 19.41: Nde ɓe ɗon piista wamnde, jawmiire wi'i ɓe: “Ngam ɗume piistoton wamnde?”
Luka 19.43: Ɓe ngaddi wamnde go haa Yeesu, ɓe caɓɓi limce maɓɓe dow maare, ɓe mba'ini Yeesu.
Luka 19.44: Nde o fuɗɗi yahugo, yimɓe mbe'iti limce muuɗum'en dow laawol.
Luka 19.45: Nde o ɗon ɓadito Urusaliima heedi diirtorde Hooseere Jaytunje, mooɓgal pukara'en fuu ceyi, ɓe puɗɗi maŋgtugo Allah bee sawtu, ngam kaayeefiiji ɗi ɓe ngi'i fuu.
Luka 19.46: Ɓe mbi'i: “Barka laatano laamiiɗo garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo! Salaaman haa asama, tedduŋgal haa Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo
Luka 19.49: Farisa'en woɗɓe diga caka yimɓe mbolwani Yeesu: “Moodibbo, telɓan pukara'en maaɗa njeeɗo!”
Luka 19.50: Yeesu jaabi: “Mi ɗon wi'a on, to kamɓe ɓe njeeɗake, kaa'e ngookan!”
Luka 19.52: Nde Yeesu ɓaditi berniwol, o yi'i ngol, o woyi daliila maagol,
Luka 19.53: o wi'i: “Mi yiɗi a anndano an boo ko woni salaaman maaɗa hanndeere nde'e! Ammaa jonta ɗum suuɗaama haa gite maaɗa.
Luka 19.54: Nyalɗe ngarante, haa konne'en ma taaro ma bee balmi, ɓe kippete, ɓe ɓiɗɗete bakeeje fuu.
Luka 19.55: Ɓe ndo'ete, an bee ɓikkoy maaɗa. Ɓe accataa hayre dow hayre haa maaɗa, ngam a annditaay saa'iire nde Allah wari wallugo ma!”
Luka 19.60: o wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa ko winnda haa Deftere: Suudu am laatoto suudu waɗugo do'a, ammaa onon on laatini ndu lowol fasooɓe
Luka 19.63: O ɗon ekkitina nder haykaliiru nyalaade fuu. Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ardiiɓe yimɓe ɗonno tefa mbarugo mo
Luka 19.65: Ammaa ɓe anndaa ɗume ɓe mbaɗata, ngam yimɓe fuu ɗon cuklani nanugo mo.

Luka 20.1: Nyannde feere Yeesu ɗon ekkitina yimɓe nder
Luka 20.3: o waazini ɓe kubaruwol belŋgol. Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe e ndotti'en ngari,
Luka 20.4: ƴami mo: “Yeccu min bee duŋayeere moy a waarata kuuje ɗe'e? Malla moy duŋani ma waɗugo bana nii?”
Luka 20.5: O jaabi ɓe: “Min boo mi ƴaman on huunde woore. Mbi'eeɗam:
Luka 20.6: Moy duŋani Yuhanna waɗango yimɓe baptisma? Allah naa malla yimɓe?”
Luka 20.7: Ammaa ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “To en mbi'i: Allah, o wi'an: Koni on nuɗɗinaay mo?
Luka 20.8: To en mbi'i: Yimɓe, nden boo yimɓe fuu piɗan en bee kaa'e, ngam ɓe nuɗɗini Yuhanna o annabiijo fakat.”
Luka 20.10: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Min boo mi wi'ataa on bee duŋayeere moy mbaɗanmi kuuje ɗe'e.”
Luka 20.12: Ɓaawo man Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango yimɓe balndol ngo'ol: “Goɗɗo jubi ngesa inabooje, o halfini ka remooɓe, o dilli jahaaŋgal, o duuri
Luka 20.14: Nde saa'i teɓugo inabooje waɗi, o neli jaggiiɗo maako haa remooɓe ngam ɓe ndokka mo geɗal maako haa inabooje. Ammaa remooɓe tappi nelaaɗo, ɓe lortini ɗum meere.
Luka 20.15: Jawmu ngesa inabooje neli jaggiiɗo mum feere, ɓe tappi mo boo, ɓe lortini mo meere.
Luka 20.16: O neli tataɓo fahin, ɓe naawni ɗum, ɓe ndiiwi ɗum.
Luka 20.17: Jawmu ngesa inabooje wi'i: Ko mbaɗanmi? Mi nelan ɓiɗɗo am giɗaaɗo, kaŋko kam ɓe teddinan mo!
Luka 20.18: Ammaa nde remooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: Ndaa donoowo, mbaren mo ngam haa ngesa laatano en.
Luka 20.19: Ɓe ndasi mo yaasi ngesa, ɓe mbari mo.
Luka 20.20: Ɗume jawmu ngesa inabooje tammi waɗango ɓe?
Luka 20.21: O waran, o halkan remooɓe ɓe'e, o hokkan woɗɓe ngesa man.” Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗo kam waɗataako!”
Luka 20.22: Ammaa Yeesu suti ɓe, wi'i: “Ɗume binndaaɗum ɗu'um yiɗi wi'go?
Luka 20.27: Koo moy do'i dow hayre nde'e, sampititto. To nde do'i dow goɗɗo boo, nde naman mo.”
Luka 20.29: Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e mawɓe Farisa'en tefi naŋngugo Yeesu saa'i man nden, ammaa ɓe kuli yimɓe, ɓe paami dow maɓɓe o wolwi balndol ngo'ol.
Luka 20.30: Ɓe puɗɗi aynugo Yeesu, ɓe neli horooɓe. Yimɓe man mbaɗi ko'e maɓɓe bana ɓe yimɓe adili'en, ngam ɓe naŋngira Yeesu nder bolle maako ngam ɓe keɓa hokkugo mo haa hiitooɓe e yimɓe marɓe baawɗe ngomnati.
Luka 20.31: Ɓe ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi ko mbolwata e ko a ekkitinta ɗum gooŋga. A senndindirtaa yimɓe, a ɗon ekkitina laawol Allah bee gooŋga.
Luka 20.32: Kaanduɗum min ndokka laamiiɗo Roma jomorgol naa malla taa min ndokka?”
Luka 20.33: Yeesu annditi faasikaare maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe:
Luka 20.34: “Kolleeɗam suleyre. Suura moy e innde moy ɗo?” Ɓe njaabi: “Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma jeyi.”
Luka 20.35: O wi'i ɓe: “Nden kam njoɓe Kaysara ko haanani mo, ndokke Allah boo ko haanani Allah.”
Luka 20.36: Ɓe keɓaay naŋngirgo mo yeeso yimɓe nder bolle maako. Ammaa ɓe kayɗini ngam jaawaabu maako, ɓe njeeɗi.
Luka 20.38: Saduki'en woɗɓe ɓaditi Yeesu. Kamɓe ngoni wi'anɓe maayɓe ummitittaako. Ɓe ƴami Yeesu ƴamol ngo'ol
Luka 20.40: “Moodibbo, Muusa winndani en umroore nde'e: To goɗɗo maayi, acci debbo bilaa ɓiŋngel, sey deerɗiiko te'a debbo man, heɓana maayɗo danygol
Luka 20.42: Woodino deerɗiraaɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Arano te'i debbo, maayi bilaa ɓiŋngel.
Luka 20.44: non boo bee tataɓo. Ɗum laati bana non haa njoweeɗiɗo fuu maaydi bilaa heɓugo ɓiŋngel.
Luka 20.46: Kadi nyannde ummitineeki maayɓe kam, o laatoto debbo moy caka maɓɓe? Ngam njoweeɗiɗo fuu te'ino mo.”
Luka 20.48: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u ɗon te'indira.
Luka 20.49: Ammaa he'iiɓe heɓugo geɗal haa zamanuuru waranndu e haa ummitineeki maayɓe, ɓe te'indirtaa.
Luka 20.50: Ngam ɓe maayataa fahin. Ɓe nanndi bee malaa'ika'en, ɓe laatake ɓiɓɓe Allah ngam o ummitini ɓe diga maayde.
Luka 20.51: Muusa wi'i laaɓɗum maayɓe ummititto bee yoŋki nder aayaaje ko winnda dow haala wumre, nde o wi'i Jawmiraawo o Allah Ibrahiima, o Allah Isiyaaku e o Allah Yaakubu
Luka 20.53: Allah laataaki Allah maayɓe, ammaa o Allah yeeɗɓe, ngam yimɓe fuu ɗon ngeeɗa fodde maako.”
Luka 20.54: Woɗɓe haa moodiɓɓe, mbi'i: “Moodibbo, a wolwi booɗɗum.”
Luka 20.55: Ɓe kuli ƴamugo mo ƴamol goɗŋgol.
Luka 20.57: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Noy ɓe mbi'rata Almasiihu o
Luka 20.60: Ngam Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum wi'i nder deftere Jabuura:
Luka 20.64: haa to mi laatini konne'en ma jaaɓruɗum kosɗe ma
Luka 20.67: Daawuda ewni mo Jawmiraawo, kadi noy Almasiihu laatori ɓiyiiko?”
Luka 20.69: Yeesu wolwani pukara'en muuɗum yeeso nananɓe mo fuu, o wi'i:
