Luka 20.70: “Ndeente e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, yiɗɓe waancugo bee ngapaleeji juutɗi. Ɓe ngiɗi yimɓe koofna ɓe haa luuɓe. Haa joole tedduɗe ɓe ngiɗi jooɗaago nder cuuɗi dewal e to ɓe ewnake ɓe ngam nyaamdu boo, ɓe ɗaɓɓitan joole camɗinaaɗe.
Luka 20.71: Ɓe ɗon njaɓta marle rewɓe yurumɓe, ɓe ɗon njuutina do'aare ngam yimɓe ngi'a ɓe. Ɓe keɓan kiita naawka masin.”

Luka 21.1: Yeesu ɓaŋgti gite, o yi'i riskuɓe ɗon ndokka dokke maɓɓe nder baatirɗum ceede.
Luka 21.2: O yi'i debbo jurumɗo talakaajo hokki suleyje pamare ɗiɗi.
Luka 21.3: Nden o wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Debbo jurumɗo talakaajo oo, hokki ko ɓuri yimɓe feere fuu.
Luka 21.4: Ngam kamɓe ɓe ndokki seɗɗa diga ɗuuɗeeŋga jawdi maɓɓe, ammaa debbo oo, koo nde o laafuɗo, o hokki ko o mari ngam nguure maako fuu.”
Luka 21.8: no ndu fawnira bee kaa'e booɗɗe e kuuje dokkanaaɗe Allah. Yeesu wi'i:
Luka 21.9: “Nyalɗe ngaran, ɓe ngibbinan ko ngi'oton ɗo, hayre luttataa dow hayre.”
Luka 21.11: Ɓe ƴami mo: “Jawmiraawo, ndeye kuuje ɗe'e laatoto? Bee alaama kaye kollata wakkati kuuje ɗe'e laatoto?”
Luka 21.13: Yeesu jaabi: “Kakkile ngam taa on majjina ko'e mooɗon. Ngam ɗuuɗɓe ngaran bee innde am, ɓe mbi'an: Min woni Almasiihu, wakkati boo ɓadake. Taa tokke ɓe.
Luka 21.14: To on nani haala konuuji e tuurtolji, taa kultore, ngam doole kuuje ɗe'e aarta wargo, ammaa ɗum laatataako timmoode bee law.”
Luka 21.15: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Ummaatoore ummanto ummaatoore, laamu ummanto laamu.
Luka 21.16: Dimmbanɗe lesdi mawɗe laatoto, haa nokkuuje goɗɗe boo nyawuji kalluɗi e weelo, kuuje kulniiɗe e alaamaaji mawɗi laatoto haa asama.
Luka 21.18: Ammaa hiddeko ɗum laato, ɓe naŋngan on, ɓe toonyan on, ɓe njahran on haa cuuɗi dewal maɓɓe, ɓe nastinan on fursina
Luka 21.19: , ɓe njahran on yeeso laamiiɓe e yeeso mawɓe lesdi ngam daliila innde am.
Luka 21.20: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu ngaranan on ngam ceedanon yam.
Luka 21.21: Njoge ɗum haa ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam taa on taaskitina hujjaaji mon.
Luka 21.22: Ngam mi hokkan on wolde e hikma, haa konne'en mooɗon mbaawataa waabaago on e dartanaago on
Luka 21.24: Koo saaro'en mon e deerɗiraaɓe mon e banndiraaɓe mon e soobiraaɓe mon ɓe zammboto on, ɓe mbaran woɗɓe haa mooɗon.
Luka 21.25: Koo moy fuu wanyan on ngam innde am.
Luka 21.26: Ammaa koo gaasaawol hoore mooɗon halkataa.
Luka 21.27: Bee tiɗɗinaare mon on kisnan yoŋkiiji mooɗon.”
Luka 21.29: “To on ngi'i honooɓe taarake berniwol Urusaliima, nden kam annde gibbineeki maagol ɓadake.
Luka 21.30: Wakkati man, wonɓe haa Yahudiya ndogga haa kooseeje, wonɓe nder Urusaliima ngurto e ɓen haa gese boo taa nasta berniwol.
Luka 21.31: Ngam ɗum laatoto nyalɗe baatol ngam hiɓɓingo ko winnda fuu
Luka 21.33: Kayto! Bone laatanto rewɓe reedu'en e musininanɓe nyalɗe man! Ngam ɓillaare mawnde laatoto nder lesdi ndi'i e tikkere Allah boo dow ummaatoore nde'e.
Luka 21.34: Ɓe mbareteeɓe bee kaafaaje, ɓe yahreteeɓe naŋngaaɓe caka ummaatooje fuu. Ummaatooje jananne njaaɓan Urusaliima haa to wakkati maɓɓe timmi.”
Luka 21.36: “Alaamaaji laatoto haa naaŋge, haa lewru e haa koode. Dow lesdi boo, kulol e saklere laatoto haa ummaatooje daliila haraka mbeela e ƴuuge
Luka 21.38: Yimɓe maayan ngam kulol dow ko tammi wargo dow lesdi. Ngam baawɗeeji asama boo ndimmboto.
Luka 21.41: waŋgan gite yimɓe, o waran nder duule bee baawɗe e tedduŋgal maŋngal
Luka 21.43: To kuuje ɗe puɗɗi laataago, ndarte booɗɗum, ɓaŋgte ko'e mon, ngam ndimu mooɗon ɓadake.”
Luka 21.45: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol: “Ndaare ibbi e leɗɗe goɗɗe fuu.
Luka 21.46: To on ngi'i ɗe ɗon mbilita, on anndi duumol ɓadake.
Luka 21.47: Bana non, to on ngi'i kuuje ɗe'e ɗon laato, annde laamu Allah ɓadake.
Luka 21.48: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatoto hiddeko yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u fuu maayda.
Luka 21.49: Asama e lesdi njinnan, ammaa bolle am njinnataa sam.”
Luka 21.51: “Ndeene ko'e mooɗon ngam taa ɓerɗe mon cuklano ɗuuɗal nyaamduuji e njaramji e laruuraaji duniyaaru, ngam taa nyannde man juha on.
Luka 21.52: Ngam ɗum waran bana zubaawol dow yimɓe dow lesdi fuu.
Luka 21.53: Ngam maajum ayne, mbaɗe do'a wakkati fuu, ngam haa keɓon semmbe daɗugo kuuje garanɗe ɗe'e fuu e daraago boo yeeso
Luka 21.58: jemma boo o ɗon waaloya dow hooseere wi'eteende Hooseere Jaytunje
Luka 21.60: Fajiri yimɓe fuu ɗon njaha haa maako nder haykaliiru ngam nanugo mo.

Luka 22.5: Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon ɗaɓɓa dabare haa ɓe mbara Yeesu, ammaa ɓe ɗon kula yimɓe.
Luka 22.7: Nden Sayɗaanu nasti nder Yahuuda, bi'eteeɗo Iskariyot, gooto nder sappo e ɗiɗo.
Luka 22.8: O yehi, o narri bee mawɓe liman'en e mawɓe aynooɓe haykaliiru, dow dabare naŋngugo Yeesu.
Luka 22.9: Ɓe ceyi, ɓe narri hokkugo mo ceede.
Luka 22.10: Yahuuda jaɓi, o fuɗɗi ɗaɓɓugo dabare no ɓe naŋngira Yeesu bee sirri ngam taa mooɓre yimɓe heɓta.
Luka 22.12: Nyalaade tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, nde ɓe kirsata jawgel
Luka 22.15: Yeesu neli Piyer e Yuhanna, o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe, taaskitinane en nyaamdu Paska haa nyaamen”
Luka 22.16: Ɓe ƴami: “Toy ngiɗɗa min taaskitina ndu?”
Luka 22.17: O jaabi ɓe: “Ndaa, to on nasti berniwol, on pottan bee goɗɗo doondiiɗo mbulku ndiyam. Tokke mo haa saare nde o nastata,
Luka 22.18: mbi'e jawmu saare man: Moodibbo wi'i: Toy suudu haa mi nyaama kiirtaari Paska bee pukara'en am?
Luka 22.19: O hollan on suudu mawndu, dowru, mo'itinaandu, haa ton on ngaɗata taaskara.”
Luka 22.20: Ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi kuuje man bana o wi'i ɓe, ɓe taaskitini kiirtaari Paska.
Luka 22.22: Nde wakkati man waɗi, Yeesu fuɗɗi nyaamugo bee nelaaɓe.
Luka 22.23: O wi'i ɓe: “Mi yeli masin nyaamugo nyaamdu
Luka 22.25: ndu bee mooɗon hiddeko mi torro.
Luka 22.26: Ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, mi meetataa nyaamugo nyaamdu Paska haa to maana maaru waŋginaama nder laamu Allah.”
Luka 22.27: Nden o hoo'i jardugel, o yetti Allah, o wi'i: “Koo'e jardugel ngel, cennde hakkunde mooɗon,
Luka 22.28: ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, yeeso ɗo mi meetataa yarugo inaboojam sey to laamu Allah wari.”
Luka 22.29: Ɓaawoɗon o hoo'i tamseere, o yetti Allah, o yewi nde, o hokki ɓe, o wi'i: “Ɗo ɗum ɓanndu am hokkaandu ngam mooɗon, mbaɗe ɗum ngam haa on ciftorammi.”
Luka 22.30: Bana non boo, o hoo'i jardugel ɓaawo nyaamdu, o hokki ɓe ngel, o wi'i: “Jardugel nge'el ɗum alkawal kesal. Allah tabitiniri ngal bee ƴiiƴam am ndufaaɗam ngam mooɗon
Luka 22.33: Ammaa ndaa zammbotooɗo yam ɗon nyaamda bee am haa ɗo
Luka 22.37: maayan bana no Allah tabitiniri ɗum, ammaa bone laatanto neɗɗo zammbotooɗo mo!
Luka 22.38: Ɓe puɗɗi ƴamƴamtirgo, moy caka maɓɓe tammiiɗo waɗugo ɗum”.
Luka 22.40: Ngaaba ummi hakkunde nelaaɓe dow moy caka maɓɓe tammiiɗo laataago mawɗo, ɓurduɗo
Luka 22.42: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Laamiiɓe ummaatooje ɗon laamano ɗe, marɓe baawɗe dow maɓɓe boo ɗon ewno ko'e muuɗum'en saahiiɓe.
Luka 22.43: Ammaa ngam mooɗon kam, naa bana non. Mo ɓurdi maŋngu caka mooɗon laato mo ɓurdi famɗugo, mo ɗon laamo boo laato bana jaggiiɗo
Luka 22.45: Moy ɓurdi maŋngu, jooɗiiɗo ɗon nyaama naa malla jagganoowo mo? Naa jooɗiiɗo ɗon nyaama na? Ammaa min, mi ɗon caka mooɗon bana jaggoowo
Luka 22.48: Onon ngoni wonduɓe bee am tum nder jarribooje am.
Luka 22.49: Mi hokki on laamu bana Baabiraawo am hokkiri yam.
Luka 22.50: Nden on nyaaman, on njaran haa nyaamrude am nder laamu am, on njooɗoto dow leese laamu ngam hiitaago le'i Isra'iila sappo e ɗiɗi
Luka 22.53: Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Simon! Simon! Sayɗaanu ƴami duŋayeere ngam dimmbugo on, jaartugo on bana ɓe njaartirta alkamaari ngam senndugo ndi bee nyaande.
Luka 22.54: Ammaa mi torake ngam maaɗa, ngam taa nuɗɗinki ma tampa. An, to a tuubi, semmbiɗin deerɗiraaɓe ma.”
Luka 22.55: Piyer wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, mi ɗon taaski yahugo bee ma, koo haa fursina
Luka 22.57: Yeesu wi'i: “Piyer, mi ɗon wi'e, hannde hiddeko asgumri
Luka 22.58: u'a, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.”
Luka 22.60: Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Nde mi nelno on bilaa booro ceede, bilaa booro njooɓaari, bilaa paɗe, woodi ko on cooyino na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Walaa koo ɗume min cooyi
Luka 22.62: O wi'i ɓe: “Ammaa jonta naa non. Marɗo booro ceede hoo'a ngo, marɗo booro njooɓaari boo hoo'a ngo. Mo maraay kaafahi, soorra limce muuɗum, sooda kaafahi.
Luka 22.63: Ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, sey binndaaɗum dow am gooŋɗa: O limaama caka halluɓe. Ngam ko waajibi dow am ɗon laato.”
Luka 22.64: Ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, ndaa kaafaaje ɗiɗi.” O wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum he'i
Luka 22.67: Nden Yeesu wurti, o dilli haa Hooseere Jaytunje bana no o woowi. Pukara'en maako tokki mo.
Luka 22.68: Nde o yotti nokkuure man, o wi'i ɓe: “Tore Allah ngam taa on ndo'o nder jarribeeki.”
Luka 22.69: Nden o daayti ɓe baakin sakkinannde hayre, o tuggi koppi, o waɗi do'a,
Luka 22.70: o wi'i: “Baabiraawo, to a muuyi, ittanam jardugel torra nge'el. Ammaa taa waɗ ko muuyo am yiɗi, sey ko ngo ma yiɗi.”
Luka 22.71: Nden malaa'ikaajo waŋgani mo diga asama ngam semmbiɗingo mo.
Luka 22.72: Nde ɗum suni mo masin, o waɗi do'a bee tiinaare, wulweende maako laati bana toɓɓe ƴiiƴam dow lesdi.
Luka 22.74: Ɓaawo waɗugo do'a, o ummi, o lorti haa pukara'en, o tawi ɓe ɗaani ngam comri suno.
Luka 22.75: O wi'i ɓe: “Ngam ɗume ɗaanotooɗon? Umme, tore ngam taa on nasta jarribeeki!”
Luka 22.77: Nde Yeesu ɗon wolwa tawon, yimɓe ngari. Bi'eteeɗo Yahuuda, gooto nder sappo e ɗiɗo go ɗon ardi ɓe. O ɓaditi Yeesu ngam o hebbo ɗum.
Luka 22.78: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Yahuuda, bee kebbaaki zammbortooɗa
Luka 22.81: Nde wonduɓe bee Yeesu ngi'i ko tammi laataago, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, min coppa ɓe bee kaafahi na?”
Luka 22.82: Gooto maɓɓe soppi suka hooreejo liman'en, ta'i mo nofru nyaamru.
Luka 22.83: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i: “Acce ɗum!” O meemi nofru gorko go, o yamɗitini mo.
Luka 22.85: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu wi'i mawɓe liman'en e mawɓe aynooɓe
Luka 22.87: e ndotti'en warɓe naŋngugo mo: “Koni on ngari bee kaafaaje e cabbi ngam naŋngugo yam bana mi pasoowo?
Luka 22.88: Nyalɗe fuu mi ɗonno bee mooɗon nder haykaliiru, on naŋngaay yam. Ammaa jonta ɗum saa'iire mooɗon e baawɗe nyiɓre
Luka 22.91: Ɓe naŋngi Yeesu, ɓe njahri mo haa saare hooreejo liman'en. Piyer ɗonno tokki ɓe daayiiɗum.
Luka 22.92: Ɓe kuɓɓi yiite caka daldal saare, ɓe fuu ɓe njooɗodi. Piyer boo jooɗi caka maɓɓe.
Luka 22.93: Paanyo debbo, korɗo nder saare man yi'i o ɗon jooɗi kommbi yiite, laari mo, wi'i: “Gorko oo boo ɗonno wondi bee maako.”
Luka 22.94: Ammaa Piyer yeddi ɗum, wi'i: “Kay debbo, mi anndaa mo sam.”
Luka 22.95: Ɓaawo seɗɗa goɗɗo feere boo yi'i mo, wi'i: “An boo, a gooto maɓɓe.” O wi'i: “Kay! Gorko, mi wonaay nder maɓɓe.”
Luka 22.96: Ɓaawo saa'iire woore goɗɗo feere tabitini haala man, wi'i: “Fakat gorko oo ɗonno wondi bee maako, o Galiiliijo maa!”
Luka 22.97: Piyer jaabi: “Gorko, mi anndaa ko ngiɗɗa wi'go.” Diga o timminaay wolwugo, asgumri
Luka 22.99: Jawmiraawo yeesiti, laari Piyer. Nden Piyer siftori ko Jawmiraawo wi'no mo: “Hiddeko asgumri u'a hannde, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.”
Luka 22.100: Piyer wurti haa yaasi, woyi masin.
Luka 22.102: Yimɓe aynooɓe Yeesu njanci mo, ɓe piyi mo.
Luka 22.103: Ɓe cuddi gite maako, ɓe ƴami: “Heɓtu, moy fiyi ma?”
Luka 22.104: Ɓe mbolwani mo bolle kuɗooje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
Luka 22.106: Nde weeti, ndotti'en Yahuudu'en e mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta mooɓtotiri, ɓe ngaddi Yeesu haa dawriinde maɓɓe.
Luka 22.107: Ɓe mbi'i: “To an woni Almasiihu, wi' min.” Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “To mi wi'i on ɗum, on nuɗɗintaa.
Luka 22.108: To mi ƴami on boo on njaabataako.
Luka 22.112: Ɓe fuu ɓe mbi'i: “An kam a
Luka 22.114: na?” O jaabi ɓe: “Nonnon bana on mbi'i.”
Luka 22.115: Nden ɓe mbi'i: “En ngoodi haaje seedamku fahin na? Enen bee ko'e meeɗen en nani ɗum diga hunnduko maako!”

Luka 23.1: Ɓe ummodi ɓe fuu, ɓe njahri Yeesu haa Pilaatu.
Luka 23.2: Ɓe puɗɗi wullaago mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Min tawi gorko oo ɗon ummina tuurtol caka ummaatoore amin, o ɗon haɗa yimɓe yoɓugo garaama haa Kaysara, o ɗon wi'a boo kaŋko woni Almasiihu, laamiiɗo.”
Luka 23.3: Pilaatu ƴami mo bana ni'i: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Nonnon bana mbi'ɗa.”
Luka 23.4: Pilaatu wi'i mawɓe liman'en e mooɓre fuu: “Mi tawaay koo ɗume haa gorko oo ngam hiitaago mo.”
Luka 23.5: Ammaa ɓe tiinani wi'ugo: “O ɗon tuurtina ummaatoore bee waazingo nder lesdi Yahuuda diga Galiili, haa yotti haa ɗo.”
Luka 23.7: Nde Pilaatu nani ɗum, o ƴami to gorko oo o Galiiliijo.
Luka 23.8: Nde o nani Yeesu iwi haa maral laamu Hirudus, o neldi mo haa Hirudus, ngam nyalɗe man Hirudus ɗonno haa Urusaliima.
Luka 23.9: Nde Hirudus yi'i Yeesu, o seyi seyo maŋngo, ngam duuri o yiɗno yi'ugo mo, ngam o nani ko ɓe mbi'no dow maako, o tammi o yi'anno Yeesu waɗan alaama kaayeefiiha feere.
Luka 23.10: O ƴami mo ƴamɗe ɗuuɗɗe, ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo koo ɗume.
Luka 23.11: Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗonno ton. Ɓe ngulli mo bee semmbe.
Luka 23.12: Hirudus e sooje'en muuɗum njanci mo e ɓe njawi mo. Ɓe ɓorni mo mojaare ɗelkannde, ɓe lorni mo haa Pilaatu.
Luka 23.13: Nyannde man nden Hirudus e Pilaatu coobiri, ngam aran ɓe narrataano.
Luka 23.15: Pilaatu mooɓti mawɓe liman'en e mawɓe yimɓe e yimɓe fuu.
Luka 23.16: O wi'i ɓe: “On ngaddani yam goɗɗo oo bee wi'go o ɗon ummina tuurtol caka ummaatoore. Ndaa, mi ƴami mo yeeso mooɗon, mi tawaay aybewol haa maako nder ko ngullirɗon mo.
Luka 23.17: Hirudus boo tawaay, ngam o lorni mo haa meeɗen. Gorko oo waɗaay koo ɗume ko he'i mbarugo mo.
Luka 23.18: Ngam maajum mi ɓoccan mo, mi yoofan mo.”
Luka 23.19: Ngam kala juulde Paska fuu, doole Pilaatu yoofana ɓe fursinaajo
Luka 23.21: Ɓe puɗɗi wookugo bee semmbe, ɓe fuu: “Mbar gorko oo! Yoofan min Barabbas!”
Luka 23.22: Gorko oo nastinaama fursina ngam fitina feere nder berniwol e ngam daliila mbar-hoore boo.
Luka 23.23: Pilaatu wolwani ɓe fahin ngam o yiɗi yoofugo Yeesu.
Luka 23.24: Ɓe kooli bee sawtu: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal! Ɓil mo!”
Luka 23.25: Pilaatu wi'i ɓe nde tataɓre: “Aybe ɗume o waɗi? Mi tawaay aybe haa maako ko he'i mbareego sam. Mi ɓoccan mo, nden mi yoofa mo.”
Luka 23.26: Ammaa ɓe tiinani ɗum, ɓe mbaɗi hoolo maŋngo, ɓe ngiɗi o ɓile haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Hoolo maɓɓe jaali mo.
Luka 23.27: Pilaatu yerdi waɗango ɓe ko ɓe ƴami.
Luka 23.28: O yoofi nastinaaɗo fursina ngam fitina e mbar-hoore, mo ɓe ƴami go, o hokki ɓe Yeesu haa ɓe mbaɗa mo ɗum ko ɓe ngiɗi fuu.
Luka 23.30: Nde ɓe ɗon njahra Yeesu, ɓe potti bee Simon, goɗɗo Sirene, ɗonno warta ladde. Ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe ndoondi mo gaafaaŋgal haa o tokko Yeesu ɓaawo.
Luka 23.32: Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde tokki mo. Rewɓe piyi biɓɓe muuɗum'en, mboyi mo.
Luka 23.33: Yeesu yeesiti gal maɓɓe, wi'i: “Rewɓe Urusaliima, taa mboye ngam am. Ammaa mboyane ko'e mon e ɓiɓɓe mooɗon.
Luka 23.34: Ngam ndaa, nyalɗe ngaran ɗe ɓe mbi'an: Seyo laatani rewɓe rimarɓe, ɓen meeɗaay danyugo e musiningo.
Luka 23.35: Nden yimɓe mbi'an kooseeje: Ndo'e dow amin! Ɓe mbi'an towndiije boo: Cudde min
Luka 23.37: Ngam to ɓe ngaɗani leggal keccal bana nii, noy ɗum laatorto ngam joorŋgal boo?”
Luka 23.39: Ɓe njahri worɓe halluɓe ɗiɗo, ngam haa ɓe mbarda ɓe bee Yeesu.
Luka 23.40: Nde ɓe njotti haa nokkuure wi'eteende Gumbal-hoore, ɓe ɓili mo ton, bee halluɓe ɗiɗo go fuu, gooto haa nyaamo, gooto boo haa nano.
Luka 23.41: Yeesu wi'i: “Baabiraawo, yaafa ɓe, ngam ɓe anndaa ko ɓe mbaɗata.” Ɓe cenndi limce maako hakkunde maɓɓe bee fiyugo caaca
Luka 23.43: Ummaatoore ɗonno ndari ton, laara. Mawɓe Yahuudu'en njanci mo, ɓe mbi'i: “O hisni woɗɓe, o hisna hoore maako boo kadi, to o Almasiihu, mo Allah, cuɓaaɗo!”
Luka 23.44: Sooje'en boo njanci mo, ɓe ɓaditi mo, ɓe ndokki mo lammuɗam,
Luka 23.45: ɓe mbi'i: “To a laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en kam, hisnu hoore ma kadi!”
Luka 23.46: Ɓe mbinndi haa dow leggal gaafaaŋgal ngal ɓe ɓili mo: “Oo woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Luka 23.48: Gooto nder halluɓe ɓildaaɓe bee maako go, huɗi mo, wi'i: “Naa an woni Almasiihu na? Hisnu hoore ma an e minin boo!”
Luka 23.49: Ammaa ɗiɗaɓo feli mo, wi'i: “A hulataa Allah na? An, a kiitaaɗo boo.
Luka 23.50: Ngam meeɗen kam kiita ka foti deydey kuuɗe meeɗen, ammaa kaŋko walaa halleende nde o waɗi.”
Luka 23.51: Nden o wi'i: “Yeesu, siftoram saa'i ngarata nder laamu maaɗa.”
Luka 23.52: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmaami, hannde a wondan bee am nder aljanna.”
Luka 23.54: Yaake man ɗum caka nyalawma, nden nyiɓre waɗi dow lesdi fuu haa yotti saa'a tati. Naaŋge moji. Wiirndallo nder
Luka 23.58: Yeesu towni sawtu bee semmbe, wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, mi ɗon halfina ruuhu am nder juŋngo maaɗa.” Ɓaawo nde o wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o maayi
Luka 23.60: Nde ardiiɗo dow sooje'en Roma teemerre yi'i ko laati, o teddini Allah, o wi'i: “Fakat, gorko oo o adiliijo.”
Luka 23.61: Yimɓe warnooɓe laarugo fuu, nde ɓe ngi'i ko laati, ɓe kuuci, ɓe ɗon piya biɓɓe maɓɓe
Luka 23.63: Soobiraaɓe maako fuu e rewɓe tokkinooɓe mo diga Galiili, ndari daayiiɗum, ɗon ndaara kuuje ɗe'e
Luka 23.66: Woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, mo berniwol lesdi Yahuuda, bi'eteeŋgol Arimate. O booɗɗo, adiliijo. O ɗonno reena garoyki laamu Allah. O ɗon caka dawrooɓe, ammaa o hawtanaay woɗɓe nder dabare e kuuɗe maɓɓe.
Luka 23.67: O yehi haa Pilaatu, o ƴami ɗum ɓanndu Yeesu.
Luka 23.68: O jippini ndu diga gaafaaŋgal, o hasni ndu bee kasa kesa, nden o wallini ndu nder yenaande wasaande nder tapaare, nde goɗɗo meeɗaay wallineego nder muuɗum.
Luka 23.69: Ɗum nyannde taaskara siwtorde. Nde ɓadino nastugo.
Luka 23.71: Rewɓe wardunooɓe bee Yeesu diga Galiili, njahdi bee Yusufu, ɓe ndaari yenaande e bana noy ɓanndu Yeesu wallinira.
Luka 23.72: Ɓe lori, ɓe taaskitini leɗɗe uurɗe e uurdi.

Luka 24.1: Nyalaade Alat fajiri cub, rewɓe go njehi haa yenaande, ɓe njahri uurle ɗe ɓe taaskuno.
Luka 24.2: Ɓe tawi hayre maɓɓunoonde yenaande go, ɗon talli haa sera.
Luka 24.3: Ɓe nasti, ammaa ɓe tawaay ɓanndu Jawmiraawo Yeesu.
Luka 24.4: Nde ɓe ɗon cakli dow ɗum ko laati, ndaa worɓe ɗiɗo mbaŋgani ɓe, ɓe ɗon ɓorni limce ɗelkanɗe.
Luka 24.5: Rewɓe go kultori, kippi geese muuɗum'en, ammaa worɓe man mbi'i: “Koni ɗaɓɓititton geeto caka maayɓe?
Luka 24.6: O walaaɗon haa ɗo, o ummitake. Ciftore ko o wi'no on yaake o ɗonno lesdi Galiili:
Luka 24.9: hokke haa juuɗe hakke'en, o ɓile haa leggal gaafaaŋgal, o ummito nyalaade tataɓre
Luka 24.13: Ɓe acci yenaande, ɓe njehi anndingo kuuje ɗe'e fuu haa pukara'en sappo e ngo'o e yimɓe woɗɓe fuu.
Luka 24.14: Kamɓe ngoni: Mariyama mo Magdala e Yowanna e Mariyama daada Yaakuba e rewɓe woɗɓe wonduɓe bee maɓɓe.
Luka 24.15: Pukara'en ndaari haala rewɓe bana meereeha, ɓe nuɗɗinaay ɓe.
Luka 24.16: Ammaa Piyer ummi, doggi, yehi haa yenaande. O yurni, o yi'aay koo ɗume, sey leppi haa lesdi. Nden o hooti, o hayɗini dow ko laati.
Luka 24.18: Nyannde man nden pukara'en ɗiɗo ɗonno njaha haa wuro wi'eteeŋgo Emmawus, kilomeetir sappo e go'o bee Urusaliima.
Luka 24.19: Ɓe ɗonno ngeewta dow ko laati ɗo fuu.
Luka 24.20: Nde ɓe ɗon ngeewtida hakkunde maɓɓe, Yeesu bee hoore mum ɓaditi, ɗon yahda bee maɓɓe.
Luka 24.21: Ɓe ngi'i mo, ammaa woodi ko haɗi ɓe anndititgo mo.
Luka 24.22: Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Dow ɗume ngeewtoton nder yahdu mon?” Nden ɓe ndari, ɓe suniiɓe.
Luka 24.23: Gooto maɓɓe bi'eteeɗo Keleyopas jaabi mo: “An feere ma woni koɗo nder Urusaliima ɗo mo anndaa ko laati balɗe ɗe'e na?”
Luka 24.24: O ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume laati?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ko laati dow Yeesu, mo Nasaratu, annabiijo baawɗo nder kuuɗe e bolle yeeso Allah e yeeso ummaatoore fuu,
Luka 24.25: no mawɓe liman'en amin e mawɓe amin zammbori mo, ngam o hiite kiita maayde. Ɓe ɓili mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Luka 24.26: Min tammino kaŋko rimɗintano Isra'iila. Ammaa bee maajum fuu, hannde nyalaade tataɓre ko kuuje ɗe'e laatori.
Luka 24.27: Fahin rewɓe woɗɓe caka amin kayɗini min, ngam hannde subaha ɓe njehi haa yenaande,
Luka 24.28: ɓe tawaay ɓanndu maako. Ɓe ngarti, ɓe mbi'i min malaa'ika'en mbaŋgani ɓe, mbi'i ɓe o geeto.
Luka 24.29: Woɗɓe caka amin njehi haa yenaande, tawi kuuje man bana rewɓe mbi'i non, ammaa kaŋko, ɓe ngi'aay mo.”
Luka 24.31: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Hey onon sooya-faamu'en, neeɓa-ɓerɗe'en haa nuɗɗingo ko annabi'en mbi'i fuu!
Luka 24.32: Naa doole Almasiihu torroro kuuje ɗe'e fuu hiddeko o nasta tedduŋgal maako na?”
Luka 24.33: O fuɗɗiri diga defte Muusa haa defte annabi'en fuu, o faamtini ɓe ko winnda nder defte dow maako fuu.
Luka 24.35: Nde ɓe ɓadake wuro ngo ɓe njahata, o waɗi bana o saaloto.
Luka 24.36: Ammaa ɓe ɓilli mo bee wi'go: “Jooɗoda bee amin, ngam hiiri, jemma ɓadake.” O nasti ngam weerdugo bee maɓɓe.
Luka 24.37: Nde o jooɗi bee maɓɓe haa o nyaama, o hoo'i tamseere, o barkiɗini nde, o yewi nde, o hokki ɓe.
Luka 24.38: Nden gite maɓɓe maɓɓiti, ɓe annditi mo, ammaa o majjiti gite maɓɓe.
Luka 24.39: Ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri caka maɓɓe: “Ɓerɗe meeɗen ngulaay nder meeɗen nde o wolwani en haa laawol, o faamtini en ko winnda nder defte go na?”
Luka 24.41: Nder wakkati man nden ɓe ummi, ɓe lorti haa Urusaliima, ɓe tawti pukara'en sappo e go'o e wonduɓe bee mum'en ɗon mooɓti,
Luka 24.42: ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Fakat Jawmiraawo ummitake, o waŋgani Simon boo.”
Luka 24.43: Kamɓe boo ɓe ngecci ɓe ko tawi ɓe haa laawol, no ɓe annditiri Yeesu wakkati o senndi tamseere boo.
Luka 24.45: Yaake nde ɓe ɗon mbolwa haala man, Yeesu bee hoore mum waŋgi, dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Salaaman laatano on.”
Luka 24.46: Pukara'en keewi kultoreeŋgol, ɓe tammi ɓe ngi'i ginnawol.
Luka 24.47: Ammaa o wi'i ɓe: “Ngam ɗume on ɗon cakli? Ngam ɗume sekuye heewi ɓerɗe mooɗon?
Luka 24.48: Ndaare juuɗe am e kosɗe am, ɗum min. Meemeeɗam, ndaare, ngam ruuhu walaa kusel e i'e bana ngi'oton mi mari.”
Luka 24.49: Nde o wi'i ɓe ɗum, o holli ɓe juuɗe maako e kosɗe maako.
Luka 24.50: Nder seyo e hayɗinaare maɓɓe, ɓe mbaawaay nuɗɗingo tawon. Nden o wi'i ɓe: “On ngoodi nyaamdu haa ɗo na?”
Luka 24.51: Ɓe ngaddani mo taƴre liiŋgu ca'aaŋgu
Luka 24.53: O hoo'i ɗum, o nyaami yeeso maɓɓe.
Luka 24.54: Nden o wi'i: “Ɗum ko mbi'no mi on yaake mi ɗonno bee mooɗon tawon: Doole ko winnda dow am nder tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en e Jabuura fuu hebbitine.”
Luka 24.55: Nden o maɓɓitani ɓe faamu haa ɓe paama defte,
Luka 24.56: o wi'i ɓe: “Bana nii ɗum winnda: Almasiihu torroto, o ummititto diga maayde nyalaade tataɓre,
Luka 24.57: bee innde maako ɓe ngaazinan yimɓe ummaatooje fuu haa ɓe tuuba e ɓe keɓa yaafuye hakkeeji, ɗum fuɗɗa haa Urusaliima.
Luka 24.59: Ndaa, mi neldanan on mo Baabiraawo am iini. Njooɗe nder berniwol haa to on keɓi baawɗe iwɗe diga dow
Luka 24.62: Yeesu yahri ɓe yaasi berniwol, heedi Baytaniya. O ɓaŋgti juuɗe maako, o barkiɗini ɓe.
Luka 24.63: Yaake o ɗon barkiɗina ɓe, o senndiri bee maɓɓe, o eeŋgi haa asama
Luka 24.65: Kamɓe boo, ɓe cujidani mo, ɓaawo man ɓe kooti haa Urusaliima bee seyo maŋngo.

Yuhanna 1.1: Haa fuɗɗam, woodi bi'eteeɗo Wolde. Wolde man ɗonno haa kommbi Allah, kayre woni Allah.
Yuhanna 1.2: Nde ɗonno haa kommbi Allah diga fuɗɗam.
Yuhanna 1.3: Allah tagri koo ɗume fuu bee maare, walaa ko taga bilaa maare.
Yuhanna 1.4: Ngeendam iwi haa maare, ngeendam man woni annoora yimɓe.
Yuhanna 1.5: Annoora ɗon yayna nder nyiɓre, ammaa nyiɓre waawaay haɗugo ka
Yuhanna 1.8: Allah neli goɗɗo mo innde muuɗum Yuhanna
Yuhanna 1.10: O wari ngam seedanaago annoora go, ngam haa yimɓe fuu nuɗɗina ka.
Yuhanna 1.11: O laataaki annoora kaŋko bee hoore maako, ammaa o wari seedanaago annoora.
Yuhanna 1.12: Wolde go woni annoora ngooŋɗuka, ka wari nder duniyaaru, ka ɗon yaynana yimɓe fuu.
Yuhanna 1.14: Wolde man ɗonno nder duniyaaru, Allah tagri duniyaaru bee maare, ammaa duniyaaru annditaay nde.
Yuhanna 1.15: Nde wari haa yimɓe maare, ammaa yimɓe maare njaɓaay nde.
Yuhanna 1.16: Ammaa haa jaɓɓe nde, nuɗɗinɓe nde fuu, nde hokki ɓe baawɗe laataago ɓiɓɓe Allah.
Yuhanna 1.17: Ɓe ndanyaaka fodde ɗabiya yimɓe malla muuyo yimɓe, ammaa ɗum Allah laatini ɓe ɓiɓɓe muuɗum.
Yuhanna 1.19: Wolde go laati neɗɗo marɗo ɓanndu, o jooɗi caka meeɗen. O keewɗo mo'ere e gooŋga. Min ngi'i tedduŋgal maako, ɗum tedduŋgal Ɓiɗɗo bajjo mo Baabiraawo.
Yuhanna 1.20: Yuhanna seedani mo, wolwi bee sawtu, wi'i: “Kaŋko woni mo mi wolwi dow muuɗum, mi wi'i: O waran ɓaawo am, ammaa o ɓuri yam, ngam o ɗon diga mi siwaa danyeego.”
Yuhanna 1.22: En fuu en keɓi geɗal meeɗen haa jeynitaaje maako, en keɓi mo'ere dow mo'ere.
Yuhanna 1.23: Tawreeta hokkaama bee juŋngo Muusa, ammaa mo'ere e gooŋga mbaŋgi bee Yeesu Almasiihu.
Yuhanna 1.24: Walaa mo meeɗi yi'ugo Allah. Ammaa
Yuhanna 1.27: , ɗakkotirɗo bee Baabiraawo, kaŋko anndini en mo.
Yuhanna 1.29: Ndaa seedamku Yuhanna nde Yahuudu'en Urusaliima neli liman'en e Lewi'en haa maako ngam ƴamugo mo: “An a moye?”
Yuhanna 1.30: O salaaki jaabaago, o waŋgini ɗum laaɓɗum, o wi'i: “Naa min woni Almasiihu.”
Yuhanna 1.31: Ɓe ƴami mo: “A moy kadi? A Eliya na?” O jaabi: “Aa'a, naa mi Eliya.” Ɓe mbi'i: “A annabiijo mo min ndeenata na?” O jaabi: “Aa'a
Yuhanna 1.33: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “E a moy kadi? Haa min keɓa lornango nelɓe min jaawaabu. Ɗume a wi'anta hoore ma, an?”
Yuhanna 1.35: “Min woni mo annabi Esaaya wolwi dow muuɗum, wi'i:
Yuhanna 1.36: Goɗɗo ɗon hoola nder ladde, ɗon wi'a:
Yuhanna 1.40: Nelaaɓe warɓe haa Yuhanna go, ɗum Farisa'en.
Yuhanna 1.41: Ɓe ƴami mo: “To a laataaki Almasiihu malla Eliya malla boo annabiijo go, ngam ɗume a ɗon waɗa baptisma?”
Yuhanna 1.42: Yuhanna jaabi ɓe: “Min mi ɗon waɗa baptisma nder ndiyam, ammaa woodi goɗɗo caka mooɗon, on anndaa mo.
Yuhanna 1.43: O waran ɓaawo am, ammaa mi he'aay koo fiistugo ɓoggi paɗe maako.”
Yuhanna 1.45: Fuu ɗum waɗi haa wuro Baytaniya, gaɗa maayo Urdun, haa Yuhanna waɗanta yimɓe baptisma.
Yuhanna 1.47: Jaŋngo man Yuhanna yi'i Yeesu ɗon wara haa maako, o wi'i: “Ndaa jawgel Allah ittanŋgel hakkeeji duniyaaru.
Yuhanna 1.48: Kaŋko woni mo mi wolwani on haala mum, mi wi'i: Goɗɗo waran ɓaawo am, ammaa o ɓuri yam, ngam o ɗon diga mi siwaa danyeego.
Yuhanna 1.49: Mi anndaano mo, ammaa mi wari waɗugo baptisma bee ndiyam ngam haa o waŋgana Isra'iila'en.”
Yuhanna 1.51: Yuhanna waɗi seedamku, wi'i fahin: “Mi yi'i Ruuhu Allah jippi diga asama bana poola, wari jooɗi dow maako.
Yuhanna 1.52: Min mi anndaano mo, ammaa Allah mo neli yam waɗugo baptisma bee ndiyam, wi'i yam: A yi'an Ruuhu jippoto, jooɗo dow goɗɗo, kaŋko o waɗan baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Yuhanna 1.53: Min mi yi'i ɗum, mi seedake kaŋko woni
Yuhanna 1.56: Jaŋngo man Yuhanna ɗonno dari fahin haa nokkuure go tawon bee pukara'en
Yuhanna 1.58: Nde o yi'i Yeesu ɗon saalo, o wi'i: “Ndaa jawgel Allah.”
Yuhanna 1.59: Pukara'en ɗiɗo go nani ko o wi'i, ɓe tokki Yeesu.
Yuhanna 1.60: Yeesu yeesiti, yi'i ɓe ɗon tokki mo, o ƴami ɓe: “Ko ɗaɓɓititton?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Rabbi, toy njooɗiiɗaa?” Rabbi yiɗi wi'go moodibbo.
Yuhanna 1.61: O wi'i ɓe: “Ngare, on ngi'an.” Nden ɓe njehi, ɓe ngi'i haa o jooɗi. Nyannde man ɓe kiirtidi, ɗum ɗonno baakin saa'a nayi.
Yuhanna 1.63: Andire deerɗiraawo Simon Piyer, o gooto nder nanɓe seedamku Yuhanna, kaŋko o tokki Yeesu.
Yuhanna 1.64: Andire tawi deerɗum Simon aran, wi'i mo: “Min tawi Almasiihu.” Almasiihu yiɗi wi'go moytaaɗo.
Yuhanna 1.65: O yahri mo haa Yeesu. Yeesu laari mo, wi'i: “An woni Simon ɓii Yuhanna, yeeso ɗo innde ma laatoto Kefas. Kefas yiɗi wi'go Tapaare.”
Yuhanna 1.67: Jaŋngo man, Yeesu yiɗi yahugo lesdi Galiili. O tawi Filip, o wi'i mo: “Tokkam!”
Yuhanna 1.68: Filip iwi wuro Baytisayda, wuro maako wooto bee Andire e Piyer.
Yuhanna 1.69: Filip boo tawi Natanayel, wi'i mo: “Min tawi mo Muusa wolwi dow muuɗum nder tawreeta e annabi'en boo mbolwi haala maako, kaŋko woni Yeesu mo Nasaratu, ɓii Yusufu.”
Yuhanna 1.70: Natanayel wi'i mo: “Huunde woonde iwan diga Nasaratu na?” Filip wi'i: “War, laar!”
Yuhanna 1.72: Nde Yeesu yi'i Natanayel ɗon wara haa maako, o wolwi dow maako, o wi'i: “Ndaa goɗɗo laatiiɗo Isra'iilaajo bee gooŋga, mo walaa naafikaare sam.”
Yuhanna 1.73: Natanayel ƴami mo: “Noy anndirɗa mi?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Mi yi'i ma nde a ɗonno les ibbi, diga Filip ewnaaki ma tawon.”
Yuhanna 1.74: Nden Natanayel wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, an woni
Yuhanna 1.77: Yeesu jaabi mo: “A nuɗɗini ngam mi wi'i mi yi'i ma les ibbi na? A yi'an kuuje ɓuranɗe kuuje ɗe'e mawnugo.”
Yuhanna 1.78: O wi'i mo fahin: “Gooŋga mi wi'ete, on ngi'an asama maɓɓitake, malaa'ika'en Allah ɗon eeŋga, ɗon njippo dow

Yuhanna 2.1: Nyalɗe ɗiɗi ɓaawo maajum, ɓaŋgal waɗi haa Kana nder lesdi Galiili. Daada
Yuhanna 2.3: Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum boo ewnaama haa ɓaŋgal man.
Yuhanna 2.4: Nde inaboojam timmi haa maɓɓe, daada Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ɓe ngalaa inaboojam.”
Yuhanna 2.5: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Debbo, ko yaalu ma bee am? Wakkati am siwaa wargo tawon.”
Yuhanna 2.6: Nden daada maako wi'i suka'en: “Mbaɗe ko o wi'ata on fuu.”
Yuhanna 2.8: Haa ton, woodi looɗe kaa'e joweego, Yahuudu'en ɗon kuuwtinira ɗe ngam laɓɓineeki, fodde umroore diina maɓɓe. Looɗe man, woore maaje fuu ɗon hoo'a ndiyam baakin liitir teemerre.
Yuhanna 2.9: Yeesu wi'i suka'en: “Kebbine looɗe ɗe'e bee ndiyam.” Ɓe kebbini ɗe.
Yuhanna 2.10: Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Jonta, nyeɗe, njahrane kaliifaajo ɓaŋgal
Yuhanna 2.12: Kaliifaajo ɓaŋgal metti ɗam, tawi ndiyam laatake inaboojam. Ammaa o anndaa haa toy inaboojam ɗam iwi, sey suka'en nyeɗnooɓe ndiyam go anndi. O ewni ɓaŋɗo,
Yuhanna 2.13: o wi'i mo: “Koo moy ɗon aarta hokkugo ewnaaɓe mum inaboojam mbooɗɗam. To yimɓe nguyki, o hokkan ɓe famɗa-dakamjam. Ammaa an a sigi inaboojam mbooɗɗam haa jonta!”
Yuhanna 2.15: Kanjum woni kaayeefiwol ngol Yeesu aarti waɗugo. O waɗi ngol haa Kana nder lesdi Galiili. O waŋgini tedduŋgal maako. Pukara'en maako nuɗɗini mo.
Yuhanna 2.17: Ɓaawo man, o yehi Kafarnahum bee daada maako e deerɗiraaɓe maako e pukara'en maako, ɓe njooɗi ton nyalɗe seɗɗa
Yuhanna 2.24: O tawi soorrooɓe na'i e baali e pooli nder haykaliiru, o tawi boo sannjooɓe ceede ɗon njooɗi ton.
Yuhanna 2.25: O hawti ɓoggi, o waɗi ɓoccol, o riiwi ɓe bee baali maɓɓe e na'i maɓɓe fuu diga
Yuhanna 2.27: O hippi taabe sannjooɓe ceede haa ceede maɓɓe caŋkiti.
Yuhanna 2.28: O wi'i soorrooɓe pooli boo: “Cottine ɗi, taa laatine suudu Baabiraawo am suudu filu!”
Yuhanna 2.29: Pukara'en maako ciftori ko winnda nder Deftere: “Yiide nde marmi ngam suudu ma, ɗon wula nder ɓernde am bana yiite
Yuhanna 2.32: Ammaa Yahuudu'en ƴami mo: “Kaayeefiwol ngole a waɗata ngam hollugo min a woodi baawɗe waɗugo bana nii?”
Yuhanna 2.33: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ngibbine haykaliiru ndu'u, min mi mahitan ndu nder nyalɗe tati
Yuhanna 2.35: Nden Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo: “Ɓe mahi haykaliiru ndu nder duuɓi cappanɗe nayi e joweego. An a mahitan ndu nder nyalɗe tati?”
Yuhanna 2.37: Ammaa kaŋko o wolwani ɓe dow ɓanndu maako laatiindu haykaliiru.
Yuhanna 2.38: Nde Yeesu ummiti diga maayde, pukara'en maako ciftori ko o wolwino, ɓe nuɗɗini ko winnda nder Deftere e bolle ɗe Yeesu wi'no fuu.
Yuhanna 2.40: Yaake Yeesu ɗonno haa Urusaliima nder nyalɗe juulde
Yuhanna 2.42: ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini mo ngam ɓe ngi'i kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗi.
Yuhanna 2.43: Ammaa Yeesu hoolaaki ɓe ngam o anndi yimɓe fuu.
Yuhanna 2.44: O walaa haaje goɗɗo anndina mo haala yimɓe, ngam o anndi ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.

Yuhanna 3.1: Woodino goɗɗo nder Farisa'en, innde maako Nikodemus, o gooto nder ardiiɓe Yahuudu'en.
Yuhanna 3.2: O wari haa Yeesu bee jemma, o wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi a ekkitinoowo mo Allah neli ɗum, ngam walaa koo gooto waawata waɗugo kaayeefiiji bana ɗi a waɗata, sonaa to Allah ɗon wondi bee maako.”
Yuhanna 3.3: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata ma: To neɗɗo danyaaka ɗiɗawre, o waawataa yi'ugo laamu Allah.”
Yuhanna 3.4: Nikodemus ƴami mo: “To neɗɗo ndottidi, noy o heɓrata danyeego fahin? O waawan nastugo reedu daada maako, o danye fahin na?”
Yuhanna 3.5: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata ma: To neɗɗo danyaaka fahin bee ndiyam e bee Ruuhu, nden kam o waawataa nastugo laamu Allah.
Yuhanna 3.6: Ko danya e yimɓe, ɗum ɓanndu tan. Ko danya e Ruuhu, ɗum ruuhu.
Yuhanna 3.7: Taa hayɗin ngam mi wi'i ma: Haani on ndanye ɗiɗawre.
Yuhanna 3.8: Henndu ɗon wifa haa ndu muuyi fuu, a ɗon nana sonyo maaru, ammaa a heɓtataa toy ndu iwi malla toy ndu yahata. Bana non ɗum laatanto danyaaɗo diga Ruuhu.”
Yuhanna 3.10: Yeesu jaabi mo: “An a moodibbo Isra'iila'en, a anndaa ɗum na?
Yuhanna 3.11: Gooŋga mi wi'ata ma: Minin min ɗon mbolwa ko min anndi, min ɗon ceedo ko min ngi'i bee gite amin, ammaa bee non fuu on njaɓataa seedamku amin.
Yuhanna 3.12: To on nuɗɗinaay yam nde mi wolwani on haala kuuje duniyaaru, noy on nuɗɗinirta to mi wolwanan on haala kuuje asama?
Yuhanna 3.13: Walaa mo meeɗi yahugo haa asama, sonaa mo iwi haa asama, waato
Yuhanna 3.16: Bana no Muusa ɓiliri mboodi njamndi mboɗeeri dow leggal nder ladde, bana non boo sey
Yuhanna 3.20: ngam haa koo moy nuɗɗini mo heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Yuhanna 3.21: Allah yiɗi duniyaaru masin. Ngam maajum o hokki
Yuhanna 3.23: maako bajjo. Koo moy nuɗɗini Ɓiɗɗo oo, halkataa, ammaa o heɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Yuhanna 3.24: Allah nelaay Ɓiɗɗo mum nder duniyaaru ngam hiitaago ndu, ammaa ngam haa duniyaaru heɓra kisndam bee maako
Yuhanna 3.29: oo, o hiitataake. Ammaa mo nuɗɗinaay mo, o hiitaama, ngam o nuɗɗinaay Ɓiɗɗo Allah bajjo.
Yuhanna 3.30: Ndaa no kiita man wa'i: Annoora wari nder duniyaaru, ammaa yimɓe duniyaaru ɓuri yiɗugo nyiɓre dow annoora, ngam kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗe kalluɗe.
Yuhanna 3.31: Ngam koo moy to ɗon waɗa halleende, ɗon wanya annoora, o warataa haa annoora, ngam o hulan taa kuuɗe maako kalluɗe mbaŋga.
Yuhanna 3.32: Ammaa mo ɗon waɗa gooŋga, waran haa annoora, ngam haa ɗum waŋga no o ɗowtani Allah bee kuuɗe maako, kuuɗe maako kuuwaama bee yerduye Allah.”
Yuhanna 3.34: Ɓaawo man Yeesu yahdi bee pukara'en muuɗum haa lesdi Yahudiya. O faɓɓidi bee maɓɓe ton seɗɗa, o waɗani yimɓe baptisma.
Yuhanna 3.35: Yuhanna boo waɗani yimɓe baptisma haa Aynon, ɓadiiɗum bee Salim, ngam ndiyam ɗuuɗɗam ɗon ton. Yimɓe ɗon njaha haa maako ngam waɗaneego baptisma.
Yuhanna 3.36: Saa'i man ɓe nastinaayno Yuhanna haa fursina
Yuhanna 3.40: Ton, ngaaba ummi hakkunde pukara'en Yuhanna e Yahuuduujo dow haala laɓɓineeki.
Yuhanna 3.41: Ɓe njehi haa Yuhanna, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, mo wonduno bee maaɗa gaɗa maayo Urdun, mo a seedino ɗum, ndaa o ɗon waɗana yimɓe baptisma, yimɓe fuu ɗon njaha haa maako.”
Yuhanna 3.42: Yuhanna jaabi ɓe: “Walaa mo heɓata koo ɗume sonaa to Allah hokki mo ɗum.
Yuhanna 3.43: Onon bee ko'e mon on mbaawan seedaago no mi bi'ɗo: Naa min woni Almasiihu, ammaa mi nelaama ngam mi aarta mo
Yuhanna 3.45: Ɓaŋɗo, kaŋko woni marɗo debbo man. Ammaa soobaajo ɓaŋɗo dariiɗo kommbi maako, nananɗo sawtu ɓaŋɗo, seyorto nanugo sawtu ɓaŋɗo masin. Bana non seyo am boo, ngo heewi jonta.
Yuhanna 3.46: Sey maŋngu maako ɓesdo, ngu am boo usto.”
Yuhanna 3.48: Iwɗo diga dow, ɗon dow koo ɗume fuu. Iwɗo haa duniyaaru boo o goɗɗo duniyaaru, o ɗon wolwa haala duniyaaru boo. Iwɗo diga asama ɗon dow koo ɗume fuu.
Yuhanna 3.49: O ɗon seedo ko o yi'i e ko o nani, ammaa walaa jaɓanɗo seedamku maako.
Yuhanna 3.50: Mo jaɓi seedamku maako, gooŋɗini Allah o gooŋgaajo.
Yuhanna 3.51: Ngam mo Allah neli ɗon wolwa haala Allah, ngam Allah ɗon hebbina mo bee Ruuhu muuɗum bilaa keerol.
Yuhanna 3.54: hokki mo baawɗe dow koo ɗume fuu
Yuhanna 3.56: Mo nuɗɗini Ɓiɗɗo, heɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam. Mo nuɗɗinaay Ɓiɗɗo heɓataa ngeendam, ammaa tikkere Allah ɗon tabiti dow maako.

Yuhanna 4.1: Farisa'en nani Yeesu ɗon waɗana yimɓe baptisma, ɗon heɓa pukara'en ko ɓuri Yuhanna.
Yuhanna 4.2: Gooŋga man kam, Yeesu bee hoore muuɗum waɗanaay koo gooto baptisma, ammaa ɗum pukara'en maako mbaɗata ɗum.
Yuhanna 4.3: Nde Yeesu nani haala ka'a, o acci lesdi Yahudiya, o lori haa lesdi Galiili.
Yuhanna 4.4: Ngam yahugo ton sey o saalo nder lesdi Samariya.
Yuhanna 4.6: O yotti berniwol bi'eteeŋgol Sikar nder lesdi Samariya, ɓadiiŋgol bee ngesa ka Yaakubu hokkuno ɓiyum Yusufu
Yuhanna 4.8: Ɓulndu Yaakubu ɗon ton. Yeesu somi bee jahaaŋgal, o jooɗi dow ɓulndu. Ɗum caka nyalawma.
Yuhanna 4.10: Debbo Samariyaajo wari nyeɗugo ndiyam. Yeesu wi'i mo: “Hokkam ndiyam mi yara.”
Yuhanna 4.11: Yaake man pukara'en maako njehino haa berniwol ngam soodoygo nyaamdu.
Yuhanna 4.12: Debbo Samariyaajo go wi'i Yeesu: “An a Yahuuduujo, min boo mi Samariyaajo, noy a ƴamratammi ndiyam yarugo?” Ngam walaa ko yaali Yahuudu'en bee Samariya'en
Yuhanna 4.14: Yeesu jaabi mo: “To a anndino dokkal Allah, to a anndino boo moy ƴami ma ndiyam yarugo, a ƴamanno mo, o hokke ndiyam ndokkanɗam ngeendam.”
Yuhanna 4.15: Debbo wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, a walaa cafgal, ɓulndu boo luggi. Noy a heɓrata ndiyam ngeetam man?
Yuhanna 4.16: Kadi a ɓuri kaaka amin Yaakubu dokkuɗo min ɓulndu ndu'u, kaŋko bee hoore maako e ɓikkoy maako ɓe njari haa maaru, non boo dabbaaji maako na?”
Yuhanna 4.17: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Koo moy yari ndiyam ɗa'am, ɗomɗan fahin.
Yuhanna 4.18: Ammaa jaranɗo ndiyam ɗam mi hokkata mo, meetataa ɗomɗugo sam. Ndiyam ɗam mi hokkata mo, laatoto seeɓoore nder maako, seeɓoore ndiyam ndokkanɗam mo ngeendam nduumiiɗam.”
Yuhanna 4.19: Debbo go wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, hokkam ndiyam man, ngam taa mi meeta ɗomɗugo fahin, mi hisa loraago nyeɗugo ndiyam haa ɗo.”
Yuhanna 4.21: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Yah ewnoya gorko ma, on ngara haa ɗo.”
Yuhanna 4.22: Debbo jaabi mo: “Mi walaa gorko.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “A wolwi gooŋga nde a wi'i a walaa gorko.
Yuhanna 4.23: Ngam a woodino worɓe njowo, mo a wondi jonta, naa o gorko ma. Ko a wi'i, ɗum gooŋga.”
Yuhanna 4.24: Nden debbo go wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, mi faami a annabiijo.
Yuhanna 4.25: Kaakiraaɓe amin cujidani Allah dow hooseere nde'e, ammaa onon, on ɗon mbi'a Urusaliima tan woni nokkuure sujidango Allah.”
Yuhanna 4.26: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Debbo, jaɓ ko mi wi'ete: Saa'i waran, nde on cujidanta Allah Baabiraawo, naa dow hooseere nde'e, naa haa Urusaliima.
Yuhanna 4.27: Onon Samariya'en on anndaa mo on cujidanta, ammaa minin Yahuudu'en min anndi mo min cujidanta, ngam kisndam iwi haa Yahuudu'en.
Yuhanna 4.28: Ammaa saa'i waran, ɗum waɗi jonta ma, sujidooɓe bee gooŋga cujidanan Baabiraawo nder Ruuhu e gooŋga. Ngam ɗum irin sujidooɓe ɓe'e Baabiraawo ɗaɓɓata.
Yuhanna 4.29: Allah o Ruuhu, sey sujidanooɓe mo, cujidana mo nder Ruuhu e gooŋga.”
Yuhanna 4.31: Debbo wi'i mo: “Mi anndi Almasiihu, waato moytaaɗo waran. To o wari, o anndinan min kuuje fuu.”
Yuhanna 4.32: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Min bolwananɗo ma woni kaŋko.”
Yuhanna 4.34: Saa'i man pukara'en maako lortoyi. Ɓe kayɗini
Yuhanna 4.35: nde ɓe ngi'i o ɗon wolida bee debbo. Ammaa walaa koo gooto maɓɓe wi'i: “Ko ɗaɓɓata?” Malla: “Ngam ɗume mbolididta bee debbo oo?”
Yuhanna 4.37: Debbo acci mbulku muuɗum, lori nder berniwol, wolwani yimɓe, o wi'i:
Yuhanna 4.38: “Ngare, ndaare goɗɗo mo yecci yam ko mi waɗi fuu. Teema kaŋko woni Almasiihu?”
Yuhanna 4.39: Yimɓe ngurti berniwol, njehi haa Yeesu.
Yuhanna 4.41: Saa'i man pukara'en ɗonno toro Yeesu ngam o nyaama, ɓe ɗonno mbi'a mo: “Moodibbo, nyaam.”
Yuhanna 4.42: Ammaa o wi'i ɓe: “Mi woodi nyaamdu ndu on anndaa.”
Yuhanna 4.43: Pukara'en ƴamƴamtiri: “Woodi mo waddani mo nyaamdu na?”
Yuhanna 4.44: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Nyaamdu am woni waɗugo muuyo nelɗo yam e hiɓɓingo kuugal ngal o umri yam.
Yuhanna 4.45: Naa on ɗon mbi'a lutti lebbi nayi haa wakkati codol waɗa? Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on, ɓaŋgte gite mon, ndaare gese, ƴaamnde ɓenndi, deydey sodugo.
Yuhanna 4.46: Diga jonta wakkati waɗi, codoowo ɗon jaɓa ngeenaari muuɗum, o ɗon mooɓta cammeeje ngam ngeendam nduumiiɗam, ngam haa mo saaki aawdi e mo sodi nyaamle fuu ceyodo.
Yuhanna 4.47: Oo saakan, oya boo sodan, balndol ngo'ol wi'i gooŋga.
Yuhanna 4.48: Mi neli on sodugo haa on kuuwaay sam, woɗɓe kuuwi, onon boo on ɗon naftoro kuuɗe maɓɓe.”
Yuhanna 4.50: Samariya'en ɗuuɗɓe nder berniwol man nuɗɗini Yeesu ngam seedamku ngu debbo seeduno: “O yecci yam ko mi waɗi fuu.”
Yuhanna 4.51: Ngam maajum, nde Samariya'en ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe tori mo o jooɗo haa maɓɓe. Yeesu jooɗi ton nyalɗe ɗiɗi.
Yuhanna 4.52: Ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini Yeesu ngam daliila bolle maako.
Yuhanna 4.53: Ɓe ɗonno mbi'a debbo: “Naa ngam daliila bolle ma fahin min nuɗɗini jonta, ammaa ngam minin bee ko'e amin min nani ko o wi'i, min anndi fakat kaŋko woni kisnoowo duniyaaru.”
Yuhanna 4.55: Ɓaawo paɓɓuki Yeesu ton nyalɗe ɗiɗi, o acci ɓe, o dilli haa lesdi Galiili.
Yuhanna 4.56: Ngam Yeesu bee hoore muuɗum wi'no: “Annabiijo heɓataa tedduŋgal nder lesdi muuɗum
Yuhanna 4.58: Ammaa nde o yotti lesdi Galiili, yimɓe ton njaɓɓi mo booɗɗum, ngam ɓe ngi'i ko o waɗno nder Urusaliima nder juulde Paska. Ngam kamɓe boo ɓe yahnooɓe juulde man
Yuhanna 4.61: Nden Yeesu lori haa wuro Kana nder lesdi Galiili, haa o waylitino ndiyam, o laatinno ɗam inaboojam go. Woodino wakiiliijo laamiiɗo haa Kafarnahum ton, ɓiyum nyawɗo
Yuhanna 4.63: Nde o nani Yeesu wari diga lesdi Yahudiya, o ɗon nder lesdi Galiili, o yehi haa maako, o tori mo o yaha o yamɗitina ɓiŋngel maako gonnooŋgel daande maayde.
Yuhanna 4.64: Yeesu wi'i mo: “To on ngi'aay alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji, on nuɗɗintaa!”
Yuhanna 4.65: Wakiiliijo go wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, war saare am hiddeko ɓiŋngel maaya!”
Yuhanna 4.66: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Hootu, ɓiŋngel ma yeeɗiti.” Goɗɗo oo nuɗɗini ko Yeesu wi'i mo, o hooti.
Yuhanna 4.67: Diga o ɗon dow laawol tawon, o fotti bee huuwooɓe maako, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel maaɗa yamɗiti.”
Yuhanna 4.68: O ƴami ɓe: “Wakkatiire ndeye ngel heɓi daama?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Keenya deydey zuura yontere acci ngel.”
Yuhanna 4.69: Baaba maagel siftori ɗum waɗi deydey saa'iire nde Yeesu wi'no mo: “Ɓiŋngel maaɗa yeeɗiti.” Nden kaŋko e yimɓe saare maako fuu ɓe nuɗɗini Yeesu.
Yuhanna 4.71: Kanjum woni kaayeefiwol ɗiɗaɓol ngol Yeesu waɗi ɓaawo o wurti Yahudiya, o warti Galiili.

Yuhanna 5.1: Ɓaawo man, juulde Yahuudu'en waɗi, Yeesu boo yehi Urusaliima.
Yuhanna 5.2: Haa Urusaliima ton, kommbi Dammugal Baali, woodi weendu wi'eteendu Baytijata bee Ibraniŋkeere, ndu woodi daŋɗe jowi.
Yuhanna 5.3: Les daŋɗe ɗe'e, nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon mbaali: Wumɓe e woosɓe e waata-terɗe'en. [Ɓe ɗon ndeena haa to ndiyam fuɗɗi dimmbaago,
Yuhanna 5.4: ngam saa'i feere malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo ɗon jippo nder weendu man, dimmba ndiyam. Nyawɗo mo aarti nastugo ndiyam ɓaawo ɗam dimmbake fuu, yamɗiti nyawu muuɗum koo nguye fuu.]
Yuhanna 5.5: Woodino ton nyawɗo mo waɗi baakin duuɓi cappanɗe tati e joweetati.
Yuhanna 5.6: Nde Yeesu yi'i mo o ɗon waali, Yeesu anndi o duuri bee nyawu maako, o ƴami mo: “A yiɗi yamɗitineego na?”
Yuhanna 5.7: Nyawɗo jaabi mo: “Moodibbo, mi walaa goɗɗo mo nastintammi nder ndiyam saa'i ɗam ɗon dimmbo. Yaake mi ɗon haɓda yahugo ton, goɗɗo feere ɗon aartammi nastugo ndiyam.”
Yuhanna 5.8: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Umma, hoocu leeso ma, yah!”
Yuhanna 5.9: Law goɗɗo oo yamɗiti, o hoosi be'itte maako, o ɗon yaha.
Yuhanna 5.13: Ngam maajum Yahuudu'en mbi'i jamɗitinaaɗo man: “Hannde ɗum nyannde siwtorde, tawreeta duŋanaaki ma roondaago be'itte ma
Yuhanna 5.15: O jaabi ɓe: “Mo yamɗitini yam, wi'i yam: Hoocu be'itte ma, yah!”
Yuhanna 5.16: Nden ɓe ƴami mo: “Ɗum moyjo wi'i ma hoocu be'itte ma, yah?”
Yuhanna 5.17: Ammaa o anndaa moy yamɗitini mo, ngam Yeesu acci nokkuure man, dilli, ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ton.
Yuhanna 5.19: Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu tawi mo nder haykaliiru, wi'i mo: “Ndaa, jonta a yamɗiti, taa meetu waɗugo hakke, ngam taa ko tulli wara dow maaɗa.”
Yuhanna 5.20: Goɗɗo oo yehi, o wi'i Yahuudu'en, ɗum Yeesu yamɗitinno mo.
Yuhanna 5.21: Ngam man Yahuudu'en puɗɗi toonyaago Yeesu, ngam o waɗi ɗum
Yuhanna 5.24: Ammaa Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Baabiraawo am ɗon huuwa foroy, min boo mi huuwan.”
Yuhanna 5.26: Ngam daliila bolle ɗe'e Yahuudu'en ɓurti waɗugo anniya mbarugo mo, naa ngam o luuti umroore
Yuhanna 5.28: tan, ammaa ngam o ɗonno wi'a Allah woni Baabiraawo maako, o fotni hoore maako kal-kal bee Allah.
Yuhanna 5.30: Ngam man Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on,
Yuhanna 5.32: waawataa waɗugo koo ɗume bee hoore muuɗum, ammaa sey ko o yi'i Baabiraawo ɗon waɗa. Ko Baabiraawo waɗata fuu, kanjum Ɓiɗɗo boo waɗata.
Yuhanna 5.33: Ngam Baabiraawo yiɗi Ɓiɗɗo, o ɗon holla mo ko o waɗata fuu. O hollan mo kuuɗe ɓuranɗe ɗe'e mawnugo boo, ngam haa on kayɗina.
Yuhanna 5.34: Bana Baabiraawo ɗon ummitina maayɓe, yeeɗitina ɓe, bana non Ɓiɗɗo boo hokkirta ngeendam haa mo o yiɗi fuu.
Yuhanna 5.35: Baabiraawo hiitataako koo moy, ammaa baawɗe hiitaago, o hokki ɗe fuu haa Ɓiɗɗo,
Yuhanna 5.36: ngam haa yimɓe fuu teddina Ɓiɗɗo bana ɓe teddinirta Baabiraawo nelɗo mo. Koo moy sali teddingo Ɓiɗɗo, teddintaa Baabiraawo nelɗo mo.
Yuhanna 5.38: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Mo ɗon nana bolle am, mo nuɗɗini nelɗo yam, heɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam, kiita do'ataa mo, o saalake maayde, o yottake ngeendam.
Yuhanna 5.39: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Saa'i waran, ɗum waɗi jonta maa, haa maayɓe nana sawtu
Yuhanna 5.42: Bana Baabiraawo woni seeɓoore ngeendam, bana non o hokki Ɓiɗɗo boo baawɗe laataago seeɓoore ngeendam.
Yuhanna 5.43: O hokki Ɓiɗɗo baawɗe hiitaago ngam o
Yuhanna 5.46: Taa ɗum hayɗina on, ngam saa'i waran, haa maayɓe nder genaale fuu nana sawtu maako,
Yuhanna 5.47: ngurto ɗe. Waɗooɓe booɗɗum ummititto ngam heɓugo ngeendam, ammaa waɗooɓe kalluɗum ummititto ngam hiiteego
Yuhanna 5.50: “Min mi waawataa waɗugo koo ɗume bee hoore am. Mi ɗon hiito fodde ko Allah wi'i yam. Kiita ka mi hiitoto, ka adiliiha, ngam mi ɗaɓɓataa waɗugo muuyo am, ammaa muuyo nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 5.51: To mi seedanake hoore am, seedamku am laatataako gooŋga.
Yuhanna 5.52: Ammaa woodi ceedoowo yam feere, mi anndi seedamku ngu o seedanto yam, ɗum gooŋga.
Yuhanna 5.53: On neli nelaaɓe haa Yuhanna, kaŋko o seedani gooŋga
Yuhanna 5.55: Min naa diga neɗɗo mi heɓata seedamku, ammaa mi wi'i ɗum bana nii ngam haa on kisa.
Yuhanna 5.56: Yuhanna laatino bana pittirla kuɓɓaaŋga, ɗonno yayna, on ceyori annoora maako wakkati seɗɗa.
Yuhanna 5.57: Ammaa min mi woodi seedamku ɓurŋgu ngu Yuhanna: Ngam kuuɗe ɗe Baabiraawo hokki yam ngam mi hebbitina ɗe, waato kuuɗe ɗe mi huuwata, kanje seedanto yam, ɗum holli Baabiraawo neli yam.
Yuhanna 5.58: Baabiraawo nelɗo yam boo o seedanake yam. On meeɗaay nanugo sawtu maako, on ngi'aay mo boo
Yuhanna 5.60: On njogaaki wolde maako nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam on nuɗɗinaay mo o neli.
Yuhanna 5.61: On ɗon njaŋnga Defte Ceniiɗe, ngam on ɗon tammo heɓugo ngeendam nduumiiɗam nder maaje. Defte Ceniiɗe man ɗon ceedano yam.
Yuhanna 5.62: Ammaa on ngiɗaa wargo haa am ngam on keɓa ngeendam.
Yuhanna 5.65: Ammaa mi anndi on, on ngiɗaa Allah.
Yuhanna 5.66: Mi wari bee innde Baabiraawo am, onon boo on njaɓaay yam. Ammaa to goɗɗo feere wari bee baawɗe hoore muuɗum, kaŋko on njaɓata.
Yuhanna 5.67: Bana noy on mbaawrata nuɗɗingo, nde nii on ɗon ɗaɓɓa tedduŋgal diga woɗɓe, ammaa on ɗaɓɓataa tedduŋgal garanŋgal diga Allah gooto?
Yuhanna 5.68: Taa nume min mi wulloto on yeeso Baabiraawo. Muusa mo on ɗon tammoro, kaŋko wulloto on.
Yuhanna 5.69: Ngam to on nuɗɗinno Muusa, on nuɗɗintam min boo, ngam dow am o winndi.
Yuhanna 5.70: Ammaa to on nuɗɗinaay ko o winndi, noy on nuɗɗinirta bolle am?”

Yuhanna 6.1: Ɓaawo man, Yeesu dilli gaɗa weendu Galiili, wi'eteendu boo weendu Tiberiyas.
Yuhanna 6.2: Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde ɗonno tokki mo, ngam yimɓe ɗonno ndaara kaayeefiiji ɗi o ɗonno waɗa bee yamɗitingo nyawɓe.
Yuhanna 6.3: Yeesu wa'i dow hooseere, o jooɗi ton bee pukara'en maako.
Yuhanna 6.7: Yeesu ɓaŋgti gite, yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde ɗon wara haa muuɗum. O wi'i Filip: “Toy en coodoyta nyaamdu ngam haa yimɓe ɓe'e nyaama?”
Yuhanna 6.8: O wi'i ɗum ngam foondugo Filip, ngam o anndi ko o tammi waɗugo.
Yuhanna 6.9: Filip jaabi mo: “Koo tamseeje ceede cardi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi boo ke'ataa haa koo moy maɓɓe heɓa nyaamdu seɗɗa!”
Yuhanna 6.10: Andire, deerɗu Simon Piyer, gooto nder pukara'en maako wi'i mo:
Yuhanna 6.11: “Ndaa, woodi derkeejo haa ɗo, o woodi tamseeje sa'iiruuri jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi, ammaa ɗume ɗum nafata haa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe'e?”
Yuhanna 6.13: Yeesu wi'i: “Ngecce yimɓe ɓe'e fuu ɓe njooɗo.” Huɗo ɗuuɗko ɗonno haa nokkuure man. Nden ɓe njooɗi, limgal maɓɓe waɗi worɓe baakin ujine njowo.
Yuhanna 6.14: Yeesu hoo'i tamseeje go, yetti Allah, nden o senndani ɗe yimɓe wonɓe ton. O waɗi non bee liɗɗi boo. Koo moy heɓi deydey bana o yiɗi.
Yuhanna 6.15: Nde ɓe kaari, Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Mooɓte luttuɗum man ngam taa ɗum wonno.”
Yuhanna 6.16: Nden ɓe mooɓti luttuɗum tamseeje jowi ɗe yimɓe nyaamino, ɓe kebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Yuhanna 6.18: Nde yimɓe ɓe'e ngi'i kaayeefiwol ngol Yeesu waɗi, ɓe mbi'i: “Fakat gorko oo woni annabiijo mo tammi wargo nder duniyaaru!”
Yuhanna 6.19: Yeesu anndi ɓe tammi wargo ngam ɓe naŋnga mo bee semmbe, ɓe mbaɗa mo laamiiɗo, o dilli dow hooseere fahin, kaŋko feere maako.
Yuhanna 6.21: Nde hiiri, pukara'en Yeesu ndiirti dow fomoonde mbeela.
Yuhanna 6.23: ngam yahugo Kafarnahum. Jemma jeŋngi, Yeesu boo waraay haa maɓɓe tawon.
Yuhanna 6.24: Ndiyam dimmbi masin, ngam henndu saatundu ɗon waɗa.
Yuhanna 6.25: Nde ɓe laanyi koommbowal baakin kilomeetir jowi malla joweego, ɓe ngi'i Yeesu ɗon ɓadito koommbowal, o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam bee kosɗe, ɓe kultori.
Yuhanna 6.26: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore, ɗum min.”
Yuhanna 6.27: Ɓe ngiɗino hoosugo mo nder koommbowal, ammaa law ngal dukki lesdi haa nokkuure nde ɓe ngiɗno yahugo.
Yuhanna 6.29: Jaŋngo man, yimɓe nder mooɓre gaɗa mbeela go ndaari walaano koommbowal feere haa ton, sey gootal tan. Ɓe anndi boo Yeesu nastaayno ngal bee pukara'en muuɗum, pukara'en feere muuɗum'en nasti ngal, ndilli.
Yuhanna 6.30: Ammaa koommbooje goɗɗe iwi haa Tiberiyas, ngari haa nokkuure nde Jawmiraawo hokkuno ɓe tamseeje, ɓaawo o yettino Allah ngam maaje.
Yuhanna 6.31: Nde yimɓe mooɓre ngi'i Yeesu walaa ton, koo pukara'en maako boo ngalaa ton, ɓe nasti koommbooje go, ɓe ndilli haa Kafarnahum ngam ɓe tefa mo.
Yuhanna 6.33: Ɓe tawi Yeesu gaɗa mbeela, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, ndey ngarɗa haa ɗo?”
Yuhanna 6.34: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: On ɗon tefammi naa ngam on ngi'i kaayeefiiji ɗi mbaɗmi, ammaa ngam on nyaami tamseeje, on kaari.
Yuhanna 6.35: Taa kuuwe ngam nyaamdu wonnotoondu, ammaa ngam nyaamdu tabitanndu, hokkanndu ngeendam nduumiiɗam. Nyaamdu ndu'u,
Yuhanna 6.37: hokkata on ndu, fodde baawɗe ɗe o heɓi haa Allah Baabiraawo.”
Yuhanna 6.38: Nden ɓe ƴami mo: “Noy min mbaɗata haa min kuuwa kuuɗe ɗe Allah yiɗi?”
Yuhanna 6.39: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Kuugal ngal Allah yiɗi woni: On nuɗɗina mo o neli.”
Yuhanna 6.40: Ɓe ƴami mo: “Kaayeefiwol ngole a waɗata ngam haa min nuɗɗine? Kuugal ngale a huuwata?
Yuhanna 6.41: Kaakiraaɓe amin nyaami mannu nder ladde, bana ko winnda: O hokki ɓe nyaamdu iwndu diga asama
Yuhanna 6.43: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on, naa ɗum Muusa hokki on nyaamdu iwndu diga asama, ammaa Baabiraawo am hokkan on ko woni nyaamdu fakat, iwndu diga asama.
Yuhanna 6.44: Ngam nyaamdu ndu Allah hokkata, kayru jippi diga asama, kayru hokkata duniyaaru ngeendam.”
Yuhanna 6.45: Nden ɓe mbi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, hokku min nyaamdu ndu'u foroy.”
Yuhanna 6.46: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Min woni nyaamdu ndu hokkata ngeendam. Koo moy wari haa am, meetataa maatugo dolo sam. Koo moy nuɗɗini yam boo, meetataa ɗomɗugo sam.
Yuhanna 6.47: Ammaa mi bi'ɗo on ɗum: On ngi'i yam, bee non fuu on nuɗɗinaay.
Yuhanna 6.48: Mo Baabiraawo hokki yam fuu, waran haa am. Koo moy wari haa am boo, mi wudintaa mo yaasi.
Yuhanna 6.49: Ngam mi jippaaki diga asama ngam waɗugo ko mi yiɗi, ammaa ko nelɗo yam yiɗi.
Yuhanna 6.50: Ndaa ko nelɗo yam yiɗi: Taa mi majjina koo gooto nder yimɓe ɓe o hokki yam, ammaa, mi ummitina ɓe diga maayde, nyalaade darŋgal.
Yuhanna 6.51: Ndaa ko Baabiraawo am yiɗi: Koo moy yi'i
Yuhanna 6.53: nuɗɗini mo, heɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam, mi ummitinan mo diga maayde, nyalaade darŋgal.”
Yuhanna 6.55: Yahuudu'en ngurŋgurti dow Yeesu, ngam o wi'no: “Min, mi nyaamdu jippiindu diga asama.”
Yuhanna 6.56: Ɓe ɗonno mbi'a: “Naa kaŋko woni Yeesu, ɓii Yusufu mo en anndi baaba mum e daada mum? Kadi, noy o wi'rata o jippi diga asama?”
Yuhanna 6.57: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Taa ngurŋgurte hakkunde mooɗon.
Yuhanna 6.58: Walaa mo heɓata wargo haa am, sonaa to Baabiraawo nelɗo yam fooɗi mo. Koo moy wari haa am, mi ummitinan mo nyalaade darŋgal.
Yuhanna 6.59: Annabi'en mbinndi: Ɓe fuu ɓe laatoto ekkitinaaɓe Allah. Koo moy heɗiti Baabiraawo, jaɓi ekkitinol maako, waran haa am
Yuhanna 6.61: Ɗum yiɗaa wi'go, goɗɗo meeɗi yi'ugo Baabiraawo, sey iwɗo haa Allah, kaŋko feere maako yi'i Baabiraawo.
Yuhanna 6.63: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo moy nuɗɗini, heɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Yuhanna 6.65: Kaakiraaɓe mooɗon nyaami mannu nder ladde, bee non fuu ɓe maayi.
Yuhanna 6.66: Ammaa koo moy nyaami nyaamdu iwndu haa asama, maayataa sam.
Yuhanna 6.67: Min, mi nyaamdu yeeru, jippiindu diga asama. To goɗɗo nyaami ndu, o yeeɗan haa abada. Nyaamdu ndu mi hokkata mo, ɗum ɓanndu am. Mi hokkan ndu ngam haa duniyaaru yeeɗa.”
Yuhanna 6.69: Bolle ɗe'e ummini gaabotiral hakkunde Yahuudu'en. Ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Noy o waawrata hokkugo en ɓanndu maako ngam en nyaama?”
Yuhanna 6.70: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: To on nyaamaay ɓanndu
Yuhanna 6.72: to on njaraay ƴiiƴam maako, on ngalaa ngeendam nder mooɗon.
Yuhanna 6.73: Mo nyaami ɓanndu am, yari ƴiiƴam am boo, heɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam, mi ummitinan mo nyalaade darŋgal.
Yuhanna 6.74: Ngam gooŋga, ɓanndu am woni nyaamdu, ƴiiƴam am boo woni njaram.
Yuhanna 6.75: Koo moy nyaami ɓanndu am, yari ƴiiƴam am boo, ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee am, min boo mi ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee maako.
Yuhanna 6.76: Baabiraawo nelɗo yam, o geeto, mi ɗon yeeɗa ngam daliila maako. Bana non boo koo moy nyaami ɓanndu am, yeeɗan ngam daliila am.
Yuhanna 6.77: Kanjum woni nyaamdu jippiindu diga asama. Ndu nanndaay bee ndu kaakiraaɓe mooɗon nyaamno. Ɓe nyaami ɗum, ɓe maayi. Koo moy nyaami nyaamdu ndu'u, yeeɗan haa abada.”
Yuhanna 6.78: Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e saa'i o ɗon ekkitina nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en haa Kafarnahum.
Yuhanna 6.80: Ɗuuɗɓe nder pukara'en Yeesu, nde nani ɗum, mbi'i: “Haala ka saati. Moy waawata jaɓugo ka?”
Yuhanna 6.81: Yeesu anndi pukara'en maako ɗon ngurŋgurta dow maajum, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum laatanake on fergere na?
Yuhanna 6.84: ɗon eeŋga haa o wonno aran?
Yuhanna 6.85: Ruuhu Allah hokkata ngeendam, ɓanndu neɗɗo nafataa koo ɗume. Bolle ɗe mi wolwani on, kanje ngoni Ruuhu e ngeendam.
Yuhanna 6.86: Ammaa woodi woɗɓe caka mooɗon nuɗɗinaay.” Ngam diga fuɗɗam Yeesu anndi ɓeye ngoni ɓe nuɗɗintaa mo, o anndi zammbotooɗo mo boo.
Yuhanna 6.87: O ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Ngam man mbi'mi on, walaa mo waawata wargo haa am sonaa to Baabiraawo hokki yam mo.”
Yuhanna 6.89: Diga saa'i man ɗuuɗɓe caka pukara'en maako acci yahdugo bee maako.
Yuhanna 6.90: Nden Yeesu ƴami pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo: “Noy onon boo, on ngiɗaa dillugo na?”
Yuhanna 6.91: Simon Piyer jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo, haa moy min njahata? An a woodi bolle dokkanɗe ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Yuhanna 6.92: Minin, min nuɗɗini, min anndi an woni Ceniiɗo iwɗo haa Allah
Yuhanna 6.94: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Naa min suɓi on sappo e ɗiɗo fuu na? Ammaa gooto mooɗon o Iblisa.”
Yuhanna 6.95: O wolwi ɗum dow Yahuuda ɓii Simon Iskariyot. Ngam ɗum kaŋko, gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo zammboto mo.

Yuhanna 7.1: Ɓaawo man, Yeesu waanci lesdi Galiili, ngam o yiɗaano yahugo lesdi Yahudiya, ngam Yahuudu'en ɗonno ɗaɓɓa mbarugo mo.
Yuhanna 7.2: Wakkati man, juulde Yahuudu'en wi'eteende juulde bukkaaji ɓadake
Yuhanna 7.4: deerɗiraaɓe maako mbi'i mo: “Dillu diga nokkuure nde'e, yah haa lesdi Yahudiya, ngam haa pukara'en maaɗa boo ngi'a kuuɗe ɗe a huuwata.
Yuhanna 7.5: Walaa mo suuɗataa hoore muuɗum to o yiɗi yimɓe ngi'a mo. Nde nii a ɗon huuwa kuuɗe ɗe'e, waŋgin hoore ma haa yimɓe.”
Yuhanna 7.6: Koo deerɗiraaɓe maako maa, nuɗɗinaay mo.
Yuhanna 7.7: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Wakkati am waɗaay tawon. Ammaa ngam mooɗon, wakkatiire koo ndeyeere fuu, nde fottunde.
Yuhanna 7.8: Duniyaaru waawataa wanyugo on, ammaa ndu wanyatam min, ngam mi ɗon seedano ndu no kuuɗe maaru ɗe kalluɗe.
Yuhanna 7.9: Njehe haa juulde onon kam, min mi siwaa yahugo, ngam wakkati am waɗaay tawon.”
Yuhanna 7.10: Ɓaawo o wi'i ɓe ɗum, kaŋko o lutti haa lesdi Galiili.
Yuhanna 7.12: Nde deerɗiraaɓe Yeesu njehi haa juulde, kaŋko boo o yehi ton. O waŋganaay yimɓe, ammaa o yehi bee sirri.
Yuhanna 7.13: Yahuudu'en ɗonno tefa mo nder mooɓre juulde, ɓe ɗonno ƴama: “Toy mo?”
Yuhanna 7.14: Yimɓe nder mooɓre mbolwi dow maako ɗuuɗɗum bee sofndaago. Woɗɓe ɗonno mbi'a: “O goɗɗo giɗɗo mbooɗeeŋga.” Ammaa woɗɓe boo ɗonno mbi'a: “Naa non sam, o ɗon majjina yimɓe.”
Yuhanna 7.15: Ammaa walaa mo wolwi dow maako bee baŋguɗum, ngam ɓe ɗon kula mawɓe Yahuudu'en.
Yuhanna 7.17: Nde reeta nyalɗe juulde caali, Yeesu nasti haykaliiru, fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe.
Yuhanna 7.18: Yahuudu'en kayɗini, mbi'i: “Noy o heɓri anndal binndi, kaŋko mo jaŋngaay?”
Yuhanna 7.19: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ko mi ekkitinta iwaay haa am, ammaa ɗum iwi haa Allah nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 7.20: To goɗɗo yiɗi waɗugo muuyo Allah, o anndan to ekkitinol am iwi haa Allah malla to mi ɗon wolwa ngiɗa am.
Yuhanna 7.21: Koo moy wolwi ngiɗa mum, ɗon ɗaɓɓana hoore mum tedduŋgal. Ammaa koo moy ɗaɓɓi teddingo nelɗo ɗum, o gooŋgaajo, walaa sooynde adilaaku nder maako.
Yuhanna 7.22: Naa Muusa hokki on tawreeta na? Ammaa walaa koo gooto mooɗon ɗowtanto ka. Koni on ɗaɓɓata mbarugo yam?”
Yuhanna 7.23: Mooɓre jaabi mo: “A ginnaaɗo! Moy ɗaɓɓi mbarugo ma?”
Yuhanna 7.24: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Mi huuwi kuugal gootal tan, on fuu on kayɗini.
Yuhanna 7.26: – ammaa umroore nde iwaay diga Muusa, nde iwi diga kaakiraaɓe – ngam maajum on ɗon njuulna ɓiŋngel gorgel nyalaade siwtorde
Yuhanna 7.28: To on ɗon njuulna goɗɗo nyalaade siwtorde, ngam taa on luuta umroore Muusa, kadi ngam ɗume on tikkani yam ngam mi yamɗitini ɓanndu goɗɗo fuu nder nyalaade siwtorde
Yuhanna 7.30: Taa kiite fodde ko gite ngi'ata, ammaa kiite kiita adiliiha.”
Yuhanna 7.32: Woɗɓe nder yimɓe Urusaliima mbi'i: “Naa kaŋko woni mo ɓe ɗaɓɓata ngam mbarugo?
Yuhanna 7.33: Ndaa o ɗon wolwa bee baŋguɗum, ammaa ɓe mbi'aay mo koo ɗume. Kadi ardiiɓe meeɗen annditi fakat kaŋko woni Almasiihu na?
Yuhanna 7.34: To Almasiihu wari, walaa anndanɗo haa o iwi, ammaa gorko oo kam, en anndi haa o iwi.”
Yuhanna 7.36: Nden Yeesu ɗon ekkitina yimɓe nder haykaliiru bee sawtu, o ɗonno wi'a: “On anndi yam, on anndi haa mi iwi. Mi waraay bee ngiɗa am, ammaa nelɗo yam o gooŋgaajo. Kaŋko, on anndaa mo.
Yuhanna 7.37: Min, mi anndi mo, ngam mi iwi haa maako, kaŋko neli yam.”
Yuhanna 7.38: Nden ɓe ɗaɓɓi naŋngugo mo, ammaa walaa mo meemi mo, ngam wakkati maako yottaaki tawon.
Yuhanna 7.39: Ɗuuɗɓe nder mooɓre nuɗɗini mo, ɓe ɗonno mbi'a: “To Almasiihu wari, o waɗan kaayeefiiji ko ɓuri gorko oo na?”
Yuhanna 7.41: Farisa'en nani ngurŋgurtol mooɓre dow Yeesu, nden ɓe narri bee mawɓe liman'en, ɓe neli aynooɓe haykaliiru ngam naŋngugo Yeesu.
Yuhanna 7.42: Yeesu wi'i: “Mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon wakkati seɗɗa tawon, nden mi loro haa nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 7.43: On tefatam, ammaa on tawataa yam, ngam on mbaawataa yahugo haa ngonanmi.”
Yuhanna 7.44: Yahuudu'en ƴamƴamtiri: Toy o tammi yahugo haa en mbaawataa tawugo mo? O tammi dillugo haa lesɗe ɗe Yahuudu'en saŋkitiiɓe caka Yunaniŋke'en
Yuhanna 7.45: ngoni ngam o ekkitina Yunaniŋke'en na?
Yuhanna 7.46: O wi'i: “On tefatam, ammaa on tawataa yam, ngam on mbaawataa yahugo haa ngonanmi.” Ɗume wolde nde'e yiɗi wi'go?
Yuhanna 7.48: Nyalaade timminirde juulde, kayre ɓuri nyalɗe goɗɗe samɗineego. Nyannde man Yeesu ummi, dari. O wolwi bee sawtu, o wi'i: “Koo moy ɗomɗi, wara haa am, yara
Yuhanna 7.50: koo moy nuɗɗini yam, bana ko Deftere wi'i, maaje ndiyam ngeetam ilan diga nder maako
Yuhanna 7.52: Yeesu waɗi balndol ngol dow Ruuhu mo nuɗɗinɓe mo tammi heɓugo. Saa'i man ɓe keɓaayno Ruuhu tawon, ngam Yeesu siwaa nastugo tedduŋgal.
Yuhanna 7.54: Nde yimɓe nder mooɓre nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe mbi'i: “Fakat, kaŋko o annabiijo mo en ndeenata.”
Yuhanna 7.55: Woɗɓe mbi'i: “Kaŋko woni Almasiihu.” Woɗɓe feere fahin mbi'i: “Kadi, diga Galiili Almasiihu iwata na?
Yuhanna 7.56: Naa Deftere wi'i Almasiihu iwan diga danygol Daawuda, nder berniwol Baytilaama, haa Daawuda wonno
Yuhanna 7.58: Nden luural waɗi hakkunde yimɓe daliila Yeesu.
Yuhanna 7.59: Woɗɓe caka maɓɓe ngiɗi naŋngugo mo, ammaa walaa mo meemi mo.
Yuhanna 7.61: Aynooɓe haykaliiru go lori haa mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en, kamɓe ɓe ɗonno mbi'a ɓe: “Koni on ngaddaay mo?”
Yuhanna 7.62: Aynooɓe njaabi: “Walaa mo meeɗi wolwugo bana gorko oo sam.”
Yuhanna 7.63: Farisa'en ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo on tokki esto maako na?
Yuhanna 7.64: Woodi koo gooto nder mawɓe meeɗen malla nder Farisa'en nuɗɗini mo na?
Yuhanna 7.65: Sey mooɓre nde anndaa tawreeta, nde naalaande!”
Yuhanna 7.66: Nikodemus, gooto nder Farisa'en wonɓe ton, mo meeɗino yahugo haa Yeesu, kaŋko o wi'i ɓe
Yuhanna 7.68: “Tawreeta meeɗen duŋani en hiitaago goɗɗo diga en nanaay mo, en anndaa ko o waɗi na?”
Yuhanna 7.69: Ɓe njaabi mo: “An boo a goɗɗo Galiili na? Linyu booɗɗum nder Deftere, a tawan walaa annabiijo koo gooto iwata diga Galiili.”
Yuhanna 7.71: Nden koo moy hooti saare muuɗum.

Yuhanna 8.2: Ammaa fajiri cub o lorti haa
Yuhanna 8.4: ummaatoore fuu wari haa maako. O jooɗi, o fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓe.
Yuhanna 8.5: Nden moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en ngaddani mo debbo mo ɓe naŋngi nder njeenu. Ɓe ndarni mo yeeso yimɓe fuu,
Yuhanna 8.6: ɓe mbi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, min naŋngi debbo oo nder njeenu.
Yuhanna 8.7: Muusa umri min nder tawreeta min piɗa irin debbo oo bee kaa'e haa o maaya. E an, ɗume a wi'ata
Yuhanna 8.9: Ɓe mbi'i non ngam foondugo mo, haa ɓe keɓa daliila wullaago mo. Ammaa Yeesu turi, fuɗɗi winndugo haa lesdi bee hoondu muuɗum.
Yuhanna 8.10: Nde ɓe tokki ƴamugo mo, o dari, o wi'i ɓe: “Goɗɗo mooɗon mo walaa hakke sam, aarta fiɗugo mo bee hayre.”
Yuhanna 8.11: Nden o turi fahin, o fuɗɗiti winndugo haa lesdi.
Yuhanna 8.12: Nde ɓe nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe ndilli gooto gooto, ndotti'en aarti dillugo. Yeesu feere mum lutti, debbo go ɗon dari yeeso maako.
Yuhanna 8.13: Nden Yeesu dari, wi'i mo: “Debbo, toy ɓe? Walaa do'uɗo ma kiita na?”
Yuhanna 8.14: Debbo jaabi: “Walaa koo gooto, Jawmiraawo.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Min boo, mi hiitataako ma. Dillu, ammaa taa meetu waɗugo hakke!”
Yuhanna 8.16: Yeesu wolwani yimɓe fahin, o wi'i: “Min, mi annoora duniyaaru. Koo moy tokki yam, yahataa nder nyiɓre fahin, ammaa o heɓan annoora ndokkanka ngeendam
Yuhanna 8.18: Farisa'en mbi'i mo: “A ɗon seedano hoore maaɗa, seedamku ma laataaki gooŋga
Yuhanna 8.20: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Koo to mi ɗon seedano hoore am, seedamku am ɗum gooŋga, ngam mi anndi haa mi iwi, mi anndi haa mi yahata boo. Ammaa onon, on anndaa haa mi iwi, on anndaa haa mi yahata boo.
Yuhanna 8.21: Onon on ɗon mbaɗa kiita fodde numooji neɗɗo, min, mi hiitataako koo moy.
Yuhanna 8.22: Koo to mi hiitake goɗɗo boo, kiita am gooŋɗan, ngam mi hiitataako feere am, ammaa Baabiraawo nelɗo yam ɗon wondi bee am.
Yuhanna 8.23: Ɗum binndaaɗum nder tawreeta mooɗon: To ɗiɗo ceedake, seedamku man ɗum gooŋga.
Yuhanna 8.24: Min, mi ɗon seedano hoore am, Baabiraawo nelɗo yam boo ɗon seedano yam.”
Yuhanna 8.25: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Toy Baabiraawo ma woni?” Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On anndaa yam, on anndaa Baabiraawo am boo. To on anndino yam, on anndanno Baabiraawo am boo.”
Yuhanna 8.27: Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e saa'i o ɗonno ekkitina yimɓe nder haykaliiru, haa nokkuure sundukru dokke ceede woni. Walaa mo meemi mo, ngam wakkati maako waraay tawon.
Yuhanna 8.29: Fahin Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mi dillan. On tefatam, ammaa on maayan nder hakkeeji mooɗon. On mbaawataa yahugo haa njahanmi.”
Yuhanna 8.30: Yahuudu'en mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde muuɗum'en: “O mbartoyan na? Ngam o wi'i: On mbaawataa yahugo haa njahanmi.”
Yuhanna 8.31: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Onon on iwi haa les, min mi iwi haa dow. Onon on yimɓe duniyaaru ndu, ammaa min mi laataaki mo duniyaaru ndu.
Yuhanna 8.32: Ngam maajum mi wi'i on: On maayan nder hakkeeji mooɗon. Ngam to on nuɗɗinaay min woni mo ngonmi
Yuhanna 8.34: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “An, a moy?” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mi tokki wi'ugo on ɗum diga fuɗɗam.
Yuhanna 8.35: Woodi kuuje ɗuuɗɗe ɗe mi yiɗi wi'go dow mooɗon e hiitoraago on bee maajum, ammaa nelɗo yam o gooŋgaajo, mi ɗon wolwana duniyaaru ko mi nani haa maako tan.”
Yuhanna 8.37: Ɓe paamaay o ɗon wolwana ɓe dow Baabiraawo.
Yuhanna 8.38: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “To on ɓaŋgti
Yuhanna 8.40: on anndan min woni mo ngonmi, on anndan mi waɗataa koo ɗume bee muuyo am, ammaa mi ɗon wolwa ko Baabiraawo ekkitini yam tan.
Yuhanna 8.41: Nelɗo yam ɗon wondi bee am, o accaay yam feere am, ngam foroy mi ɗon waɗa ko fottanta mo.”
Yuhanna 8.42: Nde Yeesu wolwi bana nii, ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini mo.
Yuhanna 8.44: Nden Yeesu wi'i Yahuudu'en nuɗɗinɓe mo: “To on ɗon tabiti nder wolde am, nden kam on laatoto pukara'en am fakat.
Yuhanna 8.45: On anndan gooŋga, gooŋga boo rimɗinan on.”
Yuhanna 8.46: Ɓe njaabi mo: “Minin min ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima, min meeɗaay laataago jeyaaɓe goɗɗo. Noy a wi'rata min: On laatoto rimɓe
Yuhanna 8.48: Yeesu wi'i: “Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on: Baɗɗo hakke fuu o jeyaaɗo hakke.
Yuhanna 8.49: Jeyaaɗo wondataa bee yimɓe saare foroy, ammaa ɓiɗɗo wondan bee yimɓe saare foroy.
Yuhanna 8.52: rimɗini on, nden kam on laatoto rimɓe fakat.
Yuhanna 8.53: Mi anndi on ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima. Ammaa on ɗon ɗaɓɓa mbarugo yam, ngam on njaɓaay bolle am.
Yuhanna 8.54: Min mi ɗon wolwa dow ko mi yi'i haa Baabiraawo am, ammaa onon on ɗon mbaɗa ko nanɗon haa baaba mooɗon.”
Yuhanna 8.56: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ibrahiima woni baabiraawo amin.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “To on ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima, on kuuwanno kuugal ngal o huuwi.
Yuhanna 8.57: Ammaa jonta, on ɗon ɗaɓɓa mbarugo yam, min mo wolwani on gooŋga ka nanmi haa Allah. Ibrahiima meeɗaay waɗugo irin maajum.
Yuhanna 8.58: On ɗon kuuwa kuuɗe baaba mooɗon.” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin min laataaki njaalu'en, min ngoodi Baabiraawo gooto, ɗum Allah.”
Yuhanna 8.59: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “To Allah wonno Baabiraawo mooɗon, on ngiɗanno yam, ngam diga Allah iwmi, daliila maako ngarmi. Mi waraay bee ngiɗa am, ammaa kaŋko neli yam.
Yuhanna 8.60: Ngam ɗume on paamataa ko mi wi'ata on? Ngam on mbaawataa heɗitaago ko mi wolwanta on.
Yuhanna 8.61: Iblisa woni baaba mooɗon, on ngiɗi waɗugo ko baaba mooɗon yiɗi. O mbaroowo ko'e diga fuɗɗam, o meeɗaay wolwugo gooŋga, ngam gooŋga walaa nder maako. To o ɗon wolwa fewre, ɗum ɗabiya maako, ngam o pewoowo, o baaba fewre.
Yuhanna 8.62: Ammaa min, gooŋga mi wi'ata, kanjum waɗi on nuɗɗintaa yam.
Yuhanna 8.63: Moy nder mooɗon waawata seedaago mi waɗi hakke? Ammaa to gooŋga mi wolwata, koni on nuɗɗintaa yam?
Yuhanna 8.64: Goɗɗo Allah heɗititto bolle Allah. Ammaa onon on laataaki yimɓe Allah, ngam man, on keɗitataako ɗe.”
Yuhanna 8.66: Yahuudu'en mbi'i Yeesu: “Naa gooŋga min mbi'i: A Samariyaajo, a ginnaaɗo?”
Yuhanna 8.67: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Naa mi ginnaaɗo. Ammaa mi ɗon teddina Baabiraawo am, onon boo on ɗon njawo yam.
Yuhanna 8.68: Min, mi ɗaɓɓantaa hoore am tedduŋgal. Woodi mo ɗaɓɓantammi tedduŋgal, kaŋko woni kiitoowo boo.
Yuhanna 8.69: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo moy ɗowtani wolde am, maayataa sam.”
Yuhanna 8.70: Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo: “Jonta min anndi a ginnaaɗo. Ibrahiima maayi, annabi'en boo maayi, nden an a wi'a: Koo moy ɗowtani bolle am, maayataa sam.
Yuhanna 8.71: A ɓuri Ibrahiima kaaka amin mo maayi maŋngu kadi na? Kaŋko o maayi. Annabi'en boo maayi. Kadi an a ɗon laara hoore ma a moy?”
Yuhanna 8.72: Yeesu jaabi: “To mi ɗon teddina hoore am, tedduŋgal am walaa saman. Mo teddintammi woni Baabiraawo am, mo mbi'ɗon o Allah mooɗon.
Yuhanna 8.73: Ammaa on anndaa mo, min mi anndi mo. To mi wi'no mi anndaa mo, mi laatotono pewoowo bana mooɗon. Ammaa mi anndi mo, mi ɗon ɗowtano bolle maako.
Yuhanna 8.74: Ibrahiima kaaka mooɗon seyori yi'ugo nyalaade am, o yi'i nde, o seyi.”
Yuhanna 8.75: Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo: “A waɗaay duuɓi cappanɗe jowi tawon, nden a wi'i a yi'i Ibrahiima?”
Yuhanna 8.76: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Diga Ibrahiima danyaaka, min mi ɗon.”
Yuhanna 8.77: Nden ɓe koo'i kaa'e ngam ɓe piɗa mo, ammaa Yeesu suuɗi, wurti

Yuhanna 9.1: Nde Yeesu ɗon saalo, o yi'i goɗɗo bumɗo diga danyeeki mum.
Yuhanna 9.2: Pukara'en maako ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, ngam ɗume gorko oo o danya o bumɗo? Ngam daliila hakke maako na? Malla ngam hakke saaro'en maako?”
Yuhanna 9.3: Yeesu jaabi: “Naa ngam hakke maako, naa ngam hakke saaro'en maako boo o danya o bumɗo. Ɗum waɗi ngam haa baawɗe Allah mbaŋga haa maako.
Yuhanna 9.4: Nde nyalawma ɗon tawon, sey en kuuwa kuuɗe nelɗo yam. Jemma ɓadake, wakkati man walaa mo waawata huuwugo.
Yuhanna 9.5: Yaake mi ɗon nder duniyaaru, mi annoora maaru
Yuhanna 9.7: Nde Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o tuuti tuuɗe haa lesdi, o jiiɓi loope seɗɗa bee maaje, o takki ɗum haa gite bumɗo,
Yuhanna 9.8: nden o wi'i mo: “Yah, sulmoya haa weendu Silowam.” Silowam yiɗi wi'go: Nelaama. Bumɗo yehi ton, sulmi. Nde o lori, o ɗon yi'a.
Yuhanna 9.10: Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako e yi'nooɓe mo o ɗonno rooko, mbi'i: “Naa gorko oo ɗonno jooɗi, rooko
Yuhanna 9.12: Woɗɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum kaŋko.” Woɗɓe boo mbi'i: “Aa'a, ɗum nannduɗo bee maako.” Ammaa kaŋko o wi'i: “Ɗum min.”
Yuhanna 9.13: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Noy gite maaɗa mbumtiri?”
Yuhanna 9.14: O jaabi ɓe: “Goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Yeesu jiiɓi loope, takki haa gite am, wi'i yam: Yah, sulmoya haa weendu Silowam. Mi yehi ton, mi sulmi, mi wumti.”
Yuhanna 9.15: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Toy goɗɗo man woni?” O jaabi ɓe: “Mi anndaa.”
Yuhanna 9.17: Ɓe njahri bumtuɗo man haa Farisa'en.
Yuhanna 9.20: Yeesu jiiɓi loope, takki haa gite bumɗo, wumtini mo.
Yuhanna 9.21: Ngam maajum, Farisa'en ƴami bumtuɗo: “Noy ɗum laatori, a ɗon yi'a jonta?” O wi'i ɓe: “O takki loope haa gite am, mi sulmi, mi wumti
Yuhanna 9.23: Woɗɓe nder Farisa'en mbi'i: “Gorko oo iwaay diga Allah, ngam o hakkilanaay nyalaade siwtorde.” Ammaa woɗɓe mbi'i: “Noy goɗɗo waawrata waɗugo irin kaayeefiiji ɗi'i to o hakkeejo?” Cenndol waɗi hakkunde maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 9.25: Farisa'en ƴami bumtuɗo fahin: “A wi'i o wumtini ma, kadi ɗume a wi'ata dow maako?” O jaabi: “O annabiijo.”
Yuhanna 9.26: Ammaa mawɓe Yahuudu'en njaɓaay o bumɗono, o wumti jonta, haa ɓe ewni saaro'en maako.
Yuhanna 9.27: Ɓe ƴami ɓe: “Oo o ɓiɗɗo mooɗon na? On ɗon tabitini o danyaaɗo o bumɗo na? Kadi noy o yi'ri jonta?”
Yuhanna 9.28: Saaro'en maako njaabi: “Min anndi o ɓiɗɗo amin, o danya o bumɗo.
Yuhanna 9.29: Ammaa min anndaa noy o wumtiri, min anndaa boo moy wumtini mo. Ƴame mo, kaŋko boo o mawni, o jaabano hoore maako.”
Yuhanna 9.30: Saaro'en maako mbolwi bana non ngam ɓe ɗon kula mawɓe Yahuudu'en. Ngam mawɓe Yahuudu'en narrino, to goɗɗo seedake Yeesu woni Almasiihu, ɓe ngurtinan mo diga suudu dewal Yahuudu'en.
Yuhanna 9.31: Ngam maajum saaro'en maako mbi'i: “O mawni. Ƴame mo!”
Yuhanna 9.33: Farisa'en ewniti bumtuɗo go, mbi'i mo: “Allah ɗon nane, wi' gooŋga! Minin min anndi gorko oo o hakkeejo.”
Yuhanna 9.34: O jaabi: “To o hakkeejo malla naa non, min mi anndaa. Ammaa huunde woore anndumi: Mi bumɗono, jonta mi ɗon yi'a.”
Yuhanna 9.35: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ɗume o waɗani ma? Noy o wumtiniri gite ma?”
Yuhanna 9.36: O jaabi: “Mi biiɗo on ɗum diga naane, ammaa on nanaay yam. Ngam ɗume on ngiɗi nanugo ɗum fahin? Malla onon boo, on ngiɗi laataago pukara'en maako?”
Yuhanna 9.37: Ɓe kuɗi mo, ɓe mbi'i: “An woni pukaraajo maako, minin kam min pukara'en Muusa.
Yuhanna 9.38: Min anndi Allah wolwani Muusa, ammaa goɗɗo oo kam, min anndaa haa toy o iwi!”
Yuhanna 9.39: O jaabi ɓe: “Asee, ɗum kaayeefi! On anndaa haa toy o iwi, ndaa boo o wumtini gite am.
Yuhanna 9.40: En anndi Allah nanantaa hakkeejo, ammaa o ɗon jaɓana hulɓe mo, waɗooɓe muuyo maako.
Yuhanna 9.41: Diga puɗɗuki duniyaaru, walaa meeɗɗo nanugo goɗɗo wumtini gite danyaaɗo bee mbumndam.
Yuhanna 9.42: To gorko oo iwaayno diga Allah, o waawataano waɗugo koo ɗume
Yuhanna 9.44: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “A ɗon nder hakke tum diga a danya! An ekkitinta min na?” Nden ɓe ngudini mo yaasi.
Yuhanna 9.46: Yeesu nani ɓe ngurtini mo, o tefi mo, o ƴami mo: “A nuɗɗini
Yuhanna 9.49: O jaabi: “Jawmiraawo, wi'am, ɗum moy ngam haa mi nuɗɗina mo.”
Yuhanna 9.50: Yeesu wi'i mo: “A giiɗo mo, mo ɗon wolwana ma jonta, ɗum kaŋko.”
Yuhanna 9.51: O wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, mi nuɗɗini.” O tuggani Yeesu koppi.
Yuhanna 9.53: Nden Yeesu wi'i: “Mi wari nder duniyaaru ndu ngam waɗugo kiita, ngam haa wumɓe ngi'a, yi'anɓe boo mbuma.”
Yuhanna 9.54: Woɗɓe nder Farisa'en wonduɓe bee maako ton mbi'i mo: “Minin boo min wumɓe na?”
Yuhanna 9.55: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “To on laatino wumɓe, nden kam on maraayno aybe. Ammaa jonta on ɗon mbi'a: Min ɗon ngi'a. Ngam maajum aybe mon ɗon tabiti.”

Yuhanna 10.1: Yeesu waɗi balndol ngo'ol, wi'i: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo moy mo nastiraay waalde baali gal dammugal, ammaa o diwi kowaagol, o nasti, goɗɗo oo gujjo, jaɓtoowo.
Yuhanna 10.2: Ammaa mo nastiri dammugal, kaŋko woni gaynaako baali.
Yuhanna 10.3: Aynoowo dammugal maɓɓitanan mo, baali boo nanan sawtu maako. O ewnoto baali maako bee inɗe maaji, o yahran ɗi yaasi.
Yuhanna 10.4: To o wurtini baali ɗi o mari fuu yaasi, o ardoto ɗi, baali boo tokkoto mo, ngam ɗi anndi sawtu maako.
Yuhanna 10.5: Ammaa fakat ɗi tokkataako mo ɗi anndaa, ɗi ndoggan daayiiɗum bee maako ngam ɗi anndaa sawtu jananɓe.”
Yuhanna 10.7: Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol ngo'ol, ammaa ɓe paamaay dow ɗume o wolwani ɓe.
Yuhanna 10.9: Fahin Yeesu wi'i: “Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Min, mi dammugal waalde baali.
Yuhanna 10.10: Aartuɓe yam wargo fuu, ɓe wuyɓe, jaɓtooɓe, ammaa baali nananaay ɓe.
Yuhanna 10.11: Min, mi dammugal, to goɗɗo nastiri bee am, hisan. O nastan, o wurtoto, o heɓan nyaamdu.
Yuhanna 10.12: Gujjo ɗon wara ngam wujjugo e mbarugo e halkugo. Min mi wari ngam haa yimɓe keɓa ngeendam, ɓe keɓa ɗam bee feecaare.
Yuhanna 10.14: Min, mi gaynaako booɗɗo. Gaynaako booɗɗo ɗon hokka yoŋki muuɗum ngam baali mum.
Yuhanna 10.15: Ammaa duroowo ngam ngeenaari, mo laataaki gaynaako, mo maraay baali, to o yi'i saafaandu ɗon wara, o wudinan baali, o doggan, o acca ɗi. Nden saafaandu hippoto baali, saŋkita ɗi.
Yuhanna 10.16: O doggan ngam o duroowo haa o heɓa ngeenaari tan, walaa ko yaali mo bee baali.
Yuhanna 10.17: Min, mi gaynaako booɗɗo, mi anndi baali am, baali am boo anndi yam.
Yuhanna 10.18: Bana no Baabiraawo anndiri yam, bana non min boo mi anndiri mo. Mi hokkan yoŋki am ngam baali am.
Yuhanna 10.19: Mi woodi baali goɗɗi, ɗi ngonaay nder waalde nde'e. Sey mi wadda ɗi kanji boo, ɗi nana sawtu am, ɗi laato tokkere woore, bee gaynaako gooto.
Yuhanna 10.21: Baabiraawo yiɗi yam, ngam mi hokkan yoŋki am, nden mi hoosita ki fahin.
Yuhanna 10.22: Walaa mo hoosata yoŋki am, ammaa min hokkata ki bee hoore am. Mi woodi baawɗe hokkugo ki, mi woodi baawɗe hoosititgo ki boo. Kanjum woni umroore nde Baabiraawo am hokki yam.”
Yuhanna 10.24: Ngam daliila bolle ɗe'e, Yahuudu'en cennditi hakkunde muuɗum'en fahin.
Yuhanna 10.25: Ɗuuɗɓe caka maɓɓe mbi'i: “O woodi ginnawol, o ginnaaɗo, ngam ɗume on nanata mo?”
Yuhanna 10.26: Woɗɓe feere mbi'i: “Marɗo ginnawol wolwataa bana nii. Kadi ginnawol wumtinan gite wumɓe na?”
Yuhanna 10.28: Saa'i juulde cenki haykaliiru haa Urusaliima waɗi, ɗum dabbunde.
Yuhanna 10.32: Yahuudu'en ɗonno taari mo, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Haa ndey ittata saklere amin? To an a Almasiihu, wi' min ɗum laaɓɗum.”
Yuhanna 10.33: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Mi wi'i on ɗum diga ɓooyma, ammaa on nuɗɗinaay ɗum. Kuuɗe ɗe mi ɗon huuwa bee baawɗe Baabiraawo am, ɗon ceedano yam.
Yuhanna 10.34: Ammaa on nuɗɗintaa, ngam on ngonaay nder baali am.
Yuhanna 10.35: Baali am ɗon nana sawtu am, mi anndi ɗi, ɗi ɗon tokko yam.
Yuhanna 10.36: Mi hokkan ɗi ngeendam nduumiiɗam, ɗi kalkataa sam. Walaa mo jaɓtata ɗi diga juŋngo am.
Yuhanna 10.37: Baabiraawo am mo hokki yam ɗi, ɓuri koo moy fuu maŋngu, walaa mo jaɓtata ɗi diga juŋngo Baabiraawo am.
Yuhanna 10.40: Yahuudu'en koo'i kaa'e fahin ngam fiɗugo mo.
Yuhanna 10.41: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mi huuwi kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe yeeso mooɗon bee baawɗe Baabiraawo am. Ngam daliila kuugal ngale nder maaje on ngiɗi fiɗugo yam?”
Yuhanna 10.42: Yahuudu'en njaabi mo: “Naa ngam daliila kuuɗe booɗɗe min piɗata ma, ammaa ngam a wolwi kalluka dow Allah. An a neɗɗo, ammaa a waɗi hoore maaɗa a Allah.”
Yuhanna 10.43: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Naa ɗum binndaaɗum nder tawreeta mooɗon, Allah wi'i: Onon on ɗowanteeɓe
Yuhanna 10.45: En anndi ko Deftere wi'i sottintaake. Allah ewni nanɓe wolde man ɓe ɗowanteeɓe.
Yuhanna 10.46: Ammaa min, cenaaɗo Baabiraawo, nelaaɗo nder duniyaaru, on mbi'i: A ɗon wolwa kalluka dow Allah, ngam mi wi'i mi
Yuhanna 10.49: To ko mi huuwi laataaki kuuɗe Baabiraawo am, nden kam taa nuɗɗineeɗam.
Yuhanna 10.50: Ammaa to ɗum kuuɗe maako fakat, koo to on nuɗɗinaay yam min, nuɗɗine kuuɗe ɗe'e, ngam haa on annda e on paama Baabiraawo ɗon nder am, min boo mi ɗon nder Baabiraawo.”
Yuhanna 10.52: Ɓe ɗaɓɓi naŋngugo mo fahin, ammaa o teetori ɓe.
Yuhanna 10.54: Fahin Yeesu dilli gaɗa maayo Urdun, haa nokkuure nde Yuhanna aartuno waɗugo baptisma, o jooɗi ton
Yuhanna 10.56: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa maako. Ɓe mbi'i: “Yuhanna waɗaay kaayeefiwol koo ngole, ammaa ko o wolwi dow gorko oo fuu ɗum gooŋga.”

Yuhanna 11.1: Woodino goɗɗo mo innde muuɗum Laazarus, o nyawi. Wuro maako, Baytaniya. Ɗum wuro ngo Mariyama e Marta deerɗum debbo ngoni haa muuɗum
Yuhanna 11.3: Mariyama o debbo mo rufino uurdi dow kosɗe Jawmiraawo, mo yiggino ɗe bee gaasa muuɗum. Laazarus nyawɗo oo, ɗum deerɗiiko
Yuhanna 11.5: Deerɗiraaɓe rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e neli goɗɗo haa Yeesu, ngam o wi'a mo: “Jawmiraawo, soobaajo maaɗa nyawɗo.”
Yuhanna 11.6: Nde Yeesu nani ɗum, o wi'i: “Nyawu ngu'u maaynataa mo, ammaa ngu waŋginan tedduŋgal Allah, ngam haa
Yuhanna 11.10: Yeesu yiɗi Marta e Mariyama e Laazarus.
Yuhanna 11.11: Nde o nani Laazarus nyawɗo, o faɓɓi nyalɗe ɗiɗi fahin haa nokkuure nde o wonno.
Yuhanna 11.12: Nden o wi'i pukara'en: “En lorto haa lesdi Yahudiya.”
Yuhanna 11.13: Pukara'en mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, neeɓaay Yahuudu'en ɗonno ɗaɓɓa fiɗugo ma bee kaa'e, nden a yiɗi loraago ton?”
Yuhanna 11.14: Yeesu jaabi: “Naa woodi saa'iiji sappo e ɗiɗi nder nyalawmaare? To goɗɗo ɗon yaha bee nyalawma, o fergataako, ngam o ɗon yi'a annoora duniyaaru ndu'u.
Yuhanna 11.15: Ammaa to goɗɗo ɗon yaha bee jemma, o fergoto, ngam o walaa annoora nder maako.”
Yuhanna 11.16: Ɓaawo wolwango ɓe bolle ɗe'e, o ɓesdi wi'ugo ɓe: “Soobaajo meeɗen Laazarus ɗaanake, ammaa mi yahan findingo mo.”
Yuhanna 11.17: Pukara'en njaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo, to o ɗaanake, o yamɗitan.”
Yuhanna 11.18: Yeesu ɗonno wolwa dow haala maayde Laazarus, ammaa pukara'en tammino o ɗon wolwa haala ɗoyŋgol bee gooŋga.
Yuhanna 11.19: Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe bee laaɓɗum: “Laazarus maayi.
Yuhanna 11.20: Ammaa ngam daliila mooɗon mi ɗon seyo ngam mi walaa ton, ngam haa on nuɗɗina. Jonta kam, ndillen haa maako.”
Yuhanna 11.21: Tomas bi'eteeɗo Ciwto wi'i pukara'en woɗɓe: “Ndillen ton enen boo, ngam en maayda bee maako.”
Yuhanna 11.23: Nde Yeesu yotti Baytaniya, o tawi ɓe nastini ɓanndu Laazarus nder yenaande, waɗi nyalɗe nayi.
Yuhanna 11.24: Baytaniya ɓadi bee Urusaliima, baakin kilomeetir tati.
Yuhanna 11.25: Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa Marta e Mariyama, ngam de'itingo ɓe ngam maayde deerɗiraawo maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 11.27: Nde Marta nani Yeesu wari, o dilli fottoygo bee maako, ammaa Mariyama jooɗi haa saare.
Yuhanna 11.28: Marta wi'i Yeesu: “Jawmiraawo, to a ɗonno ɗo, deerɗam maayataano.
Yuhanna 11.29: Ammaa mi anndi, koo jonta boo, Allah hokkete ko a toroto mo fuu.”
Yuhanna 11.31: Marta jaabi mo: “Mi anndi o ummititto saa'i ummitineeki maayɓe, nyalaade darŋgal.”
Yuhanna 11.33: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Min woni ummitinoowo e geeɗitinoowo. Koo moy nuɗɗini yam yeeɗan, koo to o maayi boo.
Yuhanna 11.34: Koo moy geeto, nuɗɗinɗo yam, maayataa sam. A nuɗɗini ɗum na?”
Yuhanna 11.35: Marta jaabi mo: “Ooho, Jawmiraawo, mi nuɗɗini an, a Almasiihu,
Yuhanna 11.39: Ɓaawo bolle ɗe'e, Marta lori haa deerɗum Mariyama, wi'i mo bee sirri: “Moodibbo wari, o ɗon ewne.”
Yuhanna 11.40: Nde Mariyama nani ɗum, o ummi law, o yehi haa Yeesu.
Yuhanna 11.41: Yeesu nastaayno wuro tawon, o ɗon haa nokkuure nde Marta fottuno bee maako.
Yuhanna 11.42: Yahuudu'en wondunooɓe bee Mariyama nder suudu ngam de'itingo mo ngi'i o ummi law, o wurti, ɓe tokki mo. Ɓe tammi o yahan haa yenaande ngam woyugo ton.
Yuhanna 11.44: Nde Mariyama wari haa nokkuure nde Yeesu woni, o yi'i mo, o hofi les kosɗe maako, o wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, to a ɗonno ɗo, deerɗam maayataano.”
Yuhanna 11.45: Nde Yeesu yi'i o ɗon woya, Yahuudu'en warduɓe bee maako boo ɗon mboya, ɗum ummini ɓernde maako.
Yuhanna 11.46: O wi'i: “Haa toy on uwi mo?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo, war laar.”
Yuhanna 11.48: Yahuudu'en mbi'i: “Kay, ndaare no o yiɗiri mo!”
Yuhanna 11.49: Ammaa woɗɓe caka maɓɓe mbi'i: “Kaŋko mo wumtini wumɓe, o waawataano hisnugo Laazarus maayde na?”
Yuhanna 11.51: Ɓernde Yeesu ummi fahin, o yehi haa yenaande. Ɗum lowol maɓɓaaŋgol bee hayre.
Yuhanna 11.52: Yeesu wi'i: “Cottine hayre.” Marta, deerɗu maayɗo wi'i: “Jawmiraawo, o haccan, ngam o waɗi nyalɗe nayi nder yenaande.”
Yuhanna 11.53: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Mi wi'aayno ma, to a nuɗɗini, a yi'an tedduŋgal Allah na?”
Yuhanna 11.54: Ɓe cottini hayre go. Yeesu tijji asama, wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, mi yetti ma ngam a nanani yam.
Yuhanna 11.55: Min kam, mi anndi a ɗon nanammi foroy, ammaa mi wi'i ɗum ngam mooɓre yimɓe dariiɓe haa ɗo, ngam haa ɓe nuɗɗina an neli yam.”
Yuhanna 11.56: Nde o wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o hooli bee sawtu: “Laazarus, wurta!”
Yuhanna 11.57: Maayɗo wurti, kosɗe e juuɗe maako ɗon taari bee leppi, yeeso maako boo saawaaŋgo bee leppol. Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Piiste mo, acce mo o dilla.”
Yuhanna 11.59: Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe warɓe haa Mariyama ngi'i ko Yeesu waɗi, ɓe nuɗɗini mo.
Yuhanna 11.60: Ammaa woɗɓe caka maɓɓe njehi haa Farisa'en, ngecci ɓe ko Yeesu waɗi.
Yuhanna 11.61: Farisa'en e mawɓe liman'en ndawridi, mbi'i: “Ɗume en mbaɗata? Ngam gorko oo ɗon waɗa kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi.
Yuhanna 11.62: To en acci mo o ɗon waɗa bana nii, yimɓe fuu nuɗɗinan mo. Nden mawɓe Roma'en nastanɓe haala man, kalkan haykaliiru meeɗen e ummaatoore meeɗen!”
