Yuhanna 11.63: Gooto caka maɓɓe, mo innde muuɗum Kayafas, kaŋko woni hooreejo liman'en hitaande man, wi'i ɓe: “Onon walaa ko on paamata.
Yuhanna 11.64: On paamataa to goɗɗo gooto maayi ngam jama'aare fuu, ɗum ɓuran wooɗugo dow halkere ummaatoore fuu na?”
Yuhanna 11.65: O wolwaay bolle ɗe'e bee ngiɗa maako. Ammaa nde o hooreejo liman'en hitaande man, o waɗi annabaaku, o wi'i Yeesu maayan ngam ummaatoore Yahuudu'en fuu,
Yuhanna 11.66: naa ngam ummaatoore maajum tan, ammaa ngam o hawta ɓiɓɓe Allah saŋkitiiɓe fuu boo.
Yuhanna 11.68: Diga nyannde man, mawɓe Yahuudu'en koo'i anniya mbarugo Yeesu.
Yuhanna 11.69: Ngam man Yeesu meetaay waancugo bee baŋguɗum caka Yahuudu'en. O dilli haa nokkuure kommbi ladde, haa wuro wi'eteeŋgo Efrayim, ton o faɓɓidi bee pukara'en maako.
Yuhanna 11.73: ɓadake, yimɓe gure feere feere njehi Urusaliima diga juulde man siwaa, ngam ɓe cena ko'e maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 11.74: Ɓe ɗonno tefa Yeesu, ɓe ɗonno ƴamƴamtira hakkunde maɓɓe nde ɓe ɗonno ndari nder haykaliiru: “Ɗume numɗon? O warataa juulde sam na?”
Yuhanna 11.75: Mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en umrino, to goɗɗo anndi haa Yeesu woni, sey o fefta mo ngam ɓe naŋnga mo.

Yuhanna 12.3: waɗa. Yeesu yehi Baytaniya, wuro Laazarus mo Yeesu ummitinno diga maayde.
Yuhanna 12.4: Ɓe mbaɗani mo nyaamduuji haa ton. Marta ɗonno hokka ɓe nyaamdu, Laazarus ɗonno caka nyaamdanɓe bee Yeesu.
Yuhanna 12.5: Nden Mariyama hoo'i uurdi nardi laaɓndi caɗndi masin baakin reeta liitir, rufi ndi dow kosɗe Yeesu, nden o yiggi ɗe bee gaasa hoore maako. Suudu fuu heewi uureeŋga uurdi maajum
Yuhanna 12.7: Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder pukara'en Yeesu, zammbotooɗo mo wi'i:
Yuhanna 12.8: “Koni ɓe coorraay uurdi ndi'i baakin ceede cardi teemeɗɗe tati ngam ɓe ndokka talaka'en?”
Yuhanna 12.9: O wi'i ɗum naa ngam o enɗi talaka'en, ammaa ngam o gujjo. Kaŋko woni jogoowo booro ceede, o ɗon wujja ceede ɗe ɓe kalfini mo.
Yuhanna 12.10: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i: “Acce debbo oo, o aarti waɗugo ɗum ngam nyalaade uweeki am.
Yuhanna 12.11: Talaka'en ngondan bee mooɗon foroy, ammaa min mi wondataa bee mooɗon foroy
Yuhanna 12.14: Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe nani Yeesu ɗon haa Baytaniya. Ɓe njehi ton, naa ngam daliila Yeesu tan, ammaa ngam laarugo Laazarus mo Yeesu ummitinno diga maayde boo.
Yuhanna 12.15: Mawɓe liman'en mbaɗi anniya mbarugo Laazarus boo,
Yuhanna 12.16: ngam daliila maako, Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe acci ɓe, nuɗɗini Yeesu.
Yuhanna 12.18: Jaŋngo man, mooɓre yimɓe warɓe ngam juulde
Yuhanna 12.20: go nani Yeesu ɗon wara haa Urusaliima.
Yuhanna 12.21: Ɓe koo'i lice dibinooje, ɓe njehi fottoygo bee maako, ɓe ɗon ngooka bee sawtu: “
Yuhanna 12.23: Barka laatano laamiiɗo Isra'iila, garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo
Yuhanna 12.25: Yeesu tawi wamnde molde, wa'i nde, bana ko winnda nder Deftere:
Yuhanna 12.32: Saa'i man pukara'en maako paamaay ɗum tawon. Ammaa nde Yeesu teddinaama, ɓe ciftori, ɗum binndaaɗum dow maako nder Deftere, kanjum ɓe ngaɗani mo ɗum.
Yuhanna 12.34: Saa'i Yeesu ewni Laazarus, wurtinno mo yenaande, ummitinno mo diga maayde, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ton. Kamɓe ɓe tokki seedaago.
Yuhanna 12.35: Ngam maajum mooɓre ɗuuɗnde wari fottugo bee Yeesu, ngam ɓe nani haala kaayeefiwol ngol o waɗno.
Yuhanna 12.36: Nden Farisa'en mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde muuɗum'en: “Ndaa, ko en mbaɗi fuu nafaay koo ɗume, ngam duniyaaru fuu ɗon tokko mo.”
Yuhanna 12.39: woɗɓe ɗonno caka warɓe haa Urusaliima ngam sujidango Allah saa'i juulde.
Yuhanna 12.40: Ɓe ngari haa Filip mo wuro muuɗum Baytisayda nder lesdi Galiili, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min ngiɗi laarugo Yeesu.”
Yuhanna 12.41: Filip yehi yecci ɗum Andire, nden ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe njehi, ɓe ngecci ɗum Yeesu.
Yuhanna 12.42: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Saa'i waɗi jonta, haa
Yuhanna 12.45: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: To wabbere alkamaari uwaaka nder lesdi, to nde waataay, nde jooɗoto feere maare. Ammaa to nde waati, nde riman gabbe ɗuuɗɗe.
Yuhanna 12.46: Koo moy yiɗi yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa koo moy wanyi yoŋki muuɗum nder duniyaaru ndu'u, aynan ki haa foroy
Yuhanna 12.48: Sey kuuwanoowo yam fuu tokko yam, ngam haa o wona haa ngonmi. Koo moy laatake kuuwanoowo yam, Baabiraawo am teddinan mo.”
Yuhanna 12.50: Yeesu wi'i: “Jonta ɓernde am sakli. Ɗume mbi'anmi? Mi wi'a Baabiraawo hisnammi torra saa'iire nde'e na? Ammaa fakat mi wari ngam mi torro nder saa'iire nde'e.
Yuhanna 12.51: Baabiraawo, teddin innde ma.” Nden sawtu iwi diga asama, wi'i: “Mi teddini nde, mi teddinan nde fahin.”
Yuhanna 12.53: Yimɓe wonɓe ton nani sawtu maajum, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum riggaaŋgo.” Woɗɓe mbi'i: “Malaa'ikaajo wolwani mo.”
Yuhanna 12.54: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Sawtu oo waraay ngam am, ammaa ɗum wari ngam mooɗon.
Yuhanna 12.55: Jonta woni saa'iire kiita duniyaaru ndu'u. Jonta laamiiɗo duniyaaru ndu wudinaama haa yaasi.
Yuhanna 12.56: Min, to mi ɓaŋgtaama diga lesdi, mi fooɗan yimɓe fuu haa am.”
Yuhanna 12.57: Bee bolle ɗe'e o tinndini irin maayde nde o tammi maayugo.
Yuhanna 12.58: Yimɓe mbi'i mo: “Min nani nder tawreeta no Almasiihu duumoto. Kadi noy a wi'rata: Haani
Yuhanna 12.62: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Annoora ɗon wondi bee mooɗon wakkati seɗɗa tawon. Ngance saa'i on ngoodi annoora, ngam taa nyiɓre juha on, ngam jahanɗo nder nyiɓre anndaa haa o yahata.
Yuhanna 12.63: Nde annoora ɗon wondi bee mooɗon, nuɗɗine annoora, ngam haa on laato ɓiɓɓe annoora.”
Yuhanna 12.64: Ɓaawo Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o dilli, o suuɗi ɓe.
Yuhanna 12.66: Koo nde Yeesu waɗi kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe nuɗɗinaay mo,
Yuhanna 12.67: ngam haa annabaaku ngu Esaaya waɗi hiɓɓa, o wi'no:
Yuhanna 12.69: Haa moy Jawmiraawo waŋgini baawɗe muuɗum
Yuhanna 12.72: Ɓe mbaawaay nuɗɗingo, ngam Esaaya wi'i fahin:
Yuhanna 12.76: ngam taa ɓe ngi'a bee gite maɓɓe,
Yuhanna 12.82: Esaaya wi'i non ngam o yi'i tedduŋgal Yeesu, o wolwi dow maako.
Yuhanna 12.84: Koo nder mawɓe Yahuudu'en boo, ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini Yeesu. Ammaa ɓe mbaŋginaay ɗum, ngam daliila Farisa'en, ngam taa ɓe ngurtina ɓe suudu dewal Yahuudu'en.
Yuhanna 12.85: Ngam ɓe ɓuri yiɗugo yerduye yimɓe dow yerduye Allah.
Yuhanna 12.87: Yeesu hooli bee sawtu, wi'i: “Koo moy nuɗɗini yam, naa min tan o nuɗɗini, ammaa o nuɗɗini nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 12.88: Koo moy yi'i yam, yi'i nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 12.89: Min, mi annoora, mi wari nder duniyaaru, ngam taa nuɗɗinɗo yam fuu jooɗo nder nyiɓre.
Yuhanna 12.90: To goɗɗo nani bolle am, ɗowtanaaki ɗe, naa min hiitoto mo, ngam mi waraay hiitaago duniyaaru, ammaa ngam hisnugo ndu.
Yuhanna 12.91: Koo moy sali yam, jaɓaay bolle am, o kiiteteeɗo. Bolle ɗe mi wolwi, kanje kiitoto mo nyalaade darŋgal.
Yuhanna 12.92: Ngam mi wolwaay bee ngiɗa am, ammaa Baabiraawo nelɗo yam, kaŋko umri yam ko mi wolwata, ko mi anndinta yimɓe.
Yuhanna 12.93: Mi anndi umroore maako, ɗum ngeendam nduumiiɗam. Walaa ko mi wolwata, sey ko Baabiraawo umri yam wolwugo.”

Yuhanna 13.3: waɗa. Yeesu anndi saa'i muuɗum wari haa o acca duniyaaru, o hoota haa Baabiraawo. O yiɗi yimɓe maako nder duniyaaru, o yiɗi ɓe haa timmoode.
Yuhanna 13.5: Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum ɗonno nyaamda, nden Iblisa waɗi numo nder ɓernde Yahuuda, ɓii Simon Iskariyot, ngam o zammbo Yeesu.
Yuhanna 13.6: Yeesu anndi, o wari diga Allah, o loroto haa Allah, o anndi boo Allah hokki mo baawɗe dow koo ɗume fuu.
Yuhanna 13.7: O acci nyaamugo, o ɓorti ngapaleewol maako, o haddi gudel.
Yuhanna 13.8: Nden o waɗi ndiyam haa taasawo
Yuhanna 13.9: , o fuɗɗi lootugo kosɗe pukara'en, o woosti ɗe bee gudel ngel o haddi.
Yuhanna 13.10: Nden o wari haa Simon Piyer. Piyer wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, an, a lootantam kosɗe?”
Yuhanna 13.11: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Jonta a anndaa ko mi waɗata tawon, ammaa a faaman ɗum yeeso seɗɗa.”
Yuhanna 13.12: Piyer wi'i mo: “Aa'a, a lootantaa yam kosɗe sam.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “To mi lootanaay ma kosɗe, a walaa geɗal haa am.”
Yuhanna 13.13: Simon Piyer wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, nden kam naa kosɗe tan a lootantammi, ammaa lootanam juuɗe bee hoore fuu.”
Yuhanna 13.14: Yeesu wi'i mo: “To goɗɗo yiiwake, o walaa haaje yiiwaago fahin. Sey kosɗe tan o lootata, ngam ɓanndu maako ɗon laaɓi. Onon on laaɓɓe, ammaa naa on fuu.”
Yuhanna 13.15: Yeesu anndi mo tammi zammbaago mo, ngam maajum o wi'i: “Naa on fuu on laaɓɓe.”
Yuhanna 13.17: Ɓaawo o timmini lootango ɓe kosɗe, o ɓorni ngapaleewol maako fahin, o jooɗi haa taabal nyaamugo, o wi'i ɓe: “On paami ko mi waɗani on na?
Yuhanna 13.18: On ɗon ewno yam moodibbo e Jawmiraawo, ɗum booɗɗum, ngam mi moodibbo fakat.
Yuhanna 13.19: To min moodibbo, Jawmiraawo, mi looti kosɗe mooɗon, nden kam haani onon boo on lootindira kosɗe mooɗon.
Yuhanna 13.20: Mi hokki on misaalu, ngam haa onon boo on mbaɗa bana mi waɗani on
Yuhanna 13.22: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Kuuwoowo ɓurataa jaagorɗo muuɗum maŋngu, nelaaɗo boo ɓurataa nelɗo ɗum maŋngu
Yuhanna 13.24: To on anndi ɗum, barka laatanto on to on mbaɗi ɗum.
Yuhanna 13.26: Mi wolwaay ɗum ngam mooɗon fuu, mi anndi suɓaaɓe am. Ammaa haani ko Deftere wi'i hiɓɓa: Mo ɗon nyaamda bee am, ummani yam
Yuhanna 13.28: Mi ɗon wi'a on ɗum jonta, diga ɗum siwaa laataago ngam haa on nuɗɗina, min woni mo ngonmi to ɗum waɗi.
Yuhanna 13.29: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo moy jaɓi nelaaɗo am, jaɓi yam min. Koo moy jaɓi yam, jaɓi nelɗo yam
Yuhanna 13.32: Ɓaawo Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e, ɓernde maako sakli, o wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, gooto mooɗon zammboto yam.”
Yuhanna 13.33: Pukara'en ndaarndaartiri, ɓe anndaa dow moy o wolwi.
Yuhanna 13.34: Pukaraajo mo Yeesu yiɗi ɗum, ɗonno kommbi Yeesu haa taabal.
Yuhanna 13.36: mo ngam haa o ƴama Yeesu dow moy o wolwi.
Yuhanna 13.37: Pukaraajo man ɓaari Yeesu ƴami mo: “Jawmiraawo, ɗum moy?”
Yuhanna 13.38: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Mi suuwan loŋngere nder takay, mo mi hokkata nde woni kaŋko.” Nden Yeesu hoo'i loŋngere, suuwi nde nder takay, hokki nde Yahuuda ɓii Simon Iskariyot.
Yuhanna 13.39: Nde Yahuuda jaɓi loŋngere maajum, Sayɗaanu nasti ɓernde maako. Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ko a yiɗi waɗugo, waɗ ɗum law.”
Yuhanna 13.41: Walaa koo gooto nder maɓɓe, taariiɓe taabal faami ngam ɗume Yeesu wi'i mo ɗum.
Yuhanna 13.42: Nde nii Yahuuda woni jogoowo ceede, ɗuuɗɓe tammi Yeesu wi'no mo o yaha o sooda kuuje ɗe ɓe mari haaje ngam juulde malla o hokka talaka'en huunde woɗnde.
Yuhanna 13.43: Nde Yahuuda jaɓi loŋngere go, o wurti law. Ɗum jemma.
Yuhanna 13.47: teddinaama, Allah boo teddinaama nder maako.
Yuhanna 13.50: Allah boo waŋginan tedduŋgal ngal Ɓiɗɗo mari bee hoore muuɗum. Jonta nii o waɗan ɗum.
Yuhanna 13.51: Ɓikkoy am, mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon saa'i seɗɗa tawon. Ɓaawoɗon on tefatam, ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on jonta ko mi wi'no Yahuudu'en: On mbaawataa yahugo haa njahanmi
Yuhanna 13.53: Mi ɗon hokka on umroore hesre: Ngiɗindire! Bana mi yiɗiri on, ngiɗindire onon boo
Yuhanna 13.55: Dow maajum yimɓe fuu anndan on pukara'en am, to on ɗon ngiɗindira.”
Yuhanna 13.57: Simon Piyer wi'i Yeesu: “Jawmiraawo, toy njahataa?” Yeesu jaabi: “A waawataa tokkaago yam haa njahanmi jonta, ammaa yeeso seɗɗa, a tammi tokkaago yam.”
Yuhanna 13.58: Piyer wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, ngam ɗume mi waawataa tokkaago ma jonta? Mi hokkan yoŋki am, mi maaya ngam maaɗa!”
Yuhanna 13.59: Yeesu jaabi: “Gooŋga a hokkan yoŋki maaɗa ngam am na? Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'e: Hiddeko asgumri
Yuhanna 13.60: u'a, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.”

Yuhanna 14.1: Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Taa ɓerɗe mooɗon caklo. Nuɗɗine Allah, nuɗɗineeɗam min boo.
Yuhanna 14.2: Woodi cuuɗi ɗuuɗɗi nder saare Baabiraawo am, mi yahan, mi taaskitinana on joonde. Mi wi'ataano on ɗum to ɗum laataaki non.
Yuhanna 14.3: To mi dilli, mi taaskitinani on joonde, mi loroto, mi hoo'a on, mi yahra on haa am, ngam haa on ngona haa ngonmi.
Yuhanna 14.4: On anndi laawol yahugo haa njahanmi.”
Yuhanna 14.5: Tomas wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, min anndaa haa a yahata, noy min anndirta laawol maajum?”
Yuhanna 14.6: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Min woni laawol e gooŋga e ngeendam. Walaa mo yahata haa Baabiraawo, sey bee am
Yuhanna 14.8: To on anndino yam, on anndanno Baabiraawo am boo. Diga jonta on anndi mo, on ngi'i mo.”
Yuhanna 14.10: Filip wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo, hollu min Baabiraawo, ɗum he'an min.”
Yuhanna 14.11: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Filip, duuri mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon, nden a anndaa yam na? Koo moy yi'i yam, yi'i Baabiraawo. Noy mbi'rata: Hollu min Baabiraawo?
Yuhanna 14.12: A nuɗɗinaay mi ɗon nder Baabiraawo, Baabiraawo boo ɗon nder am na? Bolle ɗe mi wolwanta on iwaay haa am. Baabiraawo mo ɗon nder am, kaŋko hebbitinta kuuɗe maako.
Yuhanna 14.13: Nuɗɗine ko mi wi'i on: Baabiraawo ɗon nder am, min boo mi ɗon nder maako. To naa non, nuɗɗine ngam daliila kuuɗe ɗe'e.
Yuhanna 14.14: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo moy nuɗɗini yam, huuwan kuuɗe ɗe mi huuwi, o huuwan ko ɓuri ɗum mawnugo boo, ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo.
Yuhanna 14.15: Ko on toroto bee innde am fuu, mi waɗan ɗum, ngam haa Baabiraawo teddine nder
Yuhanna 14.18: To on torake koo ɗume bee innde am, mi waɗan ɗum.”
Yuhanna 14.20: Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “To on ngiɗi yam, on njogoto umrooje am.
Yuhanna 14.21: Mi toroto Baabiraawo o hokka on Balloowo feere, ngam o wonda bee mooɗon haa abada.
Yuhanna 14.22: Ɗum Ruuhu mo gooŋga, duniyaaru waawataa heɓugo mo, ngam ndu waawataa yi'ugo mo, ndu anndataa mo boo. Ammaa onon on anndi mo, ngam o ɗon wondi bee mooɗon, o jooɗoto nder mooɗon boo.
Yuhanna 14.24: Mi accataa on bana atiime'en, mi loroto haa mooɗon.
Yuhanna 14.25: Yeeso seɗɗa duniyaaru yi'ataa yam fahin, ammaa onon on ngi'atam, ngam min mi ɗon yeeɗi, onon boo on ngeeɗan.
Yuhanna 14.26: Nyalaade man, on anndan min mi ɗon nder kawtal bee Baabiraawo am, onon boo on ɗon nder kawtal bee am.
Yuhanna 14.28: Mo jogi umrooje am, ɗowtani ɗe, kaŋko woni giɗɗo yam. Baabiraawo yiɗan giɗɗo yam, min boo mi yiɗan mo, mi waŋginanan mo hoore am.”
Yuhanna 14.29: Woodi Yahuuda feere, naa Yahuuda Iskariyot, o wi'i Yeesu: “Jawmiraawo, noy ɗum laatorto, a waŋginana min hoore ma, ammaa a waŋgantaa duniyaaru?”
Yuhanna 14.30: Yeesu jaabi mo: “To goɗɗo yiɗi yam, o ɗowtanto bolle am, Baabiraawo am boo yiɗan mo. Min bee Baabiraawo am, min ngaran, min njooɗodotto bee maako.
Yuhanna 14.31: Mo yiɗaa yam, o ɗowtantaako bolle am. Ko on nanata haa am, ɗum iwaay haa am, ammaa haa Baabiraawo nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 14.33: Mi wolwani on ɗum yaake mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon.
Yuhanna 14.34: Balloowo, waato Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo Baabiraawo neldata on bee innde am, kaŋko ekkitinta on kuuje fuu, o siftinoran on ko mi wi'i on fuu.
Yuhanna 14.37: , mi ɗon hokka on salaaman am. Ko mi hokkata on, ɗum nanndaay bee ko duniyaaru hokkata. Taa ɓerɗe mooɗon caklo, taa kultore!
Yuhanna 14.38: On nani mi wi'no on mi dillan, ammaa mi loroto haa mooɗon. To on ngiɗi yam, on ceyoto ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo, ngam Baabiraawo ɓuri yam maŋngu.
Yuhanna 14.39: Mi wolwani on ɗum jonta diga ɗum siwaa laataago, ngam haa on nuɗɗina to ɗum waɗi.
Yuhanna 14.40: Mi tokkataako wolididgo ɗuuɗɗum bee mooɗon, ngam laamiiɗo duniyaaru ɗon wara. O walaa baawɗe dow am koo seɗɗa.
Yuhanna 14.41: Ammaa ngam haa duniyaaru annda mi yiɗi Baabiraawo, ngam maajum mi ɗon waɗa ko Baabiraawo umri yam. Umme, ndillen diga ɗo!”

Yuhanna 15.1: Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Min, mi inabohi gooŋgahi, Baabiraawo am woni jawmu ngesa.
Yuhanna 15.2: Lisal koo ngale haa am ngal rimataa ɓiɓɓe, o ta'an ngal. Ammaa lisal dimanŋgal ɓiɓɓe, o mo'inan ngal haa ngal ɓesda rimugo ɓiɓɓe fahin.
Yuhanna 15.3: Onon on mo'inaaɓe ngam daliila wolde nde mi wolwani on.
Yuhanna 15.4: Tabite nder kawtal bee am, nden kam min boo mi tabitan nder kawtal bee mooɗon. Bana no lisal inabohi rimataa ɓiɓɓe, sonaa to ngal hawti bee inabohi, bana non onon boo, on mbaɗataa nafuuda sonaa to on ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee am.
Yuhanna 15.6: Min woni inabohi, onon on lice. Mo tabiti nder kawtal bee am, min boo mi tabiti nder kawtal bee muuɗum, kaŋko o waɗan nafuuda. Ammaa to on ngondaay bee am, on mbaawataa waɗugo koo ɗume.
Yuhanna 15.7: To goɗɗo tabitaay nder kawtal bee am, o wudinteeɗo yaasi bana lisal ta'aaŋgal, ngal yooran, nden ɓe koocan ngal ɓe ngudina ngal nder yiite, ngal wula.
Yuhanna 15.8: To on ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee am, bolle am boo ɗon tabiti nder mooɗon, tore ko on ngiɗi fuu, on keɓan ɗum.
Yuhanna 15.9: Ndaa ko teddinta Baabiraawo am: On mbaɗa nafuuda ɗuuɗka, on laato pukara'en
Yuhanna 15.11: Bana no Baabiraawo yiɗiri yam, non min boo mi yiɗiri on. Tabite nder yiide am.
Yuhanna 15.12: To on ɗon njogo umrooje am, on tabitan nder yiide am, bana no min boo mi jogori umrooje Baabiraawo am, mi ɗon tabiti nder yiide maako.
Yuhanna 15.14: Mi wolwani on ɗum bana nii ngam haa seyo am wona nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, seyo mooɗon boo heewa.
Yuhanna 15.15: Ndaa umroore am: Ngiɗindire bana no mi yiɗiri on
Yuhanna 15.17: Walaa yiide ɓurata nde'e: Goɗɗo hokka yoŋki muuɗum ngam soobiraaɓe muuɗum.
Yuhanna 15.18: On soobiraaɓe am, to on ɗon mbaɗa ko mi umri on.
Yuhanna 15.19: Mi ewnataa on huuwooɓe fahin, ngam kuuwoowo anndaa ko jaagorɗo muuɗum waɗata. Mi ewni on soobiraaɓe am, ngam ko mi nani haa Baabiraawo am fuu, mi anndini on ɗum.
Yuhanna 15.20: Naa onon cuɓi yam, ammaa min suɓi on. Mi suɓi on, mi yowani on kuugal, ngam haa on njaha, on mbaɗa nafuuda, nafuuda mooɗon boo tabita, ngam haa ko on ƴamata haa Baabiraawo bee innde am fuu, o hokka on ɗum.
Yuhanna 15.23: To duniyaaru wanyi on, annde ndu aarti wanyugo yam min.
Yuhanna 15.24: To on laatino ɓe duniyaaru, ndu yiɗanno on ngam on yimɓe maaru. Ammaa nde nii on laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, mi suɓi on, mi wurtini on diga duniyaaru, ngam maajum, duniyaaru ɗon wanya on.
Yuhanna 15.25: Ciftore ko mi wi'i on: Kuuwoowo ɓurataa jaagorɗo muuɗum maŋngu. To ɓe toonyake yam, ɓe toonyoto on onon boo. To ɓe ɗowtanake bolle am, ɓe ɗowtanto bolle mooɗon boo
Yuhanna 15.27: Ammaa ɓe mbaɗan on ɗum fuu ngam daliila innde am, ngam ɓe anndaa nelɗo yam.
Yuhanna 15.28: Ɓe ngalaano aybe to mi waraayno, mi wolwanaayno ɓe. Ammaa jonta ɓe ngalaa hujja ngam hakke maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 15.29: Koo moy wanyi yam, wanyi Baabiraawo am boo.
Yuhanna 15.30: Ɓe ngalaano aybe to mi huuwaayno kuuɗe caka maɓɓe ɗe goɗɗo meeɗaay huuwugo. Ammaa jonta ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe am, bee non fuu ɓe nganyi yam, min e Baabiraawo am.
Yuhanna 15.31: Ɗum laati non, ngam haa ko winnda nder defte maɓɓe, waato tawreeta gooŋɗa: Ɓe nganyi yam bilaa daliila
Yuhanna 15.34: To Balloowo mo mi nelata haa mooɗon diga Baabiraawo wari, waato Ruuhu mo gooŋga garanɗo diga Baabiraawo, kaŋko o seedanto yam.
Yuhanna 15.35: Onon boo on ceedanto yam, ngam on ngondi bee am diga fuɗɗam.

Yuhanna 16.1: “Mi wolwani on ɗum bana nii ngam taa on acca nuɗɗingo yam.
Yuhanna 16.2: Ɓe ngurtinan on cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en. Saa'iire waran, nde koo moy mbari goɗɗo mooɗon tammi o waɗi ko Allah yiɗi.
Yuhanna 16.3: Ɓe mbaɗan ɗum ngam ɓe anndaa Baabiraawo, ɓe anndaa yam min boo.
Yuhanna 16.4: Ammaa mi wolwani on bana nii ngam to saa'i man waɗi, on ciftora mi biiɗo on ɗum.” Mi wi'aayno on ɗum diga fuɗɗam, ngam mi ɗonno wondi bee mooɗon.
Yuhanna 16.6: Jonta, mi ɗon dilla haa nelɗo yam, walaa koo gooto mooɗon ƴami yam: Toy njahataa?
Yuhanna 16.7: Ammaa jonta ɓerɗe mon cunake ngam mi wi'i on ɗum.
Yuhanna 16.8: Ammaa gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Ɗum ɓuran nafugo on to mi dilli, ngam to mi dillaay, Balloowo go warataa haa mooɗon. To mi dilli, mi nelan mo haa mooɗon.
Yuhanna 16.9: Kaŋko, to o wari, o waŋginan boofi yimɓe duniyaaru dow haala hakke e adilaaku e kiita.
Yuhanna 16.10: Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala hakke, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay yam.
Yuhanna 16.11: Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala adilaaku, ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo, on meetataa yi'ugo yam.
Yuhanna 16.12: Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala kiita boo, ngam laamiiɗo duniyaaru ndu hiitaama.
Yuhanna 16.14: “Kuuje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe luttani yam wi'ugo on, ammaa ɗum ɓuran faamu mooɗon tawon.
Yuhanna 16.15: To Ruuhu mo gooŋga wari, o ɗowan on nder gooŋga fuu. Ngam o wolwataa ngiɗa maako, ammaa o wi'an on ko o nani, ko tammi wargo fuu.
Yuhanna 16.16: Kaŋko o teddintam, ngam o yeccan on ko o heɓi haa am.
Yuhanna 16.17: Ko Baabiraawo mari fuu, min mari ɗum. Ngam maajum mbi'mi: Ruuhu yeccan on ko o nani haa am.”
Yuhanna 16.19: Yeesu wi'i: “Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin.”
Yuhanna 16.20: Woɗɓe caka pukara'en maako ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗume o yiɗi wi'go en: Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin. Kadiboo: Ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo?
Yuhanna 16.21: Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go: Yeeso seɗɗa? En paamataa ko o yiɗi wi'ugo.”
Yuhanna 16.22: Yeesu anndi ɓe ngiɗi ƴamugo mo, o wi'i ɓe: “Mi wi'i on: Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin. Dow maajum on ɗon ƴamƴamtira na?
Yuhanna 16.23: Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: On mboyan, on cunoto, ammaa duniyaaru seyoto. On cunoto, ammaa suno mooɗon laatoto seyo.
Yuhanna 16.24: To debbo reeduujo ɓadake ɓesnugo, o sunoto ngam saa'i torra warani mo. Ammaa to o ɓesni, o yejjitan bone man ngam daliila seyo, ngam o danyi neɗɗo haa duniyaaru.
Yuhanna 16.25: Bana non onon boo, on cunake jonta, ammaa mi yi'an on fahin. Nden kam ɓerɗe mooɗon ceyoto, walaa mo ittata seyo mooɗon sam.
Yuhanna 16.27: To nyalaade man yottake, on ƴamataa yam koo ɗume. Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo ɗume on tori Baabiraawo bee innde am fuu, o hokkan on ɗum.
Yuhanna 16.28: Haa wargo hannde on toraaki koo ɗume bee innde am. Tore, on keɓan ko on tori, ngam haa seyo mooɗon heewa.”
Yuhanna 16.30: Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Mi wolwani on kuuje ɗe'e fuu bee balndi. Saa'iire waran nde mi wolwantaa on bee balndi fahin, ammaa mi wolwanan on haala Baabiraawo bee laaɓɗum.
Yuhanna 16.31: To nyalaade man yottake, on toroto Baabiraawo bee innde am. Mi wi'aay on, mi toroto Baabiraawo ngam mooɗon.
Yuhanna 16.32: Baabiraawo bee hoore mum yiɗi on, ngam on ngiɗi yam, on nuɗɗini mi iwi haa Allah.
Yuhanna 16.33: Mi iwi haa Baabiraawo, mi wari nder duniyaaru. Jonta mi accan duniyaaru, mi hootan haa Baabiraawo.”
Yuhanna 16.35: Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “Ndaa, jonta a ɗon wolwa laaɓɗum, bilaa balndi.
Yuhanna 16.36: Jonta min paami a anndi koo ɗume fuu. A walaa haaje goɗɗo ƴame, a anndi ko o yiɗi ƴamugo. Ngam maajum min nuɗɗini a iwi haa Allah.”
Yuhanna 16.37: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Jonta on nuɗɗini na?
Yuhanna 16.38: Saa'i waran, koo jonta maa ɗum waɗi, on fuu on caŋkititto, koo moy fuu haa saare muuɗum, on accatam min feere am. Ammaa mi laataaki feere am, ngam Baabiraawo ɗon wondi bee am.
Yuhanna 16.39: Mi wolwani on ɗum ngam haa on keɓa salaaman nder am. On njaran bone nder duniyaaru, ammaa tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon, min mi jaalake duniyaaru.”

Yuhanna 17.1: Nde Yeesu timmini bolle ɗe'e fuu, o tijji asama, o wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, saa'i am waɗi. Waŋgin tedduŋgal am, min
Yuhanna 17.3: maaɗa, ngam haa Ɓiɗɗo boo waŋgina tedduŋgal maaɗa.
Yuhanna 17.4: A hokki yam baawɗe dow yimɓe fuu, ngam mi hokka ngeendam nduumiiɗam haa yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam.
Yuhanna 17.5: Ndaa ko woni ngeendam nduumiiɗam: Ɓe annda an woni Allah gooto, gooŋgaajo, ɓe annda boo Yeesu Almasiihu, nelaaɗo ma.
Yuhanna 17.6: Mi waŋgini tedduŋgal maaɗa nder duniyaaru, mi timmitini kuugal ngal a hokki yam.
Yuhanna 17.7: Jonta, yaa Baabiraawo, hokkam tedduŋgal haa yeeso ma, tedduŋgal ngal mi marno yaake mi ɗonno wondi bee maaɗa, diga duniyaaru tagaaka tawon.
Yuhanna 17.9: Mi waŋgini innde ma haa yimɓe ɓe a wurtini nder duniyaaru, a hokki yam. An mari ɓe, a hokki yam ɓe, ɓe ɗowtani wolde ma.
Yuhanna 17.10: Jonta, ɓe anndi ko a hokki yam fuu iwi haa maaɗa.
Yuhanna 17.11: Ngam mi wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe a wolwani yam, ɓe njaɓi ɗe. Ɓe annditi fakat mi iwi haa maaɗa, ɓe nuɗɗini an neli yam.
Yuhanna 17.13: Mi ɗon toro ma ngam maɓɓe. Mi torataako ngam duniyaaru, ammaa mi ɗon toro ma ngam yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam, ngam ɓe yimɓe maaɗa.
Yuhanna 17.14: Ko marmi fuu, an jeyi, ko marɗa fuu boo, min jeyi, mi teddinaama nder maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 17.15: Mi jooɗataako nder duniyaaru fahin, ammaa kamɓe ɓe ɗon njooɗi nder maaru. Jonta mi ɗon yaha haa maaɗa. Yaa Baabiraawo Ceniiɗo, a waŋginani yam baawɗe innde maaɗa, aynu ɓe bee baawɗe man, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum, bana min bee ma en gootum.
Yuhanna 17.16: Yaake mi ɗonno wondi bee maɓɓe, mi faddi ɓe bee baawɗe innde ma nde a hokki yam. Mi ayni ɓe, walaa koo gooto maɓɓe halki, sonaa mo majjini hoore muuɗum, ngam haa ko winnda nder Deftere gooŋɗa
Yuhanna 17.18: Jonta mi ɗon yaha haa maaɗa, mi ɗon wi'a ɗum fuu diga mi ɗon nder duniyaaru tawon, ngam haa ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewa seyo am timmididŋgo.
Yuhanna 17.19: Mi anndini ɓe wolde ma. Duniyaaru wanyi ɓe, ngam ɓe laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, bana min boo mi laataaki mo duniyaaru.
Yuhanna 17.20: Mi torataako ma ngam a wurtina ɓe duniyaaru, ammaa a fadda ɓe diga Kalluɗo
Yuhanna 17.22: Ɓe laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, bana min boo mi laataaki mo duniyaaru.
Yuhanna 17.23: Wolde maaɗa woni gooŋga. Senu ɓe bee gooŋga man.
Yuhanna 17.24: Bana a neldiri yam nder duniyaaru, bana non min boo mi neldi ɓe haa duniyaaru.
Yuhanna 17.25: Mi lii'ani ma yoŋki am ngam maɓɓe, ngam haa ɓe laato lii'anaaɓe ma daliila gooŋga.
Yuhanna 17.27: Mi ɗon toro ma naa ngam maɓɓe tan, ammaa mi ɗon toro ma boo ngam nuɗɗinanɓe yam daliila waazu maɓɓe fuu,
Yuhanna 17.28: ngam haa ɓe fuu ɓe laato gootum. Bana an, Baabiraawo, a ɗon nder kawtal bee am, min boo mi ɗon nder kawtal bee maaɗa. Kamɓe boo ɓe ngona nder kawtal bee meeɗen, ngam haa duniyaaru nuɗɗina an neli yam.
Yuhanna 17.29: Mi hokki ɓe tedduŋgal ngal a hokki yam, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum, bana an bee am en laati gootum.
Yuhanna 17.30: Min mi ɗon nder kawtal bee maɓɓe, an boo a ɗon nder kawtal bee am, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum fakat, ngam haa duniyaaru annda an neli yam, a yiɗi ɓe bana a yiɗiri yam.
Yuhanna 17.32: Yaa Baabiraawo, yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam, mi yiɗi ɓe ngonda bee am haa ngonanmi, ngam haa ɓe ngi'a tedduŋgal am ngal a hokki yam, ngam a yiɗi yam diga duniyaaru tagaakano tawon.
Yuhanna 17.33: Yaa Baabiraawo, adiliijo, duniyaaru anndaa ma, ammaa min mi anndi ma, yimɓe ɓe boo anndi an neli yam.
Yuhanna 17.34: Mi anndini ɓe innde ma, mi tokkoto anndingo ɓe boo, ngam haa yiide nde a yiɗiri yam wona nder maɓɓe, min boo mi wona nder kawtal bee maɓɓe.”

Yuhanna 18.1: Nde Yeesu timmini bolle ɗe'e, o dilli bee pukara'en maako gaɗa maayel Kederon. Woodi jarne haa nokkuure man, o nasti ton bee pukara'en maako.
Yuhanna 18.2: Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo mo boo anndi nokkuure man, ngam Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum mboowi hawtugo haa ton.
Yuhanna 18.3: Yahuuda yahdi haa jarne man bee sooje'en e nelaaɓe mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en, ɓe ɗon njogi balmi e pittirlaaji e jame yiite e balmi.
Yuhanna 18.4: Yeesu anndi ko heɓata mo fuu. O wurti, o ƴami ɓe: “Moy on ɗaɓɓititta?”
Yuhanna 18.5: Ɓe njaabi mo: “Min ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu mo Nasaratu.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum min.”
Yuhanna 18.6: Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo mo boo ɗon darodi ton bee maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 18.7: Nde Yeesu wi'i: “Ɗum min”, ɓe lori ɓaawo ɓaawo, ɓe ndo'i haa lesdi.
Yuhanna 18.8: Yeesu ƴami ɓe fahin: “Moy on ɗaɓɓititta?” Ɓe njaabi: “Yeesu mo Nasaratu.”
Yuhanna 18.9: Yeesu wi'i: “Mi wi'i on, ɗum min. To ɗum min on ɗaɓɓititta kam, acce yimɓe ɓe'e ndilla.”
Yuhanna 18.10: Ɗum laati non ngam gooŋɗingo wolde nde Yeesu wi'no: “Mi majjinaay koo gooto nder yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam.”
Yuhanna 18.12: Simon Piyer woodino kaafahi, o losi ki, o soppi suka hooreejo liman'en, o ta'i mo nofru nyaamru. Innde suka oo, Malkus.
Yuhanna 18.13: Ammaa Yeesu wi'i Piyer: “Waatu kaafahi maaɗa haa suudu maaki. Mi yarataa jardugel bone ngel Baabiraawo am hokki yam na
Yuhanna 18.16: Nden sooje'en e mawɗo maɓɓe e Yahuudu'en aynooɓe naŋngi Yeesu, kaɓɓi mo.
Yuhanna 18.17: Aran ɓe njahri mo haa Annas, kaŋko woni esiraawo Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en hitaande maajum.
Yuhanna 18.18: Kayafas woni mo sarwuno Yahuudu'en, wi'no ɓe: “Ndikka goɗɗo gooto maaya ngam ummaatoore fuu
Yuhanna 18.21: Simon Piyer e pukaraajo feere ɗonno tokki Yeesu. Pukaraajo oo, hooreejo liman'en anndi mo, kaŋko o nastidi bee Yeesu haa daldal saare hooreejo liman'en.
Yuhanna 18.22: Ammaa Piyer ɗonno dari yaasi, kommbi dammugal. Nden pukaraajo mo hooreejo liman'en anndi ɗum go wurti wolwani debbo aynanɗo dammugal, nastini Piyer nder saare.
Yuhanna 18.23: Debbo man wi'i Piyer: “Naa an boo a pukaraajo gorko oo?” O jaabi: “Aa'a, naa ɗum min.”
Yuhanna 18.25: Huuwooɓe e aynooɓe kuɓɓi yiite, ɗon aytino ton, ngam jaaŋgol ɗonno waɗa. Piyer boo ɗonno darodi bee maɓɓe, ɗonno aytino.
Yuhanna 18.27: Nden hooreejo liman'en ƴami Yeesu dow haala pukara'en muuɗum e ekkitinol muuɗum.
Yuhanna 18.28: Yeesu jaabi mo: “Mi wolwi bee baŋguɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu. Foroy mi waazi nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en e nder haykaliiru, haa Yahuudu'en fuu mooɓtoto, mi wolwaay koo ɗume bee sirri.
Yuhanna 18.29: Ngam ɗume a ƴamatammi? Ƴam nanɓe yam ko mi wolwani ɓe, kamɓe ɓe anndi.”
Yuhanna 18.30: Nde Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e, gooto nder aynooɓe maari mo, wi'i: “Bana nii a jaaborto hooreejo liman'en na?”
Yuhanna 18.31: Yeesu jaabi mo: “To kalluka mbolwumi, waŋgin ɗum. Ammaa to booɗɗum mbolwumi, koni a maari yam?”
Yuhanna 18.32: Nden Annas neldi mo o kaɓɓaaɗo haa Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en.
Yuhanna 18.34: Simon Piyer ɗonno dari ton, ɗonno aytino. Nden ɓe mbi'i mo: “An boo naa a gooto nder pukara'en gorko oo na?” Ammaa o yeddi ɗum, o wi'i: “Aa'a, naa ɗum min.”
Yuhanna 18.35: Gooto nder suka'en hooreejo liman'en, banndiraawo goɗɗo mo Piyer ta'ino nofru mum go, wi'i mo: “Mi yi'aay ma nder jarne bee maako na?”
Yuhanna 18.36: Ammaa Piyer yeddi ɗum fahin. Saa'i man nden asgumri
Yuhanna 18.39: Jaŋngo maajum fajiri cub ɓe koo'i Yeesu haa saare Kayafas, ɓe njahri mo haa suudu kiita haa saare ngomna Roma'en. Yahuudu'en nastaay saare man, ngam taa ɓe coɓa, haa ɓe keɓa nyaamugo nyaamdu
Yuhanna 18.42: Nden Pilaatu, wurti, wari haa maɓɓe, ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume on ngullori goɗɗo oo?”
Yuhanna 18.43: Ɓe njaabi mo: “To o laataakino kalluɗo, min ngaddataano mo haa maaɗa.”
Yuhanna 18.44: Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kooce mo onon, kiite mo fodde tawreeta mooɗon.” Yahuudu'en njaabi mo: “Ɗum duŋanaaki min min kiito goɗɗo kiita maayde.”
Yuhanna 18.45: Ɗum laati non ngam gooŋɗingo bolle ɗe Yeesu wi'no, ngam tinndingo no o maayrata
Yuhanna 18.48: Pilaatu nasti saare mum fahin, ewni Yeesu, ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?”
Yuhanna 18.49: Yeesu jaabi: “A wi'i ɗum bee hoore ma naa malla woɗɓe ngecci ma ɗum?”
Yuhanna 18.50: Pilaatu jaabi: “Min mi Yahuuduujo na? Yimɓe ummaatoore maaɗa e mawɓe liman'en ngulli ma haa am. Ɗume a waɗi?”
Yuhanna 18.51: Yeesu jaabi: “Laamu am laataaki laamu duniyaaru ndu. To laamu am laatino ngu duniyaaru ndu, jaggiiɓe am ngaranno haɓugo ngam am, ngam taa mi nasta juuɗe Yahuudu'en. Ammaa gooŋga laamu am laataaki laamu duniyaaru ndu.”
Yuhanna 18.52: Pilaatu ƴami mo: “A laamiiɗo kadi na?” Yeesu jaabi: “An maa a wi'i ɗum: Mi laamiiɗo. Mi danyaama, mi wari nder duniyaaru ndu'u ngam mi seedano gooŋga. Koo moy yiɗi gooŋga, heɗititto ko mi wi'ata.”
Yuhanna 18.54: Nden Pilaatu wurti fahin, wari haa Yahuudu'en, wi'i ɓe: “Min mi tawaay daliila hiitaago gorko oo sam.
Yuhanna 18.55: Ammaa bana ko woowa haa mooɗon, juulde
Yuhanna 18.57: fuu, mi yoofanan on kaɓɓaaɗo gooto mo on ngiɗi. On ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?”
Yuhanna 18.58: Ammaa ɓe ngooki fahin, ɓe mbi'i: “Aa'a, naa kaŋko a yoofata, min ngiɗi a yoofana min Barabbas!” Barabbas man o pasoowo.

Yuhanna 19.1: Nden Pilaatu umri yimɓe mum ɓe kooca Yeesu, ɓe ɓocca mo.
Yuhanna 19.2: Sooje'en mbami meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ɗum dow hoore Yeesu, ɓe moji mo mojaare woɗeere.
Yuhanna 19.3: Ɓe ɓaditi mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Allah woonane, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en!” Ɓe maari mo.
Yuhanna 19.5: Pilaatu wurti fahin, wolwani yimɓe, wi'i: “Ndaa, mi wurtinan mo haa mooɗon, ngam haa on paama mi tawaay daliila hiitaago mo.”
Yuhanna 19.6: Nden Yeesu wurti, meetaleewol gi'e ɗon dow hoore maako, o ɗon moji mojaare woɗeere go. Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa mo.”
Yuhanna 19.7: Ammaa nde liman'en e aynooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal! Ɓil mo!” Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kooce mo onon, ɓile mo, ngam min mi tawaay daliila hiitaago mo.”
Yuhanna 19.8: Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo: “Min ngoodi umroore woore. Fodde umroore man sey o maaya, ngam o waɗi hoore maako o
Yuhanna 19.11: Nde Pilaatu nani wolde nde'e, kulol maako ɓesdi.
Yuhanna 19.12: O nasti saare fahin, o ƴami Yeesu: “Toy iwɗaa?” Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo sam.
Yuhanna 19.13: Pilaatu wi'i mo: “A jaabataako yam na? A anndaa mi woodi baawɗe yoofugo ma, mi woodi boo baawɗe ɓilugo ma haa leggal gaafaaŋgal na?”
Yuhanna 19.14: Yeesu jaabi mo: “A walaano baawɗe dow am koo seɗɗa, to Allah hokkaayno ma ɗe. Ngam maajum mo hokki yam haa juŋngo ma, hakke maako ɓuri mawnugo.”
Yuhanna 19.16: Diga saa'i man Pilaatu tefi dabare yoofugo Yeesu. Ammaa Yahuudu'en ngooki, mbi'i: “To a yoofi mo, nden kam naa a soobaajo Kaysara laamiiɗo Roma. Koo moy waɗi hoore muuɗum laamiiɗo, o konneejo Kaysara laamiiɗo Roma.”
Yuhanna 19.17: Nde Pilaatu nani bolle ɗe'e, o wurtini Yeesu fahin, o jooɗi dow koromwal kiita, haa nokkuure wi'eteende bee Ibraniŋkeere Gabbata, waato Taŋkol-kaa'e.
Yuhanna 19.20: deydey caka nyalawma. Pilaatu wi'i Yahuudu'en: “Ndaa laamiiɗo mooɗon!”
Yuhanna 19.21: Ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Mbar mo, mbar mo, ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.” Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kadi mi ɓila laamiiɗo mooɗon na?” Mawɓe liman'en njaabi: “Min ngalaa laamiiɗo feere, sey laamiiɗo Kaysara.”
Yuhanna 19.22: Nden, Pilaatu hokki ɓe Yeesu haa ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe ndilliri mo.
Yuhanna 19.24: Yeesu wurti yaasi berniwol, o ɗon roondi gaafaaŋgal maako, haa o yotti nokkuure wi'eteende bee Ibraniŋkeere Golgota, waato Gumbal-hoore.
Yuhanna 19.25: Haa ton sooje'en ɓili Yeesu haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe ɓildi worɓe ɗiɗo bee Yeesu, gooto haa wakeere nyaamre, gooto boo haa wakeere nannde, Yeesu ɗon haa caka.
Yuhanna 19.26: Pilaatu winndi dow alluha, o ɓili ɗum haa gaafaaŋgal. Ndaa ko o winndi: “Yeesu mo Nasaratu, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Yuhanna 19.27: Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe njaŋngi ɗum, ngam nokkuure man daayaaki bee berniwol. Binndi man winndaama bee Ibraniŋkeere e Romaŋkeere e Yunaniŋkeere.
Yuhanna 19.28: Ammaa mawɓe liman'en Yahuudu'en mbi'i Pilaatu: “Taa winndu: Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en, ammaa winndu: O wi'i o laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Yuhanna 19.29: Pilaatu jaabi ɓe: “Ko mi winndi, ɗum tabiti.”
Yuhanna 19.31: Nde sooje'en timmini ɓilugo Yeesu haa leggal gaafaaŋgal, ɓe kooci limce maako, ɓe cenndi ɗe geɓe nayi, soojeejo fuu heɓi yeɓre woore. Ɓe kooci boo toggoore maako sannyaande diga dow haa les bilaa nyoogol.
Yuhanna 19.32: Sooje'en mbi'i hakkunde muuɗum'en: “Taa en ceeka toggoore nde, ammaa en mbaɗa kur'u ngam en ndaara moy heɓata nde.” Bana nii ko Deftere wi'i, gooŋɗiri:
Yuhanna 19.34: ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam limce am.”
Yuhanna 19.38: Daada Yeesu e deerɗum debbo e Mariyama debbo Kolopas e Mariyama mo Magdala, ɓe ɗon ndari kommbi leggal gaafaaŋgal haa ɓe ɓili Yeesu.
Yuhanna 19.39: Yeesu yi'i daada muuɗum e pukaraajo mo o yiɗi ɗum, ɓe ɗon ndarodi ton. O wi'i daada maako: “Debbo, ndaa ɓiɗɗo ma.”
Yuhanna 19.40: Nden o wi'i pukaraajo man: “Ndaa daada ma.” Diga saa'i man pukaraajo man hooci Mariyama haa saare muuɗum.
Yuhanna 19.42: Ɓaawo maajum, nde Yeesu anndi kuuje fuu kebbitinaama, ngam o gooŋɗina ko winnda nder Deftere, o wi'i: “Mi ɗomɗi
Yuhanna 19.44: Woodi mbulku ton, kebbinaaŋgu inaboojam lammuɗam. Ɓe cuuwi irin sooso nder maajam, ɓe mbaɗi ɗum haa ƴommbal isop, ɓe ɓaŋgti ɗum haa hunnduko Yeesu.
Yuhanna 19.45: Nde Yeesu metti lammuɗam, o wi'i: “Ɗum fuu ɗum timmidi.” Nden o turi hoore maako, o maayi.
Yuhanna 19.49: Yahuudu'en ngiɗaa ɓalli lutta dow leɗɗe gaafaaɗe
Yuhanna 19.53: man laati nyalaade mawnde haa maɓɓe. Ngam maajum ɓe tori Pilaatu o umra ɓe ngewa kosɗe ɓilaaɓe, ɓe njippina ɓalli maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 19.54: Nden sooje'en ngari, ɓe ngewi kosɗe arano, nden ɓe ngewi ɗe ɗiɗaɓo haa ɓildaaɓe bee Yeesu dow leɗɗe gaafaaɗe.
Yuhanna 19.55: Nde ɓe njotti haa Yeesu, ɓe tawi o maayi, ngam maajum ɓe ngewaay kosɗe maako.
Yuhanna 19.56: Ammaa gooto nder sooje'en yuwi mo wuttudu bee labbo, law ƴiiƴam e ndiyam ngurti.
Yuhanna 19.57: Gi'ɗo seedi ɗum, seedamku maako gooŋga, kaŋko boo o anndi gooŋga o wolwi, ngam haa onon boo on nuɗɗina.
Yuhanna 19.58: Ɗum laati non ngam hebbitingo ko Deftere wi'i: “Ɓe ngewataa i'e maako koo gootal
Yuhanna 19.60: Aayaare feere boo wi'i: “Ɓe ndaaran mo ɓe njuwi
Yuhanna 19.63: Ɓaawo maajum, Yusufu mo wuro Arimatiya tori Pilaatu duŋayeere hoocugo ɓanndu Yeesu. Yusufu boo laatino pukaraajo Yeesu, ammaa bee sirri, ngam o ɗonno hula Yahuudu'en. Pilaatu duŋani mo. O yehi, o hooci ɓanndu Yeesu.
Yuhanna 19.64: Nikodemus mo yehino haa Yeesu jemmaare woɗnde, kaŋko boo o wari, o waddi jillindiraaɗum uurdi baɗaadi e leɗɗe uurɗe, baakin kilo cappanɗe tati
Yuhanna 19.66: Kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe kooci ɓanndu Yeesu, ɓe caawi ndu bee leppi, ɓe ndufi nebbam uurɗam dow maaru, bana Yahuudu'en mboowi waɗugo to ɓe ɗon uwa maayɗo.
Yuhanna 19.67: Haa kommbi nokkuure ɓe ɓilno Yeesu, woodi jarne ton. Nder jarne man woodi yenaande hesre nde ɓe meeɗaay wallingo maayɗo nder muuɗum.
Yuhanna 19.68: Haa ton ɓe mballini ɓanndu Yeesu, ngam ɗum nyalaade taaskara siwtorde Yahuudu'en e yenaande man boo daayaaki.

Yuhanna 20.1: Nyalaade aranndeere, waato nyannde Alat, fajiri cub, diga weetaay booɗɗum tawon, Mariyama mo Magdala yehi haa yenaande. O yi'i hayre sottinaama diga hunnduko yenaande.
Yuhanna 20.2: O doggi, o yehi haa Simon Piyer e pukaraajo giɗaaɗo Yeesu. O wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Jawmiraawo diga yenaande, min anndaa haa ɓe mballinoyi ndu!”
Yuhanna 20.3: Piyer e pukaraajo oya go ngurti, ndilli haa yenaande.
Yuhanna 20.4: Ɓe ndoggi ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, ammaa pukaraajo oya go ɓuri Piyer pargal, o aarti yottaago haa yenaande.
Yuhanna 20.5: O yurni nder yenaande, o yi'i leppi ɗon mbaali, ammaa o nastaay.
Yuhanna 20.6: Nden Piyer mo tokkino mo go boo yotti, nasti yenaande, o yi'i leppi ɗon mbaali.
Yuhanna 20.7: Leppol ngol ɓe caawino hoore Yeesu bee maajum wondaay bee leppi goɗɗi go, ammaa ngol ɗon taggi, waali haa pellel goɗŋgel.
Yuhanna 20.8: Nden pukaraajo aartuɗo yottaago haa yenaande go boo nasti. O yi'i, o nuɗɗini.
Yuhanna 20.9: Haa wargo wakkati man fuu ɓe paamaayno ko Deftere wi'i tawon. Ngam nde wi'i Yeesu ummititto caka maayɓe.
Yuhanna 20.12: Mariyama ɗonno dari haa yaasi, kommbi yenaande, o ɗonno woya. Wakkati o ɗonno woya, o turi, o yurni nder yenaande,
Yuhanna 20.13: o yi'i malaa'ika'en ɗiɗo, ɓe ɗon ɓorni limce daneeje, ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa nokkuure nde ɓanndu Yeesu wonno, gooto gal hoore, gooto boo gal kosɗe.
Yuhanna 20.14: Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Debbo, koni mboyata?” O jaabi: “Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Jawmiraawo am, mi anndaa haa ɓe mballinoyi ndu.”
Yuhanna 20.15: Nde o wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o yeesiti, o yi'i Yeesu ɗon dari, ammaa o anndaa ɗum Yeesu.
Yuhanna 20.16: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Debbo, koni mboyata? Moy a tefata?” Mariyama tammi ɗum kuuwoowo jarne. O wi'i mo: “Jawmam, to an hooci ndu, wi'am haa a wallinoyi ndu, haa mi yaha, mi hooca ndu.”
Yuhanna 20.17: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Mariyama!” Mariyama wayliti haa maako, wi'i mo bee Ibraniŋkeere: “Rabbuni!” Bana wi'go Moodibbo.
Yuhanna 20.18: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Taa meemam, ngam mi siwaa eeŋgtugo haa Baabiraawo am. Ammaa yah, wi' deerɗiraaɓe am, mi ɗon eeŋgta haa Baabiraawo am, laatiiɗo Baabiraawo mooɗon boo, haa Allah am, laatiiɗo Allah mooɗon boo.”
Yuhanna 20.19: Nden Mariyama mo Magdala dilli, wi'i pukara'en: “Mi yi'i Jawmiraawo”, nden o yecci ɓe ko Yeesu wi'no mo.
Yuhanna 20.21: Nyannde Alat man, nde jemma waɗi, pukara'en ɗon mooɓi nder suudu. Ɓe kuɓli dammugal, ngam ɓe ɗonno kula Yahuudu'en. Yeesu wari, dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon!”
Yuhanna 20.22: Nde o wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe'e, o holli ɓe juuɗe maako e wuttudu maako. Nde pukara'en ngi'i Jawmiraawo, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi seyo.
Yuhanna 20.23: Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon. Bana no Baabiraawo neli yam, min boo mi ɗon nela on.”
Yuhanna 20.24: Nde o wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe'e, o fuufi dow maɓɓe, o wi'i: “Njaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo!
Yuhanna 20.25: Ɓe on njaafani hakke muuɗum'en, keɓan yaafuye, ɓe on njaafanaaki boo, keɓataa yaafuye
Yuhanna 20.28: Nde Yeesu warino haa pukara'en, gooto nder maɓɓe, Tomas bi'eteeɗo Ciwto, wondaay bee maɓɓe.
Yuhanna 20.29: Pukara'en woɗɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngi'i Jawmiraawo.” Ammaa Tomas wi'i ɓe: “To mi yi'aay ɓattajje suufuuje
Yuhanna 20.30: nder juuɗe maako, to mi meemaay ɗe bee hoondu am, to mi nastinaay juŋngo am nder huuduure wuttudu maako boo, mi nuɗɗintaa sam.”
Yuhanna 20.32: Asaweere woore ɓaawoɗon, pukara'en ɗon mooɓti nder suudu fahin, Tomas ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe. Dammugal ɗon huɓli, ammaa Yeesu wari, dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon.”
Yuhanna 20.33: Nden o wi'i Tomas: “Waddu hoondu ma haa ɗo, laar juuɗe am, waddu juŋngo ma, nastin ngo nder wuttudu am, accu waabaago, nuɗɗin.”
Yuhanna 20.34: Tomas jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo am, Allah am!”
Yuhanna 20.35: Yeesu wi'i mo: “Jonta nde a yi'i yam a nuɗɗini na? Barka laatanto ɓe ngi'aay yam, ammaa ɓe nuɗɗini yam.”
Yuhanna 20.37: Yeesu waɗi kaayeefiiji goɗɗi ɗuuɗɗi yeeso pukara'en muuɗum, ɗi mbinndaaka nder deftere nde'e.
Yuhanna 20.38: Ammaa ko winnda nder maare, ɗum winndaama ngam haa on nuɗɗina Yeesu woni Almasiihu,
Yuhanna 20.40: ngam on keɓra ngeendam nder innde maako bee nuɗɗingo mo.

Yuhanna 21.1: Ɓaawo maajum fahin Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en muuɗum haa kommbi weendu Tiberiyas. Ndaa no o waŋgirani ɓe:
Yuhanna 21.2: Simon Piyer e Tomas bi'eteeɗo Ciwto e Natanayel mo wuro Kana nder lesdi Galiili e ɓiɓɓe Zebede e pukara'en Yeesu woɗɓe ɗiɗo, fuu ɗon kawti.
Yuhanna 21.3: Simon Piyer wi'i ɓe: “Mi dillan waawoygo liɗɗi.” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin boo min njahdan bee maaɗa.” Ɓe ndilli, ɓe nasti koommbowal
Yuhanna 21.4: . Ammaa jemmaare man fuu ɓe naŋngaay koo liiŋgu
Yuhanna 21.6: Nde fuɗɗi weetugo, Yeesu dari haa fomoonde, ammaa pukara'en anndaa ɗum kaŋko.
Yuhanna 21.7: Nden Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Ɓikkoy, on keɓi nyaamdu na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Aa'a.”
Yuhanna 21.8: O wi'i ɓe: “Cakkine zubaawol haa wuttudu koommbowal nyaamru, on keɓan.” Ɓe cakkini zubaawol, ɓe naŋngi liɗɗi ɗuuɗɗi masin haa ɓe mbaawaay nastingo zubaawol nder koommbowal
Yuhanna 21.11: Nden pukaraajo mo Yeesu yiɗi ɗum wi'i Simon Piyer: “Ɗum Jawmiraawo!” Nde Simon Piyer nani ɗum, o ɓorni limce maako, ngam o ɓortino ɗe, o diwi nder ndiyam.
Yuhanna 21.12: Pukara'en woɗɓe ngari bee koommbowal, ɓe ɗon ndasa zubaawol keewŋgol liɗɗi go, ɓe ndaayaakino fomoonde, ɓuraay meetir teemerre.
Yuhanna 21.13: Nde ɓe ngurti, ɓe njippi haa lesdi, ɓe ngi'i yiite bee liɗɗi dow maage e tamseeje.
Yuhanna 21.14: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngadde liɗɗi seɗɗa nder ko on naŋngi jonta.”
Yuhanna 21.15: Simon Piyer nasti koommbowal, wurtini zubaawol keewŋgol liɗɗi mawɗi mawɗi, limgal maaji teemerre e cappanɗe jowi e tati (153). Koo nde ɗi ɗuuɗɗi bana non, zubaawol seekaay.
Yuhanna 21.16: Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngare, nyaame.” Walaa koo gooto nder pukara'en numi ƴamugo mo: “An a moy?” Ngam ɓe anndi ɗum Jawmiraawo.
Yuhanna 21.17: Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, hoo'i tamseere, hokki ɓe, o hokki ɓe liɗɗi boo.
Yuhanna 21.18: Kanjum woni waŋgannde tataɓre nde Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en muuɗum, ɓaawo o ummitinaama caka maayɓe.
Yuhanna 21.20: Ɓaawo ɓe nyaami, Yeesu wi'i Simon Piyer: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam ko ɓuri ɓe'e ɗo na?” O jaabi: “Ooho, Jawmiraawo, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Duru ɓiɓɓe baali am.”
Yuhanna 21.21: Nden o wolwani mo ɗiɗawre, o ƴami: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam na?” O jaabi mo: “Ooho, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Laata gaynaako baali am.”
Yuhanna 21.22: O wolwani mo tataɓre: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam na?” Piyer suni nde Yeesu ƴami mo ƴamol tataɓol: “A yiɗi yam na?” O jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo, an a anndi koo ɗume fuu, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Duru baali am.
Yuhanna 21.23: Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'e: Yaake a derkeejono, an bee hoore ma a ɗon taado taadorgol ma, a ɗon yaha haa a yiɗi fuu. Ammaa to a ndottidi, a fortanan goɗɗo feere juuɗe ma, kaŋko boo o taadante taadorgol, o yahrete haa a yiɗaa.”
Yuhanna 21.24: Bee bolle ɗe'e Yeesu yiɗi tinndingo irin maayde nde Piyer tammi maayugo ngam teddingo Allah. Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Tokkam.”
Yuhanna 21.26: Piyer yeesiti, yi'i pukaraajo mo Yeesu yiɗi ɗum ɗon wara ɓaawo maɓɓe, kaŋko ɓaarino Yeesu yaake ɓe ɗonno nyaama, ƴamno mo: “Jawmiraawo, moy zammboto ma
Yuhanna 21.28: Nde Piyer yi'i mo, o wi'i Yeesu: “Jawmiraawo, e noy oo ɗo, ɗume waɗata mo?”
Yuhanna 21.29: Yeesu jaabi mo: “To mi yiɗi o yeeɗa haa to mi lori, ko yaalu ma? An kam tokkam!”
Yuhanna 21.30: Haala man saŋkiti caka nuɗɗinɓe, ɓe ɗon mbi'a pukaraajo oo maayataa. Alhaali boo Yeesu wi'aay Piyer: “Pukaraajo oo maayataa.” Ammaa o wi'i mo: “To mi yiɗi o yeeɗa haa to mi lori, ko yaalu ma?”
Yuhanna 21.32: Pukaraajo oo, kaŋko woni ceedoowo kubaruuji ɗi'i, o winndi ɗi boo, min anndi seedamku maako ɗum gooŋga.
Yuhanna 21.34: Yeesu huuwi kuuɗe goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe. To ɗe mbinndano gootal gootal fuu, mi tammi duniyaaru waawataa jogaago defte man.

Kuude Neelabe 1.1: Yaa Teyofilus, nder deftere am arannde, mi winndi ko Yeesu fuɗɗi waɗugo e ekkitingo fuu
Kuude Neelabe 1.3: haa nyannde o eeŋga haa asama. Diga o siwaa eeŋgineego, bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o anndini umrooje maako haa nelaaɓe ɓe o suɓno.
Kuude Neelabe 1.4: Ɓaawo boneeji ɗi o yari, o waŋgani ɓe o geeto fakat bee alaamaaji ɗuuɗɗi laaɓɗi. Baakin nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi, ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe mbolidi haala laamu Allah.
Kuude Neelabe 1.5: Yaake o ɗon bee maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Taa cotte Urusaliima, ammaa ndeene ko Baabiraawo iinani on, bana mbi'mi on
Kuude Neelabe 1.7: Ngam Yuhanna waɗani yimɓe baptisma bee ndiyam, ammaa onon, on njaɓan yeeso seɗɗa, baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Kuude Neelabe 1.10: Nden mooɓtiiɓe ton ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, a wo'itinan laamu ngam Isra'iila jonta na?”
Kuude Neelabe 1.11: Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Baabiraawo am bee baawɗe mum ta'i wakkatiiji e saa'iiji man, on mbaawataa anndugo ɗi,
Kuude Neelabe 1.12: ammaa to Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippake dow mooɗon, on keɓan baawɗe, nden on laatoto seedantooɓe yam haa Urusaliima, haa lesdi Yahudiya fuu bee Samariya e haa keerol duniyaaru fuu
Kuude Neelabe 1.14: Nde o timmini wolwugo bolle ɗe'e, o eeŋgi. Ɓe ɗon ndaara, haa ruuldere suddi mo
Kuude Neelabe 1.17: Nde pukara'en ɗon tijjo heedi asama haa Yeesu ɗon eeŋgo, law worɓe ɗiɗo ɓorniiɓe limce daneeje mbaŋgani ɓe,
Kuude Neelabe 1.18: mbi'i ɓe: “Onon Galiili'en, koni on ɗon ndari, tijjo dow? Yeesu oo, mo eeŋgi, acci on, o loroto bana on ngi'i o dilliri asama.”
Kuude Neelabe 1.20: Nden nelaaɓe njippi hooseere wi'eteende Hooseere Jaytunje, ɓe lori haa Urusaliima, ɗum daayi baakin kilomeetir gootel.
Kuude Neelabe 1.21: Nde ɓe nasti Urusaliima, ɓe mba'i suudu dowru, haa weerde maɓɓe bana ko woowa. Ɗum Piyer, Yuhanna, Yaakuba, Andire, Filip, Tomas, Bartolome, Matta, Yaakuba ɓii Alfa, Simon mo goɗɗo yeɓre Jelot'en e Yahuuda ɓii Yaakuba
Kuude Neelabe 1.23: Nder anniya ngoota, ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon kawta tum ngam toraago Allah hawtaade bee Mariyama, daada
Kuude Neelabe 1.24: Yeesu e deerɗiraaɓe Yeesu e rewɓe woɗɓe boo.
Kuude Neelabe 1.26: Nyannde feere, nde nuɗɗinɓe baakin teemerre e noogas (120) ɗon kawti, Piyer ummi caka deerɗiraaɓe, wi'i:
Kuude Neelabe 1.27: “Deerɗiraaɓe am, doole ko Deftere Allah aartuno wi'go dow Yahuuda, gooŋɗa. Bee hunnduko Daawuda, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'no ɗum dow Yahuuda, mo ɗowi naŋnguɓe Yeesu,
Kuude Neelabe 1.28: ngam Yahuuda laatino mo amin, ngam Yeesu suɓi mo haa min kuuwda kuugal nga'al.”
Kuude Neelabe 1.30: Yahuuda soodi ngesa bee ngeenaari ndi o heɓri bee kuugal maako kalluŋgal. Ton o do'ori hoore hoore, reedu maako seeki, teteki maako fuu ndufi yaasi.
Kuude Neelabe 1.31: Yimɓe Urusaliima fuu nani haala ka'a. Kanjum waɗi ɓe inndi ngesa ka'a
Kuude Neelabe 1.33: bee wolde maɓɓe, bana wi'go Ngesa-ƴiiƴam
Kuude Neelabe 1.35: Ngam ɗum winndaama haa deftere Jabuura:
Kuude Neelabe 1.38: Sey goɗɗo feere hoosa babal maako
Kuude Neelabe 1.41: Ngam maajum, sey goɗɗo caka yahduɓe bee amin nder jahaale bee Yeesu Almasiihu fuu,
Kuude Neelabe 1.42: diga nyannde nde Yuhanna waɗani mo baptisma haa nyannde nde o eeŋga haa asama, ceediiɗo ummitineeki maako bee amin, foti hawtana min.
Kuude Neelabe 1.44: Nden ɓe mbaŋgini inɗe yimɓe ɗiɗo: Yusufu bi'eteeɗo Barsabas, coometeeɗo Yustus bee Mattiyas.
Kuude Neelabe 1.45: Nden ɓe tori Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a anndi ɓerɗe yimɓe fuu. Ngam maajum hollu min hakkunde yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e, moy cuɓɗa
Kuude Neelabe 1.46: ngam haa o hoosa kuugal nelal ngal Yahuuda acci haa o dilli haa pellel maako.”
Kuude Neelabe 1.48: ngam suɓugo caka inɗe ɗe'e. Kur'u man waŋgini Mattiyas, o laati sappo e ɗiɗaɓo nelaaɓe go.

Kuude Neelabe 2.3: yottake, nuɗɗinɓe fuu kawti nokkuure woore
Kuude Neelabe 2.5: Law ɓe nani iidoore iwnde haa asama bana iidoore henndu semmbiɗndu, heewi suudu haa ɓe ɗon njooɗi.
Kuude Neelabe 2.6: Nden ɗemɗe nannduɗe ɗemɗe yiite mbaŋgani ɓe, caŋkiti e njooɗi dow koo moy maɓɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 2.7: Ɓe fuu ɓe kebbinaaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe puɗɗi wolwugo bee bolle jananne, bana no Ruuhu hokkiri ɓe baawɗe wolwugo.
Kuude Neelabe 2.9: Woodino Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, hulɓe Allah, iwɓe haa lesɗe duniyaaru fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 2.10: Nde ɓe nani hoolo ngo'o, ɗuuɗɓe maɓɓe mooɓi ton. Ɓe cakli ngam koo moy maɓɓe nani nuɗɗinɓe ɗon mbolwa wolde muuɗum.
Kuude Neelabe 2.11: Ɓe kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Yimɓe wolwanɓe bolle ɗe'e, naa ɓe fuu ɓe yimɓe lesdi Galiili!
Kuude Neelabe 2.12: Kadi noy en nanata ɓe ɗon mbolwa bolle meeɗen?
Kuude Neelabe 2.13: Ɓe iwi haa lesɗe Partiya, Mediya, Elam, Mesopotamiya, Yahudiya, Kappadosiya, haa Pontus e Asiya,
Kuude Neelabe 2.14: haa Firigiya e Pamfiliya, haa Misra, haa geɓe lesdi Libiya kommbi Sirene, woɗɓe maɓɓe ngari diga Roma,
Kuude Neelabe 2.15: woɗɓe boo ngari diga Kereta e Arabiya. Woodi boo Yahuudu'en e jananɓe tokkiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en. Ammaa en ɗon nana ɓe ɗon mbolwa bee bolle meeɗen haala kuuɗe mawɗe ɗe Allah waɗi.”
Kuude Neelabe 2.16: Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini, ɓe cakli, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go?”
Kuude Neelabe 2.17: Ammaa woɗɓe njanci nuɗɗinɓe, mbi'i: “Ɓe nguyki!”
Kuude Neelabe 2.19: Nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo fuu ummi. Nden Piyer towni sawtu, wi'i ɓe: “Onon Yahuudu'en e yimɓe jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima fuu, paame ko ɗon saalo e nananeeɗam booɗɗum:
Kuude Neelabe 2.20: Yimɓe ɓe'e, ɓe nguykaay bana numoton, ngam naaŋge nyalwaay tawon,
Kuude Neelabe 2.21: ammaa ɗum kebbitinki ko annabi Yo'el wolwuno:
Kuude Neelabe 2.24: Mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow yimɓe fuu:
Kuude Neelabe 2.25: Ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe mbaɗan annabaaku,
Kuude Neelabe 2.29: Koo dow maccuɓe am e horɓe am fuu boo,
Kuude Neelabe 2.30: mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow maɓɓe nder saa'i man,
Kuude Neelabe 2.35: ƴiiƴam e yiite e cuurɗe ɓaleeje mbaŋgan.
Kuude Neelabe 2.37: Naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru boo woojan bana ƴiiƴam. Nden nyalaade am mawnde hulniinde waran!
Kuude Neelabe 2.39: Koo moy ewnotooɗo innde Jawmiraawo, hisan
Kuude Neelabe 2.42: Onon Isra'iila'en, nananeeɗam: Yeesu mo Nasaratu, o gerdaaɗo Allah yeeso mooɗon. On anndi ɗum, ngam bee maako Allah waari kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji caka mooɗon.
Kuude Neelabe 2.43: Diga ɓooyma Allah muuyi, acci Yeesu haa juuɗe mooɗon. Onon on mbari mo, nde on nduŋani hakke'en ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal
Kuude Neelabe 2.45: Ammaa Allah ummitini mo, wurtini mo taaku maayde, ngam maayde walaa baawɗe jogaago mo
Kuude Neelabe 2.47: Ndaa ko Daawuda wi'no dow maako:
Kuude Neelabe 2.48: Mi ɗon yi'a Jawmiraawo yeeso am tum, o ɗon haa nyaamo am,
Kuude Neelabe 2.51: Ngam maajum ɓernde am ɗon seyo, hunnduko am ɗon welwita,
Kuude Neelabe 2.52: Koo ɓanndu am boo siwtoto jam nder hoolaare.
Kuude Neelabe 2.54: Ngam an, yaa Allah, a wudintaa yoŋki am haa joonde maayɓe,
Kuude Neelabe 2.57: A holli yam laawol jahranŋgol haa ngeendam,
Kuude Neelabe 2.58: ngam a ɗon wondi bee am,
Kuude Neelabe 2.62: Deerɗiraaɓe am, sey mi wolwana on bee dartaare dow kaakiraawo meeɗen Daawuda. O maayi, ɓe uwi mo. Haa hannde yenaande maako ɗon ɗo.
Kuude Neelabe 2.63: O annabiijo, o anndi hunayeere nde Allah waɗani mo: Allah huni o laaminan goɗɗo danygol maako dow leeso laamu maako
Kuude Neelabe 2.65: Daawuda faami ummitineeki Almasiihu diga wakkati man siwaa. Ngam maajum o wi'i:
Kuude Neelabe 2.66: Allah accaay mo nder joonde maayɓe,
Kuude Neelabe 2.69: Yeesu oo, Allah ummitini mo diga maayde, min fuu min seedooɓe haala ka'a.
Kuude Neelabe 2.70: Allah ɓaŋgti mo, jo'ini mo haa nyaamo muuɗum. O heɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo diga Baabiraawo mo iinanino mo ɗum, waanji Ruuhu oo dow amin bana no ngi'oton e nanoton.
Kuude Neelabe 2.71: Ngam Daawuda eeŋgaay haa asama, ammaa kaŋko bee hoore maako o wi'i:
Kuude Neelabe 2.75: haa to mi laatini konne'en ma jaaɓruɗum kosɗe ma
Kuude Neelabe 2.78: Ngam maajum sey Isra'iila'en fuu paama fakat, Yeesu oo, mo on ɓili dow leggal gaafaaŋgal, Allah laatini mo Jawmiraawo e
Kuude Neelabe 2.81: Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ta'i, ɓe mbi'i Piyer e nelaaɓe woɗɓe: “Noy min mbaɗata, deerɗiraaɓe?”
Kuude Neelabe 2.82: Piyer jaabi: “Tuube, koo moy mooɗon jaɓa baptisma bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu. Nden Allah yaafanto on hakkeeji mooɗon, o hokkan on Ruuhu Ceniiɗo boo.
Kuude Neelabe 2.83: Iinawol ngo'ol ɗon ngam mooɗon, ngam ɓiɓɓe mon e yimɓe daayiiɓe fuu, ɓe Allah tammi ewnaago haa maako.”
Kuude Neelabe 2.85: Piyer ɓesdi wolwango ɓe bolle ɗuuɗɗe ngam wasugo ɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Kisne ko'e mooɗon e yimɓe zamanuuru hallundu ndu'u!”
Kuude Neelabe 2.86: Jaɓɓe bolle ɗe Piyer wolwi njaɓi baptisma. Nyannde man yimɓe baakin ujine tato ɓesdaama dow nuɗɗinɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 2.87: Ɓe tiiɗi nanugo ekkitinol nelaaɓe, jooɗaago nder kawtal deerɗiraagu, senndugo nyaamdu e waɗugo do'a.
Kuude Neelabe 2.89: Nelaaɓe ngaɗi kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji ɗuuɗɗi, haa yimɓe fuu kultori.
Kuude Neelabe 2.90: Nuɗɗinɓe fuu kawti, laati jama'aare woore, ɓe mooɓti ko ɓe mari fuu
Kuude Neelabe 2.92: Ɓe coorri kuuje e mardi maɓɓe, ɓe cenndi ceede man caka maɓɓe, fodde haaje koo moy.
Kuude Neelabe 2.93: Nyalaade fuu ɓe ɗon kawta nder
Kuude Neelabe 2.95: bee ɓernde woore, ɓe ɗon kawta haa ci'e
Kuude Neelabe 2.96: maɓɓe boo, ɓe ɗon nyaamda bee seyo e bee ɓernde woore,
Kuude Neelabe 2.97: ɓe ɗon ngetta Allah. Yimɓe fuu ngerdi ɓe. Nyalaade fuu Jawmiraawo ɗon ɓesdana jama'aare maɓɓe hisnaaɓe.

Kuude Neelabe 3.1: Nyannde feere Piyer bee Yuhanna njehi
Kuude Neelabe 3.4: Haa dammugal bi'eteeŋgal Dammugal-Booɗŋgal, woodi goɗɗo boosɗo
Kuude Neelabe 3.5: diga danyeeki mum. Nde weeti fuu yimɓe maako ɗon ndoondo mo, njo'ina mo ton ngam o rooko nastanɓe haykaliiru.
Kuude Neelabe 3.6: Nde o laari Piyer e Yuhanna ɗon nasta, o rooki ɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 3.7: Ɓe cuti mo, nden Piyer wi'i: “Laar min!”
Kuude Neelabe 3.8: Boosɗo laari ɓe booɗɗum, ngam o tammino ɓe ndokkan mo huunde.
Kuude Neelabe 3.9: Ammaa Piyer wi'i mo: “Mi walaa ceede, mi walaa boo kaŋŋeeri, ammaa mi hokkete ko marmi: Bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu mo Nasaratu, umma, yah!”
Kuude Neelabe 3.10: Nden Piyer naŋngi juŋngo maako nyaamo, ummini mo. Law, kosɗe maako keɓi semmbe,
Kuude Neelabe 3.11: o hafti, o dari, o fuɗɗi yahugo. O nastidi bee Piyer e Yuhanna nder haykaliiru, o ɗon yaha, o ɗon diwa, o ɗon yetta Allah.
Kuude Neelabe 3.12: Ummaatoore fuu yi'i mo o ɗon yaha, o ɗon yetta Allah.
Kuude Neelabe 3.13: Nde ɓe annditi ɗum boosɗo mo jooɗino haa Dammugal-Booɗŋgal ngal haykaliiru ngam rookaago, ɓe kayɗini masin dow ko saali.
Kuude Neelabe 3.15: Nde nii gorko go accaay Piyer e Yuhanna, ummaatoore fuu doggi, yehi haa maɓɓe haa daŋki bi'eteeki Daŋki Suleymaanu, ngam ɗum hayɗini ɓe masin.
Kuude Neelabe 3.16: Nde Piyer yi'i ɓe, o wi'i: “Onon Isra'iila'en, ko hayɗini on, koni cutiiɗon min? On tammi gorko oo fuɗɗi yahugo bee baawɗe amin malla kuuɗe amin booɗɗe na?
Kuude Neelabe 3.17: Allah mo Ibrahiima, mo Isiyaaku, mo Yaakubu, Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen teddini suka muuɗum Yeesu mo on ndokki haa juuɗe mawɓe, on ngeddi mo yeeso Pilaatu, koo nde Pilaatu yiɗino yoofugo mo
Kuude Neelabe 3.19: On ngudini Ceniiɗo, Adiliijo, on tori Pilaatu o yoofana on mbaroowo ko'e
Kuude Neelabe 3.21: Non on mbari jawmu ngeendam, ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde. Minin boo min seedooɓe haala ka'a.
Kuude Neelabe 3.22: Boosɗo mo ngi'oton e mo annduɗon oo heɓti semmbe mum ngam daliila nuɗɗinki nder innde Yeesu. Nuɗɗinki ki'i hokki mo njamu yeeso mooɗon fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 3.24: Deerɗiraaɓe am, mi anndi, onon e mawɓe mon, on mbaɗi ɗum ngam on paamaayno.
Kuude Neelabe 3.25: Diga ɓooyma bee kunnduɗe annabi'en fuu, Allah anndini no Almasiihu muuɗum torroto. Bana nii o gooŋɗiniri ko o wi'no.
Kuude Neelabe 3.26: Tuube! Ngartane Allah, ngam haa o yaafano on hakkeeji mon fuu,
Kuude Neelabe 3.27: o suusɗina ɓerɗe mon, o neldana on Yeesu
Kuude Neelabe 3.29: mo o suɓani on diga ɓooyma.
Kuude Neelabe 3.30: Doole Yeesu jooɗo haa asama, haa wakkati Allah tammi hesɗitingo kuuje fuu yotto, bana no o wi'i diga ɓooyma bee kunnduɗe annabi'en senaaɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 3.31: Muusa wi'i: Allah, Jawmiraawo mooɗon umminanan on annabiijo bana am nder deerɗiraaɓe mooɗon. Sey on nana ko o wi'ata on fuu
Kuude Neelabe 3.33: Mo nananaay annabiijo oo fuu, o gurtinteeɗo e o nattinteeɗo diga caka ummaatoore
Kuude Neelabe 3.35: Annabi'en fuu, diga Samuyila e annabi'en warɓe ɓaawo maako, mbolwi dow balɗe ɗe'e, ngooyni ɗe.
Kuude Neelabe 3.36: Onon ngoni ɓiɓɓe annabi'en e ɓiɓɓe alkawal ngal Allah haɓɓi bee kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, o wi'i Ibrahiima: Daliila danygol maaɗa, ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu keɓan barka
Kuude Neelabe 3.38: Non Allah ummini suka mum, aarti nelugo mo haa mooɗon, haa keɓon barka, haa koo moy mooɗon waylito, acca kuuɗe mum kalluɗe.”

Kuude Neelabe 4.1: Yaake Piyer e Yuhanna ɗon mbolwana yimɓe, liman'en e mawɗo aynooɓe haykaliiru e Saduki'en ngari haa maɓɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 4.2: Ɓe tikki masin ngam nelaaɓe go ɗon ekkitina yimɓe no Allah ummitini Yeesu Almasiihu diga maayde, nden maayɓe fuu tammi ummitineego.
Kuude Neelabe 4.3: Ɓe naŋngi ɓe, ɓe maɓɓi ɓe haa suudu fursina
Kuude Neelabe 4.5: Ammaa ɗuuɗɓe haa nanɓe bolle nelaaɓe ɓe'e nuɗɗini, haa limgal worɓe waɗi baakin ujine njowi.
Kuude Neelabe 4.7: Jaŋngo man mawɓe Yahuudu'en e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta kawti haa Urusaliima.
Kuude Neelabe 4.8: Ɓe kawti bee Annas hooreejo liman'en e Kayafas e Yuhanna e Aleksandire e yimɓe saare hooreejo liman'en woɗɓe fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 4.9: Ɓe ndarni nelaaɓe yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ƴami ɓe: “Bee baawɗe ɗeye malla bee innde moy mbaɗɗon ɗum?”
Kuude Neelabe 4.10: Nden Piyer, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jaabi, wi'i ɓe: “Yaa ardiiɓe ummaatoore e ndotti'en,
Kuude Neelabe 4.11: min ngullaama yeeso mon hannde ngam daliila kuugal booɗŋgal ngal min mbaɗani boosɗo e noy o yamɗitiri.
Kuude Neelabe 4.12: Onon bee Isra'iila'en fuu, sey anndon: Neɗɗo dariiɗo yeeso mooɗon oo, o jamo ngam daliila innde Yeesu Almasiihu mo Nasaratu mo on ngaafi, ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde.
Kuude Neelabe 4.14: Hayre nde onon mahooɓe, on ngudini,
Kuude Neelabe 4.15: kayre laati hayre talkumoore ɓurnde saman
Kuude Neelabe 4.18: Haa maako tan keɓeten kisndam, ngam walaa goɗɗo feere haa duniyaaru sam, mo Allah hokki baawɗe haa en keɓa hisrugo bee muuɗum.”
Kuude Neelabe 4.20: Dawrooɓe Yahuudu'en go kayɗini ngam ɓe ngi'i Piyer e Yuhanna kulaay sam, sakko nde ɓe tawi naa ɓe tedduɓe, naa ɓe jaŋnguɓe boo. Nden ɓe annditi ɓe ɗonno ngondi bee Yeesu.
Kuude Neelabe 4.21: Ammaa walaa ko ɓe mbaawi wi'ugo ngam ɓe ngi'i goɗɗo boosɗo go ɗon dari bee Piyer e Yuhanna, o jamo.
Kuude Neelabe 4.22: Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtini Piyer e Yuhanna diga suudu dawriinde, ɓe carwootiri,
Kuude Neelabe 4.23: ɓe mbi'i: “Ko mbaɗeten yimɓe ɓe'e? Caka yimɓe Urusaliima fuu walaa mo anndaa alaama kayɗiniika ka ɓe mbaɗi. En mbaawataa yeddugo ɗum.
Kuude Neelabe 4.24: Ammaa ngam taa haala ka'a ɓesda saŋkitaago caka ummaatoore, sey mbarren ɓe taa ɓe meeta wolwango koo moy bee innde nde'e.”
Kuude Neelabe 4.25: Nden ɓe ewni ɓe fahin. Ɓe kaɗi ɓe, ɓe mbi'i taa ɓe meeta wolwango e ekkitingo yimɓe bee innde Yeesu sam.
Kuude Neelabe 4.27: Ammaa Piyer e Yuhanna njaabi: “Onon bee ko'e mon, ta'e haala ka'a. Ko wooɗi yeeso Allah: Ɗowtanaago on na malla ɗowtanaago Allah?
Kuude Neelabe 4.28: Ngam doole min tokko wolwugo ko min ngi'i e ko min nani.”
Kuude Neelabe 4.29: Dawrooɓe mbarri ɓe fahin, nden ɓe njoofi ɓe. Ɓe tawaay daliila hiitaago ɓe, ngam ummaatoore fuu ɗon teddina Allah ngam ko laati.
Kuude Neelabe 4.30: Duuɓi goɗɗo mo ɓe njamɗitini ɗum bee kaayeefi, ɓuran cappanɗe nayi.
Kuude Neelabe 4.32: Nde ɓe njoofi Piyer e Yuhanna, ɓe lori ɓe ɗiɗo fuu haa yimɓe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngecci ɓe ko mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en mbi'i ɓe fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 4.33: Nde yimɓe maɓɓe nani ɗum, ɓe fuu ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe tori Allah bee ɓernde woore, ɓe mbi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni tagɗo asama e lesdi e beeli bee ko woni ton fuu
Kuude Neelabe 4.35: An waɗi kaaka amin Daawuda, suka maaɗa, wolwa bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, nde o wi'i:
Kuude Neelabe 4.39: Laamiiɓe duniyaaru ɗon taaski waɗugo fitina,
Kuude Neelabe 4.40: ardiiɓe boo ɗon kaɓɓa dabare dow Jawmiraawo
Kuude Neelabe 4.46: Ngam bana non Hirudus e Pontiyus Pilaatu e ummaatooje e Isra'iila'en ɓe fuu ɓe kawti nder berniwol ngo'ol dow Yeesu, suka maaɗa ceniiɗo, mo a waɗi ɗum Almasiihu
Kuude Neelabe 4.48: Ɓe mbaɗi ko a taaskitini bee baawɗe ma e muuyo ma diga ɓooyma.
Kuude Neelabe 4.49: Jonta, yaa Jawmiraawo, nan barriya maɓɓe! Hokku maccuɓe ma baawɗe wolwugo bolle maaɗa bee dartaare timmididnde!
Kuude Neelabe 4.50: Waŋgin baawɗe maaɗa haa nyawɓe njamɗita, waɗ alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji bee innde Yeesu, suka maaɗa ceniiɗo!”
Kuude Neelabe 4.51: Nde ɓe timmini waɗgo do'a, nokkuure haa ɓe ɗonno kawti dimmbi. Ɓe fuu ɓe kebbinaama Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe ngaazi wolde Allah bee dartaare.
Kuude Neelabe 4.53: Jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe hawti ɓernde woore e hakkiilo wooto. Walaa bi'ɗo: “Jawdi am, min feere am jeyi”, ammaa ɓe kawti ko ɓe mari fuu
Kuude Neelabe 4.55: Bee baawɗe ɗuuɗɗe nelaaɓe ceedi ummitineeki Jawmiraawo Yeesu. Allah barkiɗini ɓe fuu bee barka ɗuuɗka.
Kuude Neelabe 4.56: Walaa talakaajo caka maɓɓe. Marɓe gese malla cuuɗi coorri ɗum, ngaddi ceede coggu man,
Kuude Neelabe 4.57: njo'ini haa nelaaɓe, kamɓe ndokkata ceede man haa koo moy fodde haaje muuɗum.
Kuude Neelabe 4.59: Woodi goɗɗo Lewiijo bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, danyaaɗo haa Kiprus. Nelaaɓe coomi mo Barnabas, bana wi'go Cemmbiɗinoowo-yimɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 4.60: Kaŋko boo o soorri ngesa maako, o waddi ceede man haa nelaaɓe.

Kuude Neelabe 5.1: Ammaa woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas, innde debbo maako boo Safira, o soorri goɗɗum haa maral maɓɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 5.2: O narri bee debbo maako, o senndi ceede man, yeɓre o sigi, yeɓre
Kuude Neelabe 5.4: Piyer wi'i mo: “Ananiyas, koni a acci Sayɗaanu nasta ɓernde ma haa a fewana Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, a sigi yeɓre ceede coggu babal mooɗon?
Kuude Neelabe 5.5: Diga a soorraay ngal, an jeyi. Nde a soorri ngal boo, an mari ceede man. Koni a waɗi anniya huuwugo kuugal nga'al? Allah a fewani, naa yimɓe.”
Kuude Neelabe 5.6: Nde Ananiyas nani bolle ɗe'e, o do'i, o maayi. Kulol maŋngol naŋngi nanɓe haala ka'a fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 5.7: Suka'en ngari, kasni mo, koo'i mo, uwoyi mo.
Kuude Neelabe 5.9: Ɓaawo saa'aaji tati debbo maako wari, o anndaa ko saali.
Kuude Neelabe 5.10: Piyer wi'i mo: “Yeccam, ceede bana nii coorruɗon babal mon na?” O wi'i: “Ooho, non min coorri ngal.”
Kuude Neelabe 5.11: Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Koni on narri, an bee gorko ma ngam jarribaago Ruuhu Jawmiraawo? Suka'en uwɓe gorko ma ɗon haa yolnde jonta, ɓe ndoondete an boo!”
Kuude Neelabe 5.12: Ɗon nii, o do'i, o maayi. Suka'en nasti, tawi o maayi, ɓe ndoondi mo, ɓe uwoyi mo kommbi yenaande goriiko.
Kuude Neelabe 5.13: Kulol maŋngol naŋngi jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe e nanɓe haala ka'a fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 5.15: Nelaaɓe ɗon kuuwa kuuɗe e alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi caka ummaatoore. Nuɗɗinɓe fuu ɗon kawta les daŋki Suleymaanu.
Kuude Neelabe 5.16: Yimɓe wuro fuu kuli hawtango ɓe koo nde ummaatoore ɗonno maŋgta ɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 5.17: Tum worɓe e rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ɓesdano nuɗɗinɓe Jawmiraawo.
Kuude Neelabe 5.18: Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon njahra nyawɓe haa laabi, ɓe ɗon mballina ɓe haa leese e daage, ngam haa mbeelu Piyer yaala dow woɗɓe maɓɓe, saa'i to o ɗon saalo.
Kuude Neelabe 5.19: Yimɓe ngari diga gure taariiɗe Urusaliima, ɓe ngaddi nyawɓe maɓɓe ɓe ruuhuuji coɓɗi torri. Ɓe fuu ɓe njamɗiti.
Kuude Neelabe 5.21: Nden hooreejo liman'en e wonduɓe bee maako fuu, waato yeɓre Saduki'en, kaaji nelaaɓe masin,
Kuude Neelabe 5.22: ɓe naŋngi ɓe, ɓe nastini ɓe fursina
Kuude Neelabe 5.24: Ammaa jemmaare man malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wari, maɓɓiti pareeje fursina, wurtini nelaaɓe, wi'i ɓe:
Kuude Neelabe 5.27: ngecce ummaatoore fuu haala ngeendam kesam ɗa'am.”
Kuude Neelabe 5.28: Nelaaɓe njaɓi, mbaɗi non. Bee baɓɓol ɓe nasti haykaliiru, ɓe ekkitinani yimɓe kuuje ɗe'e.
Kuude Neelabe 5.29: Hooreejo liman'en e wonduɓe bee maako ngari, ɓe ewni ndotti'en Yahuudu'en fuu ngam dawriinde. Nden ɓe neli haa fursina haa ɓe ngaddana ɓe nelaaɓe go.
Kuude Neelabe 5.30: Nde Sooje'en njotti fursina, ɓe tawaay ɓe ton. Nden ɓe lori, ɓe ngecci dawrooɓe:
Kuude Neelabe 5.31: “Min tawi dammuɗe ɗon maɓɓi booɗɗum, aynooɓe boo ɗon ayna, ammaa nde min maɓɓiti, min tawaay koo goɗɗo haa ton.”
Kuude Neelabe 5.32: Nde mawɗo aynooɓe haykaliiru e mawɓe liman'en nani ɗum, ɗum sakli ɓe ngam ɓe anndaa ko saali.
Kuude Neelabe 5.33: Nden goɗɗo wari, wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa, worɓe ɓe on nastinno fursina ɗon ndari nder haykaliiru, ɗon ekkitina ummaatoore!”
Kuude Neelabe 5.34: Nden mawɗo aynooɓe dillidi bee yimɓe mum ton, ɓe ngaddi nelaaɓe, ammaa naa bee semmbe, ngam ɓe kuli taa ummaatoore fiɗa ɓe bee kaa'e.
Kuude Neelabe 5.36: Nde ɓe ngaddi nelaaɓe, ɓe ndarni ɓe yeeso dawrooɓe. Hooreejo liman'en feli ɓe,
Kuude Neelabe 5.37: wi'i: “Min kaɗi on, taa on ngaazina ummaatoore bee innde gorko oo sam, ammaa ndaa ko on mbaɗi! On caŋkiti waazu mon haa Urusaliima fuu. On ngiɗi yowango min aybe mbareeki maako
Kuude Neelabe 5.39: Piyer e nelaaɓe woɗɓe njaabi: “Allah min ɗowtanto, naa yimɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 5.40: Allah mo kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ummitini Yeesu diga maayde, koo nde on mbarino mo bee ɓilugo mo dow leggal.
Kuude Neelabe 5.41: Allah boo ɓaŋgti mo, jo'ini mo haa nyaamo muuɗum, laatini mo laamiiɗo, kisnoowo, ngam haa Isra'iila heɓa tuubu e yaafuye hakkeeji.
Kuude Neelabe 5.42: Minin ngoni seedooɓe haala ka'a, non boo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, mo Allah hokki ɗowtaniiɓe mo.”
Kuude Neelabe 5.44: Nde dawrooɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ɓerni masin haa ɓe mbaɗi anniya mbarugo nelaaɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 5.45: Ammaa woodi gooto maɓɓe, Farisaajo mo innde mum Gamaliyel. O moodibbo tawreeta, teddinaaɗo yeeso ummaatoore fuu. O dari, o umri ɓe ngurtina nelaaɓe yaasi ngam wakkati seɗɗa.
Kuude Neelabe 5.46: Nden o wi'i dawrooɓe: “Onon Isra'iila'en, kakkilane ko on tammi waɗugo yimɓe ɓe'e.
Kuude Neelabe 5.47: Aran boo Tewdas waŋgi, o wi'i o goɗɗo mawɗo. Yimɓe baakin teemeɗɗe nayo tokki mo. Ammaa o mbaraama, tokkiiɓe mo fuu caŋkiti, haala maako waati.
Kuude Neelabe 5.48: Ɓaawoɗon Yahuuda Galiiliijo waŋgi yaake limki yimɓe lesdi. Kaŋko boo, yimɓe tokki mo, ammaa nde o mbara, tokkiiɓe mo caŋkiti.
Kuude Neelabe 5.49: Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on, ndaaye yimɓe ɓe'e, acce ɓe. Ngam to nufaye man malla kuugal man iwi haa yimɓe, ɗum majjan.
Kuude Neelabe 5.50: Ammaa to haa Allah ɗum iwi, on mbaawataa jaalaago ɓe. Kakkile ngam taa on kaɓa bee Allah!” Dawrooɓe njaɓi haala maako.
Kuude Neelabe 5.51: Ɓe ewniti nelaaɓe, ɓe piyi ɓe, ɓe kaɗi ɓe wolwugo bee innde Yeesu. Nden ɓe njoofi ɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 5.52: Nelaaɓe ummi caka dawrooɓe, ngurti, ndilli. Ɓe seyiiɓe masin ngam Allah heyni ɓe torreego ngam daliila innde Yeesu.
Kuude Neelabe 5.53: Nyalaade fuu, ɓe ɗon ekkitina e ɓe ɗon ngaazina yimɓe Linjiila Yeesu Almasiihu nder haykaliiru e haa ci'e

Kuude Neelabe 6.1: Nyalɗe man nuɗɗinɓe tokki ɓesdaago. Nden wolwooɓe Yunaniŋkeere
Kuude Neelabe 6.2: ngurŋgurti dow wolwooɓe Ibraniŋkeere ngam rewɓe yurumɓe
Kuude Neelabe 6.3: wonɓe caka maɓɓe keɓataa geɗal haa cennduki nyaamdu nyalaade fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 6.4: Nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo mooɓti nuɗɗinɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum fottaay min acca waazaago wolde Allah haa min cuklano senndugo nyaamdu.
Kuude Neelabe 6.5: Ngam maajum, deerɗiraaɓe, cuɓe caka mooɗon worɓe njoweeɗiɗo, hoolaaɓe, hebbinaaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, marɓe hikma, haa min kalfitina ɓe kuugal nga'al.
Kuude Neelabe 6.6: Minin kam, min tiinanan do'a e waazaago wolde Allah.”
Kuude Neelabe 6.7: Haala ka'a fottani nuɗɗinɓe fuu, ɓe cuɓi Etiyen, goɗɗo marɗo nuɗɗinki, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Filip, Porokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas bee Nikolawus mo Antakiya, jananno tokkiiɗo diina Yahuudu'en.
Kuude Neelabe 6.8: Ɓe njahri ɓe haa nelaaɓe. Nelaaɓe mbaɗi do'a, mballini juuɗe muuɗum'en dow suɓaaɓe go.
Kuude Neelabe 6.10: Wolde Allah tokki saŋkitaago. Limgal nuɗɗinɓe tokki ɓesdaago masin nder Urusaliima, ɗuuɗɓe nder liman'en boo nuɗɗini.
Kuude Neelabe 6.12: Etiyen, kebbinaaɗo mo'ere e baawɗe Allah, waɗi kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji mawɗi caka yimɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 6.13: Ammaa woɗɓe nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en wi'eteendu Suudu Rimɗinaaɓe, iwɓe haa Sirene bee Aleksandiriya bee yimɓe Silikiya e Asiya ndarni ngaaba bee Etiyen.
Kuude Neelabe 6.14: Etiyen wolwi bee hikma e bee baawɗe Ruuhu haa ɓe mbaawaay dartanaago mo.
Kuude Neelabe 6.15: Ngam man ɓe njoɓi woɗɓe nder sirri haa ɓe mbi'a: “Min nani o wolwi kalluka dow Muusa e dow Allah boo.”
Kuude Neelabe 6.16: Bana nii ɓe umminiri ɓerɗe ummaatoore e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta. Ɓe kippi Etiyen, ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso dawrooɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 6.17: Nden ɓe ngaddi seedooɓe haa pewana mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo, tum o ɗon wolwa kalluka dow suudu Allah seniindu ndu'u e dow tawreeta Muusa boo.
Kuude Neelabe 6.18: Ngam min nani o wi'i: Yeesu mo Nasaratu oo, wilan suudu Allah e waylitan al'aadaaji ɗi Muusa accani en.”
Kuude Neelabe 6.19: Dawrooɓe tawaaɓe ton fuu ɗon cuti Etiyen, ɓe ngi'i yeeso maako nanndi bee yeeso malaa'ikaajo.

Kuude Neelabe 7.1: Hooreejo liman'en ƴami Etiyen: “Gooŋga ɓe mbi'i na?”
Kuude Neelabe 7.2: Etiyen jaabi: “Deerɗiraaɓe e baabiraaɓe, nananeeɗam. Allah tedduɗo waŋgani kaakiraawo meeɗen Ibrahiima diga o ɗonno haa Mesopotamiya, o siwaa jooɗaago haa Haran tawon.
Kuude Neelabe 7.3: Allah wi'i mo: Wurta lesdi ma, accu lenyol ma, yah haa lesdi ndi mi hollete
Kuude Neelabe 7.5: Nden o acci lesdi Kaldiya, o eggi, o jooɗoyi haa Haran. Ɓaawo maayde baaba maako, Allah waddi mo haa lesdi ndi on njooɗi nder maari jonta
Kuude Neelabe 7.7: Yaake man Allah marnaay Ibrahiima koo yaaɓannde kosŋgal nder lesdi ndi'i. Ammaa o iini marnugo mo ndi, kaŋko e danygol maako. Saa'i man boo Ibrahiima walaano ɓiŋngel tawon
Kuude Neelabe 7.9: Allah wi'i mo: Danygol ma njooɗoto haa lesdi njananndi, ɓe laatoto maraaɓe, ɓe torroto baakin duuɓi teemeɗɗe nayi.
Kuude Neelabe 7.10: Ammaa mi hiitoto ummaatoore nastinnde ɓe nder maccuŋgaaku. Ɓaawoɗon, ɓe ngurtoto lesdi man, ɓe njagganto yam haa nokkuure nde'e
Kuude Neelabe 7.12: Nden Allah waɗani Ibrahiima alkawal, juulnol
Kuude Neelabe 7.13: laati alaama maagal. Nde Ibrahiima danyi Isiyaaku, o juulni mo nyannde joweetataɓre, Isiyaaku boo juulni Yaakubu, Yaakubu boo juulni kaakiraaɓe men sappo e ɗiɗo
Kuude Neelabe 7.16: Kaakiraaɓe ɓe'e kaaji Yusufu, ɓe coorri mo haa Misra. Ammaa Allah wondi bee maako
Kuude Neelabe 7.18: wurtini mo diga nder torraaji maako, hokki mo hikma e mo'ere yeeso Firawna, laamiiɗo Misra. Firawna waɗi mo ardiiɗo dow lesdi Misra e dow saare mum fuu
Kuude Neelabe 7.21: waɗi haa Misra bee Kanaana fuu. Ngo torri yimɓe masin, haa kaakiraaɓe meeɗen keɓaay ko nyaame
Kuude Neelabe 7.23: Ngam maajum, nde Yaakubu nani nyaamdu ɗon haa Misra, o neli kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ton jahaaŋgal aranal.
Kuude Neelabe 7.24: Haa jahaaŋgal ɗiɗaɓal Yusufu annditini hoore muuɗum haa deerɗiraaɓe mum. Bana non Firawna anndiri yimɓe saare baaba Yusufu
Kuude Neelabe 7.26: Nden Yusufu neli, hoosi baaba mum Yaakubu bee saare maako fuu: Ɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njowo (75)
Kuude Neelabe 7.28: Nden Yaakubu yehi, jooɗi haa Misra. Ton o maayi, kaŋko e kaakiraaɓe meeɗen fuu
Kuude Neelabe 7.30: Ɓe njahri ɓe haa Sikem. Ton ɓe uwi ɓe nder yenaande nde Ibrahiima sooduno haa ɓiɓɓe Hamor
Kuude Neelabe 7.33: Nde saa'i iinawol ngol Allah hunani Ibrahiima ɓadake yottaago, Isra'iila'en ɓesdi ɗuuɗugo nder Misra,
Kuude Neelabe 7.34: haa wakkati laamiiɗo goɗɗo mo anndaa Yusufu laamani Misra
Kuude Neelabe 7.36: O ƴoyri yimɓe meeɗen, o torri kaakiraaɓe meeɗen go, o dooli ɓe, ɓe ngudina ɓikkoy maɓɓe musinankoy, ngam taa koy ngeeɗa
Kuude Neelabe 7.38: Yaake man nden ɓe ndanyi Muusa, o ɓiɗɗo ŋarniiɗo yeeso Allah. Ɓe njogi mo haa saare baaba maako lebbi tati
Kuude Neelabe 7.40: nden ɓe ngurtini mo. Ammaa ɓiɗɗo Firawna debbo hoosi mo, mawnini mo bana ɓiŋngel muuɗum halal
Kuude Neelabe 7.42: Muusa ekkiti anndal Misra'en fuu, haa o laati baawɗo bolle e kuuɗe fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 7.44: Nde Muusa yotti duuɓi cappanɗe nayi, o waɗi anniya yillaago banndiraaɓe maako, Isra'iila'en.
Kuude Neelabe 7.45: Nde o yi'i Misraajo ɗon torra Isra'iilaajo, o yehi haa o walla mo. O jiŋngi mo, o waati mo, o mbari Misraajo go.
Kuude Neelabe 7.46: O tammino yimɓe maako paaman Allah neli mo haa o hisna ɓe, ammaa ɓe paamaay.
Kuude Neelabe 7.47: Jaŋngo man boo o tawi Isra'iila'en ɗiɗo ɗon kaɓa. O tefi senndugo ɓe, o wi'i: Hey worɓe, onon on deerɗiraaɓe, koni on ngiɗi sarrindirgo?
Kuude Neelabe 7.48: Ammaa torranɗo deerɗum jaabi Muusa, wi'i mo: Moy darni ma hooreejo e kiitoowo amin?
Kuude Neelabe 7.49: A yiɗi mbarugo yam bana mbarɗa Misraajo keenya na?
Kuude Neelabe 7.50: Nde Muusa nani ɗum, o doggi, o jooɗoyi haa Mediyan, lesdi njannandi. O danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo ton
Kuude Neelabe 7.53: Ɓaawo duuɓi cappanɗe nayi, malaa'ikaajo waŋgani Muusa nder jamre yiite nder wumre haa ladde haa hooseere Sina.
Kuude Neelabe 7.54: Ko o yi'i hayɗini mo, o ɓaditi wumre haa o laara booɗɗum. Nden o nani sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon wi'a:
Kuude Neelabe 7.55: Min woni Allah kaakiraaɓe ma, Allah Ibrahiima, Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu. Muusa hultori, diwni, huli laarugo.
Kuude Neelabe 7.56: Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: Faɗɗita ngam nokkuure haa a ɗon dari, nde seniinde.
Kuude Neelabe 7.57: Mi yi'i bone yimɓe am nder Misra. Mi nani uumaali maɓɓe, mi jippake haa mi hisna ɓe. Jonta war, haa mi nele haa Misra
Kuude Neelabe 7.60: Kaŋko woni Muusa mo Isra'iila'en njaɓaayno, ɓe mbi'i mo: Moy waɗi ma hooreejo e kiitoowo? Ammaa Allah neli mo o laato hooreejo e kisnoowo. Allah waɗi ɗum bee juŋngo malaa'ikaajo mo waŋgani mo nder wumre go.
Kuude Neelabe 7.61: Muusa wurtini ɓe bee waɗugo kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji nder lesdi Misra, haa maayo Maaliya e haa ladde duuɓi cappanɗe nayi
Kuude Neelabe 7.63: Muusa wi'i Isra'iila'en: Allah umminanan on annabiijo bana am caka deerɗiraaɓe mooɗon
Kuude Neelabe 7.65: Yaake jama'aare ɗonno nder ladde, kaŋko laati dariiɗo hakkunde kaakiraaɓe meeɗen e malaa'ikaajo bolwanɗo mo haa hooseere Sina. Ton o jaɓi bolle ngeendam haa o hokka en ɗe
Kuude Neelabe 7.68: Ammaa kaakiraaɓe meeɗen cali ɗowtanaago Muusa. Ɓe ɗoyli mo, ɓe ngiɗi loraago haa Misra.
Kuude Neelabe 7.70: : Waɗan min ɗowanteeɓe ardotooɓe min, ngam Muusa, goɗɗo gurtinɗo min lesdi Misra oo, min anndaa ko waɗi mo
Kuude Neelabe 7.72: Ɓe mbaɗi lawru nanndundu bee gaggel, ɓe lii'ani ndu kirseteeɗi, ɓe mbaɗi juulde, ɓe ceyori kuugal maɓɓe nga'al
Kuude Neelabe 7.74: Ammaa Allah ɗoyli ɓe, acci ɓe ɓe cujidana koode asama, bana ko winnda nder deftere annabi'en:
Kuude Neelabe 7.75: Onon Isra'iila'en! Nde on lii'i kirseteeɗi e dokke
Kuude Neelabe 7.76: duuɓi cappanɗe nayi nder ladde, min on lii'ani na?
Kuude Neelabe 7.78: On ndoondi laymaaru lawru mon Molok,
Kuude Neelabe 7.79: on ndoondi horre lawru mon Refan,
Kuude Neelabe 7.80: labbi ɗi on mbaɗi ngam on cujidana ɗi.
Kuude Neelabe 7.85: Laymaaru Allah ɗonno caka kaakiraaɓe meeɗen nder ladde. Ɓe nyooti ndu bana no Allah waŋginani Muusa, bana misaalu ɗum o holli mo
Kuude Neelabe 7.87: Ɓaawoɗon kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ndoni ndu haa baabiraaɓe muuɗum'en. Ɓe ndoondi ndu haa jahaaŋgal maɓɓe dow ardaaŋgal Yosuwa. Allah riiwi ummaatooje goɗɗe yeeso maɓɓe. Laymaaru ndu jooɗi ton haa yotti zamanu Daawuda
Kuude Neelabe 7.89: Daawuda heɓi mo'ere Allah, tori haa o nyiɓana danygol Yaakubu jooɗorde
Kuude Neelabe 7.91: Ammaa ɗum Suleymaanu nyiɓani mo nde
Kuude Neelabe 7.94: Ammaa Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo jooɗataako nder cuuɗi ɗi yimɓe mahata, bana no annabiijo wi'i:
Kuude Neelabe 7.96: Jawmiraawo wi'i: Asama woni leeso laamu am,
Kuude Neelabe 7.101: Naa min waɗi kuuje ɗe'e fuu na
Kuude Neelabe 7.104: Onon saata-ko'e'en, on nanataa haala Allah sam! On cali nanango Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bana kaakiraaɓe mon
Kuude Neelabe 7.106: Woodi annabiijo koo gooto mo kaakiraaɓe mooɗon toonyaaki na? Ɓe mbari nelaaɓe Allah, anndinɓe garki Adiliijo. Ndaa, on zammbi mo, on mbari mo.
Kuude Neelabe 7.107: On njaɓi tawreeta Allah ka malaa'ika'en anndini on, ammaa on tokkaaki ka.”
Kuude Neelabe 7.109: Nde dawrooɓe Yahuudu'en nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe ɓernani Etiyen masin, haa ɓe kirƴindiri nyii'e.
Kuude Neelabe 7.110: Ammaa Etiyen, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, tijji asama, yi'i tedduŋgal Allah, yi'i Yeesu boo ɗon dari haa nyaamo Allah!
Kuude Neelabe 7.111: O wi'i: “Ndaa, mi ɗon yi'a asama ɗon maɓɓiti, mi ɗon yi'a
Kuude Neelabe 7.114: Ɓe ngooki bee sawtu, ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe kawti, ɓe kippi mo.
Kuude Neelabe 7.115: Ɓe ngurtini mo haa yaasi berniwol, ɓe piɗi mo bee kaa'e. Seedooɓe acci limce muuɗum'en haa derkeejo bi'eteeɗo Sol.
Kuude Neelabe 7.116: Saa'i ɓe ɗon piɗa Etiyen, kaŋko o ɗon toro bana ni'i: “Jawmiraawo Yeesu, jaɓ yoŋki am!”
Kuude Neelabe 7.117: O tuggi koppi maako, o hooli, o wi'i: “Jawmiraawo! Yaafana ɓe hakkewol ngo'ol!” Nde o wi'i ɗum o maayi.

Kuude Neelabe 8.1: Sol boo yerdi mbareeki Etiyen. Nyannde man fitina caatuka ukkani jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Urusaliima. Ɓe fuu ɓe caŋkiti haa kawye Yahudiya e Samariya, sey nelaaɓe tan lutti.
Kuude Neelabe 8.2: Yimɓe hulɓe Allah uwi Etiyen, ɓe mboyi mo masin.
Kuude Neelabe 8.4: Ammaa Sol ɗaɓɓi nattingo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. O yehi haa ci'e
Kuude Neelabe 8.5: , o naŋngi nuɗɗinɓe worɓe e rewɓe, o nastini ɓe nder fursina
Kuude Neelabe 8.8: Nuɗɗinɓe saŋkitiiɓe go ngaazi Linjiila, haa ɓe njehi fuu.
Kuude Neelabe 8.9: Filip yehi haa berniwol Samariya, o waazi yimɓe habaru Almasiihu.
Kuude Neelabe 8.10: Mooɓe yimɓe kawti, nani bolle Filip bee hakkiilo, ngi'i boo kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗi.
Kuude Neelabe 8.11: Ngam ruuhuuji coɓɗi ngurti diga yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe bee gookaali. Jiijiiɓe e woosɓe ɗuuɗɓe boo njamɗiti.
Kuude Neelabe 8.14: Woodino goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Simon nder berniwol ngo'ol. O ɗonno hayɗina yimɓe Samariya bee hiilaaji maako. O wi'i o mawɗo.
Kuude Neelabe 8.15: Ngam maajum yimɓe nder berniwol fuu, mawɓe e leesɓe ɗonno nana mo bee hakkiilo. Ɓe mbi'i: “Kaŋko woni baawɗe Allah bi'eteeɗe Baawɗe Mawɗe.”
Kuude Neelabe 8.16: Neeɓi o ɗonno hayɗina ɓe bee hiilaaji maako, ngam maajum ɓe ngerdi mo.
Kuude Neelabe 8.17: Nde Filip waazi ɓe Linjiila dow laamu Allah e dow innde Yeesu Almasiihu, ɓe nuɗɗini, worɓe e rewɓe fuu, ɓe njaɓi baptisma.
Kuude Neelabe 8.18: Simon boo nuɗɗini. Nde o jaɓi baptisma, o tokki Filip, o hayɗini nde o yi'i alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji mawɗi ɗi Filip waɗata.
Kuude Neelabe 8.20: Nde nelaaɓe haa Urusaliima nani yimɓe Samariya njaɓi wolde Allah, ɓe neli Piyer e Yuhanna haa maɓɓe.
Kuude Neelabe 8.21: Nde Piyer e Yuhanna njotti ton, ɓe tori Allah haa o hokka ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Kuude Neelabe 8.22: Ngam yimɓe Samariya jaɓino baptisma bee innde Jawmiraawo Yeesu, ammaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippaakino koo dow gooto maɓɓe tawon.
Kuude Neelabe 8.23: Nden Piyer e Yuhanna mballini juuɗe dow maɓɓe, ɓe keɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Kuude Neelabe 8.25: Nde Simon yi'i yimɓe keɓi Ruuhu ngam nelaaɓe mballini juuɗe dow maɓɓe, o hokki Piyer bee Yuhanna ceede,
Kuude Neelabe 8.26: o wi'i ɓe: “Ndokkeeɗam min boo baawɗe ɗe'e, ngam haa mo mi wallinani ɗum juuɗe am fuu, heɓa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Kuude Neelabe 8.27: Ammaa Piyer jaabi mo: “Allah halkide bee ceede maaɗa fuu, ngam a numi soodugo dokkal Allah bee ceede!
Kuude Neelabe 8.28: A walaa geɗal nder haala ka'a sam, ngam ɓernde ma laaɓaay haa yeeso Allah.
Kuude Neelabe 8.29: Tuubu dow halleende ma! Tora Allah! Teema o yaafante anniya ɓernde ma kalluka ka'a,
Kuude Neelabe 8.30: ngam mi yi'i ɓernde ma ɗon heewi kaajal, a maccuɗo halleende.”
Kuude Neelabe 8.31: Nden Simon tori Piyer e Yuhanna: “Useni, toraneeɗam Jawmiraawo, ngam taa ko mbi'ɗon waranammi.”
Kuude Neelabe 8.33: Piyer e Yuhanna mbaɗi seedamku, ɓe ngaazi wolde Jawmiraawo, nden ɓe lorti haa Urusaliima. Nde ɓe ɗon koota, ɓe ngaazi Linjiila haa gure ɗuuɗɗe nder Samariya.
Kuude Neelabe 8.35: Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wi'i Filip: “Umma, yah haa fombina haa laawol ummotooŋgol Urusaliima yahugo Gaaza.” Yimɓe accino tokkaago laawol ngo'ol.
Kuude Neelabe 8.36: Filip ummi, yehi. Haa ton o tawi Etiyopiyaajo: O cortaaɗo, ardiiɗo mawɗo, kaliifaajo mardi laamiiɗo Kandas debbo mo laami dow lesdi Etiyopiya
Kuude Neelabe 8.37: . O yahno Urusaliima ngam sujidango Allah.
Kuude Neelabe 8.38: O ɗonno jooɗi nder moota pucci maako, o ɗon hoota. O ɗonno jaŋnga deftere annabi Esaaya.
Kuude Neelabe 8.42: Filip doggi, jokki mo, nani o ɗon jaŋnga nder deftere annabi Esaaya, nden o ƴami mo: “A ɗon faama ko a jaŋngata na?”
Kuude Neelabe 8.43: Etiyopiyaajo wi'i: “Noy paamranmi nde mi walaa paamtinoowo?” O tori Filip o wa'o moota pucci, o jooɗo kommbi maako.
Kuude Neelabe 8.44: Ndaa ko o jaŋngi nder deftere man:
Kuude Neelabe 8.45: “O ɗon bana jawgel ngel ɓe njahrata hirseego.
